original: RV_01.030.16.2{31} sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no 'dāt

original: RV_01.030.17.1{31} āśvināvaśvāvatyeṣā yataṃ śavīrayā gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat

original: RV_01.030.18.1{31} samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāvamartyaḥ
analyzed: samāna yojanaḥ hi vām rathaḥ dasrau amartyaḥ

original: RV_01.030.18.2{31} samudre aśvineyate
analyzed: samudre aśvinā īyate

original: RV_01.030.19.1{31} vyaghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ
analyzed: vyaghnyasya mūrdhani cakram rathasya yemathuḥ

original: RV_01.030.19.2{31} pari dyāmanyadīyate
analyzed: pari

original: RV_01.030.20.1{31} kasta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye
analyzed: kaḥ te uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje martaḥ amartye

original: RV_01.030.20.2{31} kaṃ nakṣase vibhāvari
analyzed: kam nakṣase vibhāvari

original: RV_01.030.21.1{31} vayaṃ hi te amanmahyāntādā parākāt
analyzed: vayam hi te amanmahi antāt ā parākāt

original: RV_01.030.21.2{31} aśve na citre aruṣi
analyzed: aśve na citre aruṣi

original: RV_01.030.22.1{31} tvaṃ tyebhirā gahi vājebhirduhitardivaḥ
analyzed: tvam tyebhiḥ ā gahi vājebhiḥ duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_01.030.22.2{31} asme rayiṃ nidhāraya
analyzed: asme rayim nidhāraya

original: RV_01.031.01.1{32} tvamagne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣirdevo devānāmabhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā
analyzed: tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirāḥ ṛṣiḥ devaḥ devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā

analyzed: tava vrate kavayaḥ vidmana apasaḥ ajāyanta marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.031.02.1{32} tvamagne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavirdevānāṃ pari bhūṣasivratam

original: RV_01.031.02.2{32} vibhurviśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cidāyave
analyzed: vibhuḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiraḥ dvi mātā śayuḥ katidhā cit āyave

original: RV_01.031.03.1{32} tvamagne prathamo mātariśvana āvirbhava sukratūyā vivasvate

original: RV_01.031.03.2{32} arejetāṃ rodasī hotṛvūrye 'saghnorbhāramayajo mahovaso

original: RV_01.031.04.1{32} tvamagne manave dyāmavāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ
analyzed: tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase su kṛte sukṛttaraḥ

original: RV_01.031.04.2{32} śvātreṇa yat pitrormucyase paryā tvā pūrvamanayannāparaṃ punaḥ

analyzed: tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭi vardhanaḥ udyata sruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ āhutim pari veda vaṣaṭkṛtim eka āyuḥ agre viśaḥ āvivāsasi

analyzed: dāsa patnīḥ ahi gopāḥ atiṣṭhat niruddhāḥ āpaḥ paṇinā iva gāvaḥ

original: RV_01.032.12.2{38} ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somamavāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn
analyzed: ajayaḥ gāḥ ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn

original: RV_01.032.13.1{38} nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yāṃ mihamakirad dhrāduniṃ ca
analyzed: na asmai vidyut na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirat hrādunim ca

original: RV_01.032.13.2{38} indraśca yad yuyudhāte ahiścotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye

original: RV_01.032.14.1{38} aheryātāraṃ kamapaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīragachat
analyzed: aheḥ yātāram kam apaśyaḥ indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣaḥ bhīḥ agachat

original: RV_01.032.14.2{38} nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhītoataro rajāṃsi
analyzed: nava ca yat navatim ca sravantīḥ śyenaḥ na rajāṃsi

original: RV_01.032.15.1{38} indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ
analyzed: indraḥ yātaḥ avasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇaḥ vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_01.032.15.2{38} sedu rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnāmarān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva
analyzed: sedu rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām amarān na nemiḥ pari tāḥ babhūva

original: RV_01.033.01.1{01} etāyāmopa gavyanta indramasmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti
analyzed: eta āyāma upa gavyantaḥ indram asmākam su pramatim vāvṛdhāti

original: RV_01.033.01.2{01} anāmṛṇaḥ kuvidādasya rāyo gavāṃ ketaṃ paramāvarjate naḥ
analyzed: anāmṛṇaḥ kuvidādasya rāyaḥ gavām ketam param āvarjate naḥ

original: RV_01.033.02.1{01} upedahaṃ dhanadāmapratītaṃ juṣṭaṃ na śyeno vasatimpatāmi
analyzed: upa id aham dhana dāma pratītam juṣṭam na śyenaḥ vasatim patāmi

original: RV_01.033.02.2{01} indraṃ namasyannupamebhirarkairyaḥ stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman
analyzed: indram namasyan upamebhiḥ arkaiḥ yaḥ stotṛbhyaḥ havyaḥ asti yāman

original: RV_01.033.03.1{01} ni sarvasena iṣudhīnrasakta samaryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi
analyzed: ni sarva senaḥ iṣudhīn rasakta samaryaḥ gāḥ ajati yasya vaṣṭi

original: RV_01.033.03.2{01} coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmaṃ mā paṇirbhūrasmadadhi pravṛddha
analyzed: coṣkūyamāṇaḥ indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇiḥ bhūḥ asmat adhi pravṛddha

original: RV_01.033.04.1{01} vadhīrhi dasyuṃ dhaninaṃ ghanenanekaścarannupaśākebhirindra
analyzed: vadhīḥ hi dasyum dhaninam ghanenanekaḥ caran upaśākebhiḥ indra

original: RV_01.033.04.2{01} dhanoradhi viṣuṇak te vyāyannayajvanaḥ sanakāḥ pretimīyuḥ
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi viṣuṇak te vyāyan ayajvanaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ

original: RV_01.033.05.1{01} parā cicchīrṣā vavṛjusta indrāyajvāno yajvabhiḥ spardhamānāḥ
analyzed: parā cit śīrṣā vavṛjuḥ te indra ayajvānaḥ yajvabhiḥ spardhamānāḥ

original: RV_01.033.05.2{01} pra yad divo hariva sthātarugra niravratānadhamorodasyoḥ
analyzed: pra yat divaḥ harivas sthātar ugra

original: RV_01.033.06.1{02} ayuyutsannanavadyasya senāmayātayanta kṣitayo navagvāḥ
analyzed: ayuyutsan anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_01.033.06.2{02} vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhirindrāccitayanta āyan
analyzed: vṛṣāyudhaḥ na vadhrayaḥ niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhiḥ indrāt citayantaḥ āyan

original: RV_01.033.07.1{02} tvametān rudato jakṣataścāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre
analyzed: tvam etān rudataḥ jakṣataḥ ca ayodhayaḥ rajasaḥ indra pāre

original: RV_01.033.07.2{02} avādaho diva ā dasyumuccā pra sunvataḥ stuvataḥ śaṃsamāvaḥ
analyzed: avādahaḥ divaḥ ā dasyum uccā pra sunvataḥ stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ

original: RV_01.033.08.1{02} cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇahaṃ pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ
analyzed: cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyāḥ hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_01.033.08.2{02} na hinvānāsastitirusta indraṃ pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa
analyzed: na hinvānāsaḥ titiruḥ te indram pari spaśaḥ adadhāt sūryeṇa

original: RV_01.033.09.1{02} pari yadindra rodasī ubhe abubhojīrmahinā viśvataḥ sīm
analyzed: pari yat indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīḥ mahinā viśvatas sīm

original: RV_01.033.09.2{02} amanyamānānabhi manyamānairnirbrahmabhiradhamo dasyumindra
analyzed: a manyamānān abhi manyamānaiḥ nirbrahmabhiḥ adhamaḥ dasyum indra

original: RV_01.033.10.1{02} na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antamāpurna māyābhirdhanadāṃ paryabhūvan
analyzed: na ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ antam āpuḥ na māyābhiḥ dhana dām paryabhūvan

original: RV_01.033.10.2{02} yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaścakra indro nirjyotiṣā tamaso gā adukṣat
analyzed: yujam vajram vṛṣabhaḥ cakre indraḥ nirjyotiṣā tamasaḥ gāḥ adukṣat

original: RV_01.033.11.1{03} anu svadhāmakṣarannāpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām
analyzed: anu svadhām akṣaran āpaḥ asya avardhata madhye ā nāvyānām

original: RV_01.033.11.2{03} sadhrīcīnena manasā tamindra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhannabhi dyūn
analyzed: sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indraḥ ojiṣṭhena hanmanā ahan abhi dyūn

original: RV_01.033.12.1{03} nyāvidhyadilībiśasya dṛlhā vi śṛṅgiṇamabhinacchuṣṇamindraḥ
analyzed: nyāvidhyat ilībiśasya dṛlhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinat śuṣṇam indraḥ

original: RV_01.033.12.2{03} yāvat taro maghavan yāvadojo vajreṇa śatrumavadhīḥ pṛtanyum
analyzed: yāvat taraḥ maghavan yāvat ojaḥ vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum

original: RV_01.033.13.1{03} abhi sidhmo ajigādasya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇa puro 'bhet
analyzed: abhi sidhmaḥ ajigādasya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇa puraḥ abhet

original: RV_01.033.13.2{03} saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtramindraḥ pra svāṃ matimatiracchāśadānaḥ
analyzed: sam vajreṇa asṛjat vṛtram indraḥ pra svām mati matiḥ acchāśadānaḥ

original: RV_01.033.14.1{xx} āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmi cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
analyzed: āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmi cākan prāvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum

original: RV_01.033.14.2{xx} śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau //
analyzed: śapha cyutaḥ reṇuḥ nakṣata dyām ud śvaitreyaḥ nṛṣāhyāya tasthau

original: RV_01.033.15.1{xx} āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañchvitryaṃ gām /
analyzed: āvaḥ śamam vṛṣabham tugryāsu kṣetra jeṣe maghavan śvitryam gām

original: RV_01.033.15.2{xx} jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañchatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ //
analyzed: jyok cit atra tasthivāṃsaḥ akran śatrūyatām adharā vedanā akaḥ

original: RV_01.034.01.1{xx} triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā /
analyzed: tris cit naḥ adya bhavatam navedasā vibhuḥ vām yāmaḥ uta rātiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_01.034.01.2{xx} yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso 'bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi yantram himyā iva vāsasaḥ abhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_01.034.02.1{xx} trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id viduḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ pavayaḥ madhu vāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśve id viduḥ

original: RV_01.034.02.2{xx} traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v aśvinā divā //
analyzed: traya skambhāsa skabhitāsaḥ ārabhe tris naktam yāthaḥ tris u aśvinā divā

original: RV_01.034.03.1{xx} samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam /
analyzed: samāne ahan tris avadya gohanā tris adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam

original: RV_01.034.03.2{xx} trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca pinvatam //
analyzed: tris vājavatīḥ iṣaḥ aśvinā yuvam doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaḥ ca pinvatam

original: RV_01.034.04.1{xx} trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvyetredheva śikṣatam /
analyzed: tris vartiḥ yātam tris anuvrate jane tris suprāvye tredhā iva śikṣatam

original: RV_01.034.04.2{xx} trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva pinvatam //
analyzed: tris nāndyam vahatam aśvinā yuvam tris pṛkṣaḥ asme akṣarā iva pinvatam

original: RV_01.034.05.1{xx} trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir utāvataṃ dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: tris naḥ rayim vahatam aśvinā yuvam tris devatātā tris uta avatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_01.034.05.2{xx} triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre duhitā ruhad ratham //
analyzed: tris saubhaga tvam tris uta śravāṃsi naḥ triṣṭham vām sūraḥ duhitā ruhat ratham

original: RV_01.034.06.1{xx} trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ /
analyzed: tris naḥ aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā tris pārthivāni tris u dattam adbhyaḥ

original: RV_01.034.06.2{xx} omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī //
analyzed: omānam śaṃyoḥ mamakāya sūnave tri dhātu śarma vahatam śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_01.034.07.1{xx} trir no aśvinā yajatā dive-dive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam /
analyzed: tris naḥ aśvinā yajatā dive dive pari tri dhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam

original: RV_01.034.07.2{xx} tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gachatam //
analyzed: tisraḥ nāsatyā rathyā parāvataḥ ātmā iva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gachatam

original: RV_01.034.08.1{xx} trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam /
analyzed: tris aśvinā sindhubhiḥ sapta mātṛbhiḥ trayaḥ āhāvāḥ tredhā haviḥ kṛtam

original: RV_01.034.08.2{xx} tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam //
analyzed: tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ upari pravā divaḥ nākam rakṣethe dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ hitam

original: RV_01.034.09.1{xx} kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ /
analyzed: kva trī cakrā trivṛtaḥ rathasya kva trayaḥ vandhuraḥ ye sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_01.034.09.2{xx} kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ //
analyzed: kadā yogaḥ vājinaḥ rāsabhasya yena yajñam nāsatyā upayāthaḥ

original: RV_01.034.10.1{xx} ā nāsatyā gachataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā nāsatyā gacchatam hūyate haviḥ madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhiḥ āsabhiḥ

original: RV_01.034.10.2{xx} yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi pūrvam savitā uṣasaḥ ratham ṛtāya citram ghṛtavantam iṣyati

original: RV_01.034.11.1{xx} ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā /
analyzed: ā nāsatyā tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha devebhiḥ yātam madhu peyam aśvinā

original: RV_01.034.11.2{xx} prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
analyzed: pra āyuḥ tāriṣṭam niḥ rapāṃsi mṛkṣatam sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā

original: RV_01.034.12.1{xx} ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram /
analyzed: ā naḥ aśvinā trivṛtā rathena arvāñcam rayim vahatam su vīram

original: RV_01.034.12.2{xx} śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
analyzed: śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau

original: RV_01.035.01.1{xx} hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase /
analyzed: hvayāmi agnim prathamam svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇau iha avase

original: RV_01.035.01.2{xx} hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
analyzed: hvayāmi rātrīm jagataḥ niveśanīm hvayāmi devam savitāram ūtaye

original: RV_01.035.02.1{xx} ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca /
analyzed: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca

original: RV_01.035.02.2{xx} hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
analyzed: hiraṇyayena savitā rathena ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan

original: RV_01.035.03.1{xx} yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām /
analyzed: yāti devaḥ pravatā yāti udvatā yāti śubhrābhyām yajataḥ haribhyām

original: RV_01.035.03.2{xx} ā devo yāti savitā parāvato 'pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ //
analyzed: ā devaḥ yāti savitā parāvataḥ apa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ

original: RV_01.035.04.1{xx} abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam /
analyzed: abhīvṛtam kṛśanaiḥ viśva rūpam hiraṇya śamyam yajataḥ bṛhantam

original: RV_01.035.04.2{xx} āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ //
analyzed: āsthāt ratham savitā citra bhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīm dadhānaḥ

original: RV_01.035.05.1{xx} vi janāñchyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraraugaṃ vahantaḥ /
analyzed: vi janān śyāvāḥ śiti pādaḥ akhyan ratham hiraṇya praraugam vahantaḥ

original: RV_01.035.05.2{xx} śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: śaśvat viśaḥ savituḥ daivyasya upasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_01.035.06.1{xx} tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ /
analyzed: tisraḥ dyāvaḥ savituḥ dvau upasthe ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāh

original: RV_01.035.06.2{xx} āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat //
analyzed: āṇim na rathyam amṛtā adhi tasthuḥ iha bravītu yaḥ u tat ciketat

original: RV_01.035.07.1{xx} vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ /
analyzed: vi suparṇaḥ antarikṣāṇi akhyat gabhīra vepāḥ asuraḥ su nīthaḥ

original: RV_01.035.07.2{xx} kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna //
analyzed: kva idānīm sūryaḥ kaḥ ciketa katamām dyām raśmiḥ asya ā tatāna

original: RV_01.035.08.1{xx} aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn /
analyzed: aṣṭau vi akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn

original: RV_01.035.08.2{xx} hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: hiraṇya akṣaḥ savitā devaḥ āgāt dadhat ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_01.035.09.1{xx} hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate /
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇiḥ ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate

original: RV_01.035.09.2{xx} apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti //
analyzed: apa amīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti

original: RV_01.035.10.1{07} hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavān yātvarvāṃ
analyzed: hiraṇya hastaḥ asuraḥ su nīthaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ svavān yātu arvān

original: RV_01.035.10.2{07} apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānānasthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: apasedhan rakṣasaḥ yātudhānān asthāt devaḥ pratidoṣam gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_01.035.11.1{07} ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe
analyzed: ye te panthāḥ savitar pūrvyāsaḥ areṇavaḥ su kṛtāḥ antarikṣe

original: RV_01.035.11.2{07} tebhirno adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ adya pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ rakṣā ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva

original: RV_01.036.01.1{08} pra vo yahvaṃ purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām
analyzed: pra vaḥ yahvam purūṇām viśām devayatīnām

original: RV_01.036.01.2{08} agniṃ sūktebhirvacobhirīmahe yaṃ sīmidanya īḷate
analyzed: agnim sūktebhiḥ vacobhiḥ īmahe yam sīmidanyaḥ īḍate

original: RV_01.036.02.1{08} janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te
analyzed: janāsaḥ agnim dadhire sahaḥ vṛdham haviṣmantaḥ vidhema te

original: RV_01.036.02.2{08} sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ iha avitā bhava vājeṣu santya

original: RV_01.036.03.1{08} pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam
analyzed: pra tvā dūtam vṛṇīmahe hotāram viśva vedasam

original: RV_01.036.03.2{08} mahaste sato vi carantyarcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ te sataḥ vi caranti arcayaḥ divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ

original: RV_01.036.04.1{08} devāsastvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtaṃ pratnamindhate
analyzed: devāsaḥ tvā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā sam dūtam pratnam indhate

original: RV_01.036.04.2{08} viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yaste dadāśa martyaḥ
analyzed: viśvam saḥ agne jayati tvayā dhanam yaḥ te dadāśa martyaḥ

original: RV_01.036.05.1{08} mandro hotā gṛhapatiragne dūto viśāmasi
analyzed: mandraḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ agne dūtaḥ viśāmasi

original: RV_01.036.05.2{08} tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata
analyzed: tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: RV_01.036.06.1{09} tve idagne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvamā hūyate haviḥ
analyzed: tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvamā hūyate haviḥ

original: RV_01.036.06.2{09} satvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā
analyzed: satvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ uta aparam yakṣi devān su vīryā

original: RV_01.036.07.1{09} taṃ ghemitthā namasvina upa svarājamāsate
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate

original: RV_01.036.07.2{09} hotrābhiragniṃ manuṣaḥ samindhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ
analyzed: hotrābhiḥ agnim manuṣaḥ samindhate titirvāṃsaḥ ati sridhaḥ

original: RV_01.036.08.1{09} ghnanto vṛtramataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtram ataran rodasī apaḥ uru kṣayāya cakrire

original: RV_01.036.08.2{09} bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumnyāhutaḥ krandadaśvo gaviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumnya āhutaḥ krandat aśvaḥ gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.036.09.1{09} saṃ sīdasva mahānasi śocasva devavītamaḥ
analyzed: sam sīdasva mahānasi śocasva deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_01.036.09.2{09} vi dhūmamagne aruṣaṃ miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam
analyzed: vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam

original: RV_01.036.10.1{09} yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhuriha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana
analyzed: yam tvā devāsaḥ manave dadhuḥ iha yajiṣṭham havyavāhana

original: RV_01.036.10.2{09} yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithirdhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yamupastutaḥ
analyzed: yam kaṇvaḥ medhyātithiḥ dhana spṛtam yam vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ

original: RV_01.036.11.1{10} yamagniṃ medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtādadhi
analyzed: yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇvaḥ īdhe ṛtāt adhi

original: RV_01.036.11.2{10} tasya preṣo dīdiyustamimā ṛcastamagniṃ vardhayāmasi
analyzed: tasya pra iṣaḥ dīdiyuḥ tam imāḥ ṛcaḥ tam agnim vardhayāmasi

original: RV_01.036.12.1{10} rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo 'sti hi te 'gne deveṣvāpyam
analyzed: rāyaḥ pūrdhi svadhāvas asti hi te agne deveṣu āpyam

original: RV_01.036.12.2{10} tvaṃvājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahānasi
analyzed: tvam vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa naḥ mṛḍa mahān asi

original: RV_01.036.13.1{10} ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ u su naḥ ūtaye tiṣṭha devaḥ na savitā

original: RV_01.036.13.2{10} ūrdhvovājasya sanitā yadañjibhirvāghadbhirvihvayāmahe
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ vājasya sanitā yat añjibhiḥ vāghadbhiḥ vihvayāmahe

original: RV_01.036.14.1{10} ūrdhvo naḥ pāhyaṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ ni ketunā viśvam samatriṇam daha

original: RV_01.036.14.2{10} kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñcarathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ
analyzed: kṛdhi naḥ ūrdhvān carathāya jīvase vida deveṣu naḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_01.036.15.1{10} pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrterarāvṇaḥ
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrteḥ arāvṇaḥ

original: RV_01.036.15.2{10} pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya
analyzed: pāhi rīṣataḥ uta vā jighāṃsataḥ bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_01.036.16.1{11} ghaneva viṣvag vi jahyarāvṇastapurjambha yo asmadhruk
analyzed: ghanā iva viṣvak vi jahi avṇaḥ tapuḥ jambha yaḥ asmadhruk

original: RV_01.036.16.2{11} yo martyaḥ śiśīte atyaktubhirmā naḥ sa ripurīśata
analyzed: yaḥ martyaḥ śiśīte ati aktubhiḥ mā naḥ sa ripuḥ īśata

original: RV_01.036.17.1{11} agnirvavne suvīryamagniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam
analyzed: agniḥ vavne su vīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam

original: RV_01.036.17.2{11} agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithimagniḥ sātā upastutam
analyzed: agniḥ prāvat mitrā uta medhyātithim agniḥ sātau upastutam

original: RV_01.036.18.1{11} agninā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: agninā turvaśam yadum parāvataḥ ugrādevam havāmahe

original: RV_01.036.18.2{11} agnirnayan navavāstvaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ nayat navavāstvam bṛhat ratham turvītim dasyave sahaḥ

original: RV_01.036.19.1{11} ni tvāmagne manurdadhe jyotirjanāya śaśvate
analyzed: ni tvām agne manuḥ dadhe jyotiḥ janāya śaśvate

original: RV_01.036.19.2{11} dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: dīdetha kaṇve ṛta jātaḥ ukṣitaḥ yam namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.036.20.1{11} tveṣāso agneramavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye
analyzed: tveṣāsaḥ agneḥ amavantaḥ arcayaḥ bhīmāsaḥ na pratītaye

original: RV_01.036.20.2{11} rakṣasvinaḥ sadamid yātumāvato viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha
analyzed: rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvataḥ viśvam samatriṇam daha

original: RV_01.037.01.1{12} krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutamanarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham
analyzed: krīḍam vaḥ śardhaḥ mārutam anarvāṇam ratheśubham

original: RV_01.037.01.2{12} kaṇvā abhi pra gāyata
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_01.037.02.1{12} ye pṛṣatībhirṛṣṭibhiḥ sākaṃ vāśībhirañjibhiḥ
analyzed: ye pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākam vāśībhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_01.037.02.2{12} ajāyanta svabhānavaḥ
analyzed: ajāyanta sva bhānavaḥ

original: RV_01.037.03.1{12} iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān
analyzed: iha iva śṛṇve eṣām kaśāḥ hasteṣu yat vadān

original: RV_01.037.03.2{12} ni yāmañcitram ṛñjate
analyzed: ni yāmañcitram ṛñjate

original: RV_01.037.04.1{12} pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe
analyzed: pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣa dyumnāya śuṣmiṇe

original: RV_01.037.04.2{12} devattaṃ brahma gāyata
analyzed: devattam brahma gāyata

original: RV_01.037.05.1{12} pra śaṃsā goṣvaghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yacchardho mārutam
analyzed: pra śaṃsa goṣu aghnyam krīḍam yat śardhaḥ mārutam

original: RV_01.037.05.2{12} jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe
analyzed: jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe

original: RV_01.037.06.1{13} ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaśca gmaśca dhūtayaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ varṣiṣṭhaḥ ā naraḥ divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_01.037.06.2{xx} yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha //
analyzed: yat sīm antam na dhūnutha

original: RV_01.037.07.1{xx} ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave /
analyzed: ni vaḥ yāmāya mānuṣaḥ dadhre ugrāya manyave

original: RV_01.037.07.2{xx} jihīta parvato giriḥ //
analyzed: jihīta parvataḥ giriḥ

original: RV_01.037.08.1{xx} yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvān iva viśpatiḥ

original: RV_01.037.08.2{xx} bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate //
analyzed: bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate

original: RV_01.037.09.1{xx} sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave /
analyzed: sthiram hi jānam eṣām vayaḥ mātuḥ niretave

original: RV_01.037.09.2{xx} yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ

original: RV_01.037.10.1{xx} ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata /
analyzed: ud u tye sūnavaḥ giraḥ kāṣṭhāḥ ajmeṣu atnata

original: RV_01.037.10.2{xx} vāśrā abhijñu yātave //
analyzed: vāśrāḥ abhijñu yātave

original: RV_01.037.11.1{xx} tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram /
analyzed: tyam cit gha dīrgham pṛthum mihaḥ napātam amṛdhram

original: RV_01.037.11.2{xx} pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.037.12.1{xx} maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana /
analyzed: marutaḥ yat ha vaḥ balam janān acucyavītana

original: RV_01.037.12.2{xx} girīṃr acucyavītana //
analyzed: girīṃr acucyavītana

original: RV_01.037.13.1{xx} yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate 'dhvann ā /
analyzed: yat ha yānti marutaḥ sam ha bruvate adhvan ā

original: RV_01.037.13.2{xx} śṛṇoti kaś cid eṣām //
analyzed: śṛṇoti kaḥ cit eṣām

original: RV_01.037.14.1{xx} pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ /
analyzed: pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vaḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_01.037.14.2{xx} tatro ṣu mādayādhvai //
analyzed: tatra u su mādayādhvai

original: RV_01.037.15.1{xx} asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām /
analyzed: asti hi sma madāya vaḥ smasi sma vayam eṣām

original: RV_01.037.15.2{xx} viśvaṃ cid āyur jīvase //
analyzed: viśvam cit āyuḥ jīvase

original: RV_01.038.01.1{xx} kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ /
analyzed: kad ha nūnam kadhapriyaḥ pitā putram na hastayoḥ

original: RV_01.038.01.2{xx} dadhidhve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ //
analyzed: dadhidhve vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_01.038.02.1{xx} kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: kva nūnam kad vaḥ artham gantā divaḥ na pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_01.038.02.2{xx} kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti //
analyzed: kva vaḥ gāvaḥ na raṇyanti

original: RV_01.038.03.1{xx} kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā /
analyzed: kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā

original: RV_01.038.03.2{xx} kvï viśvāni saubhagā //
analyzed: ku viśvāni saubhagā

original: RV_01.038.04.1{xx} yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana /
analyzed: yat yūyam pṛśni mātaraḥ martāsaḥ syātana

original: RV_01.038.04.2{xx} stotā vo amṛtaḥ syāt //
analyzed: stotā vaḥ amṛtaḥ syāt

original: RV_01.038.05.1{xx} mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ /
analyzed: mā vaḥ mṛgaḥ na yavase jaritā bhūt ajoṣyaḥ

original: RV_01.038.05.2{xx} pathā yamasya gād upa //
analyzed: pathā yamasya gāt upa

original: RV_01.038.06.1{xx} mo ṣu ṇaḥ parā-parā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt /
analyzed: mā u su naḥ parāparā nirṛtiḥ durhaṇā vadhīt

original: RV_01.038.06.2{xx} padīṣṭa tṛṣṇayā saha //
analyzed: padīṣṭa tṛṣṇayā saha

original: RV_01.038.07.1{xx} satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ /
analyzed: satyam tveṣāḥ amavantaḥ dhanvam cit ā rudriyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.038.07.2{xx} mihaṃ kṛṇvanty avātām //
analyzed: miham kṛṇvanti avātām

original: RV_01.038.08.1{xx} vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti /
analyzed: vāśrā iva vidyut mimāti vatsam na mātā siṣakti

original: RV_01.038.08.2{xx} yad eṣāṃ vṛṣṭir asarji //
analyzed: yat eṣām vṛṣṭiḥ asarji

original: RV_01.038.09.1{xx} divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena /
analyzed: divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyena uda vāhena

original: RV_01.038.09.2{xx} yat pṛthivīṃ vyundanti //
analyzed: yat pṛthivīm vyundanti

analyzed: adha svanāt marutām viśvam ā sadma pārthivam

analyzed: arejanta pra mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_01.038.11.1{xx} maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu /
analyzed: marutaḥ vīḍu pāṇibhiḥ citrāḥ rodhasvatīḥ anu

original: RV_01.038.11.2{xx} yātem akhidrayāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: yāta īm akhidra yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.038.12.2{xx} susaṃskṛtā abhīśavaḥ //
analyzed: su saṃskṛtāḥ abhīśavaḥ

analyzed: achā vada tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim

analyzed: agnim mitram na darśatam

original: RV_01.038.14.1{xx} mimīhi ślokam āsyaparjanya iva tatanaḥ /
analyzed: mimīhi ślokam āsya parjanyaḥ iva tatanaḥ

analyzed: gāya gāyatram ukthyam

original: RV_01.038.15.1{xx} vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam /
analyzed: vandasva mārutam gaṇam tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam

original: RV_01.038.15.2{xx} asme vṛddhā asann iha //
analyzed: asme vṛddhāḥ asan iha

original: RV_01.039.01.1{xx} pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha /
analyzed: pra yat itthā parāvataḥ śociḥ na mānam asyatha

analyzed: kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kam yātha kam ha dhūtayaḥ

analyzed: sthirā vaḥ santu āyudhā parāṇude vīḍū uta pratiṣkabhe

original: RV_01.039.02.2{xx} yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_01.039.03.1{xx} parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru /
analyzed: parā ha yat sthiram hatha naraḥ vartayathā guru

original: RV_01.039.03.2{xx} vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām //
analyzed: vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vi āśāḥ parvatānām

original: RV_01.039.04.1{xx} nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: nahi vaḥ śatruḥ vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyām riśādasaḥ

original: RV_01.039.04.2{xx} yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe //
analyzed: yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāsaḥ nu cit ādhṛṣe

original: RV_01.039.05.1{xx} pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn /
analyzed: pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn

original: RV_01.039.05.2{xx} pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā //
analyzed: pra u ārata marutaḥ durmadāḥ iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā

original: RV_01.039.06.1{xx} upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
analyzed: upa u ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam praṣṭiḥ vahati rohitaḥ

original: RV_01.039.06.2{xx} ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ //
analyzed: ā vaḥ yāmāya pṛthivī cit aśrot abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_01.039.07.1{xx} ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā vaḥ makṣū tanāya kam rudrāḥ avaḥ vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_01.039.07.2{xx} gantā nūnaṃ no 'vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe //
analyzed: ganta nūnam naḥ avasā yathā purā itthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe

original: RV_01.039.08.1{xx} yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate /
analyzed: yuṣmeṣitaḥ marutaḥ martya iṣitaḥ ā yaḥ naḥ abhvaḥ īṣate

original: RV_01.039.08.2{xx} vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: vi tam yuyota śavasā vi ojasā vi yuṣmākābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_01.039.09.1{19} asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ
analyzed: asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvam dada pracetasaḥ

original: RV_01.039.09.2{19} asāmibhirmaruta ā na ūtibhirgantā vṛṣtiṃ na vidyutaḥ
analyzed: asāmibhiḥ marutaḥ ā naḥ ūtibhiḥ ganta vṛṣtim na vidyutaḥ

original: RV_01.039.10.1{19} asāmyojo bibhṛthā sudānavo 'sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ
analyzed: asāmi ojaḥ bibhṛtha sudānavaḥ asāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ

original: RV_01.039.10.2{19} ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam
analyzed: ṛṣi dviṣe marutaḥ parimanyavaḥ iṣum na sṛjata dviṣam

original: RV_01.040.01.1{20} ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantastvemahe
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇaḥ pate devayantaḥ tvā īmahe

original: RV_01.040.01.2{20} upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūrbhavā sacā
analyzed: upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānavaḥ indra prāśūḥ bhava sacā

original: RV_01.040.02.1{20} tvāmid dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite
analyzed: tvām id hi sahasas putra martyaḥ upabrūte dhane hite

original: RV_01.040.02.2{20} suvīryaṃ maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake
analyzed: su vīryam marutaḥ ā su aśvyam dadhīta yaḥ vaḥ ācake

original: RV_01.040.03.1{20} praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devyetu sūnṛtā
analyzed: praitu brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ pra devyetu sūnṛtā

original: RV_01.040.03.2{20} achā vīraṃnaryaṃ paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ
analyzed: achā vīraṃnaryam paṅkti rādhasam devāḥ yajñam nayantu naḥ

original: RV_01.040.04.1{20} yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vāghate dadāti sūnaram vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_01.040.04.2{20} tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrāmā yajāmahe supratūrtimanehasam
analyzed: tasmai iḷām su vīrāmā yajāmahe su pratūrtim anehasam

original: RV_01.040.05.1{20} pra nūnaṃ brahmaṇas patirmantraṃ vadatyukthyam
analyzed: pra nūnam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ mantram vadati ukthyam

original: RV_01.040.05.2{20} yasminnindro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire
analyzed: yasmin indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā devāḥ okāṃsi cakrire

original: RV_01.040.06.1{21} tamid vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvaṃ mantraṃ devā anehasam
analyzed: tam id voca imāḥ vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantram devāḥ anehasam

original: RV_01.040.06.2{21} imāṃ ca vācaṃ pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat
analyzed: imām ca vācam pratiharyathā naraḥ viśvā id vāmā vaḥ aśnavat

original: RV_01.040.07.1{21} ko devayantamaśnavajjanaṃ ko vṛktabarhiṣam
analyzed: kaḥ devayantam aśnavat janam kaḥ vṛktabarhiṣam

original: RV_01.040.07.2{21} pra-pra dāśvān pastyābhirasthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe
analyzed: pra pra dāśvān pastyābhiḥ asthita antar vāvat kṣayam dadhe

original: RV_01.040.08.1{21} upa kṣstraṃ pṛñcīta hanti rājabhirbhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe
analyzed: upa kṣstram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhiḥ bhaye cit su kṣitim dadhe

original: RV_01.040.08.2{21} nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ
analyzed: na asya vartā na tarutā mahādhane na arbhe asti vajriṇaḥ

original: RV_01.041.01.1{22} yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: yam rakṣanti pracetasaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_01.041.01.2{22} nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ
analyzed: nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ

original: RV_01.041.02.1{22} yaṃ bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ
analyzed: yam bāhutā iva piprati pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_01.041.02.2{22} ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ sarvaḥ edhate

original: RV_01.041.03.1{22} vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām
analyzed: vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puras ghnanti rājānaḥ eṣām

original: RV_01.041.03.2{22} nayanti duritā tiraḥ
analyzed: nayanti duritā tiras

original: RV_01.041.04.1{22} sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate
analyzed: su gaḥ panthāḥ anṛkṣaraḥ ādityāsaḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_01.041.04.2{22} nātrāvakhādo asti vaḥ
analyzed: na atra avakhādaḥ asti vaḥ
