analyzed: avidriya abhirūtibhiḥ

original: RV_01.047.01.1{01} ayaṃ vāṃ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: ayam vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ somaḥ ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_01.047.01.2{01} tamaśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuśe
analyzed: tam aśvinā pibatam tiroahnyam dhattam ratnāni dāśuśe

original: RV_01.047.02.1{01} trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: tri vandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_01.047.02.2{01} kaṇvāso vāṃ brahma kṛṇvantyadhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ vām brahma kṛṇvanti adhvare teṣām su śṛṇutam havam

original: RV_01.047.03.1{01} aśvinā madhumattamaṃ pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: aśvinā madhumattamam pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_01.047.03.2{01} athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsamupa gachatam
analyzed: atha adya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam

original: RV_01.047.04.1{01} triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñaṃ mimikṣatam
analyzed: triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśva vedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam

original: RV_01.047.04.2{01} kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ vām suta somāḥ abhidyavaḥ yuvām havante aśvinā

original: RV_01.047.05.1{01} yābhiḥ kaṇvamabhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvataṃ yuvamaśvinā
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvatam yuvam aśvinā

original: RV_01.047.05.2{01} tābhiḥ ṣvasmānavataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: tābhiḥ su asmān avatam śubhaḥ patī pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_01.047.06.1{02} sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatamaśvinā
analyzed: sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣaḥ vahatam aśvinā

original: RV_01.047.06.2{02} rayiṃ samudrāduta vā divas paryasme dhattaṃ puruspṛham
analyzed: rayim samudrāt uta vā divaḥ pari asme dhattam puruspṛham

original: RV_01.047.07.1{02} yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe
analyzed: yat nāsatyā parāvati yat vā sthaḥ adhi turvaśe

original: RV_01.047.07.2{02} ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: atas rathena suvṛtā naḥ ā gatam sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_01.047.08.1{02} arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savanedupa
analyzed: arvāñcā vām saptayaḥ adhvara śriyaḥ vahantu savanā id upa

original: RV_01.047.08.2{02} iṣaṃ pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā
analyzed: iṣam pṛñcantā su kṛte sudānavaḥ ā barhiḥ sīdatam narā

original: RV_01.047.09.1{02} tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā
analyzed: tena nāsatyā gatam rathena sūrya tvacā

original: RV_01.047.09.2{02} yena śaśvadūhathurdāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: yena śaśvat ūhathuḥ dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_01.047.10.1{02} ukthebhirarvāgavase purūvasū arkaiśca ni hvayāmahe
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ arvāk avase purūvasū arkaiḥ ca ni hvayāmahe

original: RV_01.047.10.2{02} śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somaṃ papathuraśvinā
analyzed: śaśvat kaṇvānām sadasi priye hi kam somam papathuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_01.048.01.1{03} saha vāmena na uṣo vyuchā duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: saha vāmena naḥ uṣaḥ vyucha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_01.048.01.2{03} saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī
analyzed: saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī

original: RV_01.048.02.1{03} aśvāvatīrgomatīrviśvasuvido bhūri cyavanta vastave
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ viśva su vidaḥ bhūri cyavanta vastave

original: RV_01.048.02.2{03} udīraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaścoda rādho maghonām
analyzed: udīraya prati mā sūnṛtāḥ uṣaḥ coda rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_01.048.03.1{03} uvāsoṣā uchācca nu devī jīrā rathānām
analyzed: uvāsa uṣāḥ uchāt ca nu devī jīrā rathānām

original: RV_01.048.03.2{03} ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: ye asyāḥ ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_01.048.04.1{03} uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ
analyzed: uṣaḥ ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate manaḥ dānāya sūrayaḥ

original: RV_01.048.04.2{03} atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām
analyzed: atra aha tat kaṇvaḥ eṣām kaṇvatamaḥ nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām

original: RV_01.048.05.1{03} ā ghā yoṣeva sūnaryuṣā yāti prabhuñjatī
analyzed: ā ghā yoṣā iva sūnaryuṣā yāti prabhuñjatī

original: RV_01.048.05.2{03} jarayantī vṛjanaṃ padvadīyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: jarayantī vṛjanam padvadīyate ud pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_01.048.06.1{04} vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vyarthinaḥ padāṃ na vetyodatī
analyzed: vi yā sṛjati samanam vyarthinaḥ padām na

original: RV_01.048.06.2{04} vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati
analyzed: vayaḥ nakir ṭe paptivāṃsaḥ āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati

original: RV_01.048.07.1{04} eṣāyukta parāvataḥ sūryasyodayanādadhi
analyzed: eṣā ayukta parāvataḥ sūryasya udayanāt adhi

original: RV_01.048.07.2{04} śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yātyabhi mānuṣān
analyzed: śatam rathebhiḥ subhagā uṣāḥ iyam vi yāti abhi mānuṣān

original: RV_01.048.08.1{04} viśvamasyā nānāma cakṣase jagajjyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī
analyzed: viśvam asyāḥ nānāma cakṣase jagat jyotiḥ kṛṇoti sūnarī

original: RV_01.048.08.2{04} apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā uchadapa sridhaḥ
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ maghonī duhitā divaḥ uṣāḥ uchat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_01.048.09.1{04} uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: uṣe ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_01.048.09.2{04} āvahantī bhūryasmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyuchantī diviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: āvahantī bhūḥ asmabhyam saubhagam vyuchantī diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.048.10.1{04} viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yaduchasi sūnari
analyzed: viśvasya hi prāṇanam jīvanam tve vi yat uchasi sūnari

original: RV_01.048.10.2{04} sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam
analyzed: sā naḥ rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam

original: RV_01.048.11.1{05} uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaścitro mānuṣe jane
analyzed: uṣaḥ vājam hi vaṃsva yaḥ citraḥ mānuṣe jane

original: RV_01.048.11.2{05} tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarānupa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ
analyzed: tena ā vaha su kṛtaḥ adhvarān upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_01.048.12.1{05} viśvān devānā vaha somapītaye 'ntarikṣāduṣastvam
analyzed: viśvān devān ā vaha soma pītaye antarikṣāt uṣaḥ tvam

original: RV_01.048.12.2{05} sāsmāsu dhā gomadaśvāvadukthyamuṣo vājaṃ suvīryam
analyzed: sā asmāsu dhāḥ gomat aśvāvat ukthya muṣaḥ vājam su vīryam

original: RV_01.048.13.1{05} yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata
analyzed: yasyāḥ ruśantaḥ arcayaḥ prati bhadrāḥ adṛkṣata

original: RV_01.048.13.2{05} sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasamuṣā dadātu sugmyam
analyzed: sā naḥ rayim viśva vāram supeśasam uṣāḥ dadātu sugmyam

original: RV_01.048.14.1{05} ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre 'vase mahi
analyzed: ye cit hi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrve ūtaye juhūre avase mahi

original: RV_01.048.14.2{05} sā na stomānabhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā
analyzed: sā naḥ stomān abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasā uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_01.048.15.1{05} uṣo yadadya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ
analyzed: uṣaḥ yat adya bhānunā vi dvārau ṛṇavaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_01.048.15.2{05} pra no yachatādavṛkaṃ pṛthu chardiḥ pra devi gomatīriṣaḥ
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchata adavṛkam pṛthu chardiḥ pra devi gomatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_01.048.16.1{05} saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā samiḷābhirā
analyzed: sam naḥ rāyā bṛhatā viśva peśasā mimikṣvā samiḍā abhirā

original: RV_01.048.16.2{05} saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājairvājinīvati
analyzed: sam dyumnena viśva turā uṣaḥ mahi sam vājaiḥ vājinīvati

original: RV_01.049.01.1{06} uṣo bhadrebhirā gahi divaścid rocanādadhi
analyzed: uṣaḥ bhadrebhiḥ ā gahi divaḥ cit rocanāt adadhi

original: RV_01.049.01.2{06} vahantvaruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham
analyzed: vahantu aruṇapsavaḥ upa tvā sominaḥ gṛham

original: RV_01.049.02.1{06} supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yamadhyasthā uṣastvam
analyzed: supeśasam sukham ratham yam adhyasthāḥ uṣaḥ tvam

original: RV_01.049.02.2{06} tenā suśravasaṃ janaṃ prāvādya duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: tena su śravasam janam prāva adya duhitar ṛdivaḥ

original: RV_01.049.03.1{06} vayaścit te patatriṇo dvipaccatuṣpadarjuni
analyzed: vayaḥ cit te patatriṇaḥ dvipad catuṣpada arjuni

original: RV_01.049.03.2{06} uṣaḥ prārannṛtūnranu divo antebhyas pari
analyzed: uṣaḥ prāran ṛtūn ranu divaḥ antebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_01.049.04.1{06} vyuchantī hi raśmibhirviśvamābhāsi rocanam
analyzed: vyuchantī hi raśmibhiḥ viśvam ābhāsi rocanam

original: RV_01.049.04.2{06} tāṃ tvāmuṣarvasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata
analyzed: tām tvām uṣarvasūyavaḥ gīrbhiḥ kaṇvāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_01.050.01.1{07} udu tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ
analyzed: udu tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ

original: RV_01.050.01.2{07} dṛśe viśvāya sūryam
analyzed: dṛśe viśvāya sūryam

original: RV_01.050.02.1{07} apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yantyaktubhiḥ
analyzed: apa tye tāyavaḥ yathā nakṣatrāḥ yanti aktubhiḥ

original: RV_01.050.02.2{07} sūrāya viśvacakṣase
analyzed: sūrāya viśva cakṣase

original: RV_01.050.03.1{07} adṛśramasya ketavo vi raśmayo janānanu
analyzed: adṛśram asya ketavaḥ vi raśmayaḥ janān anu

original: RV_01.050.03.2{07} bhrājanto agnayo yathā
analyzed: bhrājantaḥ agnayaḥ yathā

original: RV_01.050.04.1{07} taraṇirviśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛdasi sūrya
analyzed: taraṇiḥ viśva darśataḥ jyotiṣkṛt asi sūrya

original: RV_01.050.04.2{07} viśvamā bhāsirocanam
analyzed: viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam

original: RV_01.050.05.1{07} pratyaṃ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ udeṣi mānuṣān
analyzed: pratyam devānām viśaḥ pratyaṅ udeṣi mānuṣān

original: RV_01.050.05.2{07} pratyaṃ viśvaṃ svardṛśe
analyzed: pratyam viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_01.050.06.1{08} yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janānanu
analyzed: yena pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantam janān anu

original: RV_01.050.06.2{08} tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi
analyzed: tvam varuṇa paśyasi

original: RV_01.050.07.1{08} vi dyāmeṣi rajas pṛthvahā mimāno aktubhiḥ
analyzed: vi dyāma iṣi rajaḥ pṛthu ahā mimānaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_01.050.07.2{08} paśyañ janmāni sūrya
analyzed: paśyam janmāni sūrya

original: RV_01.050.08.1{08} sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya
analyzed: sapta tvā haritaḥ rathe vahanti deva sūrya

original: RV_01.050.08.2{08} śociṣkeśaṃ vicakṣaṇa
analyzed: śociṣkeśam vicakṣaṇa

original: RV_01.050.09.1{08} ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ
analyzed: ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūraḥ rathasya naptyaḥ

original: RV_01.050.09.2{08} tābhiryāti svayuktibhiḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ yāti sva yuktibhiḥ

original: RV_01.050.10.1{08} ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari jyotiḥ paśyantaḥ uttaram

original: RV_01.050.10.2{08} devaṃ devatrā sūryamaganma jyotiruttamam
analyzed: devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: RV_01.050.11.1{08} udyannadya mitramaha ārohannuttarāṃ divam
analyzed: udyan adya mitra mahaḥ ārohan uttarām divam

original: RV_01.050.11.2{08} hṛdrogaṃ mamasūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya
analyzed: hṛd rogam mamasūrya harimāṇam ca nāśaya

original: RV_01.050.12.1{08} śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi
analyzed: śukeṣu me harimāṇam ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi

original: RV_01.050.12.2{08} atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi
analyzed: atha u hāridraveṣu me harimāṇam ni dadhmasi

original: RV_01.050.13.1{08} udagādayamādityo viśvena sahasā saha
analyzed: udagāt ayam ādityaḥ viśvena sahasā saha

original: RV_01.050.13.2{08} dviṣantaṃ mahyaṃ randhayan mo aham dviṣate radham
analyzed: dviṣantam mahyam randhayan mā u aham dviṣate radham

original: RV_01.051.01.1{09} abhi tyaṃ meṣaṃ puruhūtam ṛgmiyamindraṃ gīrbhirmadatā vasvo arṇavam
analyzed: abhi tyam meṣam puru hūtam ṛgmiyam indram gīrbhiḥ madata vasvaḥ arṇavam

original: RV_01.051.01.2{09} yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭhamabhi vipramarcata
analyzed: yasya dyāvaḥ na vicaranti mānuṣāḥ bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipramarcata

original: RV_01.051.02.1{09} abhīmavanvan svabhiṣṭimūtayo 'ntarikṣaprāṃ taviṣībhirāvṛtam
analyzed: abhīm avanvan su abhiṣṭim ūtayaḥ antarikṣa prām taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam

original: RV_01.051.02.2{09} indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī sūnṛtāruhat
analyzed: indram dakṣāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ mada cyutam śatakratum javanī sūnṛtā āruhat

original: RV_01.051.03.1{09} tvaṃ gotramaṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇorapotātraye śatadureṣu gātuvit
analyzed: tvam gotram aṅgirobhyaḥ avṛṇoḥ apa uta atraye śata dureṣu gātu vid

original: RV_01.051.03.2{09} sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasvājāvadriṃ vāvasānasyanartayan
analyzed: sasena cit vimadāya avahaḥ vasu ājāvadrim vāvasānaḥ anartayan

original: RV_01.051.04.1{09} tvamapāmapidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu
analyzed: tvam apām apidhānā avṛṇoḥ apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumat vasu

original: RV_01.051.04.2{09} vṛtraṃ yadindra śavasāvadhīrahimādit sūryaṃ divyārohayo dṛśe
analyzed: vṛtram yat indra śavasā avadhīḥ ahim āt id sūryam divi ārohayaḥ dṛśe

original: RV_01.051.05.1{09} tvaṃ māyābhirapa māyino 'dhamaḥ svadhābhirye adhi śuptāvajuhvata
analyzed: tvam māyābhiḥ apa māyinaḥ adhamaḥ svadhābhiḥ ye adhi śuptau ajuhvata

original: RV_01.051.05.2{09} tvaṃ piprornṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣvāvitha
analyzed: tvam piproḥ nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānam dasyu hatyeṣu āvitha

original: RV_01.051.06.1{10} tvaṃ kutsaṃ śuṣṇahatyeṣvāvithārandhayo 'tithigvāya śambaram
analyzed: tvam kutsam śuṣṇa hatyeṣu āvitha arandhayaḥ atithigvāya śambaram

original: RV_01.051.06.2{10} mahāntaṃ cidarbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanādeva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe
analyzed: mahāntam cit arbudam ni kramīḥ padā sanāt eva dasyu hatyāya jajñiṣe

original: RV_01.051.07.1{10} tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate
analyzed: tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryak ghitā tava rādhaḥ soma pīthāya harṣate

original: RV_01.051.07.2{10} tava vajraścikite bāhvorhito vṛścā śatrorava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā
analyzed: tava vajraḥ cikite bāhvoḥ hitaḥ vṛśca śatroḥ ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā

original: RV_01.051.08.1{10} vi jānīhyāryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsadavratān
analyzed: vi jānīhi āryān ye ca dasyavaḥ barhiṣmate randhaya śāsat avratān

original: RV_01.051.08.2{10} śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana
analyzed: śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvā id tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana

original: RV_01.051.09.1{10} anuvratāya randhayannapavratānābhūbhirindraḥ śnathayannanābhuvaḥ
analyzed: anuvratāya randhayan apavrata anābhūbhiḥ indraḥ śnathayan anābhuvaḥ

original: RV_01.051.09.2{10} vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyāminakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna sandihaḥ
analyzed: vṛddhasya cit vardhataḥ dyāminakṣata stavānaḥ vamraḥ vi jaghāna sandihaḥ

original: RV_01.051.10.1{10} takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ
analyzed: takṣat yat te uśanā sahasā sahaḥ vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ

original: RV_01.051.10.2{10} ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇamavahannabhi śravaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇaḥ manaḥ yujaḥ ā pūryamāṇam avahan abhi śravaḥ

original: RV_01.051.11.1{11} mandiṣṭa yaduśane kāvye sacānindro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati
analyzed: mandiṣṭa yat uśane kāvye sacān indraḥ vaṅkū vaṅkutarā adhi tiṣṭhati

original: RV_01.051.11.2{11} ugro yayiṃ nirapaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat puraḥ
analyzed: ugraḥ yayim nirapaḥ srotasā asṛjat vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitāḥ airayat puraḥ

original: RV_01.051.12.1{11} ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtāyeṣu mandase
analyzed: ā smā ratham vṛṣa pāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtāyeṣu mandase

original: RV_01.051.12.2{11} indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano 'narvāṇaṃślokamā rohase divi
analyzed: indra yathā suta someṣu cākanaḥ anarvāṇam ślokam ā rohase divi

original: RV_01.051.13.1{11} adadā arbhāṃ mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayāmindra sunvate
analyzed: adadāḥ arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate

original: RV_01.051.13.2{11} menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā
analyzed: menā abhavaḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya su krato viśvā id tā te savaneṣu pravācyā

original: RV_01.051.14.1{11} indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ aśrāyi su dhyaḥ nireke pajreṣu stomaḥ duryaḥ na yūpaḥ

original: RV_01.051.14.2{11} aśvayurgavyū rathayurvasūyurindra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā
analyzed: aśvayuḥ gavyuḥ rathayuḥ vasūyuḥ indraḥ id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā

original: RV_01.051.15.1{11} idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci
analyzed: idam namaḥ vṛṣabhāya sva rāje satya śuṣmāya tavase avāci

original: RV_01.051.15.2{11} asminnindra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhistava śarman syāma
analyzed: asmin indra vṛjane sarva vīrāḥ smat sūribhiḥ tava śarman syāma

original: RV_01.052.01.1{12} tyaṃ su meṣaṃ mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākamīrate
analyzed: tyam su meṣam mahayā svar vidam śatam yasya su bhvaḥ sākam īrate

original: RV_01.052.01.2{12} atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ rathamendraṃ vavṛtyāmavase suvṛktibhiḥ
analyzed: atyam na vājam havanasyadam ratham ā indram vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_01.052.02.1{12} sa parvato na dharuṇeṣvacyutaḥ sahasramūtistaviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe
analyzed: sa parvataḥ na dharuṇeṣu acyutaḥ sahasram ūti staviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe

original: RV_01.052.02.2{12} indro yad vṛtramavadhīn nadīvṛtamubjannarṇāṃsijarhṛṣāṇo andhasā
analyzed: indraḥ yat vṛtram avadhīt nadīvṛtam ubjan arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇaḥ andhasā

original: RV_01.052.03.1{12} sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ
analyzed: sa hi dvaraḥ dvariṣu vavraḥ ūdhani candra budhnaḥ mada vṛddhaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_01.052.03.2{12} indraṃ tamahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprirandhasaḥ
analyzed: indram tam ahve su apasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭha rātim sa hi papriḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_01.052.04.1{12} ā yaṃ pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā abhiṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadma barhiṣaḥ samudram na su bhvaḥ svāḥ abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.052.04.2{12} taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthurūtayaḥ śuṣmāindramavātā ahrutapsavaḥ
analyzed: tam vṛtra hatye anu tasthuḥ ūtayaḥ śuṣmāḥ aindramavātāḥ ahrutapsavaḥ

original: RV_01.052.05.1{12} abhi svavṛṣṭiṃ made asya yudhyato raghvīriva pravaṇe sasrurūtayaḥ
analyzed: abhi sva vṛṣṭim made asya yudhyataḥ raghvīḥ iva pravaṇe sasruḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_01.052.05.2{12} indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīnriva tritaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ yat vajrī dhṛṣamāṇaḥ andhasā bhinat valasya paridhīn riva tritaḥ

original: RV_01.052.06.1{13} parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo 'po vṛtvī rajaso budhnamāśayat
analyzed: pari īm ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavaḥ apaḥ vṛtvī rajasaḥ budhnam āśayat

original: RV_01.052.06.2{13} vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvorindra tanyatum
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvanaḥ nijaghantha hanvoḥ indra tanyatum

original: RV_01.052.07.1{13} hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣantyūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni vardhanā
analyzed: hradam na hi tvā nyṛṣanti ūrmayaḥ brahmāṇi indra tava yāni vardhanā

original: RV_01.052.07.2{13} tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavastatakṣa vajramabhibhūtyojasam
analyzed: tvaṣṭā cit te yujyam vāvṛdhe śavaḥ tatakṣa vajram abhibhūti ojasam

original: RV_01.052.08.1{13} jaghanvānu haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratavindra vṛtraṃ manuṣe gātuyannapaḥ
analyzed: jaghanva anu haribhiḥ sambhṛta krato indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyan apaḥ

original: RV_01.052.08.2{13} ayachathā bāhvorvajramāyasamadhārayo divyā sūryaṃ dṛśe
analyzed: ayacchathāḥ bāhvoḥ vajram āyasam adhārayaḥ divyā sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_01.052.09.1{13} bṛhat svaścandramamavad yadukthyamakṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: bṛhat yat ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇam divaḥ

original: RV_01.052.09.2{13} yan mānuṣapradhanā indramūtayaḥ svarnṛṣāco maruto 'madannanu
analyzed: yat mānuṣa pradhanāḥ indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣācaḥ marutaḥ amadan anu

original: RV_01.052.10.1{13} dyauścidasyāmavānaheḥ svanādayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra te
analyzed: dyauḥ cit asyām avānaheḥ svanāt ayoyavīt bhiyasā vajraḥ indra te

original: RV_01.052.10.2{13} vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinacchiraḥ
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasā abhinat śiraḥ

original: RV_01.052.11.1{14} yadin nvindra pṛthivī daśabhujirahāni viśvā tatanantakṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: yat id nu indra pṛthivī daśa bhujiḥ ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.052.11.2{14} atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyāmanu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat
analyzed: atra aha te maghavan viśrutam sahaḥ dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat

original: RV_01.052.12.1{14} tvamasya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ
analyzed: tvam asya pāre rajasaḥ vyomanaḥ sva bhūti ojāḥ avase dhṛṣat manaḥ

original: RV_01.052.12.2{14} cakṛṣe bhūmiṃ pratimānamojaso 'paḥ svaḥ paribhūreṣyā divam
analyzed: cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojasaḥ apaḥ svar paribhūḥ eṣyāḥ divam

original: RV_01.052.13.1{14} tvaṃ bhuvaḥ pratimānaṃ pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patirbhūḥ
analyzed: tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ ṛṣva vīrasya bṛhataḥ patiḥ bhūḥ

original: RV_01.052.13.2{14} viśvamāprā antarikṣaṃ mahitvā satyamaddhā nakiranyastvāvān
analyzed: viśvam āprāḥ antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakiranyaḥ tvāvān

original: RV_01.052.14.1{14} na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antamānaśuḥ
analyzed: na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyacaḥ na sindhavaḥ rajasaḥ antam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_01.052.14.2{14} nota svavṛṣṭiṃ made asya yudhyata eko anyaccakṛṣe viśvamānuṣak
analyzed: na uta sva vṛṣṭim made asya yudhyataḥ ekaḥ anyat cakṛṣe viśva mānuṣak

original: RV_01.052.15.1{14} ārcannatra marutaḥ sasminnājau viśve devāso amadannanutvā
analyzed: ārcan atra marutaḥ sasmin ājau viśve devāsaḥ amadan anutvā

original: RV_01.052.15.2{14} vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvamindra pratyānaṃ jaghantha
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra pratyānam jaghantha

original: RV_01.053.01.1{15} nyū ṣu vācaṃ pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ
analyzed: nyu su vācam pra mahe bharāmahe giraḥ indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ

original: RV_01.053.01.2{15} nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatāmivāvidan na duṣṭutirdraviṇodeṣu śasyate
analyzed: nu cit hi ratnam sasatām iva avidat na duṣṭutiḥ draviṇaḥ deṣu śasyate

original: RV_01.053.02.1{15} duro aśvasya dura indra gorasi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ
analyzed: duraḥ aśvasya duraḥ indra go rasi duraḥ yavasya vasunaḥ inaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_01.053.02.2{15} śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyastamidaṃ gṛṇīmasi
analyzed: śikṣā naraḥ pradivaḥ a kāma karśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ tam idam gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_01.053.03.1{15} śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama tavedidamabhitaścekite vasu
analyzed: śacīvas indra puru kṛt dyumattama tava id idam abhitas cekite vasu

original: RV_01.053.03.2{15} ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmamūnayīḥ
analyzed: atas saṃgṛbhya abhibhūtaḥ ā bhara mā tvāyataḥ jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ

original: RV_01.053.04.1{15} ebhirdyubhiḥ sumanā ebhirindubhirnirundhāno amatiṃ gobhiraśvinā
analyzed: ebhiḥ dyubhiḥ sumanāḥ ebhiḥ indubhiḥ nirundhānaḥ amatim gobhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_01.053.04.2{15} indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhiryutadveṣasaḥsamiṣā rabhemahi
analyzed: indreṇa dasyum darayantaḥ indubhiḥ yuta dveṣasaḥ samiṣā rabhemahi

original: RV_01.053.05.1{15} samindra rāyā samiṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrairabhidyubhiḥ
analyzed: sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi sam vājebhiḥ puru ścandraiḥ abhidyubhiḥ

original: RV_01.053.05.2{15} saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi
analyzed: sam devyā pramatyā vīra śuṣmayā go agrayā aśvāvatyā rabhemahi

original: RV_01.053.06.1{16} te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāsaḥ vṛtra hatyeṣu satpate

original: RV_01.053.06.2{16} yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇyaprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ
analyzed: yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇi aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ

original: RV_01.053.07.1{16} yudhā yudhamupa ghedeṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ samidaṃ haṃsyojasā
analyzed: yudhā yudham upa gha id iṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puram samidam haṃsi ojasā

original: RV_01.053.07.2{16} namyā yadindra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam
analyzed: namyā yat indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayaḥ namucim nāma māyinam

original: RV_01.053.08.1{16} tvaṃ karañjamuta parṇayaṃ vadhīstejiṣṭhayātithigvasyavartanī
analyzed: tvam karañjam uta parṇayam vadhīḥ tejiṣṭhayā atithigvasya vartanī

original: RV_01.053.08.2{16} tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā
analyzed: tvam śatā vaṅgṛdasya abhinat puraḥ anānudaḥ pariṣūtāḥ ṛjiśvanā

original: RV_01.053.09.1{16} tvametāñ janarājño dvirdaśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ
analyzed: tvam etām jana rājñaḥ dvis daśa abandhunā suśravasā upajagmuṣaḥ

original: RV_01.053.09.2{16} ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā navatim nava śrutaḥ ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadā avṛṇak

original: RV_01.053.10.1{16} tvamāvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhistava trāmabhirindra tūrvayāṇam
analyzed: tvam āvitha suśravasam tava ūtibhiḥ tava trāmabhiḥ indra tūrvayāṇam

original: RV_01.053.10.2{16} tvamasmai kutsamatithigvamāyuṃ mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ
analyzed: tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ

original: RV_01.053.11.1{16} ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyaste śivatamā asāma
analyzed: ye udṛci indra deva gopāḥ sakhāyaḥ te śivatamāḥ asāma

original: RV_01.053.11.2{16} tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ
analyzed: tvām stoṣāma tvayā su vīrāḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_01.054.01.1{17} mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsvaṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe
analyzed: mā naḥ asmin maghavan pṛtsu aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe

original: RV_01.054.01.2{17} akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīrbhiyasā samārata
analyzed: akrandayaḥ nadyaḥ roruvat vanā kathā na kṣoṇīḥ bhiyasā samārata

original: RV_01.054.02.1{17} arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantamindraṃ mahayannabhi ṣṭuhi
analyzed: arca śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayan abhi stuhi

original: RV_01.054.02.2{17} yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate
analyzed: yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣa tvā vṛṣabhaḥ nyṛñjate

original: RV_01.054.03.1{17} arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan manaḥ
analyzed: arca dive bṛhate śūṣyam vacaḥ svakṣatram yasya dhṛṣataḥ dhṛṣat manaḥ

original: RV_01.054.03.2{17} bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ
analyzed: bṛhat śravāḥ asuraḥ barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puras haribhyām vṛṣabhaḥ rathaḥ hi saḥ

original: RV_01.054.04.1{17} tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo 'va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaraṃ bhinat
analyzed: tvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ sānu kopayaḥ ava tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat

original: RV_01.054.04.2{17} yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣacchitāṃ gabhastimaśaniṃ pṛtanyasi
analyzed: yat māyinaḥ vrandinaḥ mandinā dhṛṣat śitām gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi

original: RV_01.054.05.1{17} ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandinororuvad vanā
analyzed: ni yat vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cit vrandinā uroruvat vanā

original: RV_01.054.05.2{17} prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yadadyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kastvā pari
analyzed: prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yat adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kaḥ tvā pari

original: RV_01.054.06.1{18} tvamāvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃśatakrato
analyzed: tvam āvitha naryam turvaśam yadum tvam turvītim vayyam śatakrato

original: RV_01.054.06.2{18} tvaṃ rathametaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvaṃ puro navatiṃ dambhayo nava
analyzed: tvam ratham etaśam kṛtvye dhane tvam puraḥ navatim dambhayaḥ nava

original: RV_01.054.07.1{18} sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvajjano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsaminvati
analyzed: sa ghā rājā sat patiḥ śūśuvat janaḥ rāta havyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati

original: RV_01.054.07.2{18} ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānurasmā uparā pinvate divaḥ
analyzed: ukthā vā yaḥ abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānuḥ asmai uparā pinvate divaḥ

original: RV_01.054.08.1{18} asamaṃ kṣatramasamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme
analyzed: asamam kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra soma pāḥ apasā santu neme

original: RV_01.054.08.2{18} ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ ca
analyzed: ye te indra daduṣaḥ vardhayanti mahi kṣatram sthaviram vṛṣṇyam ca

original: RV_01.054.09.1{18} tubhyedete bahulā adridugdhāścamūṣadaścamasā indrapānāḥ
analyzed: tubhya id ete bahulāḥ adri dugdhāḥ camūṣadaḥ camasāḥ indra pānāḥ

original: RV_01.054.09.2{18} vyaśnuhi tarpayā kāmameṣāmathā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva
analyzed: vyaśnuhi tarpaya kāmam eṣām athā manaḥ vasu deyāya kṛṣva

original: RV_01.054.10.1{18} apāmatiṣṭhad dharuṇahvaraṃ tamo 'ntarvṛtrasya jaṭhareṣuparvataḥ
analyzed: apām atiṣṭhat dharuṇahvaram tamaḥ antar vṛtrasya jaṭhara iṣu parvataḥ

original: RV_01.054.10.2{18} abhīmindro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate
analyzed: abhi īm indraḥ nadyaḥ vavriṇā hitāḥ viśvāḥ anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate

original: RV_01.054.11.1{18} sa śevṛdhamadhi dhā dyumnamasme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷindra tavyam
analyzed: sa śevṛdham adhi dhāḥ dyumnam asme mahi kṣatram janāṣāh indra tavyam

original: RV_01.054.11.2{18} rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ su apatyai iṣe dhāḥ

original: RV_01.055.01.1{19} divaścidasya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivīcana prati
analyzed: divaścit asya varimā vi paprathe indram na mahnā pṛthivīcana prati

original: RV_01.055.01.2{19} bhīmastuviṣmāñcarṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tuviṣmān carṣaṇibhyaḥ ātapaḥ śiśīte vajram tejase na vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_01.055.02.1{19} so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ arṇavaḥ na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritāḥ varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.055.02.2{19} indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate
analyzed: indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhmaḥ ojasā panasyate

original: RV_01.055.03.1{19} tvaṃ tamindra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇāmirajyasi
analyzed: tvam tam indra parvatam na bhojase mahaḥ nṛmṇasya dharmaṇā amirajyasi

original: RV_01.055.03.2{19} pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ
analyzed: pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmai ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ

original: RV_01.055.04.1{19} sa id vane namasyubhirvacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam
analyzed: saḥ id vane namasyubhiḥ vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇaḥ indriyam

original: RV_01.055.04.2{19} vṛṣā chandurbhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenāmmaghavā yadinvati
analyzed: vṛṣā chanduḥ bhavati haryataḥ vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yadinvati

original: RV_01.055.05.1{19} sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ id mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhmaḥ ojasā janebhyaḥ

original: RV_01.055.05.2{19} adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham
analyzed: adhā cana śrat dadhati tviṣīmate indrāya vajram nighanighnate vadham

original: RV_01.055.06.1{20} sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasāvināśayan
analyzed: sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhānaḥ ojasā a vināśayan

original: RV_01.055.06.2{20} jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvannavṛkāṇi yajyave 'va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ sṛjat
analyzed: jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvan avṛkāṇi yajyave ava su kratuḥ sartavai apaḥ sṛjat

original: RV_01.055.07.1{20} dānāya manaḥ somapāvannastu te 'rvāñcā harī vandanaśrudā kṛdhi
analyzed: dānāya manaḥ soma pāvan astu te arvāñcā harī vandana śrudā kṛdhi

original: RV_01.055.07.2{20} yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketāā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ
analyzed: yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayaḥ ye indra te na tvā ketāā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_01.055.08.1{20} aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayoraṣāḷhaṃ sahastanvi śruto dadhe
analyzed: a prakṣitam vasu bibharṣi hastayoḥ aṣāḍham saha stanvi śrutaḥ dadhe

original: RV_01.055.08.2{20} āvṛtāso 'vatāso na kartṛbhistanūṣu te kratavaindra bhūrayaḥ
analyzed: āvṛtāsaḥ avatāsaḥ na kartṛbhiḥ tanūṣu te kratavā aindra bhūrayaḥ

original: RV_01.056.01.1{21} eṣa pra pūrvīrava tasya camriṣo 'tyo na yoṣāmudayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ
analyzed: eṣa pra pūrvīḥ ava tasya camriṣaḥ atyaḥ na yoṣām udayan ta bhurvaṇiḥ

original: RV_01.056.01.2{21} dakṣaṃ mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ rathamāvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam
analyzed: dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayam ratham āvṛtya hari yogam ṛbhvasam

original: RV_01.056.02.1{21} taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ
analyzed: tam gūrtayaḥ nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudram na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ

original: RV_01.056.02.2{21} patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā
analyzed: patim dakṣasya vidathasya nu sahaḥ girim na venāḥ adhi roha tejasā

original: RV_01.056.03.1{21} sa turvaṇirmahānareṇu pauṃsye girerbhṛṣṭirna bhrājate tujā śavaḥ
analyzed: sa turvaṇiḥ mahān areṇu pauṃsye gireḥ bhṛṣṭiḥ na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ

original: RV_01.056.03.2{21} yena śuṣṇaṃ māyinamāyaso made dudhraābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani
analyzed: yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyasaḥ made dudhraābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani

original: RV_01.056.04.1{21} devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣaktyuṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ
analyzed: devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhā ūtaye indram siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ

original: RV_01.056.04.2{21} yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇuṃ bṛhadarhariṣvaṇiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tamaḥ iyarti reṇum bṛhat arha riṣvaṇiḥ

original: RV_01.056.05.1{21} vi yat tiro dharuṇamacyutaṃ rajo 'tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsubarhaṇā
analyzed: vi yat tiras dharuṇam acyutam rajaḥ atiṣṭhipaḥ divaḥ ātā su barhaṇā

original: RV_01.056.05.2{21} svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nirapāmaubjo arṇavam
analyzed: svarmīḍhe yat made indra harṣya ahan vṛtram nirapāmaubjaḥ arṇavam

original: RV_01.056.06.1{21} tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ
analyzed: tvam divaḥ dharuṇam dhiṣe ojasā pṛthivyāḥ indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ

original: RV_01.056.06.2{21} tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ
analyzed: tvam sutasya made ariṇāḥ apaḥ vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyā arujaḥ

original: RV_01.057.01.1{22} pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matiṃ bhare
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satya śuṣmāya tavase matim bhare

original: RV_01.057.01.2{22} apāmiva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyuśavase apāvṛtam
analyzed: apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharam rādhaḥ viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam

original: RV_01.057.02.1{22} adha te viśvamanu hāsadiṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ
analyzed: adha te viśvam anu ha asat iṣṭayaḥ āpaḥ nimnā iva savanā haviṣmataḥ

original: RV_01.057.02.2{22} yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: yat parvate na samaśīta haryataḥ indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_01.057.03.1{22} asmai bhīmāya namasā samadhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharāpanīyase
analyzed: asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvaraḥ uṣaḥ na śubhraḥ ā bhara apanīyase

original: RV_01.057.03.2{22} yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotirakāriharito nāyase
analyzed: yasya dhāma śravase nāma indriyam jyotiḥ akāri haritaḥ nāyase

original: RV_01.057.04.1{22} ime ta indra te vayaṃ puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso
analyzed: ime te indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvā ārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso

original: RV_01.057.04.2{22} nahi tvadanyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīriva prati no harya tad vacaḥ
analyzed: nahi tvat anyaḥ girvaṇaḥ giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīḥ iva prati naḥ harya tat vacaḥ

original: RV_01.057.05.1{22} bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasyasya stoturmaghavan kāmamā pṛṇa
analyzed: bhūri te indra vīryam tava smasyasya stotuḥ maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa

original: RV_01.057.05.2{22} anu te dyaurbṛhatī vīryaṃ mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase
analyzed: anu te dyauḥ bṛhatī vīryam mama iyam ca te pṛthivī neme ojase

original: RV_01.057.06.1{22} tvaṃ tamindra parvataṃ mahāmuruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaścakartitha
analyzed: tvam tam indra parvatam mahām urum vajreṇa vajrin parvaśas cakartitha

original: RV_01.057.06.2{22} avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ
analyzed: avāsṛjaḥ nivṛtāḥ sartavai apaḥ satrā viśvam dadhiṣe kevalam sahaḥ

original: RV_01.058.01.1{23} nū cit sahojā amṛto ni tundate hotā yad dūto abhavad vivasvataḥ
analyzed: nu cit sahaḥ jāḥ amṛtaḥ ni tundate hotā yat dūtaḥ abhavat vivasvataḥ

original: RV_01.058.01.2{23} vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhī rajo mama ā devatātāhaviṣā vivāsati
analyzed: vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhiḥ rajaḥ mama ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati

original: RV_01.058.02.1{23} ā svamadma yuvamāno ajarastṛṣvaviṣyannataseṣu tiṣṭhati
analyzed: ā sva madma yuvamānaḥ ajaraḥ tṛṣu aviṣyan ataseṣu tiṣṭhati

original: RV_01.058.02.2{23} atyo na pṛṣṭhaṃ pruṣitasya rocate divo na sānu stanayannacikradat
analyzed: atyaḥ na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat

original: RV_01.058.03.1{23} krāṇā rudrebhirvasubhiḥ purohito hotā niṣatto rayiṣāḷamartyaḥ
analyzed: krāṇā rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ purohitaḥ hotā niṣattaḥ rayiṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_01.058.03.2{23} ratho na vikṣv ṛñjasāna āyuṣu vyānuṣag vāryā deva ṛṇvati
analyzed: rathaḥ na vikṣu ṛñjasānaḥ āyuṣu vyānuṣak vāryā devaḥ ṛṇvati

original: RV_01.058.04.1{23} vi vātajūto ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ
analyzed: vi vāta jūtaḥ ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ

original: RV_01.058.04.2{23} tṛṣu yadagne vanino vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśadūrme ajara
analyzed: tṛṣu yat agne vaninaḥ vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇam te ema ruśat ūrme ajara

original: RV_01.058.05.1{23} tapurjambho vana ā vātacodito yūthe na sāhvānava vāti vaṃsagaḥ
analyzed: tapuḥ jambhaḥ vane ā vāta coditaḥ yūthe na sāhvāna ava vāti vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_01.058.05.2{23} abhivrajannakṣitaṃ pājasā rajaḥ sthātuścarathaṃ bhayate patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: abhivrajan akṣitam pājasā rajaḥ sthātuḥ caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ

original: RV_01.058.06.1{24} dadhuṣ ṭvā bhṛgavo mānuṣeṣvā rayiṃ na cāruṃ suhavaṃ janebhyaḥ
analyzed: dadhuḥ tvā bhṛgavaḥ mānuṣa iṣvā rayim na cārum su havam janebhyaḥ

original: RV_01.058.06.2{24} hotāramagne atithiṃ vareṇyaṃ mitraṃ na śevaṃ divyāya janmane
analyzed: hotāram agne atithim vareṇyam mitram na śevam divyāya janmane

original: RV_01.058.07.1{24} hotāraṃ sapta juhvo yajiṣṭhaṃ yaṃ vāghato vṛṇate adhvareṣu
analyzed: hotāram sapta juhvaḥ yajiṣṭham yam vāghataḥ vṛṇate adhvareṣu

original: RV_01.058.07.2{24} agniṃ viśveṣāmaratiṃ vasūnāṃ saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam
analyzed: agnim viśveṣām aratim vasūnām saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam

original: RV_01.058.08.1{24} achidrā sūno sahaso no adya stotṛbhyo mitramahaḥ śarma yacha
analyzed: achidrā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya stotṛbhyaḥ mitra mahas śarma yaccha

original: RV_01.058.08.2{24} agne gṛṇantamaṃhasa uruṣyorjo napāt pūrbhirāyasībhiḥ
analyzed: agne gṛṇantam aṃhasaḥ uruṣya ūrjaḥ napāt pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ

original: RV_01.058.09.1{24} bhavā varūthaṃ gṛṇate vibhāvo bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥśarma
analyzed: bhava varūtham gṛṇate vibhāvaḥ bhava maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma

original: RV_01.058.09.2{24} uruṣyāgne aṃhaso gṛṇantaṃ prātarmakṣū dhiyāvasurjagamyāt
analyzed: uruṣya agne aṃhasaḥ gṛṇantam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.059.01.1{25} vayā idagne agnayaste anye tve viśve amṛtā mādayante
analyzed: vayāḥ id agne agnayaḥ te anye tve viśve amṛtāḥ mādayante

original: RV_01.059.01.2{25} vaiśvānara nābhirasi kṣitīnāṃ sthūṇeva janānupamid yayantha
analyzed: vaiśvānara nābhiḥ asi kṣitīnām sthūṇā iva janān upamit yayantha

original: RV_01.059.02.1{25} mūrdhā divo nābhiragniḥ pṛthivyā athābhavadaratī rodasyoḥ
analyzed: mūrdhā divaḥ nābhiḥ agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ atha abhavat aratī rodasyoḥ

original: RV_01.059.02.2{25} taṃ tvā devāso 'janayanta devaṃ vaiśvānara jyotiridāryāya
analyzed: tam tvā devāsaḥ ajanayanta devam vaiśvānara jyotiḥ idāryāya

original: RV_01.059.03.1{25} ā sūrye na raśmayo dhruvāso vaiśvānare dadhire 'gnā vasūni
analyzed: ā sūrye na raśmayaḥ dhruvāsaḥ vaiśvānare dadhire agnā vasūni

original: RV_01.059.03.2{25} yā parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu yā mānuṣeṣvasi tasya rājā
analyzed: yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu yā mānuṣeṣu asi tasya rājā

original: RV_01.059.04.1{25} bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giro hotā manuṣyo na dakṣaḥ
analyzed: bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giraḥ hotā manuṣyaḥ na dakṣaḥ

original: RV_01.059.04.2{25} svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīrvaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ
analyzed: svarvate satya śuṣmāya pūrvīḥ vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ

original: RV_01.059.05.1{25} divaścit te bṛhato jātavedo vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam
analyzed: divaḥ cit te bṛhataḥ jātavedaḥ vaiśvānara pra ririce mahi tvam

original: RV_01.059.05.2{25} rājā kṛṣṭīnāmasi mānuṣīṇāṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaścakartha
analyzed: rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇām yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha

original: RV_01.059.06.1{25} pra nū mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya vocaṃ yaṃ pūravo vṛtrahaṇaṃ sacante
analyzed: pra nu mahi tvam vṛṣabhasya vocam yam pūravaḥ vṛtra haṇam sacante

original: RV_01.059.06.2{25} vaiśvānaro dasyumagnirjaghanvānadhūnot kāṣṭhā ava śambaraṃ bhet
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ dasyum agniḥ jaghanvān adhūnot kāṣṭhāḥ ava śambaram bhet

original: RV_01.059.07.1{25} vaiśvānaro mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭirbharadvājeṣu yajato vibhāvā
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭiḥ bharadvājeṣu yajataḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_01.059.07.2{25} śātavaneye śatinībhiragniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān
analyzed: śātavaneye śatinībhiḥ agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān

original: RV_01.060.01.1{26} vahniṃ yaśasaṃ vidathasya ketuṃ suprāvyaṃ dūtaṃ sadyoartham
analyzed: vahnim yaśasam vidathasya ketum suprāvyam dūtam sadyoartham

original: RV_01.060.01.2{26} dvijanmānaṃ rayimiva praśastaṃ rātiṃ bharad bhṛgavemātariśvā
analyzed: dvijanmānam rayim iva praśastam rātim bharat

original: RV_01.060.02.1{26} asya śāsurubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmanta uśijo ye ca martāḥ
analyzed: asya śāsuḥ ubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmantaḥ uśijaḥ ye ca martāḥ

original: RV_01.060.02.2{26} divaścit pūrvo nyasādi hotāpṛchyo viśpatirvikṣuvedhāḥ
analyzed: divaḥ cit pūrvaḥ nyasādi hotā āpṛchyaḥ viśpatiḥ vikṣu vedhāḥ

original: RV_01.060.03.1{26} taṃ navyasī hṛda ā jāyamānamasmat sukīrtirmadhujihvamaśyāḥ
analyzed: tam navyasī hṛdaḥ ā jāyamānam asmat su kīrtiḥ madhujihvam aśyāḥ

original: RV_01.060.03.2{26} yam ṛtvijo vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvanta āyavo jījananta
analyzed: yam ṛtvijaḥ vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvantaḥ āyavaḥ jījananta

original: RV_01.060.04.1{26} uśik pāvako vasurmānuṣeṣu vareṇyo hotādhāyi vikṣu
analyzed: uśij pāvakaḥ vasuḥ mānuṣeṣu vareṇyaḥ hotā adhāyi vikṣu

original: RV_01.060.04.2{26} damūnā gṛhapatirdama ā agnirbhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām
analyzed: damūnāḥ gṛhapatiḥ dame ā agniḥ bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_01.060.05.1{26} taṃ tvā vayaṃ patimagne rayīṇāṃ pra śaṃsāmo matibhirgotamāsaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām pra śaṃsāmaḥ matibhiḥ gotamāsaḥ

original: RV_01.060.05.2{26} āśuṃ na vājambharaṃ marjayantaḥ prātarmakṣū dhiyāvasurjagamyāt
analyzed: āśum na vājambharam marjayantaḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.061.01.1{27} asmā idu pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomaṃ māhināya
analyzed: asmai idu pra tavase turāya prayaḥ na harmi stomam māhināya

original: RV_01.061.01.2{27} ṛcīṣamāyādhrigava ohamindrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā
analyzed: ṛcīṣamāya adhrigave oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā

original: RV_01.061.02.1{27} asmā idu praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmyāṅgūṣaṃ bādhe suvṛkti
analyzed: asmai idu prayaḥ iva pra yaṃsi bharāmi āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti

original: RV_01.061.02.2{27} indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyomarjayanta
analyzed: indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyaḥ marjayanta

original: RV_01.061.03.1{27} asmā idu tyamupamaṃ svarṣāṃ bharāmyāṅgūṣamāsyena
analyzed: asmai idu tyam upamam svarṣām bharāmi āṅgūṣam āsyena

original: RV_01.061.03.2{27} maṃhiṣṭhamachoktibhirmatīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham achoktibhiḥ matīnām suvṛktibhiḥ sūrim vāvṛdhadhyai

original: RV_01.061.04.1{27} asmā idu stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya
analyzed: asmai idu stomam sam hinomi ratham na taṣṭā iva tat sināya

original: RV_01.061.04.2{27} giraśca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvaṃ medhirāya
analyzed: giraḥ ca gir vāhase suvṛktī indrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya

original: RV_01.061.05.1{27} asmā idu saptimiva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā samañje
analyzed: asmai idu saptim iva śravasyā indrāya arkam juhvā samañje

original: RV_01.061.05.2{27} vīraṃ dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam
analyzed: vīram dānaukasam vandadhyai purām gūrta śravasam darmāṇam

original: RV_01.061.06.1{28} asmā idu tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya
analyzed: asmai idu tvaṣṭā takṣat vajram su apastamam svaryam raṇāya

original: RV_01.061.06.2{28} vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujannīśānastujatā kiyedhāḥ
analyzed: vṛtrasya cit vidat yena marma tujan īśānaḥ tujatā kiyedhāḥ

original: RV_01.061.07.1{28} asyedu mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pituṃ papivāñcārvannā
analyzed: asya idu mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyas mahaḥ pitum papivān cāru annā

original: RV_01.061.07.2{28} muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhantiro adrimastā
analyzed: muṣāyat viṣṇuḥ pacatam sahīyān vidhyat varāhantiraḥ adri mastā

original: RV_01.061.08.1{28} asmā idu gnāścid devapatnīrindrāyārkamahihatya ūvuḥ
analyzed: asmai id u gnāḥ cit deva patnīḥ indrāya arka mahi hatye ūvuḥ

original: RV_01.061.08.2{28} pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānaṃ pariṣṭaḥ
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhre urvī na asya te mahimānam pariṣṭaḥ

original: RV_01.061.09.1{28} asyedeva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ paryantarikṣāt
analyzed: asya id eva pra ririce mahi tvam divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt

original: RV_01.061.09.2{28} svarāḷ indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svariramatro vavakṣe raṇāya
analyzed: svarāj indraḥ dame ā viśva gūrtaḥ svari ramatraḥ vavakṣe raṇāya

original: RV_01.061.10.1{28} asyedeva śavasā śuṣantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtramindraḥ
analyzed: asya id eva śavasā śuṣantam vi vṛścat vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ

original: RV_01.061.10.2{28} gā na vrāṇā avanīramuñcadabhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ
analyzed: gāḥ na vrāṇāḥ avanīḥ amuñcat abhi śravaḥ dāvane sacetāḥ

original: RV_01.061.11.1{29} asyedu tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīmayachat
analyzed: asya idu tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yat vajreṇa sīmayacchat

original: RV_01.061.11.2{29} īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ
analyzed: īśāna kṛt dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādham turvaṇiḥ kaḥ

original: RV_01.061.12.1{29} asmā idu pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajramīśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ
analyzed: asmai idu pra bhara tūtujānaḥ vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ

original: RV_01.061.12.2{29} gorna parva vi radā tiraśceṣyannarṇāṃsyapāṃ caradhyai
analyzed: goḥ na parva vi rada tiras ca iṣyan arṇāṃsi apām caradhyai

original: RV_01.061.13.1{29} asyedu pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ
analyzed: asya idu pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navyaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_01.061.13.2{29} yudhe yadiṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn
analyzed: yudhe yadiṣṇānaḥ āyudhāni ṛghāyamāṇaḥ niriṇāti śatrūn

original: RV_01.061.14.1{29} asyedu bhiyā girayaśca dṛḷhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣastujete
analyzed: asya idu bhiyā girayaḥ ca dṛḍhāḥ dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣaḥ tujete

original: RV_01.061.14.2{29} upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ
analyzed: upa u venasya joguvānaḥ oṇim sadyas bhuvat vīryāya nodhāḥ

original: RV_01.061.15.1{29} asmā idu tyadanu dāyyeṣāmeko yad vavne bhūrerīśānaḥ
analyzed: asmai idu tyad anu dāyi eṣām ekaḥ yat vavne bhūreḥ īśānaḥ

original: RV_01.061.15.2{29} praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvimāvadindraḥ
analyzed: pra etaśam sūrye paspṛdhānam sauvaśvye suṣvimāvat indraḥ

original: RV_01.061.16.1{29} evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran
analyzed: eva te hāriyojana suvṛktī indra brahmāṇi gotamāsaḥ akran

original: RV_01.061.16.2{29} aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
analyzed: ā eṣu viśva peśasam dhiyam dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.062.01.1{01} pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣamāṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat
analyzed: pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣam girvaṇase aṅgirasvat

original: RV_01.062.01.2{01} suvṛktibhiḥ stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya
analyzed: suvṛktibhiḥ stuvate ṛgmiyāya arcāma arkam nare viśrutāya

original: RV_01.062.02.1{01} pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvamāṅgūṣyaṃ śavasānāya sāma
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahi namaḥ bharadhvam āṅgūṣyam śavasānāya sāma

original: RV_01.062.02.2{01} yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan
analyzed: yena naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ arcantaḥ aṅgirasaḥ gāḥ avindan

original: RV_01.062.03.1{01} indrasyāṅgirasāṃ ceṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim
analyzed: indrasya aṅgirasām ca iṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim

original: RV_01.062.03.2{01} bṛhaspatirbhinadadriṃ vidad gāḥ samusriyābhirvāvaśanta naraḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ sa musriyābhiḥ vāvaśanta naraḥ

original: RV_01.062.04.1{01} sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇādriṃ svaryo navagvaiḥ
analyzed: sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇa adrim svaryaḥ navagvaiḥ

original: RV_01.062.04.2{01} saraṇyubhiḥ phaligamindra śakra valaṃ raveṇadarayo daśagvaiḥ
analyzed: saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra valam raveṇadarayaḥ daśagvaiḥ

original: RV_01.062.05.1{01} gṛṇāno aṅgirobhirdasma vi varuṣasā sūryeṇa gobhirandhaḥ
analyzed: gṛṇānaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ dasma vi varuṣasā sūryeṇa gobhiḥ andhaḥ

original: RV_01.062.05.2{01} vi bhūmyā aprathaya indra sānu divo raja uparamastabhāyaḥ
analyzed: vi bhūmyāḥ aprathayaḥ indra sānu divaḥ rajaḥ uparama stabhāyaḥ

original: RV_01.062.06.1{02} tadu prayakṣatamamasya karma dasmasya cārutamamasti daṃsaḥ
analyzed: tat u prayakṣatamam asya karma dasmasya cārutamam asti daṃsaḥ

original: RV_01.062.06.2{02} upahvare yaduparā apinvan madhvarṇaso nadyaścatasraḥ
analyzed: upahvare yat uparāḥ apinvat madhu arṇasaḥ nadyaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_01.062.07.1{02} dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhirarkaiḥ
analyzed: dvitā vi vavre sana jā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_01.062.07.2{02} bhago na mene parame vyomannadhārayad rodasī sudaṃsāḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ na mene parame vyoman adhārayat rodasī su daṃsāḥ

original: RV_01.062.08.1{02} sanād divaṃ pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhirevaiḥ
analyzed: sanāt divam pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_01.062.08.2{02} kṛṣṇebhiraktoṣā ruśadbhirvapurbhirā carato anyānyā
analyzed: kṛṣṇebhiḥ akta uṣāḥ ruśadbhiḥ vapurbhiḥ ā carataḥ anyā anyā

original: RV_01.062.09.1{02} sanemi sakhyaṃ svapasyamānaḥ sūnurdādhāra śavasā sudaṃsāḥ
analyzed: sanemi sakhyam svapasyamānaḥ sūnuḥ dādhāra śavasā su daṃsāḥ

original: RV_01.062.09.2{02} āmāsu cid dadhiṣe pakvamantaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśad rohiṇīṣu
analyzed: āmāsu cit dadhiṣe pakvamantaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśat rohiṇīṣu

original: RV_01.062.10.1{02} sanāt sanīlā avanīravātā vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ
analyzed: sanāt sa nīlāḥ avanīra vātāḥ vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_01.062.10.2{02} purū sahasrā janayo na patnīrduvasyanti svasāro ahrayāṇam
analyzed: purū sahasrā janayaḥ na patnīḥ duvasyanti svasāraḥ ahrayāṇam

original: RV_01.062.11.1{03} sanāyuvo namasā navyo arkairvasūyavo matayo dasma dadruḥ
analyzed: sanāyuvaḥ namasā navyaḥ arkaiḥ vasūyavaḥ matayaḥ dasma dadruḥ

original: RV_01.062.11.2{03} patiṃ na patnīruśatīruśantaṃ spṛśanti tvā śavasāvanmanīṣāḥ
analyzed: patim na patnīḥ uśatīḥ uśantam spṛśanti tvā śavasāvat manīṣāḥ

original: RV_01.062.12.1{03} sanādeva tava rāyo gabhastau na kṣīyante nopa dasyanti dasma
analyzed: sanāt eva tava rāyaḥ gabhastau na kṣīyante na upa dasyanti dasma

original: RV_01.062.12.2{03} dyumānasi kratumānindra dhīraḥ śikṣā śacīvastava naḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: dyumān asi kratumān indra dhīraḥ śikṣa śacīvas tava naḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_01.062.13.1{03} sanāyate gotama indra navyamatakṣad brahma hariyojanāya
analyzed: sanāyate gotamaḥ indra navyam atakṣat brahma hari yojanāya

original: RV_01.062.13.2{03} sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
analyzed: su nīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.063.01.1{04} tvaṃ mahānindra yo ha śuṣmairdyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivīame dhāḥ
analyzed: tvam mahān indra yaḥ ha śuṣmaiḥ dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ

original: RV_01.063.01.2{04} yad dha te viśvā girayaścidabhvā bhiyā dṛḷhāsaḥ kiraṇā naijan
analyzed: yat ha te viśvāḥ girayaḥ cit abhvāḥ bhiyā dṛḍhāsaḥ kiraṇāḥ na aijan

original: RV_01.063.02.1{04} ā yad dharī indra vivratā verā te vajraṃ jaritā bāhvordhāt
analyzed: ā yat harī indra vivratā verā te vajram jaritā

original: RV_01.063.02.2{04} yenāviharyatakrato amitrān pura iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ
analyzed: yena a viharyata krato amitrān puraḥ iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ

original: RV_01.063.03.1{04} tvaṃ satya indra dhṛṣṇuretān tvam ṛbhukṣā naryastvaṃṣāṭ
analyzed: tvam satyaḥ indra dhṛṣṇuḥ etān tvam ṛbhukṣāḥ naryaḥ tvaṃṣāh

original: RV_01.063.03.2{04} tvaṃ śuṣṇaṃ vṛjane pṛkṣa āṇau yūne kutsāyadyumate sacāhan
analyzed: tvam śuṣṇam vṛjane pṛkṣe āṇau yūne kutsāya dyumate sacā ahan

original: RV_01.063.04.1{04} tvaṃ ha tyadindra codīḥ sakhā vṛtraṃ yad vajrin vṛṣakarmannubhnāḥ
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra codīḥ sakhā vṛtram yat vajrin vṛṣa karman ubhnāḥ

original: RV_01.063.04.2{04} yad dha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācairvi dasyūnryonāvakṛto vṛthāṣāṭ
analyzed: yat ha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācais vi dasyūn ryonau akṛtaḥ vṛthāṣāh

original: RV_01.063.05.1{04} tvaṃ ha tyadindrāriṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cin martānāmajuṣṭau
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra a riṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cit martānām ajuṣṭau

original: RV_01.063.05.2{04} vyasmadā kāṣṭhā arvate varghaneva vajriñchnathihyamitrān
analyzed: vi asmadā kāṣṭhāḥ arvate varghanā iva vajrin śnathihi amitrān

original: RV_01.063.06.1{05} tvāṃ ha tyadindrārṇasātau svarmīḷhe nara ājā havante
analyzed: tvām ha tyad indra arṇa sātau svarmīḍhe naraḥ ājā havante

original: RV_01.063.06.2{05} tava svadhāva iyamā samarya ūtirvājeṣvatasāyyā bhūt
analyzed: tava svadhāvas iyamā samarye ūtiḥ vājeṣu atasāyyā bhūt

original: RV_01.063.07.1{05} tvaṃ ha tyadindra sapta yudhyan puro vajrin purukutsāya dardaḥ
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra sapta yudhyan puraḥ vajrin purukutsāya dardar

original: RV_01.063.07.2{05} barhirna yat sudāse vṛthā vargaṃho rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ
analyzed: barhiḥ na yat sudāse vṛthā vargaṃhaḥ rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ

original: RV_01.063.08.1{05} tvaṃ tyāṃ na indra deva citrāmiṣamāpo na pīpayaḥ parijman
analyzed: tvam tyām naḥ indra deva citra āmiṣam āpaḥ na pīpayaḥ parijman

original: RV_01.063.08.2{05} yayā śūra pratyasmabhyaṃ yaṃsi tmanamūrjaṃ na viśvadha kṣaradhyai
analyzed: yayā śūra prati asmabhyam yaṃsi tmanam ūrjam na viśvadha kṣaradhyai

original: RV_01.063.09.1{05} akāri ta indra gotamebhirbrahmāṇyoktā namasā haribhyām
analyzed: akāri te indra gotamebhiḥ brahmāṇyā uktā namasā haribhyām

original: RV_01.063.09.2{05} supeśasaṃ vājamā bharā naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
analyzed: supeśasam vājamā bhara naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.064.01.1{06} vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktiṃ pra bharā marudbhyaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇe śardhāya su makhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bhara marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_01.064.01.2{06} apo na dhīro manasā suhastyo giraḥ samañje vidatheṣvābhuvaḥ
analyzed: apaḥ na dhīraḥ manasā suhastyaḥ giraḥ samañje vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_01.064.02.1{06} te jajñire diva ṛṣvāsa ukṣaṇo rudrasya maryā asurā arepasaḥ
analyzed: te jajñire divaḥ ṛṣvāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ rudrasya maryāḥ asurāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_01.064.02.2{06} pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryā iva satvāno na drapsinoghoravarpasaḥ
analyzed: pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryāḥ iva satvānaḥ na drapsinā ghora varpasaḥ

original: RV_01.064.03.1{06} yuvāno rudrā ajarā abhogghano vavakṣuradhrigāvaḥ parvatā iva
analyzed: yuvānaḥ rudrāḥ ajarāḥ abhogghanaḥ vavakṣuḥ adhrigāvaḥ parvatāḥ iva

original: RV_01.064.03.2{06} dṛḷhā cid viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayantidivyāni majmanā
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayantidivyāni majmanā

original: RV_01.064.04.1{06} citrairañjibhirvapuṣe vyañjate vakṣassu rukmānadhi yetire śubhe
analyzed: citraiḥ añjibhiḥ vapuṣe vyañjate vakṣassu rukmān adhi yetire śubhe

original: RV_01.064.04.2{06} aṃseṣveṣāṃ ni mimṛkṣur ṛṣṭayaḥ sākaṃ jajñire svadhayā divo naraḥ
analyzed: aṃseṣu eṣām ni mimṛkṣuḥ ṛṣṭayaḥ sākam jajñire svadhayā divaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_01.064.05.1{06} īśānakṛto dhunayo riśādaso vātān vidyutastaviṣībhirakrata
analyzed: īśāna kṛtaḥ dhunayaḥ riśādasaḥ vātān vidyutaḥ taviṣībhiḥ akrata

original: RV_01.064.05.2{06} duhantyūdhardivyāni dhūtayo bhūmiṃ pinvanti payasāparijrayaḥ
analyzed: duhanti ūdhar divyāni dhūtayaḥ bhūmim pinvanti payasā aparijrayaḥ

original: RV_01.064.06.1{07} pinvantyapo marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payo ghṛtavad vidatheṣvābhuvaḥ
analyzed: pinvanti apaḥ marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payaḥ ghṛtavat vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_01.064.06.2{07} atyaṃ na mihe vi nayanti vājinamutsaṃ duhanti stanayantamakṣitam
analyzed: atyam na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsam duhanti stanayantam akṣitam

original: RV_01.064.07.1{07} mahiṣāso māyinaścitrabhānavo girayo na svatavaso raghuṣyadaḥ
analyzed: mahiṣāsaḥ māyinaḥ citra bhānavaḥ girayaḥ na svatavasaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ

original: RV_01.064.07.2{07} mṛgā iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā yadāruṇīṣu taviṣīrayugdhvam
analyzed: mṛgāḥ iva hastinaḥ khādathāḥ vanā yadā aruṇīṣu taviṣīrayugdhvam

original: RV_01.064.08.1{07} siṃhā iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśā iva supiśo viśvavedasaḥ
analyzed: siṃhāḥ iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśāḥ iva supiśaḥ viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_01.064.08.2{07} kṣapo jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ samit sabādhaḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ
analyzed: kṣapaḥ jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ samidh sabādhaḥ śavasā ahi manyavaḥ

original: RV_01.064.09.1{07} rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyo nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ
analyzed: rodasī ā vadata gaṇa śriyaḥ nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasā ahi manyavaḥ

original: RV_01.064.09.2{07} ā vandhureṣvamatirna darśatā vidyun na tasthau maruto ratheṣu vaḥ
analyzed: ā vandhureṣu amatiḥ na darśatā vidyut na tasthau marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ

original: RV_01.064.10.1{07} viśvavedaso rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsastaviṣībhirvirapśinaḥ
analyzed: viśva vedasaḥ rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsaḥ taviṣībhiḥ virapśinaḥ

original: RV_01.064.10.2{07} astāra iṣuṃ dadhire gabhastyoranantaśuṣmā vṛṣakhādayo naraḥ
analyzed: astāraḥ iṣum dadhire gabhastyoḥ ananta śuṣmāḥ vṛṣa khādayaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_01.064.11.1{08} hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdha ujjighnanta āpathyo na parvatān
analyzed: hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payaḥ vṛdhaḥ ujjighnantaḥ āpathyaḥ na parvatān

original: RV_01.064.11.2{08} makhā ayāsaḥ svasṛto dhruvacyuto dudhrakṛto maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: makhāḥ ayāsaḥ svasṛtaḥ dhruva cyutaḥ dudhra kṛtaḥ marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.064.12.1{08} ghṛṣuṃ pāvakaṃ vaninaṃ vicarṣaṇiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā gṛṇīmasi
analyzed: ghṛṣum pāvakam vaninam vicarṣaṇim rudrasya sūnum havasā gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_01.064.12.2{08} rajasturaṃ tavasaṃ mārutaṃ gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇaṃvṛṣaṇaṃ saścata śriye
analyzed: rajasturam tavasam mārutam gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇam vṛṣaṇam saścata śriye

original: RV_01.064.13.1{08} pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janānati tasthau va ūtī maruto yamāvata
analyzed: pra nu sa martaḥ śavasā janān ati tasthau vaḥ ūtī marutaḥ yamā avata

original: RV_01.064.13.2{08} arvadbhirvajaṃ bharate dhanā nṛbhirāpṛchyaṃkratumā kṣeti puṣyati
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ vajam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ āpṛchyaṃkratumā kṣeti puṣyati

original: RV_01.064.14.1{08} carkṛtyaṃ marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ dyumantaṃ śuṣmaṃ maghavatsu dhattana
analyzed: carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaram dyumantam śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana

original: RV_01.064.14.2{08} dhanaspṛtamukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ tokaṃ puṣyema tanayaṃ śataṃ himaḥ
analyzed: dhana spṛtam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim tokam puṣyema tanayam śatam himaḥ

original: RV_01.064.15.1{08} nū ṣṭhiraṃ maruto vīravantam ṛtīṣāhaṃ rayimasmāsu dhatta
analyzed: nu sthiram marutaḥ vīravantam ṛtīṣāham rayim asmāsu dhatta

original: RV_01.064.15.2{08} sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
analyzed: sahasriṇam śatinam śūśuvāṃsam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.065.01.1{09} paśvā na tāyuṃ guhā catantaṃ namo yujānaṃ namo vahantam
analyzed: paśvā na tāyum guhā catantam namaḥ yujānam namaḥ vahantam

original: RV_01.065.01.2{09} sajoṣā dhīrāḥ padairanu gmannupa tvā sīdan viśveyajatrāḥ
analyzed: sajoṣāḥ dhīrāḥ padaiḥ anu gman upa tvā sīdan viśveyajatrāḥ

original: RV_01.065.02.1{09} ṛtasya devā anu vratā gurbhuvat pariṣṭirdyaurna bhūma
analyzed: ṛtasya devāḥ anu vratā guḥ bhuvat pariṣṭiḥ dyauḥ na bhūma

original: RV_01.065.02.2{09} vardhantīmāpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam
analyzed: vardhanti īm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe su jātam

original: RV_01.065.03.1{09} puṣṭirna raṇvā kṣitirna pṛthivī girirna bhujma kṣodo na śambhu
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ na raṇvā kṣitiḥ na pṛthivī giriḥ na bhujma kṣodaḥ na śambhu

original: RV_01.065.03.2{09} atyo nājman sargaprataktaḥ sindhurna kṣodaḥ ka īṃ varāte
analyzed: atyaḥ na ajman sarga prataktaḥ sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ kaḥ īm varāte

original: RV_01.065.04.1{09} jāmiḥ sindhūnāṃ bhrāteva svasrāmibhyān na rājā vanānyatti
analyzed: jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrātā iva na rājā vanāni atti

original: RV_01.065.04.2{09} yad vātajūto vanā vyasthādagnirha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: yat vāta jūtaḥ vanā vyasthāt agniḥ ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_01.065.05.1{09} śvasityapsu haṃso na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭho viśāmuṣarbhut
analyzed: śvasiti apsu haṃsaḥ na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭhaḥ viśām uṣarbudh

original: RV_01.065.05.2{09} somo na vedhā ṛtaprajātaḥ paśurna śiśvā vibhurdūrebhāḥ
analyzed: somaḥ na vedhāḥ ṛta prajātaḥ paśuḥ na śiśvā vibhuḥ dūrebhāḥ

original: RV_01.066.01.1{10} rayirna citrā sūro na sandṛgāyurna prāṇo nityo nasūnuḥ
analyzed: rayiḥ na citrā sūraḥ na sandṛś āyuḥ na prāṇaḥ nityaḥ na sūnuḥ

original: RV_01.066.01.2{10} takvā na bhūrṇirvanā siṣakti payo na dhenuḥ śucirvibhāvā
analyzed: takvā na bhūrṇiḥ vanā siṣakti payaḥ na dhenuḥ śuciḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_01.066.02.1{10} dādhāra kṣemamoko na raṇvo yavo na pakvo jetā janānām
analyzed: dādhāra kṣema mokaḥ na raṇvaḥ yavaḥ na pakvaḥ jetā janānām

original: RV_01.066.02.2{10} ṛṣirna stubhvā vikṣu praśasto vājī na prīto vayodadhati
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ na stubhvā vikṣu praśastaḥ vājī na prītaḥ vayodadhati

original: RV_01.066.03.1{10} durokaśociḥ kraturna nityo jāyeva yonāvaraṃ viśvasmai
analyzed: duroka śociḥ kratuḥ na nityaḥ jāyā iva yonau avaram viśvasmai

original: RV_01.066.03.2{10} citro yadabhrāṭ chveto na vikṣu ratho na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu
analyzed: citraḥ yat abhrāṭ śvetaḥ na vikṣu rathaḥ na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu

original: RV_01.066.04.1{10} seneva sṛṣṭāmaṃ dadhātyasturna didyut tveṣapratīkā
analyzed: senā iva sṛṣṭā āmam dadhāti astuḥ na didyut tveṣa pratīkā

original: RV_01.066.04.2{10} yamo ha jāto yamo janitvaṃ jāraḥ kanīnāṃ patirjanīnām
analyzed: yamaḥ ha jātaḥ yamaḥ janitvam jāraḥ kanīnām patiḥ janīnām

original: RV_01.066.05.1{10} taṃ vaścarāthā vayaṃ vasatyāstaṃ na gāvo nakṣanta iddham
analyzed: tam vaḥ carātha vayam vasatyāḥ tam na gāvaḥ nakṣante iddham

original: RV_01.066.05.2{10} sindhurna kṣodaḥ pra nīcīrainon navanta gāvaḥ svardṛśīke
analyzed: sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīḥ ainot navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke

original: RV_01.067.01.1{11} vaneṣu jāyurmarteṣu mitro vṛṇīte śruṣṭiṃ rājevājuryam
analyzed: vaneṣu jāyuḥ marteṣu mitraḥ vṛṇīte śruṣṭim rājā iva ajuryam

original: RV_01.067.01.2{11} kṣemo na sādhuḥ kraturna bhadro bhuvat svādhirhotā havyavāṭ
analyzed: kṣemaḥ na sādhuḥ kratuḥ na bhadraḥ bhuvat svādhiḥ hotā havyavāṭ

original: RV_01.067.02.1{11} haste dadhāno nṛmṇā viśvānyame devān dhād guhā niṣīdan
analyzed: haste dadhānaḥ nṛmṇāḥ viśvān yame devān dhāt guhā niṣīdan

original: RV_01.067.02.2{11} vidantīmatra naro dhiyandhā hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrānaśaṃsan
analyzed: vidanti īm atra naraḥ hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrān aśaṃsan

original: RV_01.067.03.1{11} ajo na kṣāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ tastambha dyāṃ mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ
analyzed: ajaḥ na kṣām dādhāra pṛthivīm tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ

original: RV_01.067.03.2{11} priyā padāni paśvo ni pāhi viśvāyuragne guhā guhaṃ gāḥ
analyzed: priyā padāni paśvaḥ ni pāhi viśvāyuḥ agne guhā guham gāḥ

original: RV_01.067.04.1{11} ya īṃ ciketa guhā bhavantamā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya
analyzed: yaḥ īm ciketa guhā bhavantamā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya

original: RV_01.067.04.2{11} vi ye cṛtanty ṛtā sapanta ādid vasūni pra vavācāsmai
analyzed: vi ye cṛtanti ṛtā sapantaḥ ādid vasūni pra vavāca asmai

original: RV_01.067.05.1{11} vi yo vīrutsu rodhan mahitvota prajā uta prasūṣvantaḥ
analyzed: vi yaḥ vīrutsu rodhat mahitvā uta prajāḥ uta prasūṣu antaḥ

original: RV_01.067.05.2{11} cittirapāṃ dame viśvāyuḥ sadmeva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ
analyzed: cittiḥ apām dame viśvāyuḥ sadma iva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ

original: RV_01.068.01.1{12} śrīṇannupa sthād divaṃ bhuraṇyu sthātuścarathamaktūnvyūrṇot
analyzed: śrīṇan upa sthāt divam bhuraṇyu sthātuḥ caratham aktūn vyūrṇot

original: RV_01.068.01.2{12} pari yadeṣāmeko viśveṣāṃ bhuvad devo devānāṃ mahitvā
analyzed: pari yat eṣām ekaḥ viśveṣām bhuvat devaḥ devānām mahitvā

original: RV_01.068.02.1{12} ādit te viśve kratuṃ juṣanta śuṣkād yad deva jīvo janiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: ādit te viśve kratum juṣanta śuṣkāt yat deva jīvaḥ janiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_01.068.02.2{12} bhajanta viśve devatvaṃ nāma ṛtaṃ sapanto amṛtamevaiḥ
analyzed: bhajanta viśve deva tvam nāma ṛtam sapantaḥ amṛta mevaiḥ

original: RV_01.068.03.1{12} ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītirviśvāyurviśve apāṃsi cakruḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītiḥ viśvāyuḥ viśve apāṃsi cakruḥ

original: RV_01.068.03.2{12} yastubhyaṃ dāśād yo vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvānrayiṃ dayasva
analyzed: yaḥ tubhyam dāśāt yaḥ vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvān rayim dayasva

original: RV_01.068.04.1{12} hotā niṣatto manorapatye sa cin nvāsāṃ patī rayīṇām
analyzed: hotā niṣattaḥ manoḥ apatye sa cit nu āsām patiḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_01.068.04.2{12} ichanta reto mithastanūṣu saṃ jānata svairdakṣairamūrāḥ
analyzed: ichanta retaḥ mithas tanūṣu sam jānata svaiḥ dakṣaiḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_01.068.05.1{12} piturna putrāḥ kratuṃ juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsaṃ turāsaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ na putrāḥ kratum juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsam turāsaḥ

original: RV_01.068.05.2{12} vi rāya aurṇod duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākaṃ stṛbhirdamūnāḥ
analyzed: vi rāyaḥ aurṇot duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākam stṛbhiḥ damūnāḥ

original: RV_01.069.01.1{13} śukraḥ śuśukvānuṣo na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divo najyotiḥ
analyzed: śukraḥ śuśukva anuṣaḥ na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divaḥ na jyotiḥ

original: RV_01.069.01.2{13} pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvo devānāṃ pitā putraḥ san
analyzed: pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvaḥ devānām pitā putraḥ san

original: RV_01.069.02.1{13} vedhā adṛpto agnirvijānannūdharna gonāṃ svādmā pitūnām
analyzed: vedhāḥ adṛptaḥ agniḥ vijānan ūdhar na gonām svādmā pitūnām

original: RV_01.069.02.2{13} jane na śeva āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣatto raṇvo duroṇe
analyzed: jane na śevaḥ āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣattaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe

original: RV_01.069.03.1{13} putro na jāto raṇvo duroṇe vājī na prīto viśo vi tārīt
analyzed: putraḥ na jātaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe vājī na prītaḥ viśaḥ vi tārīt

original: RV_01.069.03.2{13} viśo yadahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷā agnirdevatvā viśvānyaśyāḥ
analyzed: viśaḥ yat ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷāḥ agniḥ deva tvā viśvāni yaśyāḥ

original: RV_01.069.04.1{13} nakiṣ ṭa etā vratā minanti nṛbhyo yadebhyaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakartha
analyzed: nakir ṭe etā vratā minanti nṛbhyaḥ yat ebhyaḥ śruṣṭim cakartha

original: RV_01.069.04.2{13} tat tu te daṃso yadahan samānairnṛbhiryad yukto vive rapāṃsi
analyzed: tat tu te daṃsaḥ yat ahan samānaiḥ nṛbhiḥ yat yuktaḥ viveḥ rapāṃsi

original: RV_01.069.05.1{13} uṣo na jāro vibhāvosraḥ saṃjñātarūpaściketadasmai
analyzed: uṣaḥ na jāraḥ vibhāvā usraḥ saṃjñāta rūpaḥ ciketat asmai

original: RV_01.069.05.2{13} tmanā vahanto duro vy ṛṇvan navanta viśve svardṛśīke
analyzed: tmanā vahantaḥ duraḥ vi ṛṇvan navanta viśve svar dṛśīke

original: RV_01.070.01.1{14} vanema pūrvīraryo manīṣā agniḥ suśoko viśvānyaśyāḥ
analyzed: vanema pūrvīḥ aryaḥ manīṣāḥ agniḥ su śokaḥ viśvāni aśyāḥ

original: RV_01.070.01.2{14} ā daivyāni vratā cikitvānā mānuṣasya janasya janma
analyzed: ā daivyāni vratā cikitvānā mānuṣasya janasya janma

original: RV_01.070.02.1{14} garbho yo apāṃ garbho vanānāṃ garbhaśca sthātāṃ garbhaścarathām
analyzed: garbhaḥ yaḥ apām garbhaḥ vanānām garbhaḥ ca sthātām garbhaḥ carathām

original: RV_01.070.02.2{14} adrau cidasmā antarduroṇe viśāṃ na viśvo amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ
analyzed: adrau cit asmai antar duroṇe viśām na viśvaḥ amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ

original: RV_01.070.03.1{14} sa hi kṣapāvānagnī rayīṇāṃ dāśad yo asmā araṃ sūktaiḥ
analyzed: sa hi kṣapāvān agniḥ rayīṇām dāśat yaḥ asmai aram sūktaiḥ

original: RV_01.070.03.2{14} etā cikitvo bhūmā ni pāhi devānāṃ janma martāṃśca vidvān
analyzed: etā cikitvaḥ bhūmā ni pāhi devānām janma martān ca vidvān

original: RV_01.070.04.1{14} vardhān yaṃ pūrvīḥ kṣapo virūpā sthātuśca ratham ṛtapravītam
analyzed: vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapaḥ virūpā sthātuḥ ca ratham ṛta pravītam

original: RV_01.070.04.2{14} arādhi hotā svarniṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvānyapāṃsi satyā
analyzed: arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvāni apāṃsi satyā

original: RV_01.070.05.1{14} goṣu praśastiṃ vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve baliṃ svarṇaḥ
analyzed: goṣu praśastim vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve balim svarṇaḥ

original: RV_01.070.05.2{14} vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan piturna jivrervi vedobharanta
analyzed: vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pituḥ na jivreḥ vi

original: RV_01.070.06.1{14} sādhurna gṛdhnurasteva śūro yāteva bhīmastveṣaḥ samatsu
analyzed: sādhuḥ na gṛdhnuḥ astā iva śūraḥ yātā iva bhīmaḥ tveṣaḥ samatsu

original: RV_01.071.01.1{15} upa pra jinvannuśatīruśantaṃ patiṃ na nityaṃ janayaḥ sanīḷāḥ
analyzed: upa pra jinvan uśatīḥ uśantam patim na nityam janayaḥ sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_01.071.01.2{15} svasāraḥ śyāvīmaruṣīmajuṣrañcitramuchantīmuṣasaṃ na gāvaḥ
analyzed: svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣran citram uchantīm uṣasam na gāvaḥ

original: RV_01.071.02.1{15} vīḷu cid dṛḷhā pitaro na ukthairadriṃ rujannaṅgiraso raveṇa
analyzed: vīḍu cit dṛḷhā pitaraḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ adrim rujan aṅgirasaḥ raveṇa

original: RV_01.071.02.2{15} cakrurdivo bṛhato gātumasme ahaḥ svarvividuḥ ketumusrāḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ gātum asme ahar svar vividuḥ ketumusrāḥ

original: RV_01.071.03.1{15} dadhannṛtaṃ dhanayannasya dhītimādidaryo didhiṣvo vibhṛtrāḥ
analyzed: dadhan ṛtam dhanayan asya dhītim ādidaryaḥ didhiṣvaḥ vibhṛtrāḥ

original: RV_01.071.03.2{15} atṛṣyantīrapaso yantyachā devāñ janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ
analyzed: a tṛṣyantīḥ apasaḥ yanti achā devām janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ

original: RV_01.071.04.1{15} mathīd yadīṃ vibhṛto mātariśvā gṛhe-gṛhe śyeto jenyo bhūt
analyzed: mathīt yadi īm vibhṛtaḥ mātariśvā gṛhe gṛhe śyetaḥ jenyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_01.071.04.2{15} ādīṃ rājñe na sahīyase sacā sannā dūtyaṃ bhṛgavāṇo vivāya
analyzed: rājñe na sahīyase sacā sannā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇaḥ vivāya

original: RV_01.071.05.1{15} mahe yat pitra īṃ rasaṃ dive karava tsarat pṛśanyaścikitvān
analyzed: mahe yat pitre īm rasam dive karava tsarat pṛśanyaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_01.071.05.2{15} sṛjadastā dhṛṣatā didyumasmai svāyāṃ devo duhitari tviṣiṃ dhāt
analyzed: sṛjat astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai svāyām devaḥ duhitari tviṣim dhāt

original: RV_01.071.06.1{16} sva ā yastubhyaṃ dama ā vibhāti namo vā dāśāduśato anu dyūn
analyzed: sve ā yaḥ tubhyam dame ā vibhāti namaḥ vā dāśāt uśataḥ anu dyūn

original: RV_01.071.06.2{16} vardho agne vayo asya dvibarhā yāsad rāyā sarathaṃ yaṃ junāsi
analyzed: vardha u agne vayaḥ asya dvibarhāḥ yāsat rāyā sa ratham yam junāsi

original: RV_01.071.07.1{16} agniṃ viśvā abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudraṃ na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ
analyzed: agnim viśvāḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudram na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ

original: RV_01.071.07.2{16} na jāmibhirvi cikite vayo no vidā deveṣu pramatiṃ cikitvān
analyzed: na jāmibhiḥ vi cikite vayaḥ naḥ vidāḥ deveṣu pramatim cikitvān

original: RV_01.071.08.1{16} ā yadiṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ chuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaurabhīke
analyzed: ā yat iṣe nṛpatim tejaḥ ānaṭ śuci retaḥ niṣiktam dyauḥ abhīke

original: RV_01.071.08.2{16} agniḥ śardhamanavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayacca
analyzed: agniḥ śardham anavadyam yuvānam svādhyam janayat sūdayat ca

original: RV_01.071.09.1{16} mano na yo 'dhvanaḥ sadya etyekaḥ satrā sūro vasva īśe
analyzed: manaḥ na yaḥ adhvanaḥ sadyas eti ekaḥ satrā sūraḥ vasvaḥ īśe

original: RV_01.071.09.2{16} rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī goṣu priyamamṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇā
analyzed: rājānā mitrāvaruṇā su pāṇī goṣu priyam amṛtam rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_01.071.10.1{16} mā no agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhā abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san
analyzed: mā naḥ agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhāḥ abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san

original: RV_01.071.10.2{16} nabho na rūpaṃ jarimā mināti purā tasyā abhiśasteradhīhi
analyzed: nabhaḥ na rūpam jarimā mināti purā tasyāḥ abhiśasteḥ adhīhi

original: RV_01.072.01.1{17} ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvatas karhaste dadhāno naryā purūṇi
analyzed: ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvataḥ karhaste dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi

original: RV_01.072.01.2{17} agnirbhuvad rayipatī rayīṇāṃ satrā cakrāṇo amṛtāni viśvā
analyzed: agniḥ bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām satrā cakrāṇaḥ amṛtāni viśvā

original: RV_01.072.02.1{17} asme vatsaṃ pari ṣantaṃ na vindannichanto viśve amṛtā amūrāḥ
analyzed: asme vatsam pari santam na vindan icchantaḥ viśve amṛtāḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_01.072.02.2{17} śramayuvaḥ padavyo dhiyandhāstasthuḥ pade paramecārvagneḥ
analyzed: śramayuvaḥ padavyaḥ dhiyandhāḥ tasthuḥ pade parame cāru agneḥ

original: RV_01.072.03.1{17} tisro yadagne śaradastvāmicchuciṃ ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān
analyzed: tisraḥ yat agne śaradaḥ tvām id śucim ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān

original: RV_01.072.03.2{17} nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyānyasūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ
analyzed: nāmāni cit dadhire yajñiyāni asūdayanta tanvaḥ su jātāḥ

original: RV_01.072.04.1{17} ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyāḥ jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.072.04.2{17} vidan marto nemadhitā cikitvānagniṃ pade parame tasthivāṃsam
analyzed: vidat martaḥ nemadhitā cikitvān agnim pade parame tasthivāṃsam

original: RV_01.072.05.1{17} saṃjānānā upa sīdannabhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyan
analyzed: saṃjānānāḥ upa sīdan abhijñu patnīvantaḥ namasyam namasyan

original: RV_01.072.05.2{17} ririkvāṃsastanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyurnimiṣirakṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: ririkvāṃsaḥ tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_01.072.06.1{18} triḥ sapta yad guhyāni tve it padāvidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: tris sapta yat guhyāni tve id padā avidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.072.06.2{18} tebhī rakṣante amṛtaṃ sajoṣāḥ paśūñca sthātṝñcarathaṃ ca pāhi
analyzed: tebhiḥ rakṣante amṛtam sajoṣāḥ paśūn ca sthātṝn caratham ca pāhi

original: RV_01.072.07.1{18} vidvānagne vayunāni kṣitīnāṃ vyānuṣak churudho jīvasedhāḥ
analyzed: vidvān agne vayunāni kṣitīnām vyānuṣak śurudhaḥ jīva sedhāḥ

original: RV_01.072.07.2{18} antarvidvānadhvano devayānānatandro dūto abhavo havirvāṭ
analyzed: antar vidvān adhvanaḥ deva yānān atandraḥ dūtaḥ abhavaḥ haviḥ vāh

original: RV_01.072.08.1{18} svādhyo diva ā sapta yahvī rāyo duro vy ṛtajñā ajānan
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ divaḥ ā sapta yahvī rāyaḥ duraḥ vi ṛta jñāḥ ajānan

original: RV_01.072.08.2{18} vidad gavyaṃ saramā dṛḷhamūrvaṃ yenā nu kaṃ mānuṣībhojate viṭ
