original: RV_01.072.09.1{18} ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum
analyzed: ā ye viśvā su apatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāsaḥ amṛta tvāya gātum

original: RV_01.072.09.2{18} mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putrairaditirdhāyase veḥ
analyzed: mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putraiḥ aditiḥ dhāyase veḥ

original: RV_01.072.10.1{18} adhi sriyaṃ ni dadhuścārumasmin divo yadakṣī amṛtā akṛṇvan
analyzed: adhi sriyam ni dadhuḥ cārum asmin divaḥ yat akṣī amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan

original: RV_01.072.10.2{18} adha kṣaranti sindhavo na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nī cīragnearuṣīrajānan
analyzed: adha kṣaranti sindhavaḥ na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nī cīḥ agne aruṣīḥ ajānan

original: RV_01.073.01.1{19} rayirna yaḥ pitṛvitto vayodhāḥ supraṇītiścikituṣo naśāsuḥ
analyzed: rayiḥ na yaḥ pitṛ vittaḥ vayodhāḥ su praṇītiḥ cikituṣaḥ naśāsuḥ

original: RV_01.073.01.2{19} syonāśīratithirna prīṇāno hoteva sadma vidhato vi tārīt
analyzed: syona āśīḥ atithiḥ na prīṇānaḥ hotā iva sadma vidhataḥ vi tārīt

original: RV_01.073.02.1{19} devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā
analyzed: devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satya manmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.073.02.2{19} purupraśasto amatirna satya ātmeva śevo didhiṣāyyo bhūt
analyzed: puru praśastaḥ amatiḥ na satyaḥ ātmā iva śevaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_01.073.03.1{19} devo na yaḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upakṣeti hitamitro na rājā
analyzed: devaḥ na yaḥ pṛthivīm viśva dhāyas upakṣeti hita mitraḥ na rājā

original: RV_01.073.03.2{19} puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā anavadyā patijuṣṭeva nārī
analyzed: puraḥsadaḥ śarma sadaḥ na vīrāḥ anavadyā pati juṣṭā iva nārī

original: RV_01.073.04.1{19} taṃ tvā naro dama ā nityamiddhamagne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu
analyzed: tam tvā naraḥ dame ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu

original: RV_01.073.04.2{19} adhi dyumnaṃ ni dadhurbhūryasmin bhavā viśvāyurdharuṇo rayīṇām
analyzed: adhi dyumnam ni dadhuḥ bhūḥ yasmin bhava viśvāyuḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_01.073.05.1{19} vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyurvi sūrayo dadato viśvamāyuḥ
analyzed: vi pṛkṣaḥ agne maghavānaḥ aśyuḥ vi sūrayaḥ dadataḥ viśvam āyuḥ

original: RV_01.073.05.2{19} sanema vājaṃ samitheṣvaryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravasedadhānāḥ
analyzed: sanema vājam samitheṣu aryaḥ bhāgam deveṣu śravasā dadhānāḥ

original: RV_01.073.06.1{20} ṛtasya hi dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya hi dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyu bhaktāḥ

original: RV_01.073.06.2{20} parāvataḥ sumatiṃ bhikṣamāṇā vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasruradrim
analyzed: parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasruḥ adrim

original: RV_01.073.07.1{20} tve agne sumatiṃ bhikṣamāṇā divi śravo dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ divi śravaḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.073.07.2{20} naktā ca cakruruṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇamaruṇaṃ ca saṃ dhuḥ
analyzed: naktā ca cakruḥ uṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇam ca varṇam aruṇam ca sam dhuḥ

original: RV_01.073.08.1{20} yān rāye martān suṣūdo agne te syāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca
analyzed: yān rāye martān suṣūdaḥ agne te syāma maghavānaḥ vayam ca

original: RV_01.073.08.2{20} chāyeva viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ sisakṣyāpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam
analyzed: chāyā iva viśvam bhuvanam sisakṣya apaprivān rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_01.073.09.1{20} arvadbhiragne arvato nṛbhirnṝn vīrairvīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ agne arvataḥ nṛbhiḥ nṝn vīraiḥ vīrān vanuyāma tvotāḥ

original: RV_01.073.09.2{20} īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyo vi sūrayaḥ śatahimā no aśyuḥ
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ pitṛ vittasya rāyaḥ vi sūrayaḥ śata himā naḥ aśyuḥ

original: RV_01.073.10.1{20} etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca
analyzed: etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca

original: RV_01.073.10.2{20} śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ
analyzed: śakema rāyaḥ su dhuraḥ yamam te adhi śravaḥ deva bhaktam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_01.074.01.1{21} upaprayanto adhvaraṃ mantraṃ vocemāgnaye
analyzed: upaprayantaḥ adhvaram mantram vocema agnaye

original: RV_01.074.01.2{21} āre asme ca śṛṇvate
analyzed: āre asme ca śṛṇvate

original: RV_01.074.02.1{21} yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu
analyzed: yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.074.02.2{21} arakṣad dāśuṣe gayam
analyzed: arakṣat dāśuṣe gayam

original: RV_01.074.03.1{21} uta bruvantu jantava udagnirvṛtrahājani
analyzed: uta bruvantu jantavaḥ ud agniḥ vṛtra hā ajani

original: RV_01.074.03.2{21} dhanaṃjayo raṇe-raṇe
analyzed: dhanaṃjayaḥ raṇeraṇe

original: RV_01.074.04.1{21} yasya dūto asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye
analyzed: yasya dūtaḥ asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye

original: RV_01.074.04.2{21} dasmat kṛṇoṣyadhvaram
analyzed: dasmat kṛṇoṣi adhvaram

original: RV_01.074.05.1{21} tamit suhavyamaṅgiraḥ sudevaṃ sahaso yaho
analyzed: tam id su havyam aṅgiraḥ su devam sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_01.074.05.2{21} janā āhuḥ subarhiṣam
analyzed: janai āhuḥ su barhiṣam

original: RV_01.074.06.1{22} ā ca vahāsi tāniha devānupa praśastaye
analyzed: ā ca vahāsi tān iha devān upa praśastaye

original: RV_01.074.06.2{22} havyā suścandra vītaye
analyzed: havyā su ścandra vītaye

original: RV_01.074.07.1{22} na yorupabdiraśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kaccana
analyzed: na yaḥ uru pabdiḥ aśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kat cana

original: RV_01.074.07.2{22} yadagneyāsi dūtyam
analyzed: yat agneyā asi dūtyam

original: RV_01.074.08.1{22} tvoto vājyahrayo 'bhi pūrvasmādaparaḥ
analyzed: tvotaḥ vājya hrayaḥ abhi pūrvasmāt aparaḥ

original: RV_01.074.08.2{22} pra dāśvānagne asthāt
analyzed: pra dāśvān agne asthāt

original: RV_01.074.09.1{22} uta dyumat suvīryaṃ bṛhadagne vivāsasi
analyzed: uta dyumat su vīryam bṛhat agne vivāsasi

original: RV_01.074.09.2{22} devebhyo deva dāśuṣe
analyzed: devebhyaḥ deva dāśuṣe

original: RV_01.075.01.1{23} juṣasva saprathastamaṃ vaco devapsarastamam
analyzed: juṣasva saprathastamam vacaḥ deva psarastamam

original: RV_01.075.01.2{23} havyā juhvānaāsani
analyzed: havyā juhvāna āsani

original: RV_01.075.02.1{23} athā te aṅgirastamāgne vedhastama priyam
analyzed: athā te aṅgirastama agne vedhastama priyam

original: RV_01.075.02.2{23} vocema brahma sānasi
analyzed: vocema brahma sānasi

original: RV_01.075.03.1{23} kaste jāmirjanānāmagne ko dāśvadhvaraḥ
analyzed: kaḥ te jāmiḥ janānām agne kaḥ dāśu adhvaraḥ

original: RV_01.075.03.2{23} ko ha kasminnasi śritaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ ha kasmin asi śritaḥ

original: RV_01.075.04.1{23} tvaṃ jāmirjanānāmagne mitro asi priyaḥ
analyzed: tvam jāmiḥ janānām agne mitraḥ asi priyaḥ

original: RV_01.075.04.2{23} sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ
analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_01.075.05.1{23} yajā no mitrāvaruṇā yajā devān ṛtaṃ bṛhat
analyzed: yaja naḥ mitrāvaruṇā yaja devān ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_01.075.05.2{23} agne yakṣisvaṃ damam
analyzed: agne yakṣisvam damam

original: RV_01.076.01.1{24} kā ta upetirmanaso varāya bhuvadagne śantamā kā manīṣā
analyzed: kā te upetiḥ manasaḥ varāya bhuvat agne śantamā kā manīṣā

original: RV_01.076.01.2{24} ko vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣaṃ ta āpa kena vā te manasādāśema
analyzed: kaḥ vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣam te āpa kena vā te manasā ādāśema

original: RV_01.076.02.1{24} ehyagna iha hotā ni ṣīdādabdhaḥ su puraetā bhavā naḥ
analyzed: ehi agne iha hotā ni sīda adabdhaḥ su puraetā bhava naḥ

original: RV_01.076.02.2{24} avatāṃ tvā rodasī viśvaminve yajā mahe saumanasāya devān
analyzed: avatām tvā rodasī viśvaminve yaja mahe saumanasāya devān

original: RV_01.076.03.1{24} pra su viśvān rakṣaso dhakṣyagne bhavā yajñānāmabhiśastipāvā
analyzed: pra su viśvān rakṣasaḥ dhakṣi agne bhava yajñānām abhiśasti pāvā

original: RV_01.076.03.2{24} athā vaha somapatiṃ haribhyāmātithyamasmai cakṛmā sudāvne
analyzed: athā vaha soma patim haribhyām ātithyam asmai cakṛma sudāvne

original: RV_01.076.04.1{24} prajāvatā vacasā vahnirāsā ca huve ni ca satsīha devaiḥ
analyzed: prajāvatā vacasā vahni rāsā ca huve ni ca satsi iha devaiḥ

original: RV_01.076.04.2{24} veṣi hotramuta potraṃ yajatra bodhi prayantarjanitarvasūnām
analyzed: veṣi hotram uta potram yajatra bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām

original: RV_01.076.05.1{24} yathā viprasya manuṣo havirbhirdevānayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san
analyzed: yathā viprasya manuṣaḥ havirbhiḥ devān ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san

original: RV_01.076.05.2{24} evā hotaḥ satyatara tvamadyāgne mandrayā juhvā yajasva
analyzed: eva hotar satyatara tvam adya agne mandrayā juhvā yajasva

original: RV_01.077.01.1{25} kathā dāśemāgnaye kāsmai devajuṣṭocyate bhāmine gīḥ
analyzed: kathā dāśema agnaye kā asmai deva juṣṭā ucyate bhāmine gīḥ

original: RV_01.077.01.2{25} yo martyeṣvamṛta ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭha it kṛṇoti devān
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ id kṛṇoti devān

original: RV_01.077.02.1{25} yo adhvareṣu śantama ṛtāvā hotā tamū namobhirā kṛṇudhvam
analyzed: yaḥ adhvareṣu śantamaḥ ṛtāvā hotā tamū namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_01.077.02.2{25} agniryad vermartāya devān sa cā bodhāti manasāyajāti
analyzed: agniḥ yat veḥ martāya devān sa ca ā bodhāti manasā ayajāti

original: RV_01.077.03.1{25} sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhurmitro na bhūdadbhutasya rathīḥ
analyzed: sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhuḥ mitraḥ na bhūt adbhutasya rathīḥ

original: RV_01.077.03.2{25} taṃ medheṣu prathamaṃ devayantīrviśa upa bruvate dasmamārīḥ
analyzed: tam medheṣu prathamam devayantīḥ viśaḥ upa bruvate dasma mārīḥ

original: RV_01.077.04.1{25} sa no nṛṇāṃ nṛtamo riśāda agnirgiro 'vasā vetu dhītim
analyzed: sa naḥ nṛṇām nṛtamaḥ riśādaḥ agniḥ giraḥ avasā vetu dhītim

original: RV_01.077.04.2{25} tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭha vājaprasūtā iṣayantamanma
analyzed: tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭha vāja prasūtāḥ iṣayanta manma

original: RV_01.077.05.1{25} evāgnirgotamebhirṛtāvā viprebhirastoṣṭa jātavedāḥ
analyzed: eva agniḥ gotamebhiḥ ṛtāvā viprebhiḥ astoṣṭa jātavedāḥ

original: RV_01.077.05.2{25} sa eṣu dyumnaṃ pīpayat sa vājaṃ sa puṣṭiṃ yāti joṣamā cikitvān
analyzed: saḥ eṣu dyumnam pīpayat sa vājam sa puṣṭim yāti joṣam ā cikitvān

original: RV_01.078.01.1{26} abhi tvā gotamā girā jātavedo vicarṣaṇe
analyzed: abhi tvā gotamāḥ girā jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_01.078.01.2{26} dyumnairabhi pra ṇonumaḥ
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_01.078.02.1{26} tamu tvā gotamo girā rāyaskāmo duvasyati
analyzed: tam u tvā gotamaḥ girā rāyaskāmaḥ duvasyati
dyumnaiḥ

original: RV_01.078.03.1{26} tamu tvā vājasātamamaṅgirasvad dhavāmahe
analyzed: tam u tvā vāja sātamam aṅgirasvat havāmahe
dyumnaiḥ

original: RV_01.078.04.1{26} tamu tvā vṛtrahantamaṃ yo dasyūnravadhūnuṣe
analyzed: tam u tvā vṛtra hantamam yaḥ dasyūn ravadhūnuṣe
dyumnaiḥ

analyzed: avocāma rahūgaṇāḥ agnaye madhumat vacaḥ
dyumnaiḥ

analyzed: śuci bhrājāḥ uṣasaḥ navedāḥ yaśasvatīḥ apasyuvaḥ na satyāḥ

analyzed: ā te suparṇau aminantam evaiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam

analyzed: śivābhiḥ na smayamāna abhirāgāt patanti mihaḥ stanayanti abhrā

analyzed: yadi īm ṛtasya payasā piyānaḥ nayan ṛtasya pathibhiḥ rajiṣṭhaiḥ

analyzed: aryamā mitraḥ varunaḥ parijmā tvacam pṛñcanti uparasya yonau

analyzed: asme dhehi jātavedaḥ mahi śravaḥ

analyzed: sa tigma jambha rakṣasaḥ daha prati

analyzed: viśvāsu pṛtsu duṣṭaram

analyzed: bharasva sumnayuḥ giraḥ

analyzed: asmākam id vṛdhe bhava

analyzed: hotā gṛṇīte ukthyaḥ

analyzed: itthā hi some id made brahmā cakāra vardhanam

analyzed: prehi abhīhi dhṛṣṇuhi na te vajraḥ ni yaṃsate

analyzed: sṛja marutvatīḥ ava jīva dhanyāḥ imāḥ apaḥ arcan

analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrasya dodhataḥ sānum vajreṇa hi iḍitaḥ

analyzed: abhikramya ava jighnate apaḥ sarmāya codayan arcan

analyzed: adhi sānau ni jighnate vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

analyzed: mandānaḥ indraḥ andhasaḥ sakhibhyaḥ gātum ichati arcan

analyzed: indra tubhyam id adrivas anuttam vajrin vīryam

analyzed: vi te vajrāsaḥ asthiran navatim nāvyāḥ anu

analyzed: mahat te indra vīryam bāhvoḥ te balam hitam arcan

analyzed: sahasram sākam arcata pari stobhata viṃśatiḥ

analyzed: mahat tat asya pauṃsyam vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat arcan

analyzed: ime cit tava manyave vepete bhiyasā mahī

analyzed: yat indra vajrin ojasā vṛtram marutvān avadhīḥ arcan

original: RV_01.080.12.1{31} na vepasā na tanyatendraṃ vṛtro vi bībhayat
analyzed: na vepasā na tanyatā indram vṛtraḥ vi bībhayat

analyzed: ahim indra jighāṃsataḥ divi te badbadhe śavaḥ arcan

analyzed: mademade hi naḥ dadiḥ yūthā gavām ṛju kratuḥ

original: RV_01.081.08.1{02} mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase
analyzed: mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase

analyzed: akṣan amīmadanta hi ava priyāḥ adhūṣata

original: RV_01.082.03.2{03} pra nūnaṃ pūrṇavandhura stuto yāhi vaśānanu yojā ...

original: RV_01.082.04.2{03} yaḥpātraṃ hāriyojanaṃ pūrṇamindra ciketati yojā ...

original: RV_01.082.05.1{03} yuktaste astu dakṣiṇa uta savyaḥ śatakrato
analyzed: yuktaḥ te astu dakṣiṇaḥ uta savyaḥ śatakrato

original: RV_01.082.05.2{03} tena jāyāmupa priyāṃ mandāno yāhyandhaso yojā ...
analyzed: tena jāyām upa priyām mandānaḥ yāhi andhasaḥ yojā

original: RV_01.082.06.1{03} yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_01.082.06.2{03} ut tvā sutāso rabhasā amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin samu patnyāmadaḥ
analyzed: ud tvā sutāsaḥ rabhasāḥ amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin samu patnyā amadaḥ

original: RV_01.083.01.1{04} aśvāvati prathamo goṣu gachati suprāvīrindra martyastavotibhiḥ
analyzed: aśvāvati prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati su prāvīḥ indra martyaḥ tava ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_01.083.01.2{04} tamit pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhumāpo yathābhito vicetasaḥ
analyzed: tam id pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpaḥ yathā abhitas vicetasaḥ

original: RV_01.083.02.1{04} āpo na devīrupa yanti hotriyamavaḥ paśyanti vitataṃ yathā rajaḥ

original: RV_01.083.02.2{04} prācairdevāsaḥ pra ṇayanti devayuṃ brahmapriyaṃ joṣayante varā iva
analyzed: prācais devāsaḥ pra nayanti devayum brahma priyam joṣayante varāḥ iva

original: RV_01.083.03.1{04} adhi dvayoradadhā ukthyaṃ vaco yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ
analyzed: adhi dvayoḥ adadhāḥ ukthyam vacaḥ yata srucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ

original: RV_01.083.03.2{04} asaṃyatto vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktiryajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: a saṃyattaḥ vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktiḥ yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_01.083.04.1{04} ādaṅgirāḥ prathamaṃ dadhire vaya iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā yesukṛtyayā
analyzed: āt aṅgirāḥ prathamam dadhire vayaḥ iddha agnayaḥ śamyā yesu kṛtyayā

original: RV_01.083.04.2{04} sarvaṃ paṇeḥ samavindanta bhojanamaśvāvantaṃ gomantamā paśuṃ naraḥ
analyzed: sarvam paṇeḥ samavindanta bhojanam aśvāvantam gomantam ā paśum naraḥ

original: RV_01.083.05.1{04} yajñairatharvā prathamaḥ pathastate tataḥ sūryo vratapāvena ājani
analyzed: yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ pathaḥ tate tatas sūryaḥ vrata pāvena ājani

original: RV_01.083.05.2{04} ā gā ājaduśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātamamṛtaṃ yajāmahe
analyzed: ā gāḥ ājat uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātam amṛtam yajāmahe

original: RV_01.083.06.1{04} barhirvā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate 'rko vā ślokamāghoṣatedivi
analyzed: barhiḥ vā yat su apatyāya vṛjyate arkaḥ vā ślokam āghoṣate divi

original: RV_01.083.06.2{04} grāvā yatra vadati kārurukthyastasyedindro abhipitveṣu raṇyati
analyzed: grāvā yatra vadati kāruḥ ukthyaḥ tasya id indraḥ abhipitveṣu raṇyati

original: RV_01.084.01.1{05} asāvi soma indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇavā gahi
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇavā gahi

original: RV_01.084.01.2{05} ā tvā pṛṇaktvindriyaṃ rajaḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: ā tvā pṛṇaktu indriyam rajaḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_01.084.02.1{05} indramid dharī vahato 'pratidhṛṣṭaśavasam
analyzed: indram id harī vahataḥ a pratidhṛṣṭa śavasam

original: RV_01.084.02.2{05} ṛṣīṇāṃ ca stutīrupa yajñaṃ ca mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca stutīḥ upa yajñam ca mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_01.084.03.1{05} ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan rathaṃ yuktā te brahmaṇā harī
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham yuktā te brahmaṇā harī

original: RV_01.084.03.2{05} arvācīnaṃ su te mano grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā
analyzed: arvācīnam su te manaḥ grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā

original: RV_01.084.04.1{05} imamindra sutaṃ piba jyeṣṭhamamartyaṃ madam
analyzed: imam indra sutam piba jyeṣṭham amartyam madam

original: RV_01.084.04.2{05} śukrasya tvābhyakṣaran dhārā ṛtasya sādane
analyzed: śukrasya tvā abhyakṣaran dhārāḥ ṛtasya sādane

original: RV_01.084.05.1{05} indrāya nūnamarcatokthāni ca bravītana
analyzed: indrāya nūnam arcata ukthāni ca bravītana

original: RV_01.084.05.2{05} sutā amatsurindavo jyeṣṭhaṃ namasyatā sahaḥ
analyzed: sutāḥ amatsuḥ indavaḥ jyeṣṭham namasyata sahaḥ

original: RV_01.084.06.1{06} nakiṣ ṭvad rathītaro harī yadindra yachase
analyzed: nakir tvat rathītaraḥ harī yat indra yacchase

original: RV_01.084.06.2{06} nakiṣ ṭvānu majmanā nakiḥ svaśva ānaśe
analyzed: nakir tvā anu majmanā nakir su aśvaḥ ānaśe

original: RV_01.084.07.1{06} ya eka id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_01.084.07.2{06} īśāno apratiṣkuta indro aṅga
analyzed: īśānaḥ apratiṣkutaḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_01.084.08.1{06} kadā martamarādhasaṃ padā kṣumpamiva sphurat
analyzed: kadā martam arādhasam padā kṣumpam iva sphurat

original: RV_01.084.08.2{06} kadā naḥśuśravad gira indro aṅga
analyzed: kadā naḥ śuśravat giraḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_01.084.09.1{06} yaścid dhi tvā bahubhya ā sutāvānāvivāsati
analyzed: yaḥ cit hi tvā bahubhyaḥ ā sutāvān āvivāsati

original: RV_01.084.09.2{06} ugraṃ tat patyate śava indro aṅga
analyzed: ugram tat patyate śavaḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_01.084.10.1{06} svādoritthā viṣūvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ
analyzed: svādoḥ itthā viṣūvataḥ madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ

original: RV_01.084.10.2{06} yā indreṇa sayāvarīrvṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīranu svarājyam
analyzed: yāḥ indreṇa sa yāvarīḥ vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam

original: RV_01.084.11.1{07} tā asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ

original: RV_01.084.11.2{07} priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr...
analyzed: priyāḥ indrasya dhenavaḥ vajram hinvanti sāyakam vasvīḥ

original: RV_01.084.12.1{07} tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ

original: RV_01.084.12.2{07} vratānyasya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīr...
analyzed: vratāni asya saścire purūṇi pūrva cittaye vasvīḥ

original: RV_01.084.13.1{07} indro dadhīco asthabhirvṛtrāṇyapratiṣkutaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ dadhīcaḥ asthabhiḥ vṛtrāṇi apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_01.084.13.2{07} jaghāna navatīrnava
analyzed: jaghāna navatīḥ nava

original: RV_01.084.14.1{07} ichannaśvasya yacchiraḥ parvateṣvapaśritam
analyzed: ichan aśvasya yat śiraḥ parvateṣu apaśritam

original: RV_01.084.14.2{07} tad vidaccharyaṇāvati
analyzed: tat vidat śaryaṇāvati

original: RV_01.084.15.1{07} atrāha goramanvata nāma tvaṣṭurapīcyam
analyzed: atra āha goramanvata nāma tvaṣṭuḥ apīcyam

original: RV_01.084.15.2{07} itthā candramaso gṛhe
analyzed: itthā candramasaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_01.084.16.1{08} ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāmino durhṛṇāyūn
analyzed: kaḥ adya yuṅkte dhuri gāḥ ṛtasya śimīvataḥ bhāminaḥ durhṛṇāyūn

original: RV_01.084.16.2{08} asanniṣūn hṛtsvaso mayobhūn ya eṣāṃ bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt
analyzed: asanniṣūn hṛtsvasaḥ mayobhūn yaḥ eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt

original: RV_01.084.17.1{08} ka īṣate tujyate ko bibhāya ko maṃsate santamindraṃ ko anti
analyzed: kaḥ īṣate tujyate kaḥ bibhāya kaḥ maṃsate santam indram kaḥ anti

original: RV_01.084.17.2{08} kastokāya ka ibhāyota rāye 'dhi bravat tanve ko janāya
analyzed: kaḥ stokāya kaḥ ibhāya uta rāye adhi bravat tanve kaḥ janāya

original: RV_01.084.18.1{08} ko agnimīṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātā ṛtubhirdhruvebhiḥ
analyzed: kaḥ agnim īṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātai ṛtubhiḥ dhruvebhiḥ

original: RV_01.084.18.2{08} kasmai devā ā vahānāśu homa ko maṃsate vītihotraḥ sudevaḥ
analyzed: kasmai devāḥ ā vahān āśu homa kaḥ maṃsate vītihotraḥ su devaḥ

original: RV_01.084.19.1{08} tvamaṅga pra śaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam
analyzed: tvam aṅga pra śaṃsiṣaḥ devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam

original: RV_01.084.19.2{08} na tvadanyo maghavannasti marḍitendra bravīmi te vacaḥ
analyzed: na tvad anyaḥ maghavan asti marḍitā indra bravīmi te vacaḥ

original: RV_01.084.20.1{08} mā te rādhāṃsi mā ta ūtayo vaso 'smān kadā canā dabhan
analyzed: mā te rādhāṃsi mā te ūtayaḥ vasaḥ asmān kadā cana ā dabhan

original: RV_01.084.20.2{08} viśvā ca na upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhya ā
analyzed: viśvā ca naḥ upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhyaḥ ā

original: RV_01.085.01.1{09} pra ye śumbhante janayo na saptayo yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥsudaṃsasaḥ
analyzed: pra ye śumbhante janayaḥ na saptayaḥ yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ su daṃsasaḥ

original: RV_01.085.01.2{09} rodasī hi marutaścakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ
analyzed: rodasī hi marutaḥ cakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrāḥ vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_01.085.02.1{09} ta ukṣitāso mahimānamāśata divi rudrāso adhi cakrire sadaḥ
analyzed: te ukṣitāsaḥ mahimānam āśata divi rudrāsaḥ adhi cakrire sadaḥ

original: RV_01.085.02.2{09} arcanto arkaṃ janayanta indriyamadhi śriyo dadhire pṛśnimātaraḥ
analyzed: arcantaḥ arkam janayantaḥ indriyam adhi śriyaḥ dadhire pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_01.085.03.1{09} gomātaro yacchubhayante añjibhistanūṣu śubhrā dadhire virukmataḥ
analyzed: go mātaraḥ yat śubhayante añjibhiḥ tanūṣu śubhrāḥ dadhire virukmataḥ

original: RV_01.085.03.2{09} bādhante viśvamabhimātinamapa vartmānyeṣāmanu rīyate ghṛtam
analyzed: bādhante viśvam abhimātinam apa vartmāni eṣām anu rīyate ghṛtam

original: RV_01.085.04.1{09} vi ye bhrājante sumakhāsa ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayanto acyutācidojasā
analyzed: vi ye bhrājante su makhāsaḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayantaḥ acyutācit ojasā

original: RV_01.085.04.2{09} manojuvo yan maruto ratheṣvā vṛṣavrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīrayugdhvam
analyzed: manaḥ juvaḥ yat marutaḥ ratha iṣvā vṛṣa vrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam

original: RV_01.085.05.1{09} pra yad ratheṣu pṛṣatīrayugdhvaṃ vāje adriṃ maruto raṃhayantaḥ
analyzed: pra yat ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam vāje adrim marutaḥ raṃhayantaḥ

original: RV_01.085.05.2{09} utāruṣasya vi ṣyanti dhārāścarmevodabhirvyundanti bhūma
analyzed: uta aruṣasya vi syanti dhārāḥ carmā iva udabhiḥ vyundanti bhūma

original: RV_01.085.06.1{09} ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: ā vaḥ vahantu saptayaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ raghu patvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ

original: RV_01.085.06.2{09} sīdatā barhiruru vaḥ sadas kṛtaṃ mādayadhvaṃ maruto madhvo andhasaḥ
analyzed: sīdata ā barhiḥ uru vaḥ sadaḥ kṛtam mādayadhvam marutaḥ madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_01.085.07.1{10} te 'vardhanta svatavaso mahitvanā nākaṃ tasthururu cakrire sadaḥ
analyzed: te avardhanta svatavasaḥ mahitvanā nākam tasthuḥ uru cakrire sadaḥ

original: RV_01.085.07.2{10} viṣṇuryad dhāvad vṛṣaṇaṃ madacyutaṃ vayo na sīdannadhi barhiṣi priye
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yat dhāvat vṛṣaṇam mada cyutam vayaḥ na sīdan adhi barhiṣi priye

original: RV_01.085.08.1{10} śūrā ived yuyudhayo na jagmayaḥ śravasyavo na pṛtanāsu yetire
analyzed: śūrāḥ iva id yuyudhayaḥ na jagmayaḥ śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanāsu yetire

original: RV_01.085.08.2{10} bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyo rājāna iva tveṣasandṛśo naraḥ
analyzed: bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyaḥ rājānaḥ iva tveṣa sandṛśaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_01.085.09.1{10} tvaṣṭā yad vajraṃ sukṛtaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ svapā avartayat
analyzed: tvaṣṭā yat vajram su kṛtam hiraṇyayam sahasra bhṛṣṭim su apāḥ avartayat

original: RV_01.085.09.2{10} dhatta indro naryapāṃsi kartave 'han vṛtraṃ nirapāmaubjadarṇavam
analyzed: dhatte indraḥ narya apāṃsi kartave ahan vṛtram

original: RV_01.085.10.1{10} ūrdhvaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ ta ojasā dadṛhāṇaṃ cid bibhidurviparvatam
analyzed: ūrdhvam nunudre avatam te ojasā dadṛhāṇam cit bibhiduḥ viparvatam

original: RV_01.085.10.2{10} dhamanto vāṇaṃ marutaḥ sudānavo made somasya raṇyāni cakrire
analyzed: dhamantaḥ vāṇam marutaḥ sudānavaḥ made somasya raṇyāni cakrire

original: RV_01.085.11.1{10} jihmaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ tayā diśāsiñcannutsaṃ gotamāya tṛṣṇaje
analyzed: jihmam nunudre avatam tayā diśā asiñcan utsam gotamāya tṛṣṇaje

original: RV_01.085.11.2{10} ā gachantīmavasā citrabhānavaḥ kāmaṃ viprasyatarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ
analyzed: ā gacchanti īm avasā citra bhānavaḥ kāmam viprasya atarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.085.12.1{10} yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tridhātūni dāśuṣe yachatādhi
analyzed: yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tri dhātūni dāśuṣe yacchata adhi

original: RV_01.085.12.2{10} asmabhyaṃ tāni maruto vi yanta rayiṃ no dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram
analyzed: asmabhyam tāni marutaḥ vi yanta rayim naḥ dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ su vīram

original: RV_01.086.01.1{11} maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ

original: RV_01.086.01.2{11} sa sugopātamo janaḥ
analyzed: sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ

original: RV_01.086.02.1{11} yajñairvā yajñavāhaso viprasya vā matīnām
analyzed: yajñaiḥ vā yajña vāhasaḥ viprasya vā matīnām

original: RV_01.086.02.2{11} marutaḥ śṛṇutā havam
analyzed: marutaḥ śṛṇutā havam

original: RV_01.086.03.1{11} uta vā yasya vājino 'nu vipramatakṣata
analyzed: uta vā yasya vājinaḥ anu vipram atakṣata

original: RV_01.086.03.2{11} sa gantā gomativraje
analyzed: sa gantā gomativraje

original: RV_01.086.04.1{11} asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somo diviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somaḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.086.04.2{11} ukthaṃ madaśca śasyate
analyzed: uktham madaḥ ca śasyate

original: RV_01.086.05.1{11} asya śroṣantvā bhuvo viśvā yaścarṣaṇīrabhi
analyzed: asya śroṣantu ā bhuvaḥ viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi

original: RV_01.086.05.2{11} sūraṃ cit sasruṣīriṣaḥ
analyzed: sūram cit sasruṣi iriṣaḥ

original: RV_01.086.06.1{12} pūrvībhirhi dadāśima śaradbhirmaruto vayam
analyzed: pūrvībhiḥ hi dadāśima śaradbhiḥ marutaḥ vayam

original: RV_01.086.06.2{12} avobhiścarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: avobhiḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_01.086.07.1{12} subhagaḥ sa prayajyavo maruto astu martyaḥ
analyzed: subhagaḥ sa prayajyavaḥ marutaḥ astu martyaḥ

original: RV_01.086.07.2{12} yasya prayāṃsiparṣatha
analyzed: yasya prayāṃsi parṣatha

original: RV_01.086.08.1{12} śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satyaśavasaḥ
analyzed: śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satya śavasaḥ

original: RV_01.086.08.2{12} vidā kāmasyavenataḥ
analyzed: vidā kāmasyavenataḥ

original: RV_01.086.09.1{12} yūyaṃ tat satyaśavasa āviṣ karta mahitvanā
analyzed: yūyam tat satya śavasaḥ āvis karta mahitvanā

original: RV_01.086.09.2{12} vidhyatā vidyutā rakṣaḥ
analyzed: vidhyata vidyutā rakṣaḥ

original: RV_01.086.10.1{12} gūhatā guhyaṃ tamo vi yāta viśvamatriṇam
analyzed: gūhata guhyam tamaḥ vi yāta viśva matriṇam

original: RV_01.086.10.2{12} jyotiṣ kartā yaduśmasi
analyzed: jyotiḥ kartā yat uśmasi

original: RV_01.087.01.1{13} pratvakṣasaḥ pratavaso virapśino 'nānatā avithurā ṛjīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: pratvakṣasaḥ pratavasaḥ virapśinaḥ an ānatāḥ a vithurāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_01.087.01.2{13} juṣṭatamāso nṛtamāso añjibhirvyānajre ke cidusrā iva stṛbhiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭatamāsaḥ nṛtamāsaḥ añjibhiḥ vyānajre ke cit usrāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ

original: RV_01.087.02.1{13} upahvareṣu yadacidhvaṃ yayiṃ vaya iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā
analyzed: upahvareṣu yat acidhvam yayim vayaḥ iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā

original: RV_01.087.02.2{13} ścotanti kośā upa vo ratheṣvā ghṛtamukṣatā madhuvarṇamarcate
analyzed: ścotanti kośāḥ upa vaḥ ratheṣvā ghṛtam ukṣata madhu varṇam arcate

original: RV_01.087.03.1{13} praiṣāmajmeṣu vithureva rejate bhūmiryāmeṣu yad dha yuñjate śubhe
analyzed: pra eṣām ajmeṣu vithurā iva rejate bhūmiḥ yāmeṣu yat ha yuñjate śubhe

original: RV_01.087.03.2{13} te krīḷayo dhunayo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ svayaṃ mahitvaṃ panayanta dhūtayaḥ
analyzed: te krīḍayaḥ dhunayaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ svayam mahitvam panayanta dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_01.087.04.1{13} sa hi svasṛt pṛṣadaśvo yuvā gaṇo 'yā īśānastaviṣībhirāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa hi svasṛt pṛṣat aśvaḥ yuvā gaṇaḥ īśānaḥ taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtaḥ

original: RV_01.087.04.2{13} asi satya ṛṇayāvānedyo 'syā dhiyaḥ prāvitāthā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ
analyzed: asi satyaḥ ṛṇayāvā anedyaḥ asyāḥ dhiyaḥ prāvitā athā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ

original: RV_01.087.05.1{13} pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā
analyzed: pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā

original: RV_01.087.05.2{13} yadīmindraṃ śamy ṛkvāṇa āśatādin nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire
analyzed: yadi īm indram śamī ṛkvāṇaḥ āśata adit nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire

original: RV_01.087.06.1{13} śriyase kaṃ bhānubhiḥ saṃ mimikṣire te raśmibhista ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ
analyzed: śriyase kam bhānubhiḥ sam mimikṣire te raśmibhiḥ te ṛkvabhiḥ su khādayaḥ

original: RV_01.087.06.2{13} te vāśīmanta iṣmiṇo abhīravo vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ
analyzed: te vāśīmantaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ abhīravaḥ vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ

original: RV_01.088.01.1{14} ā vidyunmadbhirmarutaḥ svarkai rathebhiryāta ṛṣṭimadbhiraśvaparṇaiḥ
analyzed: ā vidyunmadbhiḥ marutaḥ su arkaiḥ rathebhiḥ yāta ṛṣṭimadbhiḥ aśva parṇaiḥ

original: RV_01.088.01.2{14} ā varṣiṣṭhayā na iṣā vayo na paptatā sumāyāḥ
analyzed: ā varṣiṣṭhayā naḥ iṣā vayaḥ na paptata su māyāḥ

original: RV_01.088.02.1{14} te 'ruṇebhirvaramā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kaṃ yānti rathatūrbhiraśvaiḥ
analyzed: te aruṇebhiḥ varamā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kam yānti

original: RV_01.088.02.2{14} rukmo na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma
analyzed: rukmaḥ na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma

original: RV_01.088.03.1{14} śriye kaṃ vo adhi tanūṣu vāśīrmedhā vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā
analyzed: śriye kam vaḥ adhi tanūṣu vāśīḥ medhāḥ vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā

original: RV_01.088.03.2{14} yuṣmabhyaṃ kaṃ marutaḥ sujātāstuvidyumnāso dhanayante adrim
analyzed: yuṣmabhyam kam marutaḥ su jātāḥ tuvidyumnāsaḥ dhanayante adrim

original: RV_01.088.04.1{14} ahāni gṛdhrāḥ paryā va āgurimāṃ dhiyaṃ vārkāryāṃca devīm
analyzed: ahāni gṛdhrāḥ pari ā vaḥ āguḥ imām dhiyam vārkāryāṃca devīm

original: RV_01.088.04.2{14} brahma kṛṇvanto gotamāso arkairūrdhvaṃ nunudrautsadhiṃ pibadhyai
analyzed: brahma kṛṇvantaḥ gotamāsaḥ arkaiḥ ūrdhvam nunudrau sadhim pibadhyai

original: RV_01.088.05.1{14} etat tyan na yojanamaceti sasvarha yan maruto gotamo vaḥ
analyzed: etat tyad na yojanam aceti sasvarha yat marutaḥ gotamaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_01.088.05.2{14} paśyan hiraṇyacakrānayodaṃṣṭrān vidhāvato varāhūn
analyzed: paśyan hiraṇya cakrān ayaḥ daṃṣṭrān vidhāvataḥ varāhūn

original: RV_01.088.06.1{14} eṣā syā vo maruto 'nubhartrī prati ṣṭobhati vāghato na vāṇī
analyzed: eṣā syā vaḥ marutaḥ anubhartrī prati stobhati vāghataḥ na vāṇī

original: RV_01.088.06.2{14} astobhayad vṛthāsāmanu svadhāṃ gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: astobhayat vṛthāsām anu svadhām gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_01.089.01.1{15} ā no bhadrāḥ kratavo xyantu viśvato 'dabdhāso aparītāsa udbhidaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ bhadrāḥ kratavaḥ xyantu viśvatas adabdhāsaḥ aparītāsaḥ udbhidaḥ

original: RV_01.089.01.2{15} devā no yathā sadamid vṛdhe asannaprāyuvo rakṣitāro dive-dive
analyzed: devāḥ naḥ yathā sadam id vṛdhe a sanna prāyuvaḥ rakṣitāraḥ dive dive

original: RV_01.089.02.1{15} devānāṃ bhadrā sumatirṛjūyatāṃ devānāṃ rātirabhi noni vartatām
analyzed: devānām bhadrā sumatiḥ ṛjūyatām devānām rātiḥ abhi noni vartatām

original: RV_01.089.02.2{15} devānāṃ sakhyamupa sedimā vayaṃ devā na āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase
analyzed: devānām sakhyam upa sedimā vayam devāḥ naḥ āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase

original: RV_01.089.03.1{15} tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayaṃ bhagaṃ mitramaditiṃ dakṣamasridham
analyzed: tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayam bhagam mitram aditim dakṣam asridham

original: RV_01.089.03.2{15} aryamaṇaṃ varuṇaṃ somamaśvinā sarasvatīnaḥ subhagā mayas karat
analyzed: aryamaṇam varuṇam somam aśvinā sarasvatīnaḥ subhagā mayaḥ karat

original: RV_01.089.04.1{15} tan no vāto mayobhu vātu bheṣajaṃ tan mātā pṛthivī tatpitā dyauḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ vātaḥ mayobhu vātu bheṣajam tat mātā pṛthivī tat pitā dyauḥ

original: RV_01.089.04.2{15} tad grāvāṇaḥ somasuto mayobhuvastadaśvinā śṛṇutaṃ dhiṣṇyā yuvam
analyzed: tat grāvāṇaḥ soma sutaḥ mayobhuvaḥ tat aśvinā śṛṇutam dhiṣṇyā yuvam

original: RV_01.089.05.1{15} tamīśānaṃ jagatastasthuṣas patiṃ dhiyaṃjinvamavase hūmahe vayam
analyzed: tam īśānam jagataḥ tasthuṣas patim dhiyaṃjinvam avase hūmahe vayam

original: RV_01.089.05.2{15} pūṣā no yathā vedasāmasad vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyuradabdhaḥ svastaye
analyzed: pūṣā naḥ yathā vedasām asat vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyuḥ adabdhaḥ svastaye

original: RV_01.089.06.1{16} svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ puṣā viśvavedāḥ
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ vṛddha śravāḥ svasti naḥ puṣā viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_01.089.06.2{16} svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu
analyzed: svasti naḥ tārkṣyaḥ ariṣṭa nemiḥ svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu

original: RV_01.089.07.1{16} pṛṣadaśvā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvāno vidatheṣujagmayaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāḥ marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvānaḥ vidatheṣu jagmayaḥ

original: RV_01.089.07.2{16} agnijihvā manavaḥ sūracakṣaso viśve no devā avasā gamanniha
analyzed: agni jihvāḥ manavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gaman iha

original: RV_01.089.08.1{16} bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ
analyzed: bhadram karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadram paśyema akṣabhiḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_01.089.08.2{16} sthirairaṅgaistuṣṭuvāṃsastanūbhirvyaśemadevahitaṃ yadāyuḥ
analyzed: sthiraiḥ aṅgaiḥ tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ tanūbhiḥ vyaśema deva hitam yat āyuḥ

original: RV_01.089.09.1{16} śatamin nu śarado anti devā yatrā naścakrā jarasaṃ tanūnām
analyzed: śatam id nu śaradaḥ anti devāḥ yatrā naḥ cakrā jarasam tanūnām

original: RV_01.089.09.2{16} putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyurgantoḥ
analyzed: putrāsaḥ yatra pitaraḥ bhavanti mā naḥ madhyā rīriṣata āyuḥ gantoḥ

original: RV_01.089.10.1{16} aditirdyauraditirantarikṣamaditirmātā sa pitā sa putraḥ
analyzed: aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam aditiḥ mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ

original: RV_01.089.10.2{16} viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditirjātamaditirjanitvam
analyzed: viśve devāḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ aditiḥ jātam aditiḥ janitvam

original: RV_01.090.01.1{17} ṛjunītī no varuṇo mitro nayatu vidvān
analyzed: ṛju nītī naḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ nayatu vidvān

original: RV_01.090.01.2{17} aryamā devaiḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: aryamā devaiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_01.090.02.1{17} te hi vasvo vasavānāste apramūrā mahobhiḥ
analyzed: te hi vasvaḥ vasavānāḥ te apramūrāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_01.090.02.2{17} vratā rakṣante viśvāhā
analyzed: vratā rakṣante viśvāhā

original: RV_01.090.03.1{17} te asmabhyaṃ śarma yaṃsannamṛtā martyebhyaḥ
analyzed: te asmabhyam śarma yaṃsan amṛtāḥ martyebhyaḥ

original: RV_01.090.03.2{17} bādhamānāapa dviṣaḥ
analyzed: bādhamānā apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_01.090.04.1{17} vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantvindro marutaḥ
analyzed: vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantu indraḥ marutaḥ

original: RV_01.090.04.2{17} pūṣā bhago vandyāsaḥ
analyzed: pūṣā bhagaḥ vandyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.090.05.1{17} uta no dhiyo goagrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇavevayāvaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ dhiyaḥ go agrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇave iva yāvaḥ

original: RV_01.090.05.2{17} kartā naḥ svastimataḥ
analyzed: karta naḥ svastimataḥ

original: RV_01.090.06.1{18} madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ
analyzed: madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_01.090.06.2{18} mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīḥ
analyzed: mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ

original: RV_01.090.07.1{18} madhu naktamutoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ
analyzed: madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ madhumat pārthivam rajaḥ

original: RV_01.090.07.2{18} madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā
analyzed: madhu dyauḥ astu naḥ pitā

original: RV_01.090.08.1{18} madhumān no vanaspatirmadhumānastu sūryaḥ
analyzed: madhumān naḥ vanaspatiḥ madhumān astu sūryaḥ

original: RV_01.090.08.2{18} mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ
analyzed: mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: RV_01.090.09.1{18} śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatvaryamā
analyzed: śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā

original: RV_01.090.09.2{18} śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇururukramaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ urukramaḥ

original: RV_01.091.01.1{19} tvaṃ soma pra cikito manīṣā tvaṃ rajiṣṭhamanu neṣi panthām
analyzed: tvam soma pra cikitaḥ manīṣā tvam rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām

original: RV_01.091.01.2{19} tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnamabhajanta dhīrāḥ
analyzed: tava praṇītī pitaraḥ naḥ indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ

original: RV_01.091.02.1{19} tvaṃ soma kratubhiḥ subhūstvaṃ dakṣaiḥ sudakṣo viśvavedāḥ
analyzed: tvam soma kratubhiḥ subhūḥ tvam dakṣaiḥ su dakṣaḥ viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_01.091.02.2{19} tvaṃ vṛṣā vṛṣatvebhirmahitvā dyumnebhirdyumnyabhavo nṛcakṣāḥ
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā vṛṣa tvebhiḥ mahitvā dyumnebhiḥ dyumnī abhavaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_01.091.03.1{19} rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma
analyzed: rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma

original: RV_01.091.03.2{19} śuciṣ ṭvamasi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsisoma
analyzed: śuciḥ tvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma

original: RV_01.091.04.1{19} yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyāṃ yā parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyām yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu

original: RV_01.091.04.2{19} tebhirno viśvaiḥ sumanā aheḷan rājan soma pratihavyā gṛbhāya
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ viśvaiḥ sumanāḥ a heḍan rājan soma pratihavyā gṛbhāya

original: RV_01.091.05.1{19} tvaṃ somāsi satpatistvaṃ rājota vṛtrahā
analyzed: tvam soma asi sat patiḥ tvam rājā uta vṛtrahā

original: RV_01.091.05.2{19} tvaṃ bhadro asi kratuḥ
analyzed: tvam bhadraḥ asi kratuḥ

original: RV_01.091.06.1{20} tvaṃ ca soma no vaśo jīvātuṃ na marāmahe
analyzed: tvam ca soma naḥ vaśaḥ jīvātum na marāmahe

original: RV_01.091.06.2{20} priyastotro vanaspatiḥ
analyzed: priya stotraḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: RV_01.091.07.1{20} tvaṃ soma mahe bhagaṃ tvaṃ yūna ṛtāyate
analyzed: tvam soma mahe bhagam tvam yūne ṛtāyate

original: RV_01.091.07.2{20} dakṣaṃ dadhāsi jīvase
analyzed: dakṣam dadhāsi jīvase

original: RV_01.091.08.1{20} tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato rakṣā rājannaghāyataḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas rakṣa rājan aghāyataḥ

original: RV_01.091.08.2{20} na riṣyettvāvataḥ sakhā
analyzed: na riṣyet tvāvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_01.091.09.1{20} soma yāste mayobhuva ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe
analyzed: soma yāḥ te mayobhuvaḥ ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe

original: RV_01.091.09.2{20} tābhirno 'vitā bhava
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ avitā bhava

original: RV_01.091.10.1{20} imaṃ yajñamidaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi
analyzed: imam yajñam idam vacaḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi

original: RV_01.091.10.2{20} soma tvaṃ novṛdhe bhava
analyzed: soma tvam naḥ vṛdhe bhava

original: RV_01.091.11.1{21} soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ vardhayāmo vacovidaḥ
analyzed: soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam vardhayāmaḥ vacaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_01.091.11.2{21} sumṛḷīkona ā viśa
analyzed: su mṛḷīkonaḥ ā viśa

original: RV_01.091.12.1{21} gayasphāno amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ
analyzed: gaya sphānaḥ amīva hā vasu vid puṣṭi vardhanaḥ

original: RV_01.091.12.2{21} sumitraḥ somano bhava
analyzed: su mitraḥ somanaḥ bhava

original: RV_01.091.13.1{21} soma rārandhi no hṛdi gāvo na yavaseṣvā
analyzed: soma rārandhi naḥ hṛdi gāvaḥ na yavasa iṣvā

original: RV_01.091.13.2{21} marya iva svaokye
analyzed: maryaḥ iva svaokye

original: RV_01.091.14.1{21} yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇad deva martyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇat deva martyaḥ

original: RV_01.091.14.2{21} taṃ dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ
analyzed: tam dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ

original: RV_01.091.15.1{21} uruṣyā ṇo abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhyaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: uruṣya naḥ abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhi aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_01.091.15.2{21} sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ
analyzed: sakhā su śevaḥ edhi naḥ

original: RV_01.091.16.1{22} ā pyāyasva sametu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sametu te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_01.091.16.2{22} bhavā vājasya saṃgathe
analyzed: bhava vājasya saṃgathe

original: RV_01.091.17.1{22} ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhiraṃśubhiḥ
analyzed: ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: RV_01.091.17.2{22} bhavā naḥsuśravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe
analyzed: bhava naḥ su śravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe

original: RV_01.091.18.1{22} saṃ te payāṃsi samu yantu vājāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyānyabhimātiṣāhaḥ
analyzed: sam te payāṃsi samu yantu vājāḥ sam vṛṣṇyāni abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_01.091.18.2{22} āpyāyamāno amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsyuttamāni dhiṣva
analyzed: āpyāyamānaḥ amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsi uttamāni dhiṣva

original: RV_01.091.19.1{22} yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti tā te viśvā paribhūrastuyajñam
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti tā te viśvā paribhūrastu yajñam

original: RV_01.091.19.2{22} gayasphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ suvīro 'vīrahā pra carā soma duryān
analyzed: gaya sphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ avīra hā pra cara soma duryān

original: RV_01.091.20.1{22} somo dhenuṃ somo arvantamāśuṃ somo vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ dadāti
analyzed: somaḥ dhenum somaḥ arvantam āśum somaḥ vīram karmaṇyam dadāti

original: RV_01.091.20.2{22} sādanyaṃ vidathyaṃ sabheyaṃ pitṛśravaṇaṃ yo dadāśadasmai
analyzed: sādanyam vidathyam sabheyam pitṛ śravaṇam yaḥ dadāśat asmai

original: RV_01.091.21.1{23} aṣāḷhaṃ yutsu pṛtanāsu papriṃ svarṣāmapsāṃ vṛjanasyagopām
analyzed: aṣāḷham yutsu pṛtanāsu paprim svarṣām ap sām vṛjanasya gopām

original: RV_01.091.21.2{23} bhareṣujāṃ sukṣitiṃ suśravasaṃ jayantaṃ tvāmanu madema soma
analyzed: bhareṣujām su kṣitim su śravasam jayantam tvām anu madema soma

original: RV_01.091.22.1{23} tvamimā oṣadhīḥ soma viśvāstvamapo ajanayastvaṃ gāḥ
analyzed: tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma viśvāḥ tvam apaḥ ajanayaḥ tvam gāḥ

original: RV_01.091.22.2{23} tvamā tatanthorvantarikṣaṃ tvaṃ jyotiṣā vi tamo vavartha
analyzed: tvam ā tatantha uru antarikṣam tvam jyotiṣā vi tamaḥ vavartha

original: RV_01.091.23.1{23} devena no manasā deva soma rāyo bhāgaṃ sahasāvannabhi yudhya
analyzed: devena naḥ manasā deva soma rāyaḥ bhāgam sahasāvan abhi yudhya

original: RV_01.091.23.2{23} mā tvā tanadīśiṣe vīryasyobhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsā gaviṣṭau
analyzed: mā tvā tanat īśiṣe vīryasya ubhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsa gaviṣṭau

original: RV_01.092.01.1{24} etā u tyā uṣasaḥ ketumakrata pūrve ardhe rajaso bhānumañjate
analyzed: etāḥ u tyāḥ uṣasaḥ ketum akrata pūrve ardhe rajasaḥ bhānum añjate

original: RV_01.092.01.2{24} niṣkṛṇvānā āyudhānīva dhṛṣṇavaḥ prati gāvo'ruṣīryanti mātaraḥ
analyzed: niṣkṛṇvānāḥ āyudhāni iva dhṛṣṇavaḥ prati gāvaḥ aruṣīḥ yanti mātaraḥ

original: RV_01.092.02.1{24} udapaptannaruṇā bhānavo vṛthā svāyujo aruṣīrgā ayuksata
analyzed: udapaptan aruṇāḥ bhānavaḥ vṛthā su āyujaḥ aruṣīḥ gāḥ ayuksata

original: RV_01.092.02.2{24} akrannuṣāso vayunāni pūrvathā ruśantaṃ bhānumaruṣīraśiśrayuḥ
analyzed: akran uṣāsaḥ vayunāni pūrvathā ruśantam bhānum aruṣīḥ aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_01.092.03.1{24} arcanti nārīrapaso na viṣṭibhiḥ samānena yojanenā parāvataḥ
analyzed: arcanti nārī rapasaḥ na viṣṭibhiḥ samānena yojanena ā parāvataḥ

original: RV_01.092.03.2{24} iṣaṃ vahantīḥ sukṛte sudānave viśvedaha yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: iṣam vahantīḥ su kṛte sudānave viśvedaha yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_01.092.04.1{24} adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūrivāporṇute vakṣa usreva barjaham
analyzed: adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūḥ iva aporṇute vakṣaḥ usrā iva barjaham

original: RV_01.092.04.2{24} jyotirviśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvo na vrajaṃ vyuṣā āvartamaḥ
analyzed: jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvaḥ na vrajam vyuṣasi āvartamaḥ

original: RV_01.092.05.1{24} pratyarcī ruśadasyā adarśi vi tiṣṭhate bādhate kṛṣṇamabhvam
analyzed: pratyarciḥ ruśat asyāḥ adarśi vi tiṣṭhate bādhate kṛṣṇam abhvam

original: RV_01.092.05.2{24} svaruṃ na peśo vidatheṣvañjañcitraṃ divo duhitā bhānumaśret
analyzed: svarum na peśaḥ vidatheṣu añjan citram divaḥ duhitā bhānum aśret

original: RV_01.092.06.1{25} atāriṣma tamasas pāramasyoṣā uchantī vayunā kṛṇoti
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāramasya uṣāḥ uchantī vayunā kṛṇoti

original: RV_01.092.06.2{25} śriye chando na smayate vibhātī supratīkā saumanasāyājīgaḥ
analyzed: śriye chandaḥ na smayate vibhātī su pratīkā saumanasāya ajīgaḥ

original: RV_01.092.07.1{25} bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānāṃ diva stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ
analyzed: bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām divaḥ stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ

original: RV_01.092.07.2{25} prajāvato nṛvato aśvabudhyānuṣo goagrānupa māsi vājān
analyzed: prajāvataḥ nṛvataḥ aśva budhyān uṣaḥ go agrān upa māsi vājān

original: RV_01.092.08.1{25} uṣastamaśyāṃ yaśasaṃ suvīraṃ dāsapravargaṃ rayimaśvabudhyam
analyzed: uṣastam aśyām yaśasam su vīram dāsa pravargam rayim aśva budhyam

original: RV_01.092.08.2{25} sudaṃsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi vājaprasūtā subhage bṛhantam
analyzed: su daṃsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi vāja prasūtā subhage bṛhantam

original: RV_01.092.09.1{25} viśvāni devī bhuvanābhicakṣyā pratīcī cakṣururviyā vi bhāti

original: RV_01.095.11.2{02} tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthvivī uto dyauḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthvivī uta u dyauḥ
