original: RV_01.096.02.2{03} vivasvatā cakṣasā dyāmapaśca devā a. dh. d.
analyzed: vivasvatā cakṣasā dyāmapaḥ ca devāḥ a dh d

original: RV_01.096.03.1{03} tamīḷata prathamaṃ yajñasādhaṃ viśa ārīrāhutam ṛñjasānam
analyzed: tam īḍata prathamam yajñasādham viśaḥ ārīra āhutam ṛñjasānam

original: RV_01.096.03.2{03} ūrjaḥ putraṃ bharataṃ sṛpradānuṃ devā ...
analyzed: ūrjaḥ putram bharatam sṛpra dānum devā

original: RV_01.096.04.1{03} sa mātariśvā puruvārapuṣṭirvidad gātuṃ tanayāya svarvit
analyzed: sa mātariśvā puru vāra puṣṭiḥ vidat gātum tanayāya svar vid

original: RV_01.096.04.2{03} viśāṃ gopā janitā rodasyordevā ...
analyzed: viśām gopāḥ janitā rodasyoḥ devā

original: RV_01.096.05.1{03} naktoṣāsā varṇamāmemyāne dhāpayete śiśumekaṃ samīcī
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā varṇam āmemyāne dhāpayete śiśum ekam samīcī

original: RV_01.096.05.2{03} dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antarvi bhāti devā ...
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā rukmaḥ antar vi bhāti devā

original: RV_01.096.06.1{04} rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ yajñasya keturmanmasādhano veḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām yajñasya ketuḥ manma sādhanaḥ veḥ

original: RV_01.096.06.2{04} amṛtatvaṃ rakṣamāṇāsa enaṃ devā ...
analyzed: amṛta tvam rakṣamāṇāsaḥ enam devāḥ

original: RV_01.096.07.1{04} nū ca purā ca sadanaṃ rayīṇāṃ jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām
analyzed: nu ca purā ca sadanam rayīṇām jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām

original: RV_01.096.07.2{04} sataśca gopāṃ bhavataśca bhūrerdevā ...
analyzed: sataḥ ca gopām bhavataḥ ca bhūreḥ devā

original: RV_01.096.08.1{04} draviṇodā draviṇasasturasya draviṇodāḥ sanarasya pra yaṃsat
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ draviṇasasturasya draviṇaḥ dāḥ sa narasya pra yaṃsat

original: RV_01.096.08.2{04} draviṇodā vīravatīmiṣaṃ no draviṇodā rasate dīrghamāyuḥ
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ vīravatīm iṣam naḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ rasate dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_01.096.09.1{04} evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi
analyzed: eva naḥ agne samidhā vṛdhānaḥ revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi

original: RV_01.096.09.2{04} tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthvivī uto dyauḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthvivī uta u dyauḥ

original: RV_01.097.01.1{05} apa naḥ śośucadaghamagne śuśugdhyā rayim
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham agne śuśugdhyā rayim

original: RV_01.097.01.2{05} apa naḥ śośucadagham
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_01.097.02.1{05} sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe
analyzed: sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe
apa

original: RV_01.097.03.1{05} pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣāṃ prāsmākāsaśca sūrayaḥ
analyzed: pra yat bhandiṣṭhaḥ eṣām pra asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ
apa

original: RV_01.097.04.1{05} pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam
analyzed: pra yat te agne sūrayaḥ jāyemahi pra te vayam
apa

original: RV_01.097.05.1{05} pra yadagneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ
analyzed: pra yat agneḥ sahasvataḥ viśvatas yanti bhānavaḥ
apa

original: RV_01.097.06.1{05} tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūrasi
analyzed: tvam hi viśvatomukha viśvatas paribhūḥ asi
apa

original: RV_01.097.07.1{05} dviṣo no viśvatomukhāti nāveva pāraya
analyzed: dviṣaḥ naḥ viśvatomukha ati nāvā iva pāraya
apa

original: RV_01.097.08.1{05} sa naḥ sindhumiva nāvayāti parṣā svastaye
analyzed: sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvayāti parṣa svastaye
apa

original: RV_01.098.01.1{06} vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kaṃ bhuvanānāmabhiśrīḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ

original: RV_01.098.01.2{06} ito jāto viśvamidaṃ vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaro yatate sūryeṇa
analyzed: itas jātaḥ viśvam idam vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaraḥ yatate sūryeṇa

original: RV_01.098.02.1{06} pṛṣṭo divi pṛṣṭo agniḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭo viśvā oṣadhīrā viveśa
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ divi pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭaḥ viśvāḥ oṣadhīḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_01.098.02.2{06} vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭo agniḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam

original: RV_01.098.03.1{06} vaiśvānara tava tat satyamastvasmān rāyo maghavānaḥ sacantām
analyzed: vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astu asmān rāyaḥ maghavānaḥ sacantām
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.099.01.1{07} jātavedase sunavāma somamarātīyato ni dahāti vedaḥ
analyzed: jātavedase sunavāma somam arātīyataḥ ni dahāti vedaḥ

original: RV_01.099.01.2{07} sa naḥ parṣadati durgāṇi viśvā nāveva sindhuṃ duritātyagniḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣadati durgāṇi viśvā nāvā iva sindhum duritā ati agniḥ

original: RV_01.100.01.1{08} sa yo vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokā maho divaḥ pṛthivyāścasamrāṭ
analyzed: sa yaḥ vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokāḥ mahaḥ divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ca samrāj

original: RV_01.100.01.2{08} satīnasatvā havyo bhareṣu marutvān no bhavatvindra ūtī
analyzed: satīna satvā havyaḥ bhareṣu marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_01.100.02.1{08} yasyānāptaḥ sūryasyeva yāmo bhare-bhare vṛtrahā śuṣmo asti
analyzed: yasya an āptaḥ sūryasya iva yāmaḥ bharebhare vṛtra hā śuṣmaḥ asti

original: RV_01.100.02.2{08} vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhirevairma...
analyzed: vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhiḥ eva airma

original: RV_01.100.03.1{08} divo na yasya retaso dughānāḥ panthāso yanti śavasāparītāḥ
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya retasaḥ dughānāḥ panthāsaḥ yanti śavasā a parītāḥ

original: RV_01.100.03.2{08} taraddveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ pauṃsyebhirma...
analyzed: tarat dveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ

original: RV_01.100.04.1{08} so aṅgirobhiraṅgirastamo bhūd vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san
analyzed: saḥ aṅgirobhiḥ aṅgirastamaḥ bhūt vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san

original: RV_01.100.04.2{08} ṛgmibhirṛgmī gātubhirjyeṣṭho ma...
analyzed: ṛgmibhiḥ ṛgmī gātubhiḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ ma

original: RV_01.100.05.1{08} sa sūnubhirna rudrebhirṛbhvā nṛṣāhye sāsahvānamitrān
analyzed: sa sūnubhiḥ na rudrebhiḥ ṛbhvā nṛṣāhye sāsahvān amitrān

original: RV_01.100.05.2{08} sanīḷebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan ma...
analyzed: sanīḷebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan ma

original: RV_01.100.06.1{09} sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartāsmākebhirnṛbhiḥ sūryaṃ sanat
analyzed: sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartā asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ sūryam sanat

original: RV_01.100.06.2{09} asminnahan satpatiḥ puruhūto ma...
analyzed: asmin ahan satpatiḥ puruhūtaḥ ma

original: RV_01.100.07.1{09} tamūtayo raṇayañchūrasātau taṃ kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām
analyzed: tam ūtayaḥ raṇayan śūrasātau tam kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām

original: RV_01.100.07.2{09} sa viśvasya karuṇasyeśa eko ma...
analyzed: sa viśvasya karuṇasya īśe ekaḥ ma

original: RV_01.100.08.1{09} tamapsanta śavasa utsaveṣu naro naramavase taṃ dhanāya
analyzed: tam apsanta śavasaḥ utsaveṣu naraḥ naram avase tam dhanāya

original: RV_01.100.08.2{09} so andhe cit tamasi jyotirvidan ma...
analyzed: saḥ andhe cit tamasi jyotiḥ vidat ma

original: RV_01.100.09.1{09} sa savyena yamati vrādhataścit sa dakṣiṇe saṃgṛbhītā kṛtāni
analyzed: sa savyena yamati vrādhataḥ cit sa dakṣiṇe saṃgṛbhītā kṛtāni

original: RV_01.100.09.2{09} sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni ma...
analyzed: sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni ma

original: RV_01.100.10.1{09} sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhirvide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣṭibhirnvadya
analyzed: sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhiḥ vide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣṭibhiḥ nu adya

original: RV_01.100.10.2{09} sa pauṃsyebhirabhibhūraśastīrma...
analyzed: sa pauṃsyebhiḥ abhibhūḥ aśastīrma

original: RV_01.100.11.1{10} sa jāmibhiryat samajāti mīḷhe 'jāmibhirvā puruhūta evaiḥ
analyzed: sa jāmibhiḥ yat samajāti mīḷhe a jāmibhiḥ vā puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_01.100.11.2{10} apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣe ma...
analyzed: apām tokasya tanayasya jeṣe ma

original: RV_01.100.12.1{10} sa vajrabhṛd dasyuhā bhīma ugraḥ sahasracetāḥ śatanīthaṛbhvā
analyzed: sa vajrabhṛt dasyu hā bhīmaḥ ugraḥ sahasra cetāḥ śata nītha ṛbhvā

original: RV_01.100.12.2{10} camrīṣo na śavasā pāñcajanyo ma...
analyzed: camrīṣaḥ na śavasā pāñcajanyaḥ ma

original: RV_01.100.13.1{10} tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣā divo na tveṣo ravathaḥśimīvān
analyzed: tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣāḥ divaḥ na tveṣaḥ ravathaḥ śimīvān

original: RV_01.100.13.2{10} taṃ sacante sanayastaṃ dhanāni ma...
analyzed: tam sacante sanayaḥ tam dhanāni ma

original: RV_01.100.14.1{10} yasyājasraṃ śavasā mānamukthaṃ paribhujad rodasī viśvataḥ sīm
analyzed: yasya ajasram śavasā mānamuktham paribhujat rodasī viśvatas sīm

original: RV_01.100.14.2{10} sa pāriṣat kratubhirmandasāno ma...
analyzed: sa pāriṣat kratubhiḥ mandasānaḥ ma

original: RV_01.100.15.1{10} na yasya devā devatā na martā āpaścana śavaso antamāpuḥ
analyzed: na yasya devāḥ devatā na martāḥ āpaḥ cana śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ

original: RV_01.100.15.2{10} sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmo divaśca ma...
analyzed: sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmaḥ divaḥ ca ma

original: RV_01.100.16.1{11} rohicchyāvā sumadaṃśurlalāmīrdyukṣā rāya ṛjrāśvasya
analyzed: rohit śyāvā sumat aṃśuḥ lalāmīḥ dyukṣā rāye ṛjrāśvasya

original: RV_01.100.16.2{11} vṛṣaṇvantaṃ bibhratī dhūrṣu rathaṃ mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvantam bibhratī dhūrṣu ratham mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_01.100.17.1{11} etat tyat ta indra vṛṣṇa ukthaṃ vārṣāgirā abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ
analyzed: etat tyad te indra vṛṣṇe uktham vārṣāgirāḥ abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ

original: RV_01.100.17.2{11} ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣṭibhirambarīṣaḥ sahadevo bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ
analyzed: ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣṭibhiḥ ambarīṣaḥ sahadevaḥ bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ

original: RV_01.100.18.1{11} dasyūñchimyūṃśca puruhūta evairhatvā pṛthivyāṃ śarvā ni barhīt
analyzed: dasyūn śimyūn ca puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ hatvā pṛthivyām śarvā ni barhīt

original: RV_01.100.18.2{11} sanat kṣetraṃ sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ sanatsūryaṃ sanadapaḥ suvajraḥ
analyzed: sanat kṣetram sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ sanat sūryam sanat apaḥ su vajraḥ

original: RV_01.100.19.1{11} viśvāhendro adhivaktā no astvaparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam
analyzed: viśvāhā indraḥ adhivaktā naḥ astu aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.101.01.1{12} pra mandine pitumadarcatā vaco yaḥ kṛṣṇagarbhā nirahannṛjiśvanā
analyzed: pra mandine pitumat arcatā vacaḥ yaḥ kṛṣṇagarbhā nirahan nṛjiśvanā

original: RV_01.101.01.2{12} avasyavo vṛṣaṇaṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe
analyzed: avasyavaḥ vṛṣaṇam vajra dakṣiṇam marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_01.101.02.1{12} yo vyaṃsaṃ jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā yaḥ śambaraṃ yo ahan piprumavratam
analyzed: yaḥ vyaṃsam jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā yaḥ śambaram yaḥ ahan piprum avratam

original: RV_01.101.02.2{12} indro yaḥ śuṣṇamaśuṣaṃ nyāvṛṇaṃ ma. ..
analyzed: indraḥ yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣam nyāvṛṇam mā

original: RV_01.101.03.1{12} yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsyaṃ mahad yasya vrate varuṇo yasya sūryaḥ
analyzed: yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsyam mahat yasya vrate varuṇaḥ yasya sūryaḥ

original: RV_01.101.03.2{12} yasyendrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vrataṃ ma...
analyzed: yasya indrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vratam ma

original: RV_01.101.04.1{12} yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ gopatirvaśī ya āritaḥ karmaṇi karmaṇi sthiraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ aśvānām yaḥ gavām gopatiḥ vaśī yaḥ āritaḥ karmaṇi karmaṇi sthiraḥ

original: RV_01.101.04.2{12} vīḷościdindro yo asunvato vadho ma...
analyzed: vīḍoḥ cit indraḥ yaḥ a sunvataḥ vadhaḥ ma

original: RV_01.101.05.1{12} yo viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇatas patiryo brahmaṇe prathamo gā avindat
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇataḥ patiḥ yaḥ brahmaṇe prathamaḥ gāḥ avindat

original: RV_01.101.05.2{12} indro yo dasyūnradharānavātiran ma...
analyzed: indraḥ yaḥ dasyūn radharān avātirat ma

original: RV_01.101.06.1{12} yaḥ śūrebhirhavyo yaśca bhīrubhiryo dhāvadbhirhūyate yaśca jigyubhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ śūrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhīrubhiḥ yaḥ dhāvadbhiḥ hūyate yaḥ ca jigyubhiḥ

original: RV_01.101.06.2{12} indraṃ yaṃ viśvā bhuvanābhi sandadhurma...
analyzed: indram yam viśvā bhuvanā abhi sandadhurma

original: RV_01.101.07.1{13} rudrāṇāmeti pradiśā vicakṣaṇo rudrebhiryoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ
analyzed: rudrāṇām eti pradiśā vicakṣaṇaḥ rudrebhiḥ yoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ

original: RV_01.101.07.2{13} indraṃ manīṣā abhyarcati śrutaṃ ma...
analyzed: indram manīṣā abhyarcati śrutam ma

original: RV_01.101.08.1{13} yad vā marutvaḥ parame sadhasthe yad vāvame vṛjane mādayāse
analyzed: yat vā marutvas parame sadhasthe yat vā avame vṛjane mādayāse

original: RV_01.101.08.2{13} ata ā yāhyadhvaraṃ no achā tvāyā haviścakṛmā satyarādhaḥ
analyzed: atas ā yāhi adhvaram naḥ achā tvāyā haviḥ cakṛma satya rādhaḥ

original: RV_01.101.09.1{13} tvāyendra somaṃ suṣumā sudakṣa tvāyā haviścakṛmā brahmavāhaḥ
analyzed: tvāyā indra somam suṣuma su dakṣa tvāyā haviḥ cakṛma brahma vāhaḥ

original: RV_01.101.09.2{13} adhā niyutvaḥ sagaṇo marudbhirasmin yajñe barhiṣimādayasva
analyzed: adhā niyutvas sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmin yajñe

original: RV_01.101.10.1{13} mādayasva haribhirye ta indra vi ṣyasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene
analyzed: mādayasva haribhiḥ ye te indra vi syasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene

original: RV_01.101.10.2{13} ā tvā suśipra harayo vahantūśan havyāni prati no juṣasva
analyzed: ā tvā su śipra harayaḥ vahantu uśan havyāni prati naḥ juṣasva

original: RV_01.101.11.1{13} marutstotrasya vṛjanasya gopā vayamindreṇa sanuyāma vājam
analyzed: marut stotrasya vṛjanasya gopāḥ vayam indreṇa sanuyāma vājam
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.102.01.1{14} imāṃ te dhiyaṃ pra bhare maho mahīmasya stotre dhiṣaṇāyat ta ānaje
analyzed: imām te dhiyam pra bhare mahaḥ mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇāyat te ānaje

original: RV_01.102.01.2{14} tamutsave ca prasave ca sāsahimindraṃ devāsaḥ śavasāmadannanu
analyzed: tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indram devāsaḥ śavasā amadan anu

original: RV_01.102.02.1{14} asya śravo nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśataṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: asya śravaḥ nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśatam vapuḥ

original: RV_01.102.02.2{14} asme sūryācandramasābhicakṣe śraddhe kamindra carato vitarturam
analyzed: asme sūryācandramasā abhicakṣe śraddhe kam indra carataḥ vitarturam

original: RV_01.102.03.1{14} taṃ smā rathaṃ maghavannprāva sātaye jaitraṃ yaṃ te anumadāma saṃgame
analyzed: tam smā ratham maghavan prāva sātaye jaitram yam te anumadāma saṃgame

original: RV_01.102.03.2{14} ājā na indra manasā puruṣṭuta tvāyadbhyo maghavañcharma yacha naḥ
analyzed: ājā naḥ indra manasā puruṣṭuta tvāyadbhyaḥ maghavan śarma yaccha naḥ

original: RV_01.102.04.1{14} vayaṃ jayema tvayā yujā vṛtamasmākamaṃśamudavā bhare-bhare
analyzed: vayam jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam udavā bharebhare

original: RV_01.102.04.2{14} asmabhyamindra varivaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇāṃmaghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja
analyzed: asmabhyam indra varivaḥ su gam kṛdhi pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja

original: RV_01.102.05.1{14} nānā hi tvā havamānā janā ime dhanānāṃ dhartaravasāvipanyavaḥ
analyzed: nānā hi tvā havamānāḥ janāḥ ime dhanānām dhartar avasā avipanyavaḥ

original: RV_01.102.05.2{14} asmākaṃ smā rathamā tiṣṭha sātaye jaitraṃhīndra nibhṛtaṃ manastava
analyzed: asmākam smā rathamā tiṣṭha sātaye jaitram hi indra nibhṛtam manaḥ tava

original: RV_01.102.06.1{15} gojitā bāhū amitakratuḥ simaḥ karman karmañchatamūtiḥ khajaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: go jitā bāhū amita kratuḥ simaḥ karman karman śatamūtiḥ khajaṃkaraḥ

original: RV_01.102.06.2{15} akalpa indraḥ pratimānamojasāthā janā vihvayante siṣāsavaḥ
analyzed: akalpaḥ indraḥ pratimānam ojasā athā janāḥ vihvayante siṣāsavaḥ

original: RV_01.102.07.1{15} ut te śatān maghavannucca bhūyasa ut sahasrād ririce kṛṣṭiṣu śravaḥ
analyzed: ud te śatāt maghavan ucca bhūyasaḥ ud sahasrāt ririce kṛṣṭiṣu śravaḥ

original: RV_01.102.07.2{15} amātraṃ tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahyadhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase purandara
analyzed: amātram tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahyadhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase purandara

original: RV_01.102.08.1{15} triviṣṭidhātu pratimānamojasastisro bhūmīrnṛpate trīṇi rocanā
analyzed: triviṣṭi dhātu pratimānam ojasaḥ tisraḥ bhūmīḥ nṛpate trīṇi rocanā

original: RV_01.102.08.2{15} atīdaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vavakṣithāśatrurindrajanuṣā sanādasi
analyzed: ati idam viśvam bhuvanam vavakṣitha a śatruḥ indra januṣā sanādasi

original: RV_01.102.09.1{15} tvāṃ deveṣu prathamaṃ havāmahe tvaṃ babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ
analyzed: tvām deveṣu prathamam havāmahe tvam babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ

original: RV_01.102.09.2{15} semaṃ naḥ kārumupamanyumudbhidamindraḥ kṛṇotu prasave rathaṃ puraḥ
analyzed: sa imam naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indraḥ kṛṇotu prasave ratham puras

original: RV_01.102.10.1{15} tvaṃ jigetha na dhanā rurodhithārbheṣvājā maghavan mahatsu ca
analyzed: tvam jigetha na dhanā rurodhitha arbheṣu ājā maghavan mahatsu ca

original: RV_01.102.10.2{15} tvāmugramavase saṃ śiśīmasyathā na indra havaneṣu codaya
analyzed: tvām ugram avase sam śiśīmasi athā naḥ indra havaneṣu codaya

original: RV_01.102.11.1{15} viśvāhendro ...
analyzed: viśvāhā indraḥ

original: RV_01.103.01.1{16} tat ta indriyaṃ paramaṃ parācairadhārayanta kavayaḥ puredam
analyzed: tat te indriyam paramam parācais adhārayanta kavayaḥ purā idam

original: RV_01.103.01.2{16} kṣamedamanyad divyanyadasya samī pṛcyate samaneva ketuḥ
analyzed: kṣamā idam anyat divi anyat asya samī pṛcyate samanā iva ketuḥ

original: RV_01.103.02.1{16} sa dhārayat pṛthivīṃ paprathacca vajreṇa hatvā nirapaḥ sasarja
analyzed: sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathat ca vajreṇa hatvā nirapaḥ sasarja

original: RV_01.103.02.2{16} ahannahimabhinad rauhiṇaṃ vyahan vyaṃsaṃ maghavā śacībhiḥ
analyzed: ahan ahim abhinat rauhiṇam vyahan vyaṃsam maghavā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_01.103.03.1{16} sa jātūbharmā śraddadhāna ojaḥ puro vibhindannacarad vidāsīḥ
analyzed: sa jātūbharmā śraddadhānaḥ ojaḥ puras vibhindan acarat vidāsīḥ

original: RV_01.103.03.2{16} vidvān vajrin dasyave hetimasyāryaṃ saho vardhayā dyumnamindra
analyzed: vidvān vajrin dasyave hetim asya āryam sahaḥ vardhaya dyumnam indra

original: RV_01.103.04.1{16} tadūcuṣe mānuṣemā yugāni kīrtenyaṃ maghavā nāma bibhrat
analyzed: tat ūcuṣe mānuṣā imā yugāni kīrtenyam maghavā nāma bibhrat

original: RV_01.103.04.2{16} upaprayan dasyuhatyāya vajrī yad dha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe
analyzed: upaprayan dasyu hatyāya vajrī yat ha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe

original: RV_01.103.05.1{16} tadasyedaṃ paśyatā bhūri puṣṭaṃ śradindrasya dhattana vīryāya
analyzed: tat asya idam paśyata bhūri puṣṭam śrath indrasya dhattana vīryāya

original: RV_01.103.05.2{16} sa gā avindat so avindadaśvān sa oṣadhīḥ soapaḥ sa vanāni
analyzed: sa gāḥ avindat saḥ avindat aśvān saḥ oṣadhīḥ saḥ apaḥ sa vanāni

original: RV_01.103.06.1{17} bhurikarmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe satyaśuṣmāya sunavāma somam
analyzed: bhuri karmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe satya śuṣmāya sunavāma somam

original: RV_01.103.06.2{17} ya ādṛtyā paripanthīva śūro 'yajvano vibhajanneti vedaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ādṛtya paripanthī iva śūraḥ ayajvanaḥ vibhajan eti vedaḥ

original: RV_01.103.07.1{17} tadindra preva vīryaṃ cakartha yat sasantaṃ vajreṇābodhayo 'him
analyzed: tat indra pra iva vīryam cakartha yat sasantam vajreṇa abodhayaḥ ahim

original: RV_01.103.07.2{17} anu tvā patnīrhṛṣitaṃ vayaśca viśve devāso amadannanu tvā
analyzed: anu tvā patnīḥ hṛṣitam vayaḥ ca viśve devāsaḥ amadan anu tvā

original: RV_01.103.08.1{17} śuṣṇaṃ pipruṃ kuyavaṃ vṛtramindra yadāvadhīrvi puraḥśambarasya
analyzed: śuṣṇam piprum kuyavam vṛtram indra yadā avadhīḥ vi puras śambarasya
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.104.01.1{18} yoniṣ ṭa indra niṣade akāri tamā ni ṣīda svāno nārvā
analyzed: yoniḥ te indra niṣade akāri tamā ni sīda svānaḥ na arvā

original: RV_01.104.01.2{18} vimucya vayo 'vasāyāśvān doṣā vastorvahīyasaḥ prapitve
analyzed: vimucya vayaḥ avasāya aśvān doṣā vastoḥ vahīyasaḥ prapitve

original: RV_01.104.02.1{18} o tye nara indramūtaye gurnū cit tān sadyo adhvano jagamyāt
analyzed: ā u tye naraḥ indram ūtaye guḥ nu cit tān sadyas adhvanaḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_01.104.02.2{18} devāso manyuṃ dāsasya ścamnan te na ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam
analyzed: devāsaḥ manyum dāsasya ścamnan te naḥ ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam

original: RV_01.104.03.1{18} ava tmana bharate ketavedā ava tmanā bharate phenamudan
analyzed: ava bharate keta vedāḥ ava tmanā bharate phena mudan

original: RV_01.104.03.2{18} kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe hate te syātāṃ pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ
analyzed: kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe hate te syātām pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ

original: RV_01.104.04.1{18} yuyopa nābhiruparasyāyoḥ pra pūrvābhistirate rāṣṭi śūraḥ
analyzed: yuyopa nābhiḥ uparasya āyoḥ pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate rāṣṭi śūraḥ

original: RV_01.104.04.2{18} añjasī kuliśī vīrapatnī payo hinvānā udabhirbharante
analyzed: añjasī kuliśī vīra patnī payaḥ hinvānāḥ udabhiḥ bharante

original: RV_01.104.05.1{18} prati yat syā nīthādarśi dasyoroko nāchā sadanaṃ jānatī gāt
analyzed: prati yat syā nīthā adarśi dasyoḥ rokaḥ nā achā sadanam jānatī gāt

original: RV_01.104.05.2{18} adha smā no maghavañcarkṛtādin mā no magheva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ
analyzed: adha smā naḥ maghavan carkṛta ādin mā naḥ maghā iva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ

original: RV_01.104.06.1{19} sa tvaṃ na indra sūrye so apsvanāgāstva ā bhaja jīvaśaṃse
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra sūrye saḥ apsu anāgāstve ā bhaja jīva śaṃse

original: RV_01.104.06.2{19} māntarāṃ bhujamā rīriṣo naḥ śraddhitaṃ te mahata indriyāya
analyzed: mā antarām bhujamā rīriṣaḥ naḥ śraddhitam te mahate indriyāya

original: RV_01.104.07.1{19} adhā manye śrat te asmā adhāyi vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya
analyzed: adhā manye śrat te asmai adhāyi vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya

original: RV_01.104.07.2{19} mā no akṛte puruhūta yonāvindra kṣudhyadbhyo vaya āsutiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ a kṛte puruhūta yonau indra kṣudhyadbhyaḥ vayaḥ āsutim dāḥ

original: RV_01.104.08.1{19} mā no vadhīrindra mā parā dā mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ indra mā parā dāḥ mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ

original: RV_01.104.08.2{19} āṇḍā mā no maghavañchakra nirbhen mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi
analyzed: āṇḍā mā naḥ maghavan śakra nirbhet mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi

original: RV_01.104.09.1{19} arvāṃ ehi somakāmaṃ tvāhurayaṃ sutastasya pibā madāya
analyzed: arvān ehi soma kāmam tvā āhuḥ ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya

original: RV_01.104.09.2{19} uruvyacā jathara ā vṛṣasva piteva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ
analyzed: uru vyacāḥ jathare ā vṛṣasva pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_01.105.01.1{20} candramā apsvantarā suparṇo dhāvate divi
analyzed: candramāḥ apsu antarā suparṇaḥ dhāvate divi

original: RV_01.105.01.2{20} na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittaṃ me asya rodasī
analyzed: na vaḥ hiraṇya nemayaḥ padam vindanti vidyutaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_01.105.02.1{20} arthamid vā u arthina ā jāyā yuvate patim
analyzed: artham id vai u arthinaḥ ā jāyā yuvate patim

original: RV_01.105.02.2{20} tuñjāte vṛṣṇyaṃ payaḥ paridāya rasaṃ duhe vittam...
analyzed: tuñjāte vṛṣṇyam payaḥ paridāya rasam duhe vittam

original: RV_01.105.03.1{20} mo ṣu deva adaḥ svarava pādi divas pari
analyzed: mā u su deva adaḥ svarava pādi divas pari

original: RV_01.105.03.2{20} mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ śūne bhūma kadā cana vittam...
analyzed: mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ śūne bhūma kadā cana vittam

original: RV_01.105.04.1{20} yajñaṃ pṛchāmyavamaṃ sa tad dūto vi vocati
analyzed: yajñam pṛcchāmi avamam sa tat dūtaḥ vi vocati

original: RV_01.105.04.2{20} kva ṛtaṃ pūrvyaṃ gataṃ kastad bibharti nūtano vi...
analyzed: kva ṛtam pūrvyam gatam kaḥ tat bibharti nūtanaḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.05.1{20} amī ye devā sthana triṣvā rocane divaḥ
analyzed: amī ye devā sthana triṣu ā rocane divaḥ

original: RV_01.105.05.2{20} kad va ṛtaṃ kadanṛtaṃ kva pratnā va āhutirvi...
analyzed: kad vaḥ ṛtam kad anṛtam kva pratnā vaḥ āhutiḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.06.1{21} kad va ṛtasya dharṇasi kad varuṇasya cakṣaṇam
analyzed: kad vaḥ ṛtasya dharṇasi kad varuṇasya cakṣaṇam

original: RV_01.105.06.2{21} kadaryamṇo mahas pathāti krāmema dūḍhyo vi...
analyzed: kadaryamṇaḥ mahaḥ pathā ati krāmema dūḍhyaḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.07.1{21} aham so asmi yaḥ purā sute vadāmi kāni cit
analyzed: aham saḥ asmi yaḥ purā sute vadāmi kāni cit

original: RV_01.105.07.2{21} taṃ mā vyantyādhyo vṛko na tṛṣṇajaṃ mṛgaṃ vi...
analyzed: tam mā vyanti ādhyaḥ vṛkaḥ na tṛṣṇajam mṛgam vi

original: RV_01.105.08.1{21} saṃ mā tapantyabhitaḥ sapatnīriva parśavaḥ
analyzed: sam mā tapanti abhitas sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ

original: RV_01.105.08.2{21} mūṣo na śiśnā vyadanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato vi...
analyzed: mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vyadanti mā adhya stotāram te śatakrato vi

original: RV_01.105.09.1{21} amī ye sapta raśmayastatrā me nābhirātatā
analyzed: amī ye sapta raśmayaḥ tatra me nābhiḥ ātatā

original: RV_01.105.09.2{21} tritastad vedāptyaḥ sa jāmitvāya rebhati vi...
analyzed: tritaḥ tat veda āptyaḥ sa jāmi tvāya rebhati vi

original: RV_01.105.10.1{21} amī ye pañcokṣaṇo madhye tasthurmaho divaḥ
analyzed: amī ye pañca ukṣaṇaḥ madhye tasthuḥ mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_01.105.10.2{21} devatrā nu pravācyaṃ sadhrīcīnā ni vāvṛturvi...
analyzed: devatrā nu pravācyam sadhrīcīnāḥ ni vāvṛtuḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.11.1{22} suparṇā eta āsate madhya ārodhane divaḥ
analyzed: suparṇāḥ ete āsate madhye ārodhane divaḥ

original: RV_01.105.11.2{22} te sedhanti patho vṛkaṃ tarantaṃ yahvatīrapo vi...
analyzed: te sedhanti pathaḥ vṛkam tarantam yahvatīḥ apaḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.12.1{22} navyaṃ tadukthyaṃ hitaṃ devāsaḥ supravācanam
analyzed: navyam tat ukthyam hitam devāsaḥ su pravācanam

original: RV_01.105.12.2{22} ṛtamarṣanti sindhavaḥ satyaṃ tātāna sūryo vi...
analyzed: ṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ satyam tātāna sūryaḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.13.1{22} agne tava tyadukthyaṃ deveṣvastyāpyam
analyzed: agne tava tyad ukthyam deveṣu astyāpyam

original: RV_01.105.13.2{22} sa naḥ satto manuṣvadā devān yakṣi viduṣṭaro vi...
analyzed: sa naḥ sattaḥ manuṣvadā devān yakṣi viduṣṭaraḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.14.1{22} satto hotā manuṣvadā devānachā viduṣṭaraḥ
analyzed: sattaḥ hotā manuṣvadā viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_01.105.14.2{22} agnirhavyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiro vi...
analyzed: agniḥ havyā suṣūdati devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ vi

original: RV_01.105.15.1{22} brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇo gātuvidaṃ tamīmahe
analyzed: brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇaḥ gātu vidam tam īmahe

original: RV_01.105.15.2{22} vyūrṇoti hṛdā matiṃ navyo jāyatām ṛtaṃ vi...
analyzed: vyūrṇoti hṛdā matim navyaḥ jāyatām ṛtam vi

original: RV_01.105.16.1{23} asau yaḥ panthā ādityo divi pravācyaṃ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: asau yaḥ panthāḥ ādityaḥ divi pravācyam kṛtaḥ

original: RV_01.105.16.2{23} na sa devā atikrame taṃ martāso na paśyatha vi...
analyzed: na sa devāḥ atikrame tam martāsaḥ na paśyatha vi

original: RV_01.105.17.1{23} tritaḥ kūpe 'vahito devān havata ūtaye
analyzed: tritaḥ kūpe avahitaḥ devān havate ūtaye

original: RV_01.105.17.2{23} tacchuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ kṛṇvannaṃhūraṇāduru vi...
analyzed: tat śuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ kṛṇvan aṃhūraṇāt uru vi

original: RV_01.105.18.1{23} aruṇo mā sakṛd vṛkaḥ pathā yantaṃ dadarśa hi
analyzed: aruṇaḥ mā sakṛt vṛkaḥ pathā yantam dadarśa hi

original: RV_01.105.18.2{23} ujjihīte nicāyyā taṣṭeva pṛṣṭyāmayī vi...
analyzed: ujjihīte nicāyyā taṣṭā iva pṛṣṭi āmayī vi

original: RV_01.105.19.1{23} enāṅgūṣeṇa vayamindravanto 'bhi ṣyāma vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ
analyzed: enā āṅgūṣeṇa vayam indravantaḥ abhi syāma vṛjane sarva vīrāḥ
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.106.01.1{24} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇamagnimūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃhavāmahe
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutam śardhaḥ aditim havāmahe

original: RV_01.106.01.2{24} rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān noaṃhaso niṣ pipartana
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_01.106.02.1{24} ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye bhūta devā vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ
analyzed: te ādityāḥ ā gata sarvatātaye bhūta devāḥ vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ
ratham

original: RV_01.106.03.1{24} avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanā uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: avantu naḥ pitaraḥ su pravācanāḥ uta devī deva putre ṛtāvṛdhā
ratham

original: RV_01.106.04.1{24} narāśaṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājayanniha kṣayadvīraṃ pūṣaṇaṃ sumnairīmahe
analyzed: narāśaṃsam vājinam vājayan iha kṣayat vīram pūṣaṇam sumnaiḥ īmahe
ratham

original: RV_01.106.05.1{24} bṛhaspate sadamin naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi śaṃ yoryat te manurhitaṃ tadīmahe
analyzed: bṛhaspate sadamin naḥ sugam kṛdhi śam yos yat te manuḥ hitam tat īmahe
ratham

original: RV_01.106.06.1{24} indraṃ kutso vṛtrahaṇaṃ śacīpatiṃ kāṭe nibāḷha ṛṣirahvadūtaye
analyzed: indram kutsaḥ vṛtra haṇam śacīpatim kāṭe nibāḍhaḥ ṛṣiḥ ahva dūtaye
ratham

original: RV_01.106.07.1{24} devairno devyaditirni pātu devastrātā trāyatāmaprayuchan
analyzed: devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayuchan
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.107.01.1{25} yajño devānāṃ pratyeti sumnamādityāso bhavatā mṛḷayantaḥ
analyzed: yajñaḥ devānām pratyeti sumnam ādityāsaḥ bhavata mṛḍayantaḥ

original: RV_01.107.01.2{25} ā vo 'rvācī sumatirvavṛtyādaṃhościd yā varivovittarāsat
analyzed: ā vaḥ arvācī sumatiḥ vavṛtya a daṃhoḥ cit yā varivaḥ vittarā asat

original: RV_01.107.02.1{25} upa no devā avasā gamantvaṅgirasāṃ sāmabhiḥ stūyamānāḥ
analyzed: upa naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu aṅgirasām sāmabhiḥ stūyamānāḥ

original: RV_01.107.02.2{25} indra indriyairmaruto marudbhirādityairno aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat
analyzed: indraḥ indriyaiḥ marutaḥ marudbhiḥ ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_01.107.03.1{25} tan na indrastad varuṇastadagnistadaryamā tat savitācano dhāt
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ tat varuṇaḥ tat agniḥ tat aryamā tat savitā acanaḥ dhāt
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.108.01.1{26} ya indrāgnī citratamo ratho vāmabhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe
analyzed: yaḥ indra agnī citratamaḥ rathaḥ vām abhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe

original: RV_01.108.01.2{26} tenā yātaṃ sarathaṃ tasthivāṃsāthā somasya pibataṃ sutasya
analyzed: tena ā yātam sa ratham tasthivāṃsā athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_01.108.02.1{26} yāvadidaṃ bhuvanaṃ viśvamastyuruvyacā varimatā gabhīram
analyzed: yāvat idam bhuvanam viśvam asti uruvyacā varimatā gabhīram

original: RV_01.108.02.2{26} tāvānayaṃ pātave somo astvaramindrāgnī manase yuvabhyām
analyzed: tāvān ayam pātave somaḥ astvaram indra agnī manase yuvabhyām

original: RV_01.108.03.1{26} cakrāthe hi sadhryaṃ nāma bhadraṃ sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇāuta sthaḥ
analyzed: cakrāthe hi sadhryam nāma bhadram sadhrīcīnā vṛtra haṇau uta sthaḥ

original: RV_01.108.03.2{26} tāvindrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām
analyzed: tau indra agnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām

original: RV_01.108.04.1{26} samiddheṣvagniṣvānajānā yatasrucā barhiru tistirāṇā
analyzed: samiddheṣu agniṣu ānajānā yata srucā barhiḥ u tistirāṇā

original: RV_01.108.04.2{26} tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhirarvāgendrāgnī saumanasāya yātam
analyzed: tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhiḥ arvāk indra agnī saumanasāya yātam

original: RV_01.108.05.1{26} yānīndrāgnī cakrathurvīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇyuta vṛṣṇyāni
analyzed: yāni indra agnī cakrathuḥ vīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇi uta vṛṣṇyāni

original: RV_01.108.05.2{26} yā vāṃ pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibataṃ sutasya
analyzed: yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_01.108.06.1{27} yadabravaṃ prathamaṃ vāṃ vṛṇāno 'yaṃ somo asurairno vihavyaḥ
analyzed: yat abravam prathamam vām vṛṇānaḥ ayam somaḥ asuraiḥ naḥ vihavyaḥ

original: RV_01.108.06.2{27} tāṃ satyāṃ śraddhāmabhyā hi yātamathā somasya pibataṃ sutasya
analyzed: tām satyām śraddhām abhyā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_01.108.07.1{27} yadindrāgnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yad brahmaṇi rājani vāyajatrā
analyzed: yat indra agnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yat brahmaṇi rājani vā ayajatrā

original: RV_01.108.07.2{27} ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāvā hi yātamathā somasya pibataṃ sutasya
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇāvā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_01.108.08.1{27} yadindrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yad druhyuṣvanuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ
analyzed: yat indra agnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yat druhyuṣu anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ
atas

original: RV_01.108.09.1{27} yadindrāgnī avamasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ madhyamasyāṃ paramasyāmuta sthaḥ
analyzed: yat indra agnī avamasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ
atas

original: RV_01.108.10.1{27} yadindrāgnī paramasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ madhyamasyāmavamasyāmuta sthaḥ
analyzed: yat indra agnī paramasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ
atas

original: RV_01.108.11.1{27} yadindrāgnī divi ṣṭho yat pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu
analyzed: yat indra agnī divi ṣṭhaḥ yat pṛthivyām yat parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu
atas

original: RV_01.108.12.1{27} yadindrāgnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe
analyzed: yat indra agnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe
atas

original: RV_01.108.13.1{27} evendrāgnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvāsmabhyaṃ saṃ jayatandhanāni
analyzed: eva indra agnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvā asmabhyam sam jayatan dhanāni
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.109.01.1{28} vi hyakhyaṃ manasā vasya ichannindrāgnī jñāsa uta vā sajātān
analyzed: vi hi akhyam manasā vasyaḥ ichan indra agnī jñāsaḥ uta vā sajātān

original: RV_01.109.01.2{28} nānyā yuvat pramatirasti mahyaṃ sa vāṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantīmatakṣam
analyzed: na anyā yuvat pramatiḥ asti mahyam sa vām dhiyam vājayantīm atakṣam

original: RV_01.109.02.1{28} aśravaṃ hi bhūridāvattarā vāṃ vijāmāturuta vā ghā syālāt
analyzed: aśravam hi bhūri dāvattarā vām vijāmātuḥ uta vā gha syālāt

original: RV_01.109.02.2{28} athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyāmindrāgnī stomaṃ janayāmi navyam
analyzed: athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām indra agnī stomam janayāmi navyam

original: RV_01.109.03.1{28} mā chedma raśmīnriti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇāṃ śaktīranuyachamānāḥ
analyzed: mā chedma raśmīn riti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇām śaktīḥ anuyacchamānāḥ

original: RV_01.109.03.2{28} indrāgnibhyāṃ kaṃ vṛṣaṇo madanti tā hyadrī dhiṣaṇāyā upasthe
analyzed: indra agnibhyām kam vṛṣaṇaḥ madanti tā hi adrī dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthe

original: RV_01.109.04.1{28} yuvābhyāṃ devī dhiṣaṇā madāyendrāgnī somamuśatī sunoti
analyzed: yuvābhyām devī dhiṣaṇā madāya indra agnī somam uśatī sunoti

original: RV_01.109.04.2{28} tāvaśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī ā dhāvataṃ madhunā pṛṅktamapsu
analyzed: tau aśvinā bhadra hastā su pāṇī ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu

original: RV_01.109.05.1{28} yuvāmindrāgnī vasuno vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye
analyzed: yuvām indra agnī vasunaḥ vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtra hatye

original: RV_01.109.05.2{28} tāvāsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethāṃ sutasya
analyzed: tau āsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethām sutasya

original: RV_01.109.06.1{29} pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaśca
analyzed: pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanā āhaveṣu pra pṛthivyāḥ riricāthe divaḥ ca

original: RV_01.109.06.2{29} pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyo mahitvā prendrāgnī viśvā bhuvanātyanyā
analyzed: pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyaḥ mahitvā pra indra agnī viśvā bhuvanā atyanyā

original: RV_01.109.07.1{29} ā bharataṃ śikṣataṃ vajrabāhū asmānindrāgnī avataṃ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: ā bharatam śikṣatam vajra bāhū asmān indra agnī avatam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_01.109.07.2{29} ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvaṃ pitaro na āsan
analyzed: ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaraḥ naḥ āsan

original: RV_01.109.08.1{29} purandarā śikṣataṃ vajrahastāsmānindrāgnī avataṃ bhareṣu
analyzed: purandarā śikṣatam vajra hastā asmān indra agnī avatam bhareṣu
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.110.01.1{30} tataṃ me apastadu tāyate punaḥ svādiṣṭhā dhītirucathāya śasyate
analyzed: tatam me apaḥ tat u tāyate punar svādiṣṭhā dhītiḥ ucathāya śasyate

original: RV_01.110.01.2{30} ayaṃ samudra iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya samu tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ
analyzed: ayam samudraḥ iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya samu tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ

original: RV_01.110.02.1{30} ābhogayaṃ pra yadichanta aitanāpākāḥ prāñco mama ke cidāpayaḥ
analyzed: ābhogayam pra yat icchanta aitana apākāḥ prāñcaḥ mama ke cit āpayaḥ

original: RV_01.110.02.2{30} saudhanvanāsaścaritasya bhūmanāgachata saviturdāśuṣo gṛham
analyzed: saudhanvanāsaḥ caritasya bhūmanā agachata savituḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_01.110.03.1{30} tat savitā vo 'mṛtatvāmāsuvadagohyaṃ yacchravayanta aitana
analyzed: tat savitā vaḥ amṛta tvām āsuvat agohyam yat śravayantaḥ aitana

original: RV_01.110.03.2{30} tyaṃ ciccamasamasurasya bhakṣaṇamekaṃ santamakṛṇutā caturvayam
analyzed: tyam cit camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam ekam santam akṛṇuta caturvayam

original: RV_01.110.04.1{30} viṣṭvī śamī taraṇitvena vāghato martāsaḥ santo amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
analyzed: viṣṭvī śamī taraṇi tvena vāghataḥ martāsaḥ santaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_01.110.04.2{30} saudhanvanā ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare samapṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare samapṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_01.110.05.1{30} kṣetramiva vi mamustejanenamekaṃ pātram ṛbhavo jehamānam
analyzed: kṣetram iva vi mamuḥ tejanena ekam pātram ṛbhavaḥ jehamānam

original: RV_01.110.05.2{30} upastutā upamaṃ nādhamānā amartyeṣu śrava ichamānāḥ
analyzed: upastutāḥ upamam nādhamānāḥ amartyeṣu śravaḥ ichamānāḥ

original: RV_01.110.06.1{31} ā manīṣāmantarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ sruceva ghṛtaṃ juhavāma vidmanā
analyzed: ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ srucā iva ghṛtam juhavāma vidmanā

original: RV_01.110.06.2{31} taraṇitvā ye piturasya saścira ṛbhavo vājamaruhan divo rajaḥ
analyzed: taraṇi tvā ye pituḥ asya saścire ṛbhavaḥ vājam aruhan divaḥ rajaḥ

original: RV_01.110.07.1{31} ṛbhurna indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhurvājebhirvasubhirvasurdadiḥ
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ naḥ indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhuḥ vājebhiḥ vasubhiḥ vasuḥ dadiḥ

original: RV_01.110.07.2{31} yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priye 'bhi tiṣṭhemapṛtsutīrasunvatām
analyzed: yuṣmākam devāḥ avasā ahani priye abhi tiṣṭhema pṛtsu tīra sunvatām

original: RV_01.110.08.1{31} niścarmaṇa ṛbhavo gāmapiṃśata saṃ vatsenāsṛjatā mātaraṃ punaḥ
analyzed: niścarmaṇaḥ ṛbhavaḥ gām apiṃśata sam vatsena asṛjata mātaram punar

original: RV_01.110.08.2{31} saudhanvanāsaḥ svapasyayā naro jivrī yuvānā pitarākṛṇotana
analyzed: saudhanvanāsaḥ su apasyayā naraḥ jivrī yuvānā pitarā akṛṇotana

original: RV_01.110.09.1{31} vājebhirno vājasātāvaviḍḍhy ṛbhumānindra citramā darṣi rādhaḥ
analyzed: vājebhiḥ naḥ vājasātā avaviḍḍhi ṛbhumān indra citramāḥ darṣi rādhaḥ

original: RV_01.111.01.1{32} takṣan rathaṃ suvṛtaṃ vidamnāpasastakṣan harī indravāhā vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: takṣan ratham suvṛtam vidamnā apasaḥ takṣan harī indra vāhā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_01.111.01.2{32} takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavo yuvad vayastakṣanvatsāya mātaraṃ sacābhuvam
analyzed: takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavaḥ yuvat vayaḥ takṣan vatsāya mātaram sacā abhuvam

original: RV_01.111.02.1{32} ā no yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumad vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya suprajāvatīmiṣam
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumat vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya su prajāvatī imiṣam

original: RV_01.111.02.2{32} yathā kṣayāma sarvavīrayā viśā tan naḥśardhāya dhāsathā svindriyam
analyzed: yathā kṣayāma sarva vīrayā viśā tat naḥ śardhāya dhāsatha su indriyam

original: RV_01.111.03.1{32} ā takṣata sātimasmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātiṃ rathāya sātimarvate naraḥ
analyzed: ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātim rathāya sātim arvate naraḥ

original: RV_01.111.03.2{32} sātiṃ no jaitrīṃ saṃ maheta viśvahā jāmimajāmiṃ pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim
analyzed: sātim naḥ jaitrīm sam maheta viśvahā jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim

original: RV_01.111.04.1{32} ṛbhukṣaṇamindramā huva ūtaya ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ somapītaye
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huve ūtaye ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_01.111.04.2{32} ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnamaśvinā te no hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe
analyzed: ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā te naḥ hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe

original: RV_01.111.05.1{32} ṛbhurbharāya saṃ śiśātu sātiṃ samaryajid vājo asmānaviṣṭu
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ bharāya sam śiśātu sātim samarya jit vājaḥ asmān aviṣṭu
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.112.01.1{33} īḷe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvacittaye 'gniṃ gharmaṃ surucaṃ yāmanniṣṭaye
analyzed: īḍe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva cittaye agnim gharmam su rucam yāman niṣṭaye

original: RV_01.112.01.2{33} yābhirbhare kāramaṃśāya jinvathastābhirū ṣu ūtibhiraśvinā gatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ bhare kāram aṃśāya jinvathaḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_01.112.02.1{33} yuvordānāya subharā asaścato rathamā tasthurvacasaṃ na mantave
analyzed: yuvoḥ dānāya subharāḥ asaścataḥ rathamā tasthuḥ vacasam na mantave

original: RV_01.112.02.2{33} yābhirdhiyo 'vathaḥkarmanniṣṭaye tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhiyaḥ avathaḥ karman niṣṭaye tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.03.1{33} yuvaṃ tāsāṃ divyasya praśāsane viśāṃ kṣayatho amṛtasyamajmanā
analyzed: yuvam tāsām divyasya praśāsane viśām kṣayathaḥ amṛtasya majmanā

original: RV_01.112.03.2{33} yābhirdhenumasvaṃ pinvatho narā tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhenum asvam pinvathaḥ narā tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.04.1{33} yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇirvibhūṣati
analyzed: yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇiḥ vibhūṣati

original: RV_01.112.04.2{33} yābhistrimanturabhavad vicakṣaṇastābhir.. .
analyzed: yābhiḥ tri mantuḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.05.1{33} yābhī rebhaṃ nivṛtaṃ sitamadbhya ud vandanamairayataṃ svardṛśe
analyzed: yābhiḥ rebham nivṛtam sitam adbhyaḥ ud vandanam airayatam svar dṛśe

original: RV_01.112.05.2{33} yābhiḥ kaṇvaṃ pra siṣāsantamāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.06.1{34} yābhirantakaṃ jasamānamāraṇe bhujyaṃ yābhiravyathibhirjijinvathuḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ antakam jasamāna māraṇe bhujyam yābhiḥ avyathibhiḥ jijinvathuḥ

original: RV_01.112.06.2{34} yābhiḥ karkandhuṃ vayyaṃ ca jinvathastābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ karkandhum vayyam ca jinvathaḥ tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.07.1{34} yābhiḥ śucantiṃ dhanasāṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ taptaṃ gharmamomyāvantamatraye
analyzed: yābhiḥ śucantim dhanasām suṣaṃsadam taptam gharmam omyāvantam atraye

original: RV_01.112.07.2{34} yābhiḥ pṛṣniguṃ purukutsamāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ pṛṣnigum purukutsam āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.08.1{34} yābhiḥ śacībhirvṛṣaṇā parāvṛjaṃ prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ cakṣasa etave kṛthaḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ śacībhiḥ vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam pra andham śroṇam cakṣase etave kṛthaḥ

original: RV_01.112.08.2{34} yābhirvartikāṃ grasitāmamuñcatantābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ vartikām grasitām amuñcata tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.09.1{34} yābhiḥ sindhuṃ madhumantamasaścataṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ yābhirajarāvajinvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścatam vasiṣṭham yābhiḥ ajarau ajinvatam

original: RV_01.112.09.2{34} yābhiḥ kutsaṃ śrutaryaṃ naryamāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ kutsam śrutaryam naryam āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.10.1{34} yābhirviśpalāṃ dhanasāmatharvyaṃ sahasramīḷha ājāvajinvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ viśpalām dhanasām atharvyam sahasramīḍhe ājau ajinvatam

original: RV_01.112.10.2{34} yābhirvaśamaśvyaṃ preṇimāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.11.1{35} yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośoakṣarat
analyzed: yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośaḥ akṣarat

original: RV_01.112.11.2{35} kakṣīvantaṃ stotāraṃ yābhirāvataṃ tābhir. ..
analyzed: kakṣīvantam stotāram yābhiḥ āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.12.1{35} yābhī rasāṃ kṣodasodnaḥ pipinvathuranaśvaṃ yābhī rathamāvataṃ jiṣe
analyzed: yābhiḥ rasām kṣodasā udnaḥ pipinvathuḥ an aśvam yābhiḥ ratham āvatam jiṣe

original: RV_01.112.12.2{35} yābhistriśoka usriyā udājata tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ triśokaḥ usriyāḥ udājata tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.13.1{35} yābhiḥ sūryaṃ pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāraṃ kṣaitrapatyeṣvāvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāram kṣaitrapatyeṣu āvatam

original: RV_01.112.13.2{35} yābhirvipraṃ pra bharadvājamāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ vipram pra bharadvājam āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.14.1{35} yābhirmahāmatithigvaṃ kaśojuvaṃ divodāsaṃ śambarahatyaāvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ mahām atithigvam kaśojuvam divodāsam śambara hatya avatam

original: RV_01.112.14.2{35} yābhiḥ pūrbhidye trasadasyumāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ pūḥ bhidye trasadasi umāvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.15.1{35} yābhirvamraṃ vipipānamupastutaṃ kaliṃ yābhirvittajāniṃ duvasyathaḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ vamram vipipānam upastutam kalim yābhiḥ vitta jānim duvasyathaḥ

original: RV_01.112.15.2{35} yābhirvyaśvamuta pṛthimāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ vyaśvam uta pṛthimāvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.16.1{36} yābhirnarā śayave yābhiratraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātumīṣathuḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ narā śayave yābhiḥ atraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātum īṣathuḥ

original: RV_01.112.16.2{36} yābhiḥ śārīrājataṃ syūmaraśmaye tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ śārīrājatam syūmaraśmaye tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.17.1{36} yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanāgnirnādīdeccita iddho ajmannā
analyzed: yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanā agniḥ na adīdet citaḥ iddhaḥ ajman ā

original: RV_01.112.17.2{36} yābhiḥ śaryātamavatho mahādhane tābhir.. .
analyzed: yābhiḥ śaryātam avathaḥ mahā dhane tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.18.1{36} yābhiraṅgiro manasā niraṇyatho 'graṃ gachatho vivare goarṇasaḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ aṅgiraḥ manasā niraṇyathaḥ agram gachathaḥ vivare go arṇasaḥ

original: RV_01.112.18.2{36} yābhirmanuṃ śūramiṣā samāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ manum śūram iṣā samāvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.19.1{36} yābhiḥ patnīrvimadāya nyūhathurā gha vā yābhiraruṇīraśikṣatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ patnīḥ vimadāya nyūhathuḥ urāḥ gha vā yābhiḥ aruṇīḥ aśikṣatam

original: RV_01.112.19.2{36} yābhiḥ sudāsa ūhathuḥ sudevyaṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ sudāse ūhathuḥ sudevyam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.20.1{36} yābhiḥ śantātī bhavatho dadāśuṣe bhujyuṃ yābhiravatho yābhiradhrigum
analyzed: yābhiḥ śantātī bhavathaḥ dadāśuṣe bhujyum yābhiḥ avathaḥ yābhiḥ adhrigum

original: RV_01.112.20.2{36} omyāvatīṃ subharām ṛtastubhaṃ tābhir...
analyzed: omyāvatīm subharām ṛta stubham tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.21.1{37} yābhiḥ kṛśānumasane duvasyatho jave yābhiryūno arvantamāvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyathaḥ jave yābhiḥ yūnaḥ arvantam āvatam

original: RV_01.112.21.2{37} madhu priyaṃ bharatho yat saraḍbhyastābhir...
analyzed: madhu priyam bharathaḥ yat saraḍbhyaḥ tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.22.1{37} yābhirnaraṃ goṣuyudhaṃ nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ naram goṣuyudham nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_01.112.22.2{37} yābhī rathānavatho yābhirarvatastābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ rathān avathaḥ yābhiḥ arvataḥ tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.23.1{37} yābhiḥ kutsamārjuneyaṃ śatakratū pra turvītiṃ pra ca dabhītimāvatam
analyzed: yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyam śata kratū pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam

original: RV_01.112.23.2{37} yābhirdhvasantiṃ puruṣantimāvataṃ tābhir...
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhvasantim puruṣantim āvatam tābhiḥ

original: RV_01.112.24.1{37} apnasvatīmaśvinā vācamasme kṛtaṃ no dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām
analyzed: apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtam naḥ dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām

original: RV_01.112.24.2{37} adyūtye 'vase ni hvaye vāṃ vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau
analyzed: a dyūtye avase ni hvaye vām vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau

original: RV_01.112.25.1{37} dyubhiraktubhiḥ pari pātamasmānariṣṭebhiraśvinā saubhagebhiḥ
analyzed: dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhiḥ aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.113.01.1{01} idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotirāgāccitraḥ praketo ajaniṣṭa vibhvā
analyzed: idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ āgāt citraḥ praketaḥ ajaniṣṭa vibhvā

original: RV_01.113.01.2{01} yathā prasūtā savituḥ savayamevā rātryuṣase yonimāraik
analyzed: yathā prasūtā savituḥ savayam evā rātrī uṣase yonim āraik

original: RV_01.113.02.1{01} ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyāgādāraigu kṛṣṇā sadanānyasyāḥ
analyzed: ruśat vatsā ruśatī śvetyā agāt āraigu kṛṣṇā sadanāni asyāḥ

original: RV_01.113.02.2{01} samānabandhū amṛte anucī dyāvā varṇaṃ carata āmināne
analyzed: samāna bandhū amṛte anucī dyāvā varṇam carataḥ āmināne

original: RV_01.113.03.1{01} samāno adhvā svasroranantastamanyānyā carato devaśiṣṭe
analyzed: samānaḥ adhvā svasroḥ anantaḥ tam anyā anyā carataḥ deva śiṣṭe

original: RV_01.113.03.2{01} na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe
analyzed: na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe

original: RV_01.113.04.1{01} bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānāmaceti citrā vi duro na āvaḥ
analyzed: bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām aceti citrā vi duraḥ naḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_01.113.04.2{01} prārpyā jagad vyu no rāyo akhyaduṣā ajīgarbhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: prārpya jagat vi u naḥ rāyaḥ akhyaduṣāḥ ajīgarbhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.113.05.1{01} jihmaśye caritave maghonyābhogaya iṣṭaye rāya u tvam
analyzed: jihmaśye caritave maghonyā ābhogaye iṣṭaye rāye u tvam

original: RV_01.113.05.2{01} dabhraṃ paśyadbhya urviyā vicakṣa uṣā
analyzed: dabhram paśyadbhyaḥ urviyā vicakṣe uṣāḥ

original: RV_01.113.06.1{02} kṣatrāya tvaṃ śravase tvaṃ mahīyā iṣṭaye tvamarthamivatvamityai
analyzed: kṣatrāya tvam śravase tvam mahīyai iṣṭaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai

original: RV_01.113.06.2{02} visadṛśā jīvitābhipracakṣa uṣā ...
analyzed: visadṛśā jīvitā abhipracakṣe uṣāḥ

original: RV_01.113.07.1{02} eṣā divo duhitā pratyadarśi vyuchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ
analyzed: eṣā divaḥ duhitā pratyadarśi vyuchantī yuvatiḥ śukra vāsāḥ

original: RV_01.113.07.2{02} viśvasyeśānā pārthivasya vasva uṣo adyeha subhagevyucha
analyzed: viśvasya īśānā pārthivasya vasvaḥ uṣaḥ adyā iha subhagā iva ucha

original: RV_01.113.08.1{02} parāyatīnāmanveti pātha āyatīnāṃ prathamā śaśvatīnām
analyzed: parāyatīnām anveti pāthaḥ āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām

original: RV_01.113.08.2{02} vyuchantī jīvamudīrayantyuṣā mṛtaṃ kaṃ cana bodhayantī
analyzed: vyuchantī jīvam udīrayantī uṣāḥ mṛtam kam cana bodhayantī

original: RV_01.113.09.1{02} uṣo yadagniṃ samidhe cakartha vi yadāvaścakṣasā sūryasya
analyzed: uṣaḥ yat agnim samidhe cakartha vi yat āvaḥ cakṣasā sūryasya

original: RV_01.113.09.2{02} yan mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇānajīgastad deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadramapnaḥ
analyzed: yat mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇān ajīgaḥ tat deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ

original: RV_01.113.10.1{02} kiyātyā yat samayā bhavāti yā vyūṣuryāśca nūnaṃvyuchān
analyzed: kiyātyā yat samayā bhavāti yāḥ vyūṣuḥ yāḥ ca nūnaṃvyuchān

original: RV_01.113.10.2{02} anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣamanyābhireti
analyzed: anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhiḥ eti

original: RV_01.113.11.1{03} īyuṣ ṭe ye pūrvatarāmapaśyan vyuchantīmuṣasaṃ martyāsaḥ
analyzed: īyuḥ ṭe ye pūrvatarām apaśyan vyuchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.113.11.2{03} asmābhirū nu praticakṣyābhūdo te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān
analyzed: asmābhiḥ u nu praticakṣya abhūta u te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān

original: RV_01.113.12.1{03} yāvayaddveṣā ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtā īrayantī
analyzed: yāvayat dveṣāḥ ṛta pāḥ ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī

original: RV_01.113.12.2{03} sumaṅgalīrbibhratī devavītimihādyoṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamāvyucha
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ bibhratī deva vītim iha adya uṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamā vyucha

original: RV_01.113.13.1{03} śaśvat puroṣā vyuvāsa devyatho adyedaṃ vyāvo maghonī
analyzed: śaśvat purā uṣāḥ vyuvāsa devī atho adyā idam vyāvaḥ maghonī

original: RV_01.113.13.2{03} atho vyuchāduttarānanu dyūnajarāmṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ
analyzed: atha u vyuchāt uttarān anu dyūn ajarā amṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_01.113.14.1{03} vyañjibhirdiva ātāsvadyaudapa kṛṣṇāṃ nirṇijaṃ devyāvaḥ
analyzed: vyañjibhiḥ divaḥ kṛṣṇām nirṇijam devyāvaḥ

original: RV_01.113.14.2{03} prabodhayantyaruṇebhiraśvairoṣā yāti suyujā rathena
analyzed: prabodhayanti aruṇebhiḥ aśvaiḥ oṣā yāti su yujā rathena

original: RV_01.113.15.1{03} āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citraṃ ketuṃ kṛṇute cekitānā
analyzed: āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citram ketum kṛṇute cekitānā

original: RV_01.113.15.2{03} īyuṣīṇāmupamā śaśvatīnāṃ vibhātīnāṃ prathamoṣā vyaśvait
analyzed: īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām vibhātīnām prathamā uṣāḥ vyaśvait

original: RV_01.113.16.1{04} udīrdhvaṃ jīvo asurna āgādapa prāgāt tama ā jyotireti
analyzed: udīrdhvam jīvaḥ asuḥ naḥ āgāt apa prāgāt tamaḥ ā jyotiḥ eti

original: RV_01.113.16.2{04} āraik panthāṃ yātave sūryāyāganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ
analyzed: āraik panthām yātave sūryāya aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_01.113.17.1{04} syūmanā vāca udiyarti vahni stavāno rebha uṣaso vibhātīḥ
analyzed: syūmanā vācaḥ udiyarti vahniḥ stavānaḥ rebhaḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_01.113.17.2{04} adyā taducha gṛṇate maghonyasme āyurni didīhi prajāvat
analyzed: adyā taducha gṛṇate maghoni asme āyuḥ ni didīhi prajāvat

original: RV_01.113.18.1{04} yā gomatīruṣasaḥ sarvavīrā vyuchanti dāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: yāḥ gomatīḥ uṣasaḥ sarva vīrāḥ vyuchanti dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_01.113.18.2{04} vāyoriva sūnṛtānāmudarke tā aśvadā aśnavat somasutvā
analyzed: vāyoḥ iva sūnṛtānām udarke tāḥ aśva dāḥ aśnavat soma sutvā

original: RV_01.113.19.1{04} mātā devānāmaditeranīkaṃ yajñasya keturbṛhatī vi bhāhi
analyzed: mātā devānām aditeḥ anīkam yajñasya ketuḥ bṛhatī vi bhāhi

original: RV_01.113.19.2{04} praśastikṛd brahmaṇe no vyuchā no jane janaya viśvavāre
analyzed: praśasti kṛt brahmaṇe naḥ vyucha naḥ jane janaya viśva vāre

original: RV_01.113.20.1{04} yaccitramapna uṣaso vahantījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram
analyzed: yat citram apnaḥ uṣasaḥ vahanti ījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.114.01.1{05} imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ
analyzed: imāḥ rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ

original: RV_01.114.01.2{05} yathā śamasad dvipade catuṣpade viśvaṃ puṣṭaṃgrāme asminnanāturam
analyzed: yathā śama sad dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭam grāme asmin anāturam

original: RV_01.114.02.1{05} mṛḷā no rudrota no mayas kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhemate
analyzed: mṛḷa naḥ rudra uta naḥ mayaḥ kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhemate

original: RV_01.114.02.2{05} yacchaṃ ca yośca manurāyeje pitā tadaśyāma tavarudra praṇītiṣu
analyzed: yat śam ca yoḥ ca manuḥ āyeje pitā tat aśyāma tava rudra praṇītiṣu

original: RV_01.114.03.1{05} aśyāma te sumatiṃ devayajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ
analyzed: aśyāma te sumatim deva yajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_01.114.03.2{05} sumnāyannid viśo asmākamā carāriṣṭavīrā juhavāma te haviḥ
analyzed: sumnāyan id viśaḥ asmākam ā cara ariṣṭa vīrāḥ juhavāma te haviḥ

original: RV_01.114.04.1{05} tveṣaṃ vayaṃ rudraṃ yajñasādhaṃ vaṅkuṃ kavimavase nihvayāmahe
analyzed: tveṣam vayam rudram yajñasādham vaṅkum kavim avase nihvayāmahe

original: RV_01.114.04.2{05} āre asmad daivyaṃ heḷo asyatu sumatimid vayamasyā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: āre asmat daivyam heḍaḥ asyatu sumatim id vayam asya ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_01.114.05.1{05} divo varāhamaruṣaṃ kapardinaṃ tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ namasā nihvayāmahe
analyzed: divaḥ varāham aruṣam kapardinam tveṣam rūpam namasā nihvayāmahe

original: RV_01.114.05.2{05} haste bibhrad bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma chardirasmabhyaṃ yaṃsat
analyzed: haste bibhrat bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma chardiḥ asmabhyam yaṃsat

original: RV_01.114.06.1{06} idaṃ pitre marutāmucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyo rudrāya vardhanam
analyzed: idam pitre marutām ucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyaḥ rudrāya vardhanam

original: RV_01.114.06.2{06} rāsvā ca no amṛta martabhojanaṃ tmane tokā
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ amṛta marta bhojanam tmane tokā

original: RV_01.114.07.1{06} mā no mahāntamuta mā no arbhakaṃ mā na ukṣantamuta māna ukṣitam
analyzed: mā naḥ mahāntam uta mā naḥ arbhakam mā naḥ ukṣantam uta mā anaḥ ukṣitam

original: RV_01.114.07.2{06} mā no vadhīḥ pitaraṃ mota mātaraṃ mā naḥ priyāstanvo rudra rīriṣaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ pitaram mā uta mātaram mā naḥ priyāḥ tanvaḥ rudra rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_01.114.08.1{06} mā nastoke tanaye mā na āyau mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣurīriṣaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ toke tanaye mā naḥ āyau mā naḥ goṣu mā naḥ aśveṣuḥ īriṣaḥ

original: RV_01.114.08.2{06} vīrān mā no rudra bhāmito vadhīrhaviṣmantaḥsadamit tvā havāmahe
analyzed: vīrān mā naḥ rudra bhāmitaḥ vadhīḥ haviṣmantaḥsadam id tvā havāmahe

original: RV_01.114.09.1{06} upa te stomān paśupā ivākaraṃ rāsvā pitarmarutāṃ sumnamasme
analyzed: upa te stomān paśu pāḥ iva akaram rāsvā pitar marutām sumnam asme

original: RV_01.114.09.2{06} bhadrā hi te sumatirmṛḷayattamāthā vayamava itte vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: bhadrā hi te sumatiḥ mṛḍayattama athā vayam avaḥ id te vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_01.114.10.1{06} āre te goghnamuta pūruṣaghnaṃ kṣayadvīra sumnamasme teastu
analyzed: āre te go ghnam uta pūruṣa ghnam kṣayadvīra sumnam asme te astu

original: RV_01.114.10.2{06} mṛḷā ca no adhi ca brūhi devādhā ca naḥ śarma yachadvibarhāḥ
analyzed: mṛḷa ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva adhā ca naḥ śarma yacchat vibarhāḥ

original: RV_01.114.11.1{06} avocāma namo asmā avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu no havaṃ rudro marutvān
analyzed: avocāma namaḥ asmai avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu naḥ havam rudraḥ marutvān
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.115.01.1{07} citraṃ devānāmudagādanīkaṃ cakṣurmitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ
analyzed: citram devānām udagāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ

original: RV_01.115.01.2{07} āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca
analyzed: āprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca

original: RV_01.115.02.1{07} sūryo devīmuṣasaṃ rocamānāṃ maryo na yoṣāmabhyeti paścāt
analyzed: sūryaḥ devīm uṣasam rocamānām maryaḥ na yoṣām abhyeti paścāt

original: RV_01.115.02.2{07} yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ devayantaḥ yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram

original: RV_01.115.03.1{07} bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ
analyzed: bhadrāḥ aśvāḥ haritaḥ sūryasya citrāḥ etagvāḥ anumādyāsaḥ

original: RV_01.115.03.2{07} namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭhamasthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ
analyzed: namasyantaḥ divaḥ ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyas

original: RV_01.115.04.1{07} tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvaṃ madhyā kartorvitataṃ saṃ jabhāra
analyzed: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahi tvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra

original: RV_01.115.04.2{07} yadedayukta haritaḥ sadhasthādād rātrī vāsastanute simasmai
analyzed: yadā id ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthā adāt rātrī vāsaḥ tanute simasmai

original: RV_01.115.05.1{07} tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyorupasthe
analyzed: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe

original: RV_01.115.05.2{07} anantamanyad ruśadasya pājaḥ kṛṣṇamanyad dharitaḥ saṃ bharanti
analyzed: anantam anyat ruśadasya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyat haritaḥ sam bharanti

original: RV_01.115.06.1{07} adyā devā uditā sūryasya niraṃhasaḥ pipṛtā naravadyāt
analyzed: adyā devāḥ uditā sūryasya niraṃhasaḥ pipṛta nara vadyāt
tat naḥ

original: RV_01.116.01.1{08} nāsatyābhyāṃ barhiriva pra vṛñje stomāniyarmyabhriyeva vātaḥ
analyzed: nāsatyābhyām barhiḥ iva pra vṛñje stomān iyarmi abhriyā iva vātaḥ

original: RV_01.116.01.2{08} yāvarbhagāya vimadāya jāyāṃ senājuvā nyūhatūrathena
analyzed: yau arbhagāya vimadāya jāyām senā juvā nyūhatūrathena

original: RV_01.116.02.1{08} vīḷupatmabhirāśuhemabhirvā devānāṃ vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā
analyzed: vīḍu patmabhiḥ āśu hemabhiḥ vā devānām vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā

original: RV_01.116.02.2{08} tad rāsabho nāsatyā sahasramājā yamasya pradhane jigāya
analyzed: tat rāsabhaḥ nāsatyā sahasram ājā yamasya pradhane jigāya

original: RV_01.116.03.1{08} tugro ha bhujyumaśvinodameghe rayiṃ na kaścin mamṛvānavāhāḥ
analyzed: tugraḥ ha bhujyum aśvinā uda meghe rayim na kaścid mamṛvāna vāhāḥ

original: RV_01.116.03.2{08} tamūhathurnaubhirātmanvatībhirantarikṣaprudbhirapodakābhiḥ
analyzed: tam ūhathuḥ naubhiḥ ātmanvatībhiḥ antarikṣa prudbhiḥ apodakābhiḥ

original: RV_01.116.04.1{08} tisraḥ kṣapastrirahātivrajadbhirnāsatyā bhujyumūhathuḥ pataṃgaiḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ kṣapaḥ tris ahā ativrajadbhiḥ nāsatyāḥ bhujyum ūhathuḥ pataṃgaiḥ

original: RV_01.116.04.2{08} samudrasya dhanvannārdrasya pāre tribhī rathaiḥ śatapadbhiḥ ṣaḷaśvaiḥ
analyzed: samudrasya dhanvan ārdrasya pāre tribhiḥ rathaiḥ śata padbhiḥ ṣaṣ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_01.116.05.1{08} anārambhaṇe tadavīrayethāmanāsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre
analyzed: an ārambhaṇe tat avīrayethām an āsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre

original: RV_01.116.05.2{08} yadaśvinā ūhathurbhujyumastaṃ śatāritrāṃ nāvamātasthivāṃsam
analyzed: yat aśvinau ūhathuḥ bhujyum astam śata aritrām nāvam ātasthivāṃsam

original: RV_01.116.06.1{09} yamaśvinā dadathuḥ śvetamaśvamaghāśvāya śaśvaditsvasti
analyzed: yam aśvinā dadathuḥ śvetam aśvam agha aśvāya śaśvat id svasti

original: RV_01.116.06.2{09} tad vāṃ dātraṃ mahi kīrtenyaṃ bhūt paidvo vājīsadamid dhavyo aryaḥ
analyzed: tat vām dātram mahi kīrtenyam bhūt paidvaḥ vājīsadam id havyaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_01.116.07.1{09} yuvaṃ narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradataṃ purandhim
analyzed: yuvam narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradatam purandhim

original: RV_01.116.07.2{09} kārotarācchaphādaśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śataṃ kumbhānasiñcataṃ surāyāḥ
analyzed: kārotarāt śaphāt aśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śatam kumbhān asiñcatam surāyāḥ

original: RV_01.116.08.1{09} himenāgniṃ ghraṃsamavārayethāṃ pitumatīmūrjamasmā adhattam
analyzed: himena agnim ghraṃsam avārayethām pitumatīm ūrjam asmai adhattam

original: RV_01.116.08.2{09} ṛbīse atrimaśvināvanītamun ninyathuḥ sarvagaṇaṃ svasti
analyzed: ṛbīse atrim aśvinau avanītam ud ninyathuḥ sarva gaṇam svasti

original: RV_01.116.09.1{09} parāvataṃ nāsatyānudethāmuccābudhnaṃ cakrathurjihmabāram
analyzed: parāvatam nāsatyā anudethām uccābudhnam cakrathuḥ jihma bāram

original: RV_01.116.09.2{09} kṣarannāpo na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya
analyzed: kṣaran apaḥ na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya

original: RV_01.116.10.1{09} jujuruṣo nāsatyota vavriṃ prāmuñcataṃ drāpimiva cyavānāt
analyzed: jujuruṣaḥ nāsatya uta vavrim prāmuñcatam drāpim iva cyavānāt

original: RV_01.116.10.2{09} prātirataṃ jahitasyāyurdasrādit patimakṛṇutaṃ kanīnām
analyzed: prātiratam jahitasya āyuḥ dasrā āt id patim akṛṇutam kanīnām

original: RV_01.116.11.1{10} tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ rādhyaṃ cābhiṣṭiman nāsatyā varūtham
analyzed: tat vām narā śaṃsyam rādhyam ca abhiṣṭiman nāsatyāḥ varūtham

original: RV_01.116.11.2{10} yad vidvāṃsā nidhimivāpagūḷhamud darśatādūpathurvandanāya
analyzed: yat vidvāṃsā nidhim iva apagūḍham ud darśatā adūpathuḥ vandanāya

original: RV_01.116.12.1{10} tad vāṃ narā sanaye daṃsa ugramāviṣ kṛṇomi tanyaturnavṛṣṭim
analyzed: tat vām narā sanaye daṃsaḥ ugram āvis kṛṇomi

original: RV_01.116.12.2{10} dadhyaṃ ha yan madhvātharvaṇo vāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yadīmuvāca
analyzed: dadhyam ha yat madhvā atharvaṇaḥ vāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā pra

original: RV_01.116.13.1{10} ajohavīn nāsatyā karā vāṃ mahe yāman purubhujā purandhiḥ
analyzed: ajohavīt nāsatyā karā vām mahe yāman puru bhujā purandhiḥ

original: RV_01.116.13.2{10} śrutaṃ tacchāsuriva vadhrimatyā hiraṇyahastamaśvināvadattam
analyzed: śrutam tat śāsuḥ iva vadhrimatyā hiraṇyahastam aśvinau adattam

original: RV_01.116.14.1{10} āsno vṛkasya vartikāmabhīke yuvaṃ narā nāsatyāmumuktam
analyzed: āsnaḥ vṛkasya vartikām abhīke yuvam narā nāsatya amumuktam

original: RV_01.116.14.2{10} uto kaviṃ purubhujā yuvaṃ ha kṛpamāṇamakṛṇutaṃ vicakṣe
analyzed: uta u kavim puru bhujā yuvam ha kṛpamāṇam akṛṇutam vicakṣe

original: RV_01.116.15.1{10} caritraṃ hi verivāchedi parṇamājā khelasya paritakmyāyām
analyzed: caritram hi khelasya paritakmyāyām

original: RV_01.116.15.2{10} sadyo jaṅghāmāyasīṃ viśpalāyai dhane hite sartavepratyadhattam
analyzed: sadyas jaṅghām āyasīm viśpalāyai dhane hite sartave pratyadhattam

original: RV_01.116.16.1{11} śataṃ meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvaṃ taṃ pitāndhaṃcakāra
analyzed: śatam meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvam tam pitā andhaṃcakāra

original: RV_01.116.16.2{11} tasmā akṣī nāsatyā vicakṣa ādhattaṃ dasrā bhiṣajāvanarvan
analyzed: tasmai akṣī nāsatyāḥ vicakṣe ādhattam dasrā bhiṣajau anarvan

original: RV_01.116.17.1{11} ā vāṃ rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya kārṣmevātiṣṭhadarvatājayantī
analyzed: ā vām ratham duhitā sūryasya kārṣma iva atiṣṭhat arvatā ajayantī

original: RV_01.116.17.2{11} viśve devā anvamanyata hṛdbhiḥ samu śriyā nāsatyā sacethe
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anvamanyata hṛdbhiḥ samu śriyā nāsatyā sacethe

original: RV_01.116.18.1{11} yadayātaṃ divodāsāya vartirbharadvājāyāśvinā hayantā
analyzed: yat ayātam divodāsāya vartiḥ bharadvājāya aśvinā

original: RV_01.116.18.2{11} revaduvāha sacano ratho vāṃ vṛṣabhaśca śiṃśumāraśca yuktā
analyzed: revat uvāha sacanaḥ rathaḥ vām vṛṣabhaḥ ca śiṃśumāraḥ ca yuktā

original: RV_01.116.19.1{11} rayiṃ sukṣatraṃ svapatyamāyuḥ suvīryaṃ nāsatyā vahantā
analyzed: rayim su kṣatram su apatyam āyuḥ su vīryam nāsatyā vahantā

original: RV_01.116.19.2{11} ā jahnāvīṃ samanasopa vājaistrirahno bhāgaṃ dadhatīmayātam
analyzed: ā jahnāvīm samanasā upa vājaiḥ tris ahnaḥ bhāgam dadhatīm ayātam

original: RV_01.116.20.1{11} pariviṣṭaṃ jāhuṣaṃ viśvataḥ sīṃ sugebhirnaktamūhathū rajobhiḥ
analyzed: pariviṣṭam jāhuṣam viśvatas sīm sugebhiḥ naktam ūhathuḥ rajobhiḥ

original: RV_01.116.20.2{11} vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatānajarayū ayātam
analyzed: vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatān ajarayū ayātam

original: RV_01.116.21.1{12} ekasyā vastorāvataṃ raṇāya vaśamaśvinā sanaye sahasrā
analyzed: ekasyāḥ vastoḥ āvatam raṇāya vaśam aśvinā sanaye sahasrā

original: RV_01.116.21.2{12} nirahataṃ duchunā indravantā pṛthuśravaso vṛṣaṇāvarātīḥ
analyzed: nirahatam duchunāḥ indravantā pṛthuśravasaḥ vṛṣaṇau arātīḥ

original: RV_01.116.22.1{12} śarasya cidārcatkasyāvatādā nīcāduccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ
analyzed: śarasya cit ārcatkasya avatādā nīcāt uccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ

original: RV_01.116.22.2{12} śayave cin nāsatyā śacībhirjasuraye staryaṃ pipyathurgām
analyzed: śayave cit nāsatyā śacībhiḥ jasuraye staryam pipyathuḥ gām

original: RV_01.116.23.1{12} avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ
analyzed: avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_01.116.23.2{12} paśuṃ na naṣṭamiva darśanāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathurviśvakāya
analyzed: paśum na naṣṭam iva darśanāya viṣṇāpvam dadathuḥ viśvakāya

original: RV_01.116.24.1{12} daśa rātrīraśivenā nava dyūnavanaddhaṃ śnathitamapsvantaḥ
analyzed: daśa rātrīḥ aśivena nava dyūn avanaddham śnathitam apsu antar

original: RV_01.116.24.2{12} viprutaṃ rebhamudani pravṛktamun ninyathuḥ somamiva sruveṇa
analyzed: viprutam rebham udani pravṛktam ud ninyathuḥ somam iva sruveṇa

original: RV_01.116.25.1{12} pra vāṃ daṃsāṃsyaśvināvavocamasya patiḥ syāṃ sugavaḥ suvīraḥ
analyzed: pra vām daṃsāṃsi aśvinau avocam asya patiḥ syām sugavaḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_01.116.25.2{12} uta paśyannaśnuvan dīrghamāyurastamivejjarimāṇaṃ jagamyām
analyzed: uta paśyan aśnuvan dīrgham āyuḥ astam iva id jarimāṇam jagamyām

original: RV_01.117.01.1{13} madhvaḥ somasyāśvinā madāya pratno hotā vivāsate vām
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya aśvinā madāya pratnaḥ hotā vivāsate vām

original: RV_01.117.01.2{13} barhiṣmatī rātirviśritā gīriṣā yātaṃ nāsatyopa vājaiḥ
analyzed: barhiṣmatī rātiḥ viśritā gīriṣā yātam nāsatyā upa vājaiḥ

original: RV_01.117.02.1{13} yo vāmaśvinā manaso javīyān rathaḥ svaśvo viśa ājigāti
analyzed: yaḥ vām aśvinā manasaḥ javīyān rathaḥ su aśvaḥ viśaḥ ājigāti

original: RV_01.117.02.2{13} yena gachathaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tena narā vartirasmabhyaṃ yātam
analyzed: yena gacchathaḥ su kṛtaḥ duroṇam tena narā vartiḥ asmabhyam yātam

original: RV_01.117.03.1{13} ṛṣiṃ narāvaṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsādatriṃ muñcatho gaṇena
analyzed: ṛṣim narau aṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsādatrim muñcathaḥ gaṇena

original: RV_01.117.03.2{13} minantā dasyoraśivasya māyā anupūrvaṃ vṛṣaṇā codayantā
analyzed: minantā dasyoḥ aśivasya māyāḥ anupūrvam vṛṣaṇā codayantā

original: RV_01.117.04.1{13} aśvaṃ na gūḷhamaśvinā durevairṛṣiṃ narā vṛṣaṇā rebhamapsu
analyzed: aśvam na gūḍham aśvinā durevaiḥ ṛṣim narā vṛṣaṇā rebham apsu

original: RV_01.117.04.2{13} saṃ taṃ riṇītho viprutaṃ daṃsobhirna vāṃ jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni
analyzed: sam tam riṇīthaḥ viprutam daṃsobhiḥ na vām jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni

original: RV_01.117.05.1{13} suṣupvāṃsaṃ na nirṛterupasthe sūryaṃ na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam
analyzed: suṣupvāṃsam na nirṛteḥ upasthe sūryam na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam

original: RV_01.117.05.2{13} śubhe rukmaṃ na darśataṃ nikhātamudūpathuraśvinā vandanāya
analyzed: śubhe rukmam na darśatam nikhātam udūpathuḥ aśvinā vandanāya

original: RV_01.117.06.1{14} tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman
analyzed: tat vām narā śaṃsyam pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman

original: RV_01.117.06.2{14} śaphādaśvasya vājino janāya śataṃ kumbhānasiñcataṃ madhūnām
analyzed: śaphāt aśvasya vājinaḥ janāya śatam kumbhān asiñcatam madhūnām

original: RV_01.117.07.1{14} yuvaṃ narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathurviśvakāya
analyzed: yuvam narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvam dadathuḥ viśvakāya

original: RV_01.117.07.2{14} ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade durone patiṃ jūryantyā aśvināvadattam
analyzed: ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade durone patim jūryantyai aśvinau adattam

original: RV_01.117.08.1{14} yuvaṃ śyāvāya ruśatīmadattaṃ mahaḥ kṣoṇasyāśvinā kaṇvāya
analyzed: yuvam śyāvāya ruśatīm adattam mahaḥ kṣoṇasya aśvinā kaṇvāya

original: RV_01.117.08.2{14} pravācyaṃ tad vṛṣaṇā kṛtaṃ vāṃ yan nārṣadāyaśravo adhyadhattam
analyzed: pravācyam tat vṛṣaṇā kṛtam vām yat nārṣada āyaśravaḥ adhyadhattam

original: RV_01.117.09.1{14} purū varpāṃsyaśvinā dadhānā ni pedava ūhathurāśumaśvam
analyzed: purū varpāṃsi aśvinā dadhānā ni pedavaḥ ūhathuḥ āśum aśvam

original: RV_01.117.09.2{14} sahasrasāṃ vājinamapratītamahihanaṃ śravasyaṃ tarutram
analyzed: sahasra sām vājinam apratītam ahi hanam śravasyam tarutram

original: RV_01.117.10.1{14} etāni vāṃ śravasyā sudānū brahmāṅgūṣaṃ sadanaṃ rodasyoḥ
analyzed: etāni vām śravasyā sudānū brahma āṅgūṣam sadanam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_01.117.10.2{14} yad vāṃ pajrāso aśvinā havante yātamiṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam
analyzed: yat vām pajrāsaḥ aśvinā havante yātamiṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam

original: RV_01.117.11.1{15} sūnormānenāśvinā gṛṇānā vājaṃ viprāya bhuraṇā radantā
analyzed: sūnoḥ mānena aśvinā gṛṇānā vājam viprāya bhuraṇā radantā

original: RV_01.117.11.2{15} agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā saṃ viśpalāṃ nāsatyāriṇītam
analyzed: agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā sam viśpalām nāsatyā ariṇītam

original: RV_01.117.12.1{15} kuha yāntā suṣṭutiṃ kāvyasya divo napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā
analyzed: kuha yāntā suṣṭutim kāvyasya divaḥ napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā

original: RV_01.117.12.2{15} hiraṇyasyeva kalaśaṃ nikhātamudūpathurdaśame aśvināhan
analyzed: hiraṇyasya iva kalaśam nikhātam udūpathuḥ daśame aśvinā ahan

original: RV_01.117.13.1{15} yuvaṃ cyavānamaśvinā jarantaṃ punaryuvānaṃ cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam aśvinā jarantam punaryuvānam cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_01.117.13.2{15} yuvo rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyāvṛṇīta
analyzed: yuvoḥ ratham duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyā avṛṇīta

original: RV_01.117.14.1{15} yuvaṃ tugrāya pūrvyebhirevaiḥ punarmanyāvabhavataṃ yuvānā
analyzed: yuvam tugrāya pūrvyebhiḥ evaiḥ punarmanyau abhavatam yuvānā

original: RV_01.117.14.2{15} yuvaṃ bhujyumarṇaso niḥ samudrād vibhirūhathurṛjrebhiraśvaiḥ
analyzed: yuvam bhujyumarṇasaḥ niḥ samudrāt vibhiḥ ūhathuḥ ṛjrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_01.117.15.1{15} ajohavīdaśvinā taugryo vāṃ proḷhaḥ samudramavyathirjaganvān
analyzed: ajohavīt aśvinā taugryaḥ vām proḍhaḥ samudram avyathiḥ jaganvān

original: RV_01.117.15.2{15} niṣ ṭamūhathuḥ suyujā rathena manojavasā vṛṣaṇāsvasti
analyzed: niḥ tamūhathuḥ su yujā rathena manaḥ javasā vṛṣaṇāsu asti

original: RV_01.117.16.1{16} ajohavīdaśvinā vartikā vāmāsno yat sīmamuñcataṃ vṛkasya
analyzed: ajohavīt aśvinā vartikāḥ vāma asnaḥ yat sīmam uñcatam vṛkasya

original: RV_01.117.16.2{16} vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānvadrerjātaṃ viṣvāco ahataṃ viṣeṇa
analyzed: vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānū adreḥ jātam viṣvācaḥ ahatam viṣeṇa

original: RV_01.117.17.1{16} śataṃ meṣān vṛkye māmahānaṃ tamaḥ praṇītamaśivena pitrā
analyzed: śatam meṣān vṛkye māmahānam tamaḥ praṇītam aśivena pitrā

original: RV_01.117.17.2{16} ākṣī ṛjrāśve aśvināvadhattaṃ jyotirandhāya cakrathurvicakṣe
analyzed: ā akṣī ṛjrāśve aśvinau adhattam jyotiḥ andhāya cakrathuḥ vicakṣe

original: RV_01.117.18.1{16} śunamandhāya bharamahvayat sā vṛkīraśvinā vṛṣaṇā nareti
analyzed: śunam andhāya bharam ahvayat sā vṛkīḥ aśvinā vṛṣaṇā narā iti

original: RV_01.117.18.2{16} jāraḥ kanīna iva cakṣadāna ṛjrāśvaḥ śatamekaṃca meṣān
analyzed: jāraḥ kanīnaḥ iva cakṣadānaḥ ṛjrāśvaḥ śatam ekam ca meṣān

original: RV_01.117.19.1{16} mahī vāmūtiraśvinā mayobhūruta srāmaṃ dhiṣṇyā saṃriṇīthaḥ
analyzed: mahī vāmūtiḥ aśvinā mayobhūḥ uta srāmam dhiṣṇyā saṃriṇīthaḥ

original: RV_01.117.19.2{16} athā yuvāmidahvayat purandhirāgachataṃ sīṃ vṛṣaṇāvavobhiḥ
analyzed: athā yuvām idahvayat purandhiḥ āgacchatam sīm vṛṣaṇau avobhiḥ

original: RV_01.117.20.1{16} adhenuṃ dasrā staryaṃ viṣakṭāmapinvataṃ śayave aśvināgām

original: RV_01.117.20.2{16} yuvaṃ śacībhirvimadāya jāyāṃ nyūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām

original: RV_01.117.21.1{17} yavaṃ vṛkeṇāśvinā vapanteṣaṃ duhantā manuṣāya dasrā

original: RV_01.117.21.2{17} abhi dasyuṃ bakureṇā dhamantoru jyotiścakrathurāryāya
analyzed: abhi dasyum bakureṇa dhamantā uru jyotiḥ cakrathuḥ āryāya

original: RV_01.117.22.1{17} ātharvaṇāyāśvinā dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ pratyairayatam

original: RV_01.117.22.2{17} sa vāṃ madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāvapikakṣyaṃ vām

original: RV_01.117.23.1{17} sadā kavī sumatimā cake vāṃ viśvā dhiyo aśvinā prāvataṃ me

original: RV_01.117.24.1{17} hiraṇyahastamaśvinā rarāṇā putraṃ narā vadhrimatyā adattam
analyzed: hiraṇyahastam aśvinā rarāṇā putram narā vadhrimatyai adattam

original: RV_01.117.24.2{17} tridhā ha śyāvamaśvinā vikastamujjīvasa airayataṃsudānū

original: RV_01.117.25.1{17} etāni vāmaśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇyāyavo 'vocan

analyzed: yaḥ martyasya manasaḥ javīyān tri vandhuraḥ vṛṣaṇā vāta raṃhāḥ

original: RV_01.118.05.1{18} ā vāṃ rathaṃ yuvatistiṣṭhadatra juṣṭvī narā duhitāsūryasya

original: RV_01.118.07.1{19} yuvamatraye 'vanītāya taptamūrjamomānamaśvināvadhattam

original: RV_01.118.08.2{19} amuñcataṃ vartikāmaṃhaso niḥ prati jaṅghāṃ viśpalāyā adhattam

original: RV_01.118.11.1{19} ā śyenasya javasā nūtanenāsme yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ

analyzed: kathā vidhātyapracetāḥ

analyzed: nū cit nu marte akrau

analyzed: prārcat dayamānaḥ yuvākuḥ

original: RV_01.120.05.2{22} praiṣayurna vidvān
analyzed: praiṣayuḥ na vidvān

original: RV_01.120.06.1{23} śrutaṃ gāyatraṃ takavānasyāhaṃ cid dhi rirebhāśvinā vām

analyzed: ā akṣī śubhaḥ patī dan

analyzed: yuvam hi āstam mahaḥ ran yuvam vā yat niratataṃsatam

original: RV_01.120.07.2{23} tāno vasū sugopā syātaṃ pātaṃ no vṛkādaghāyoḥ

original: RV_01.120.08.1{23} mā kasmai dhātamabhyamitriṇe no mākutrā no gṛhebhyo dhenavo guḥ
analyzed: mā kasmai dhātam abhyamitriṇe na u mā akutrā naḥ gṛhebhyaḥ dhenavaḥ guḥ

original: RV_01.120.08.2{23} stanābhujo aśiśvīḥ
analyzed: stanābhujaḥ aśiśvīḥ

original: RV_01.120.09.2{23} iṣe ca no mimītaṃ dhenumatyai
analyzed: iṣe ca naḥ mimītam dhenumatyai

original: RV_01.120.10.1{23} aśvinorasanaṃ rathamanaśvaṃ vājināvatoḥ
analyzed: aśvinoḥ asanam ratham an aśvam vājināvatoḥ

original: RV_01.120.10.2{23} tenāhaṃ bhūri cākana
analyzed: tena aham bhūri cākana

original: RV_01.120.11.1{23} ayaṃ samaha mā tanūhyāte janānanu
analyzed: ayam samaha mā janān anu

original: RV_01.120.11.2{23} somapeyaṃ sukho rathaḥ
analyzed: soma peyam sukhaḥ rathaḥ

original: RV_01.120.12.1{23} adha svapnasya nirvide 'bhuñjataśca revataḥ
analyzed: adha svapnasya nirvide abhuñjataḥ ca revataḥ

original: RV_01.120.12.2{23} ubhā tā basri naśyataḥ
analyzed: ubhā tā basri naśyataḥ

original: RV_01.121.01.1{24} kaditthā nṝnḥ pātraṃ devayatāṃ śravad giro aṅgirasāṃ turaṇyan
analyzed: kad itthā nṝn pātram devayatām śravat giraḥ aṅgirasām turaṇyan

original: RV_01.121.01.2{24} pra yadānaḍ viśa ā harmyasyoru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ
analyzed: pra yadā anaṭ viśaḥ ā harmyasya uru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ

original: RV_01.121.02.1{24} stambhīd dha dyāṃ sa dharuṇaṃ pruṣāyad ṛbhurvājāya draviṇaṃ naro goḥ
analyzed: stambhīt ha dyām sa dharuṇam pruṣāyat ṛbhuḥ vājāya draviṇam naraḥ goḥ
