original: RV_01.121.03.1{24} nakṣad dhavamaruṇīḥ pūrvyaṃ rāṭ turo viśāmaṅgirasāmanu dyūn
analyzed: nakṣat dhavam aruṇīḥ pūrvyam rāj turaḥ viśām aṅgirasām anu dyūn

original: RV_01.121.03.2{24} takṣad vajraṃ niyutaṃ tastambhad dyāṃ catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde
analyzed: takṣat vajram niyutam tastambhat dyām catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde

original: RV_01.121.04.1{24} asya made svaryaṃ dā ṛtāyāpīvṛtamusriyāṇāmanīkam
analyzed: asya made svaryam dāḥ ṛtāya apīvṛtam usriyāṇām anīkam

original: RV_01.121.04.2{24} yad dha prasarge trikakuṃ nivartadapa druho mānuṣasya duro vaḥ
analyzed: yat ha prasarge trikakum nivartat apa druhaḥ mānuṣasya duraḥ var

original: RV_01.121.05.1{24} tubhyaṃ payo yat pitarāvanītāṃ rādhaḥ suretasturaṇe bhuraṇyū
analyzed: tubhyam payaḥ yat pitarau anītām rādhaḥ su retaḥ turaṇe bhuraṇyu

original: RV_01.121.05.2{24} śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payausriyāyāḥ
analyzed: śuci yat te rekṇaḥ āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payausriyāyāḥ

original: RV_01.121.06.1{25} adha pra jajñe taraṇirmamattu pra rocyasyā uṣaso na sūraḥ
analyzed: adha pra jajñe taraṇiḥ mamattu pra rocyasyāḥ uṣasaḥ na sūraḥ

original: RV_01.121.06.2{25} induryebhirāṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcañ jaraṇābhi dhāma
analyzed: induḥ yebhiḥ āṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcam jaraṇā abhi dhāma

original: RV_01.121.07.1{25} svidhmā yad vanadhitirapasyāt sūro adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ
analyzed: su idhmā yat sūraḥ adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ

original: RV_01.121.07.2{25} yad dha prabhāsi kṛtvyānanu dyūnanarviśe paśviṣeturāya
analyzed: yat ha prabhāsi dyūnanarviśe paśviṣeturāya

original: RV_01.121.08.1{25} aṣṭā maho diva ādo harī iha dyumnāsāhamabhi yodhānautsam
analyzed: aṣṭā mahaḥ divaḥ ādaḥ harī iha dyumnāsāham abhi yodhāna autsam

original: RV_01.121.08.2{25} hariṃ yat te mandinaṃ dukṣan vṛdhe gorabhasamadribhirvātāpyam
analyzed: harim yat te mandinam dukṣan vṛdhe go rabhasam adribhiḥ vātāpyam

original: RV_01.121.09.1{25} tvamāyasaṃ prati vartayo gordivo aśmānamupanītam ṛbhvā
analyzed: tvam āyasam prati vartayaḥ goḥ divaḥ aśmānam upanītam ṛbhvā

original: RV_01.121.09.2{25} kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvañchuṣṇamanantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ
analyzed: kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvan śuṣṇam anantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ

original: RV_01.121.10.1{25} purā yat sūrastamaso apītestamadrivaḥ phaligaṃ hetimasya
analyzed: purā yat sūrastamasaḥ apīteḥ tam adrivas phaligam hetimasya

original: RV_01.121.10.2{25} śuṣṇasya cit parihitaṃ yadojo divas pari sugrathitaṃ tadādaḥ
analyzed: śuṣṇasya cit parihitam yat ojaḥ divaḥ pari su grathitam tadā adaḥ

original: RV_01.121.11.1{26} anu tvā mahī pājasī acakre dyāvākṣāmā madatāmindra karman
analyzed: anu tvā mahī pājasī a cakre dyāvākṣāmā madatām indra karman

original: RV_01.121.11.2{26} tvaṃ vṛtramāśayānaṃ sirāsu maho vajreṇa siṣvapovarāhum
analyzed: tvam vṛtram āśayānam sirāsu mahaḥ vajreṇa siṣvapaḥ varāhum

original: RV_01.121.12.1{26} tvamindra naryo yānavo nṝn tiṣṭhā vātasya suyujo vahiṣṭhān
analyzed: tvam indra naryaḥ yānavaḥ nṝn tiṣṭhāḥ vātasya su yujaḥ vahiṣṭhān

original: RV_01.121.12.2{26} yaṃ te kāvya uśanā mandinaṃ dād vṛtrahaṇaṃ pāryaṃ tatakṣa vajram
analyzed: yam te kāvyaḥ uśanāḥ mandinam dāt vṛtra haṇam pāryam tatakṣa vajram

original: RV_01.121.13.1{26} tvaṃ sūro harito rāmayo nṝn bharaccakrametaśo nāyamindra
analyzed: tvam sūraḥ haritaḥ rāmayaḥ nṝn bharat cakram etaśaḥ na ayam indra

original: RV_01.121.13.2{26} prāsya pāraṃ navatiṃ nāvyānāmapi kartamavartayo'yajyūn
analyzed: prāsya pāram navatim nāvyānām api kartam avartayaḥ a yajyūn

original: RV_01.121.14.1{26} tvaṃ no asyā indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivo duritādabhīke
analyzed: tvam naḥ asyāḥ indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivas duritāt abhīke

original: RV_01.121.14.2{26} pra no vājān rathyo aśvabudhyāniṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai
analyzed: pra naḥ vājān rathyaḥ aśva budhyā aniṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai

original: RV_01.121.15.1{26} mā sā te asmat sumatirvi dasad vājapramahaḥ samiṣo varanta
analyzed: mā sā te asmat sumatiḥ vi dasat vāja pramahas samiṣaḥ varanta

original: RV_01.121.15.2{26} ā no bhaja maghavan goṣvaryo maṃhiṣṭhāste sadhamādaḥ syāma
analyzed: ā naḥ bhaja maghavan goṣvaryaḥ maṃhiṣṭhāḥ te sadhamādaḥ syāma

original: RV_01.122.01.1{01} pra vaḥ pāntaṃ raghumanyavo 'ndho yajñaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe bharadvam
analyzed: pra vaḥ pāntam raghu manyavaḥ andhaḥ yajñam rudrāya mīḍhuṣe bharadvam

original: RV_01.122.01.2{01} divo astoṣyasurasya vīrairiṣudhye=va maruto rodasyoḥ
analyzed: divaḥ astoṣi asurasya vīraiḥ iṣudhyā iva marutaḥ rodasyoḥ

original: RV_01.122.02.1{01} patnīva pūrvahūtiṃ vāvṛdhadhyā uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne
analyzed: patnī iva pūrva hūtim vāvṛdhadhyai uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne

original: RV_01.122.02.2{01} starīr nātkaṃ vyutaṃ vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ
analyzed: starīḥ nā atkam vyutam vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ

original: RV_01.122.03.1{01} mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vāto apāṃ vṛṣaṇvān
analyzed: mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vātaḥ apām vṛṣaṇvān

original: RV_01.122.03.2{01} śiśītamindrāparvatā yuvaṃ nastan no viśve varivasyantudevāḥ
analyzed: śiśītam indrāparvatā yuvam naḥ tat naḥ viśve varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_01.122.04.1{01} uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā pāntauśijo huvadhyai
analyzed: uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā huvadhyai

original: RV_01.122.04.2{01} pra vo napātamapā%ṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ pra mātarā rāspinasyāyoḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ napātam apām kṛṇudhvam pra mātarā rāspinasya āyoḥ

original: RV_01.122.05.1{01} ā vo ruvaṇyumauśijo huvadhyai ghoṣeva śaṃsamarjunasya naṃśe
analyzed: ā vaḥ ruvaṇyum auśijaḥ huvadhyai ghoṣa iva śaṃsam arjunasya naṃśe

original: RV_01.122.05.2{01} pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvana ānachā voceya vasutātimagneḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvane ānacha ā voceya vasutātim agneḥ

original: RV_01.122.06.1{02} śrutaṃ me mitrāvaruṇā havemota śrutaṃ sadane viśvataḥ sīm
analyzed: śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havā imā uta śrutam sadane viśvatas sīm

original: RV_01.122.06.2{02} śrotu naḥ śroturātiḥ suśrotuḥ sukṣetrā sindhuradbhiḥ
analyzed: śrotu naḥ śrotu rātiḥ su śrotuḥ su kṣetrā sindhuḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_01.122.07.1{02} stuṣe sā vāṃ varuṇa mitra rātirgavāṃ śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre
analyzed: stuṣe sā vām varuṇa mitra rātiḥ gavām śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre

original: RV_01.122.07.2{02} śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃnirundhānāso agman
analyzed: śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyas puṣṭim nirundhānāsaḥ agman

original: RV_01.122.08.1{02} asya stuṣe mahimaghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ suvīrāḥ
analyzed: asya stuṣe mahi maghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ su vīrāḥ

original: RV_01.122.08.2{02} jano yaḥ pajrebhyo vājinīvānaśvāvato rathino mahyaṃ sūriḥ
analyzed: janaḥ yaḥ pajrebhyaḥ vājinīvān aśvāvataḥ rathinaḥ mahyam sūriḥ

original: RV_01.122.09.1{02} jano yo mitrāvaruṇāvabhidhrugapo na vāṃ sunotyakṣṇayādhruk
analyzed: janaḥ yaḥ mitrāvaruṇau abhidhruk apaḥ na vām sunoti akṣṇayādhruk

original: RV_01.122.09.2{02} svayaṃ sa yakṣmaṃ hṛdaye ni dhatta āpa yadīṃ hotrābhirṛtāvā
analyzed: svayam sa yakṣmam hṛdaye ni dhatte āpa yadi īm hotrābhiḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_01.122.10.1{02} sa vrādhato nahuṣo daṃsujūtaḥ śardhastaro narāṃ gūrtaśravāḥ
analyzed: sa vrādhataḥ nahuṣaḥ daṃsu jūtaḥ śardhastaraḥ narām gūrta śravāḥ

original: RV_01.122.10.2{02} visṛṣṭarātiryāti bāḷhasṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadamicchūraḥ
analyzed: visṛṣṭa rātiḥ yāti bāḷha sṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadam id śūraḥ

original: RV_01.122.11.1{03} adha gmantā nahuṣo havaṃ sūreḥ śrotā rājāno amṛtasya mandrāḥ
analyzed: adha gmantā nahuṣaḥ havam sūreḥ śrota rājānaḥ amṛtasya mandrāḥ

original: RV_01.122.11.2{03} nabhojuvo yan niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinārathavate
analyzed: nabhaḥ juvaḥ yat niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinā rathavate

original: RV_01.122.12.1{03} etaṃ śardhaṃ dhāma yasya sūrerityavocan daśatayasya naṃśe
analyzed: etam śardham dhāma yasya sūreḥ iti avocan daśatayasya naṃśe

original: RV_01.122.12.2{03} dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātī rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam
analyzed: dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātiḥ rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam

original: RV_01.122.13.1{03} mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāserdviryat pañca bibhrato yantyannā
analyzed: mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāseḥ dvis yat pañca bibhrataḥ yanti annā

original: RV_01.122.13.2{03} kimiṣṭāśva iṣṭaraśmireta īśānāsastaruṣaṛñjate nṝn
analyzed: kim iṣṭa aśvaḥ iṣṭa raśmi retaḥ īśānāsaḥ taruṣa ṛñjate nṝn

original: RV_01.122.14.1{03} hiraṇyakarṇaṃ maṇigrīvamarṇastan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ
analyzed: hiraṇya karṇam maṇi grīvam arṇaḥ tat naḥ viśve varivasyantu devāḥ

original: RV_01.122.14.2{03} aryo giraḥ sadya ā jagmuṣīrosrāścākantūbhayeṣvasme
analyzed: aryaḥ giraḥ sadyas ā jagmuṣīḥ īrā usrāḥ cākantu ubhayeṣu asme

original: RV_01.122.15.1{03} catvāro mā maśarśārasya śiśvastrayo rājña āyavasasyajiṣṇoḥ
analyzed: catvāraḥ mā maśarśārasya śiśvaḥ trayaḥ rājñaḥ āyavasasya jiṣṇoḥ

original: RV_01.122.15.2{03} ratho vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā dīrghā]psāḥ syūmagabhastiḥ sūro nādyaut
analyzed: rathaḥ vām mitrāvaruṇā dīrgha apsāḥ syūma gabhastiḥ sūraḥ na adyaut

original: RV_01.123.01.1{04} pṛthū ratho dakṣiṇāyā ayojyainaṃ devāso amṛtāso asthuḥ
analyzed: pṛthuḥ rathaḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ ayojya enam devāsaḥ amṛtāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_01.123.01.2{04} kṛṣṇādudasthādaryā vihāyāścikitsantī mānuṣāyakṣayāya
analyzed: kṛṣṇāt udasthāt aryā vihāyāḥ cikitsantī mānuṣāya kṣayāya

original: RV_01.123.02.1{04} pūrvā viśvasmād bhuvanādabodhi jayantī vājaṃ bṛhatī sanutrī
analyzed: pūrvā viśvasmāt bhuvanāt abodhi jayantī vājam bṛhatī sanutrī

original: RV_01.123.02.2{04} uccā vyakhyad yuvatiḥ punarbhūroṣā agan prathamā pūrvahūtau
analyzed: uccā vyakhyat yuvatiḥ punarbhūḥ ā uṣāḥ agan prathamā pūrva hūtau

original: RV_01.123.03.1{04} yadadya bhāgaṃ vibhajāsi nṛbhya uṣo devi martyatrā sujāte
analyzed: yat adya bhāgam vibhajāsi nṛbhyaḥ uṣaḥ devi martyatrā sujāte

original: RV_01.123.03.2{04} devo no atra savitā damūnā anāgaso vocati sūryāya
analyzed: devaḥ naḥ atra savitā damūnāḥ anāgasaḥ vocati sūryāya

original: RV_01.123.04.1{04} gṛhaṃ-gṛhamahanā yātyachā dive-dive adhi nāmā dadhānā
analyzed: gṛhaṃgṛham ahanā yāti achā dive dive adhi nāmā dadhānā

original: RV_01.123.04.2{04} siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvadāgādagram-agramid bhajatevasūnām
analyzed: siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvat āgāt agram agram id bhajatevasūnām

original: RV_01.123.05.1{04} bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmiruṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva
analyzed: bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmi ruṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva

original: RV_01.123.05.2{04} paścā sa daghyā yo aghasya dhātā jayema taṃ dakṣiṇayā rathena
analyzed: paścā sa daghyāḥ yaḥ aghasya dhātā jayema tam dakṣiṇayā rathena

original: RV_01.123.06.1{05} udīratāṃ sūnṛtā ut purandhīrudagnayaḥ śuśucānāsoasthuḥ
analyzed: udīratām sūnṛtāḥ ud purandhīḥ ud agnayaḥ śuśucānāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_01.123.06.2{05} spārhā vasūni tamasāpagūḷhāviṣ kṛṇvantyuṣaso vibhātīḥ
analyzed: spārhā vasūni tamasā apagūḍhā āvis kṛṇvanti uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_01.123.07.1{05} apānyadetyabhyanyadeti viṣurūpe ahanī saṃ carete
analyzed: apānyadā iti abhyanyadā iti viṣurūpe ahanī sam carete

original: RV_01.123.07.2{05} parikṣitostamo anyā guhākaradyauduṣāḥ śośucatā rathena
analyzed: parikṣitoḥ tamaḥ anyā guhā akarat yauduṣāḥ śośucatā rathena

original: RV_01.123.08.1{05} sadṛśīradya sadṛśīridu śvo dīrghaṃ sacante varuṇasyadhāma
analyzed: sadṛśīḥ adya sadṛśīḥ idu śvas dīrgham sacante varuṇasya dhāma

original: RV_01.123.08.2{05} anavadyāstriṃśataṃ yojanānyekaikā kratuṃ pariyanti sadyaḥ
analyzed: anavadyāḥ triṃśatam yojanāni ekaikā kratum pariyanti sadyas

original: RV_01.123.09.1{05} jānatyahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇādajaniṣṭa śvitīcī
analyzed: jānatī ahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇāt ajaniṣṭa śvitīcī

original: RV_01.123.09.2{05} ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāmāhar aharniṣkṛtamācarantī
analyzed: ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāma ahar ahar niṣkṛtam ācarantī

original: RV_01.123.10.1{05} kanyeva tanvā śāśadānāneṣi devi devamiyakṣamāṇam
analyzed: kanyā iva tanvā śāśada anāneṣi devi devam iyakṣamāṇam

original: RV_01.123.10.2{05} saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastādāvirvakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī
analyzed: saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastāt āvis vakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī

original: RV_01.123.11.1{06} susaṃkāśā mātṛmṛṣṭeva yoṣāvistanvaṃ kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam
analyzed: su saṃkāśā mātṛ mṛṣṭā iva yoṣā āvis tanvam kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam

original: RV_01.123.11.2{06} bhadrā tvamuṣo vitaraṃ vyucha na tat te anyā uṣasonaśanta
analyzed: bhadrā tvam uṣaḥ vitaram vyucha na tat te anyāḥ uṣasaḥ naśanta

original: RV_01.123.12.1{06} aśvāvatīrgomatīrviśvavārā yatamānā raśmibhiḥ sūryasya
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ viśva vārāḥ yatamānāḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya

original: RV_01.123.12.2{06} parā ca yanti punarā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānāuṣāsaḥ
analyzed: parā ca yanti punarā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānā auṣāsaḥ

original: RV_01.123.13.1{06} ṛtasya raśmimanuyachamānā bhadram-bhadraṃ kratumasmāsu dhehi
analyzed: ṛtasya raśmim anuyacchamānā bhadram bhadram kratum asmāsu dhehi

original: RV_01.123.13.2{06} uṣo no adya suhavā vyuchāsmāsu rāyo maghavatsu ca syuḥ
analyzed: uṣaḥ naḥ adya su havā vyucha asmāsu rāyaḥ maghavatsu ca syuḥ

original: RV_01.124.01.1{07} uṣā uchantī samidhāne agnā udyan sūrya urviyā jyotiraśret
analyzed: uṣāḥ uchantī samidhāne agnau udyan sūryaḥ urviyā jyotiḥ aśret

original: RV_01.124.01.2{07} devo no atra savitā nvarthaṃ prāsāvīd dvipat pra catuṣpadityai
analyzed: devaḥ naḥ atra savitā nu artham prāsāvīt dvipad pra catuṣpada ityai

original: RV_01.124.02.1{07} aminatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni
analyzed: a minatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni

original: RV_01.124.02.2{07} īyuṣīṇāmupamā śaśvatīnāmāyatīnāṃ prathamoṣā vyadyaut
analyzed: īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām āyatīnām prathamā uṣāḥ vyadyaut

original: RV_01.124.03.1{07} eṣā divo duhitā pratyadarśi jyotirvasānā samanā purastāt
analyzed: eṣā divaḥ duhitā pratyadarśi jyotiḥ vasānā samanā purastāt

original: RV_01.124.03.2{07} ṛtasya panthāmanveti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anveti sādhu prajānatī iva na diśaḥ mināti

original: RV_01.124.04.1{07} upo adarśi śundhyuvo na vakṣo nodhā ivāvirakṛta priyāṇi
analyzed: upa u adarśi śundhyuvaḥ na vakṣaḥ nodhāḥ iva āvirakṛta priyāṇi

original: RV_01.124.04.2{07} admasan na sasato bodhayantī śaśvattamāgāt punareyuṣīṇām
analyzed: admasad na sasataḥ bodhayantī śaśvattamā agāt punar eyuṣīṇām

original: RV_01.124.05.1{07} pūrve ardhe rajaso aptyasya gavāṃ janitryakṛta pra ketum
analyzed: pūrve ardhe rajasaḥ aptyasya gavām janitrī akṛta pra ketum

original: RV_01.124.05.2{07} vyu prathate vitaraṃ varīya obhā pṛṇantī pitrorupasthā
analyzed: vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ ā ubhā pṛṇantī pitroḥ upasthā

original: RV_01.124.06.1{08} evedeṣā purutamā dṛśe kaṃ nājāmiṃ na pari vṛṇakti jāmim
analyzed: eva id eṣā purutamā dṛśe kam na ajāmim na pari vṛṇakti jāmim

original: RV_01.124.06.2{08} arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nārbhādīṣate na mahovibhātī
analyzed: arepasā tanvā śāśadānā na arbhādīṣate na mahaḥ vibhātī

original: RV_01.124.07.1{08} abhrāteva puṃsa eti pratīcī gartārugiva sanaye dhanānām
analyzed: abhrātā iva puṃsaḥ eti pratīcī gartāruh iva sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_01.124.07.2{08} jāyeya patya uśatī suvāsā uṣā hasreva ni riṇīte apsaḥ
analyzed: jāyeya patye uśatī su vāsāḥ uṣāḥ hasrā iva ni riṇīte apsaḥ

original: RV_01.124.08.1{08} svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonimāraigapaityasyāḥ praticakṣyeva
analyzed: svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonim āraigapaiti asyāḥ praticakṣya iva

original: RV_01.124.08.2{08} vyuchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasyāñjyaṅkte samanagā ivavrāḥ
analyzed: vyuchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasya añjī aṅkte samana gā ivavrāḥ

original: RV_01.124.09.1{08} āsāṃ pūrvāsāmahasu svasṝṇāmaparā pūrvāmabhyeti paścāt
analyzed: āsām pūrvāsām ahasu svasṝṇām aparā pūrvām abhyeti paścāt

original: RV_01.124.09.2{08} tāḥ pratnavan navyasīrnūnamasme revaduchantu sudinā uṣāsaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ pratna vat navyasīḥ nūnam asme revat uchantu su dināḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_01.124.10.1{08} pra bodhayoṣaḥ pṛṇato maghonyabudhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu
analyzed: pra bodhaya uṣaḥ pṛṇataḥ maghoni a budhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu

original: RV_01.124.10.2{08} revaducha maghavadbhyo maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī
analyzed: revat ucha maghavadbhyaḥ maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī

original: RV_01.124.11.1{09} aveyamaśvaid yuvatiḥ purastād yuṅkte gavāmaruṇānāmanīkam
analyzed: ava iyam aśvait yuvatiḥ purastāt yuṅkte gavām aruṇānām anīkam

original: RV_01.124.11.2{09} vi nūnamuchādasati pra keturgṛhaṃ-gṛhamupa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ
analyzed: vi nūnam uchā adasati pra ketuḥ gṛhaṃgṛham upa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ

original: RV_01.124.12.1{09} ut te vayaścid vasaterapaptan naraśca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau
analyzed: ud te vayaḥ cit vasateḥ apaptan naraḥ ca ye pitu bhājaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_01.124.12.2{09} amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmamuṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmamuṣaḥ devi dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_01.124.13.1{09} astoḍhvaṃ stomyā brahmaṇā me 'vīvṛdhadhvamuśatīruṣāsaḥ
analyzed: astoḍhvam stomyāḥ brahmaṇā me avīvṛdhadhvam uśatīḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_01.124.13.2{09} yuṣmākaṃ devīravasā sanema sahasriṇaṃ ca śatinaṃ cavājam
analyzed: yuṣmākam devī ravasā sanema sahasriṇam ca śatinam ca vājam

original: RV_01.125.01.1{10} prātā ratnaṃ prātaritvā dadhāti taṃ cikitvān pratigṛhyāni dhatte
analyzed: prātar ratnam prātar itvā dadhāti tam cikitvān pratigṛhyāni dhatte

original: RV_01.125.01.2{10} tena prajāṃ vardhayamāna āyū rāyas poṣeṇa sacate suvīraḥ
analyzed: tena prajām vardhayamānaḥ āyuḥ rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sacate su vīraḥ

original: RV_01.125.02.1{10} sugurasat suhiraṇyaḥ svaśvo bṛhadasmai vaya indro dadhāti
analyzed: su gurasad su hiraṇyaḥ su aśvaḥ bṛhat asmai vayaḥ indraḥ dadhāti

original: RV_01.125.02.2{10} yastvāyantaṃ vasunā prātaritvo mukṣījayeva padimutsināti
analyzed: yaḥ tvā āyantam vasunā prātaritvaḥ

original: RV_01.125.03.1{10} āyamadya sukṛtaṃ prātarichanniṣṭeḥ putraṃ vasumatā rathena
analyzed: ā ayam adya su kṛtam prātar ichan iṣṭeḥ putram vasumatā rathena

original: RV_01.125.03.2{10} aṃśoḥ sutaṃ pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīraṃ vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ
analyzed: aṃśoḥ sutam pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīram vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_01.125.04.1{10} upa kṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ cadhenavaḥ
analyzed: upa kṣaranti sindhavaḥ mayobhuvaḥ ījānam ca yakṣyamāṇam ca dhenavaḥ

original: RV_01.125.04.2{10} pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upa yanti viśvataḥ
analyzed: pṛṇantam ca papurim ca śravasyavaḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ upa yanti viśvatas

original: RV_01.125.05.1{10} nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śrito yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gachati
analyzed: nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śritaḥ yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gacchati

original: RV_01.125.05.2{10} tasmā āpo ghṛtamarṣanti sindhavastasmā iyaṃ dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā
analyzed: tasmai āpaḥ ghṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ tasmai iyam dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā

original: RV_01.125.06.1{10} dakṣiṇāvatāmidimāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatāṃ divi sūryāsaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvatām id imāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatām divi sūryāsaḥ

original: RV_01.125.06.2{10} dakṣiṇāvanto amṛtaṃ bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tiranta āyuḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvantaḥ amṛtam bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_01.125.07.1{10} mā pṛṇanto duritamena āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ
analyzed: mā pṛṇantaḥ duritamenaḥ āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ

original: RV_01.125.07.2{10} anyasteṣāṃ paridhirastu kaścidapṛṇantamabhi saṃ yantu śokāḥ
analyzed: anyaḥ teṣām paridhiḥ astu kaścid apṛṇantam abhi sam yantu śokāḥ

original: RV_01.126.01.1{11} amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhāvadhi kṣiyato bhāvyasya
analyzed: amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhau adhi kṣiyataḥ bhāvyasya

original: RV_01.126.01.2{11} yo me sahasramamimīta savānatūrto rājā śravaichamānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ me sahasram amimīta rājā śravāna aichamānaḥ

original: RV_01.126.02.1{11} śataṃ rājño nādhamānasya niṣkāñchatamaśvān prayatān sadya ādam
analyzed: śatam rājñaḥ nādhamānasya niṣkān śatam aśvān prayatān sadyas ādam

original: RV_01.126.02.2{11} śataṃ kakṣīvānasurasya gonāṃ divi śravo 'jaramā tatāna
analyzed: śatam kakṣīvān asurasya gonām divi śravaḥ ajaramā tatāna

original: RV_01.126.03.1{11} upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattā vadhūmanto daśa rathāsoasthuḥ
analyzed: upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattāḥ vadhūmantaḥ daśa rathāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_01.126.03.2{11} ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasramanu gavyamāgāt sanat kakṣīvānabhipitve ahnām
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram anu gavyam āgāt sanat kakṣīvān abhipitve ahnām

original: RV_01.126.04.1{11} catvāriṃśad daśarathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasyāgre śreṇiṃnayanti
analyzed: catvāriṃśat daśa rathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasya agre śreṇiṃnayanti

original: RV_01.126.04.2{11} madacyutaḥ kṛśanāvato atyān kakṣīvanta udamṛkṣanta pajrāḥ
analyzed: mada cyutaḥ kṛśanāvataḥ atyān kakṣīvantaḥ udamṛkṣanta pajrāḥ

original: RV_01.126.05.1{11} pūrvāmanu prayatimā dade vastrīn yuktānaṣṭāvaridhāyaso gāḥ
analyzed: pūrvām anu prayatimā dade vaḥ trīn yuktān aṣṭau ari dhāyasaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_01.126.05.2{11} subandhavo ye viśyā iva vrā anasvantaḥ śrava aiṣanta pajrāḥ
analyzed: su bandhavaḥ ye viśyāḥ iva vrāḥ anasvantaḥ śravaḥ aiṣanta pajrāḥ

original: RV_01.126.06.1{11} āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkeva jaṅgahe
analyzed: āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkā iva jaṅgahe

original: RV_01.126.06.2{11} dadāti mahyaṃ yāduri yāśūnāṃ bhojyā śatā
analyzed: dadāti mahyam yāduri yāśūnām bhojyā śatā

original: RV_01.126.07.1{11} upopa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ
analyzed: upa upa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ

original: RV_01.126.07.2{11} sarvāhamasmi romaśā gandhārīṇāmivāvikā
analyzed: sarvā aham asmi romaśā gandhārīṇām iva avikā

original: RV_01.127.01.1{12} agniṃ hotāraṃ manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam /
analyzed: agnim hotāram manye dāsvantam vasum sūnum sahasaḥ jātavedasam vipram na jātavedasam

original: ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā
analyzed: yaḥ ūrdhvayā su adhvaraḥ devaḥ devācyā kṛpā

original: RV_01.127.01.2{12} ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭimanu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣā ājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ

original: RV_01.127.02.1{12} yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā yajamānā huvema jyeṣṭhamaṅgirasāṃ vipramanmabhirviprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ /
analyzed: yajiṣṭham tvā yajamānāḥ huvema jyeṣṭham aṅgirasām vipra manmabhiḥ viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ

original: parijmānamiva dyāṃ hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: parijmānam iva dyām hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_01.127.02.2{12} śociṣkeśaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ yamimā viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ
analyzed: śociṣkeśam vṛṣaṇam yam imāḥ viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ

original: RV_01.127.03.1{12} sa hi purū cidojasā virukmatā dīdyāno bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśurna druhantaraḥ /
analyzed: sa hi purū cit ojasā virukmatā dīdyānaḥ bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśuḥ na druhantaraḥ

original: vīḷu cid yasya samṛtau śruvad vaneva yat sthiram
analyzed: vīḷu cit yasya samṛtau śruvat vanā iva yat sthiram

original: RV_01.127.03.2{12} niḥṣahamāṇo yamate nāyate dhanvāsahā nāyate
analyzed: niḥṣahamāṇaḥ yamate nāyate dhanvāsahāḥ nāyate

original: RV_01.127.04.1{12} dṛlḥā cidasmā anu duryathā vide tejiṣṭhābhiraraṇibhirdāṣṭyavase 'gnaye dāṣṭyavase /
analyzed: dṛlḍā cit asmai anu duryathā vide tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ dāṣṭyavase agnaye dāṣṭyavase

original: pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣad vaneva śociṣā
analyzed: pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣat vanā iva śociṣā

original: RV_01.127.04.2{12} sthirā cidannā ni riṇātyojasā ni sthirāṇi cidojasā
analyzed: sthirā cit annā ni riṇāti ojasā ni sthirāṇi cit ojasā

original: RV_01.127.05.1{12} tamasya pṛkṣamuparāsu dhīmahi naktaṃ yaḥ sudarśataro divātarādaprāyuṣe divātarāt /
analyzed: tam asya pṛkṣam uparāsu dhīmahi naktam yaḥ sudarśataraḥ divā tarāt a prāyuṣe divā tarāt

original: ādasyāyurgrabhaṇavad vīḷu śarma na sūnave
analyzed: ādasya āyurgrabhaṇavat vīḷu śarma na sūnave

original: RV_01.127.05.2{12} bhaktamabhaktamavo vyanto ajarā agnayo vyanto ajarāḥ
analyzed: bhaktam abhaktamavaḥ vyantaḥ ajarāḥ agnayaḥ vyantaḥ ajarāḥ

original: RV_01.127.06.1{13} sa hi śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇirapnasvatīṣūrvarāsviṣṭanirārtanāsviṣṭaniḥ /
analyzed: sa hi śardhaḥ na mārutam tuviṣvaṇiḥ apnasvatīṣu urvarāsu iṣṭaniḥ ārtanāsu iṣṭaniḥ

original: ādad dhavyānyādadiryajñasya keturarhaṇā
analyzed: ādat havyāni ādadiḥ yajñasya ketuḥ arhaṇā

original: RV_01.127.06.2{13} adha smāsya harṣato hṛṣīvato viśve juṣanta panthāṃ naraḥ śubhe na panthām
analyzed: adha sma asya harṣataḥ hṛṣīvataḥ viśve juṣanta panthām naraḥ śubhe na panthām

original: RV_01.127.07.1{13} dvitā yadīṃ kīstāso abhidyavo namasyanta upavocanta bhṛgavo mathnanto dāsā bhṛgavaḥ /
analyzed: dvitā yadi īm kīstāsaḥ abhidyavaḥ namasyantaḥ upavocanta bhṛgavaḥ mathnantaḥ dāsāḥ bhṛgavaḥ

original: agnirīśe vasūnāṃ śuciryo dharṇireṣām
analyzed: agniḥ īśe vasūnām śuciḥ yaḥ dharṇiḥ eṣām

original: RV_01.127.07.2{13} priyānapidhīnrvaniṣīṣṭa medhira ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhirah
analyzed: priyān apidhīn rvaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ

original: RV_01.127.08.1{13} viśvāsāṃ tvā viśāṃ patiṃ havāmahe sarvāsāṃ samānandampatiṃ bhuje satyagirvāhasaṃ bhuje /
analyzed: viśvāsām tvā viśām patim havāmahe sarvāsām samānandam patim bhuje satyagiḥ vāhasam bhuje

original: atithiṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ piturna yasyāsayā
analyzed: atithim mānuṣāṇām pituḥ na yasya āsayā

original: RV_01.127.08.2{13} amī ca viśve amṛtāsa ā vayo havyādeveṣvā vayaḥ
analyzed: amī ca viśve amṛtāsaḥ ā vayaḥ havyādeva iṣvā vayaḥ

original: RV_01.127.09.1{13} tvamagne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamo jāyase devatātaye rayirna devatātaye /
analyzed: tvam agne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamaḥ jāyase devatātaye rayiḥ na devatātaye

original: śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ
analyzed: śuṣmintamaḥ hi te madaḥ dyumnintamaḥ uta kratuḥ

original: RV_01.127.09.2{13} adha smā te pari carantyajara śruṣṭīvāno nājara
analyzed: adha smā te pari caranti ajara śruṣṭīvānaḥ na ajara

original: RV_01.127.10.1{13} pra vo mahe sahasā sahasvata uṣarbudhe paśuṣe nāgnaye stomo babhūtvagnaye /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe sahasā sahasvate uṣarbudhe paśuṣe na agnaye stomaḥ babhūtu agnaye

original: prati yadīṃ haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve
analyzed: prati yadīm haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve

original: RV_01.127.10.2{13} agre rebho na jarata ṛṣūṇāṃ jūrṇirhota ṛṣūṇām
analyzed: agre rebhaḥ na jarate ṛṣūṇām jūrṇiḥ hotar ṛṣūṇām

original: RV_01.127.11.1{13} sa no nediṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāna ā bharāgne devebhiḥ sacanāḥsucetunā maho rāyāḥ sucetunā /
analyzed: sa naḥ nediṣṭham dadṛśānaḥ ā bhara agne devebhiḥ sacanāḥsu cetunā mahaḥ rāyāḥ su cetunā

original: mahi śaviṣṭha nas kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai
analyzed: mahi śaviṣṭha naḥ kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai

original: RV_01.127.11.2{13} mahi stotṛbhyo maghavan suvīryaṃ mathīrugro na śavasā
analyzed: mahi stotṛbhyaḥ maghavan su vīryam mathīḥ ugraḥ na śavasā

original: RV_01.128.01.1{14} ayaṃ jāyata manuṣo dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭha uśijāmanuvratamagniḥ svamanu vratam /
analyzed: ayam jāyata manuṣaḥ dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ uśijām anuvratam agniḥ svam anu vratam

original: viśvaśruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayiriva śravasyate
analyzed: viśva śruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayiḥ iva śravasyate

original: RV_01.128.01.2{14} adabdho hotā ni ṣadadiḷas pade parivīta iḷas pade
analyzed: adabdhaḥ hotā ni sadat iḷaḥ pade parivītaḥ iḷaḥ pade

original: RV_01.128.02.1{14} taṃ yajñasādhamapi vātayāmasy ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā /
analyzed: tam yajñasādham api vātayāmasi ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā

original: sa na ūrjāmupābhṛtyayā kṛpā na jūryati
analyzed: sa naḥ ūrjām upābhṛtyayā kṛpā na jūryati

original: RV_01.128.02.2{14} yaṃ mātariśvā manave parāvato devaṃ bhāḥ parāvataḥ
analyzed: yam mātariśvā manave parāvataḥ devam bhāḥ parāvataḥ

original: RV_01.128.03.1{14} evena sadyaḥ paryeti pārthivaṃ muhurgī reto vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradad dadhad retah kanikradat /
analyzed: evena sadyas paryeti pārthivam muhur gir retaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat dadhat retaḥ kanikradat

original: śataṃ cakṣāṇo akṣabhirdevo vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ
analyzed: śatam cakṣāṇaḥ akṣabhiḥ devaḥ vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_01.128.03.2{14} sado dadhāna upareṣu sānuṣvagniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu
analyzed: sadaḥ dadhānaḥ upareṣu sānuṣu agniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu

original: RV_01.128.04.1{14} sa sukratuḥ purohito dame dame 'gniryajñasyādhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati /
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ purohitaḥ dame dame agniḥ yajñasya adhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati

original: kratvā vedhā iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe
analyzed: kratvā vedhāḥ iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe

original: RV_01.128.04.2{14} yato ghṛtaśrīratithirajāyata vahnirvedhā ajāyata
analyzed: yatas ghṛtaśrīḥ atithiḥ ajāyata vahniḥ vedhāḥ ajāyata

original: RV_01.128.05.1{14} kratvā yadasya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate 'gneraveṇa marutāṃ na bhojyeṣirāya na bhojyā /
analyzed: kratvā yat asya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate marutām na bhojyā iṣirāya na bhojyā

original: sa hi ṣmā dānaminvati vasūnāṃ ca majmanā
analyzed: sa hi sma dānam invati vasūnām ca majmanā

original: RV_01.128.05.2{14} sa nastrāsate duritādabhihrutaḥ śaṃsādaghādabhihrutaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ trāsate duritāt abhihrutaḥ śaṃsāt aghāt abhihrutaḥ

original: RV_01.128.06.1{15} viśvo vihāyā aratirvasurdadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇirnaśiśrathacchravasyayā na śiśrathat /
analyzed: viśvaḥ vihāyāḥ aratiḥ vasuḥ dadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇiḥ na śiśrathat śravasyayā na śiśrathat

original: viśvasmā idiṣudhyate devatrā havyamohiṣe
analyzed: viśvasmai idiṣudhyate devatrā havyam ohiṣe

original: RV_01.128.06.2{15} viśvasmā it sukṛte vāram ṛṇvatyagnirdvārā vy ṛṇvati
analyzed: viśvasmai id su kṛte vāram ṛṇvati agniḥ dvārā vi ṛṇvati

original: RV_01.128.07.1{15} sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamo hito 'gniryajñeṣu jenyo na viśpatiḥ priyo yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamaḥ hitaḥ agniḥ yajñeṣu jenyaḥ na viśpatiḥ priyaḥ yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ

original: sa havyā mānuṣāṇāmiḷā kṛtāni patyate
analyzed: sa havyā mānuṣāṇām iḷā kṛtāni patyate

original: RV_01.128.07.2{15} sa nastrāsate varuṇasya dhūrtermahodevasya dhūrteḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ trāsate varuṇasya dhūrteḥ mahodevasya dhūrteḥ

original: RV_01.128.08.1{15} agniṃ hotāramīḷate vasudhitiṃ priyaṃ cetiṣṭhamaratiṃ nyerire havyavāhaṃ nyerire /
analyzed: agnim hotāram īḍate vasu dhitim priyam cetiṣṭham aratim nyerire havyavāham nyerire

original: viśvāyuṃ viśvavedasaṃ hotāraṃ yajataṃ kavim
analyzed: viśvāyum viśva vedasam hotāram yajatam kavim

original: RV_01.128.08.2{15} devāso raṇvamavase vasūyavo gīrbhīraṇvaṃ vasūyavaḥ
analyzed: devāsaḥ raṇvam avase vasūyavaḥ gīrbhiraṇvam vasūyavaḥ

original: RV_01.129.01.1{16} yaṃ tvaṃ rathamindra medhasātaye 'pākā santamiṣira praṇayasi prānavadya nayasi /
analyzed: yam tvam ratham indra medha sātaye apākā santam iṣira praṇayasi pra anavadya nayasi

original: sadyaścit tamabhiṣṭaye karo vaśaśca vājinam
analyzed: sadyas cit tam abhiṣṭaye karaḥ vaśaḥ ca vājinam

original: RV_01.129.01.2{16} sāsmākamanavadya tūtujāna vedhasāmimāṃ vācaṃ na vedhasām
analyzed: sa asmākam anavadya tūtujāna vedhasām imām vācam na vedhasām

original: RV_01.129.02.1{16} sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cid dakṣāyya indra bharahūtaye nṛbhirasi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cit dakṣāyyaḥ indra bhara hūtaye nṛbhiḥ asi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ

original: yaḥ śūraiḥ svaḥ sanitā yo viprairvājaṃ tarutā
analyzed: yaḥ śūraiḥ svar sanitā yaḥ vipraiḥ vājam tarutā

original: RV_01.129.02.2{16} tamīśānāsa iradhanta vājinaṃ pṛkṣamatyaṃ na vājinam
analyzed: tam īśānāsaḥ iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣamatyam na vājinam

original: RV_01.129.03.1{16} dasmo hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇaṃ pinvasi tvacaṃ kaṃ cid yāvīrararuṃ śūra martyaṃ parivṛṇakṣi martyam /
analyzed: dasmaḥ hi sma vṛṣaṇam pinvasi tvacam kam cit śūra martyam parivṛṇakṣi martyam

original: indrota tubhyaṃ taddive tad rudrāya svayaśase
analyzed: indra uta tubhyam tat dive tat rudrāya sva yaśase

original: RV_01.129.03.2{16} mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya saprathaḥ sumṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ
analyzed: mitrāya vocam varuṇāya saprathaḥ su mṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ

original: RV_01.129.04.1{16} asmākaṃ va indramuśmasīṣṭaye sakhāyaṃ viśvāyuṃ prāsahaṃ yujaṃ vājeṣu prāsahaṃ yujam /
analyzed: asmākam vaḥ indram uśmasi iṣṭaye sakhāyam viśvāyum prāsaham yujam vājeṣu prāsaham yujam

original: asmākaṃbrahmotye 'vā pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit
analyzed: asmākaṃbrahmā ūtye ava pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit

original: RV_01.129.04.2{16} nahi tvā śatru starate stṛṇoṣi yaṃviśvaṃ śatruṃ stṛṇoṣi yam
analyzed: na hi tvā śatruḥ starate stṛṇoṣi yam viśvam śatrum stṛṇoṣi yam

original: RV_01.129.05.1{16} ni ṣū namātimatiṃ kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhiraraṇibhirnotibhirugrābhirugrotibhiḥ /
analyzed: ni ṣū nama atimatim kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhiḥ araṇibhiḥ notibhiḥ ugrābhiḥ ugra ūtibhiḥ

original: neṣi ṇo yathā purānenāḥ śūra manyase
analyzed: neṣi naḥ yathā purā anenāḥ śūra manyase

original: RV_01.129.05.2{16} viśvāni pūrorapa parṣi vahnirāsā vahnirno acha
analyzed: viśvāni pūroḥ apa parṣi vahniḥ āsā vahniḥ naḥ acha

original: RV_01.129.06.1{17} pra tad voceyaṃ bhavyāyendave havyo na ya iṣavān manma rejati rakṣohā manma rejati /
analyzed: pra tat voceyam bhavyāya indave havyaḥ na yaḥ iṣavān manma rejati rakṣaḥ hā manma rejati

original: svayaṃ so asmadā nido vadhairajeta durmatim
analyzed: svayam saḥ asmadā nidaḥ vadhaiḥ ajeta durmatim

original: RV_01.129.06.2{17} ava sravedaghaśaṃso 'vataramava kṣudramiva sravet
analyzed: ava sravet agha śaṃsaḥ avataram ava kṣudram iva sravet

original: RV_01.129.07.1{17} vanema tad dhotrayā citantyā vanema rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīryaṃ raṇvaṃ santaṃ suvīryam /
analyzed: vanema tat hotrayā citantyā vanema rayim rayivas su vīryam raṇvam santam su vīryam

original: durmanmānaṃ sumantubhiremiṣā pṛcīmahi
analyzed: durmanmānam su mantubhiḥ emiṣā pṛcīmahi

original: RV_01.129.07.2{17} ā satyābhirindraṃ dyumnahūtibhiryajatraṃ dyumnahūtibhiḥ
analyzed: ā satyābhiḥ indram dyumna hūtibhiḥ yajatram dyumna hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_01.129.08.1{17} pra-prā vo asme svayaśobhirūtī parivarga indro durmatīnāṃ darīman durmatīnām /
analyzed: pra prāḥ vaḥ asme sva yaśobhiḥ ūtī parivargaḥ indraḥ durmatīnām darīman durmatīnām

original: svayaṃ sā riṣayadhyai yā na upeṣe atraiḥ
analyzed: svayam sā riṣayadhyai yā naḥ upeṣe atraiḥ

original: RV_01.129.08.2{17} hatemasan na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇirna vakṣati
analyzed: hata imasat na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇiḥ na vakṣati

original: RV_01.129.09.1{17} tvaṃ na indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi patha“nanehasā puro yāhyarakṣasā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi pathananehasā puras yāhi arakṣasā

original: sacasva naḥ parāka ā sacasvāstamīka ā
analyzed: sacasva naḥ parāke ā sacasva astamīke ā

original: RV_01.129.09.2{17} pāhi no dūrādārādabhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhyabhiṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: pāhi naḥ dūrāt ārāt abhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhi abhiṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_01.129.10.1{17} tvaṃ na indra rāyā tarūṣasograṃ cit tvā mahimā sakṣadavase mahe mitraṃ nāvase /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra rāyā tarūṣasā ugram cit tvā mahimā sakṣat avase mahe mitram na avase

original: ojiṣṭha trātaravitā rathaṃ kaṃ cidamartya
analyzed: ojiṣṭha trāta ravitā ratham kam cit amartya

original: RV_01.129.10.2{17} anyamasmad ririṣeḥ kaṃ cidadrivo ririkṣantaṃ cidadrivaḥ
analyzed: anyam asmat ririṣeḥ kam cit adrivas ririkṣantam cit adrivas

original: RV_01.129.11.1{17} pāhi na indra suṣṭuta sridho 'vayātā sadamid durmatīnāndevaḥ san durmatīnām /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ indra suṣṭuta sridhaḥ avayātā sadam id durmatīnām devaḥ san durmatīnām

original: hantā pāpasya rakṣasastrātā viprasya māvataḥ
analyzed: hantā pāpasya rakṣasaḥ trātā viprasya māvataḥ

original: RV_01.129.11.2{17} adhā hi tvā janitā jījanad vaso rakṣohaṇaṃ tvā jījanad vaso
analyzed: adhā hi tvā janitā jījanat vaso rakṣaḥ haṇam tvā jījanat vaso

original: RV_01.130.01.1{18} endra yāhyupa naḥ parāvato nāyamachā vidathānīva satpatirastaṃ rājeva satpatiḥ /
analyzed: ā indra yāhi upa naḥ parāvataḥ na ayam achā vidathāni iva satpatiḥ astam rājā iva satpatiḥ

original: havāmahe tvā vayaṃ prayasvantaḥ sute sacā
analyzed: havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā

original: RV_01.130.01.2{18} putrāso na pitaraṃ vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vājasātaye
analyzed: putrāsaḥ na pitaram vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭham vājasātaye

original: RV_01.130.02.1{18} pibā somamindra suvānamadribhiḥ kośena siktamavataṃ navaṃsagastātṛṣāṇo na vaṃsagaḥ /
analyzed: pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ kośena siktam avatam navaṃsagaḥ tātṛṣāṇaḥ na vaṃsagaḥ

original: madāya haryataya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase
analyzed: madāya haryataya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase

original: RV_01.130.02.2{18} ā tvā yachantu harito na sūryamahāviśveva sūryam
analyzed: ā tvā yacchantu haritaḥ na sūrya mahā viśvā iva sūryam

original: RV_01.130.03.1{18} avindad divo nihitaṃ guhā nidhiṃ verna garbhaṃ parivītamaśmanyanante antaraśmani /
analyzed: avindat divaḥ nihitam guhā nidhim veḥ na garbham parivītam aśmani anante antaraśmani

original: vrajaṃ vajri”:
analyzed: vrajam vajri

original: gavāmiva siṣāsannaṅgirastamaḥ
analyzed: gavām iva siṣāsan aṅgirastamaḥ

original: RV_01.130.03.2{18} apāvṛṇodiṣa indraḥ parīvṛtā dvāra iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ
analyzed: apāvṛṇot iṣaḥ indraḥ parīvṛtāḥ dvāraḥ iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ

original: RV_01.130.04.1{18} dādṛhāṇo vajramindro gabhastyoḥ kṣadmeva tigmamasanāyasaṃ śyadahihatyāya saṃ śyat /
analyzed: dādṛhāṇaḥ vajram indraḥ gabhastyoḥ kṣadma iva tigmam asanāyasam śyat ahi hatyāya sam śyat

original: saṃvivyāna ojasā śavobhirindra majmanā
analyzed: saṃvivyānaḥ ojasā śavobhiḥ indra majmanā

original: RV_01.130.04.2{18} taṣṭeva vṛkṣaṃ vanino ni vṛścasi paraśveva ni vṛścasi
analyzed: taṣṭā iva vṛkṣam vaninaḥ ni vṛścasi paraśu eva ni vṛścasi

original: RV_01.130.05.1{18} tvaṃ vṛthā nadya indra sartave 'chā samudramasṛjo rathāniva vājayato rathāniva /
analyzed: tvam vṛthā nadyaḥ indra sartave achā samudram asṛjaḥ rathān iva vājayataḥ rathān iva

analyzed: itas ūtīḥ ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam

analyzed: dhenūḥ iva manave viśva dohasaḥ janāya viśva dohasaḥ

original: RV_01.130.06.1{19} imāṃ te vācaṃ vasūyanta āyavo rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapāatakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvāmatakṣiṣuḥ /
analyzed: imām te vācam vasūyantaḥ āyavaḥ ratham na dhīraḥ su apāḥ atakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvām atakṣiṣuḥ

original: śumbhanto jenyaṃ yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam
analyzed: śumbhantaḥ jenyam yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam

original: RV_01.130.06.2{19} atyamiva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye
analyzed: atyam iva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye

analyzed: bhinat puraḥ navatim indra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto

analyzed: atithigvāya śambaram gireḥ ugraḥ avābharat

analyzed: mahaḥ dhanāni dayamānaḥ ojasā viśvā dhanāni ojasā

original: RV_01.130.08.1{19} indraḥ samatsu yajamānamāryaṃ prāvad viśveṣu śatamūtirājiṣu svarmīḷheṣvājiṣu /
analyzed: indraḥ samatsu yajamānam āryam prāvat viśveṣu śatamūti rājiṣu svarmīḷheṣu ājiṣu

original: manave śāsadavratān tvacaṃ kṛṣṇāmarandhayat
analyzed: manave śāsat avratān tvacam kṛṣṇām arandhayat

analyzed: dakṣat na viśvam tatṛṣāṇam oṣati nyarśasānam oṣati

original: RV_01.130.09.1{19} sūraścakraṃ pra vṛhajjāta ojasā prapitve vācamaruṇo muṣāyatīśāna ā muṣāyati /
analyzed: sūraḥ cakram pra vṛhat jātaḥ ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇaḥ muṣāyati īśānaḥ ā muṣāyati

analyzed: uśanāḥ yat parāvataḥ ajagan ūtaye kave

analyzed: sumnāni viśvā manuṣā iva turvaṇiḥ ahāḥ viśvevaturvaṇiḥ

analyzed: sa naḥ navyebhiḥ vṛṣa karman ukthaiḥ purām dartar pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ

analyzed: divodāsebhiḥ indra stavānaḥ vāvṛdhīthāḥ ahobhiḥ iva dyauḥ

original: RV_01.131.01.1{20} indrāya hi dyaurasuro anamnatendrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhirdyumnasātā varīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: indrāya hi dyauḥ asuraḥ anamnata indrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhiḥ dyumna sātā varīmabhiḥ

original: indraṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dadhire puraḥ
analyzed: indram viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_01.131.01.2{20} indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā
analyzed: indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā

original: RV_01.131.02.1{20} viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānamekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekam vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svar saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak

original: taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi
analyzed: tam tvā nāvam na parṣaṇim śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi

original: RV_01.131.02.2{20} indraṃ na yajñaiścitayanta āyava stomebhirindramāyavaḥ
analyzed: indram na yajñaiḥ citayantaḥ āyavaḥ stomebhiḥ indram āyavaḥ

original: RV_01.131.03.1{20} vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ /
analyzed: vi tvā tatasre mithunāḥ avasyavaḥ vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣantaḥ indra niḥsṛjaḥ

original: yad gavyantā dvā janā svaryantā samūhasi
analyzed: yat gavyantā dvā janā svaryantā samūhasi

original: RV_01.131.03.2{20} āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajramindra sacābhuvam
analyzed: āvis karikrat vṛṣaṇam sacābhuvam vajram indra sacābhuvam

original: RV_01.131.04.1{20} viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yadindra śāradīravātiraḥ sāsahāno avātiraḥ /
analyzed: viduḥ te asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puraḥ yat indra śāradīḥ avātiraḥ sāsahānaḥ avātiraḥ

original: śāsastamindra martyamayajyuṃ śavasas pate
analyzed: śāsaḥ tam indra martyam ayajyum śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_01.131.04.2{20} mahīmamuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīmimā apo mandasāna imā apaḥ
analyzed: mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imāḥ apaḥ mandasānaḥ imāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_01.131.05.1{20} ādit te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣannuśijo yadāvitha sakhīyato yadāvitha /
analyzed: ādit te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣan uśijaḥ yadā avitha sakhīyataḥ yadā avitha

original: cakartha kāramebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantava
analyzed: cakartha kāramebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantava

original: RV_01.131.05.2{20} te anyām-anyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata
analyzed: te anyām anyām nadyam saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata

original: RV_01.131.06.1{20} uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hyarkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: uta u naḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ juṣeta hi arkasya bodhi haviṣaḥ havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ

original: yadindra hantave mṛdho vṛṣā vajriñciketasi
analyzed: yat indra hantave mṛdhaḥ vṛṣā vajrin ciketasi

original: RV_01.131.06.2{20} ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ
analyzed: ā me asya vedhasaḥ navīyasaḥ manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ

original: RV_01.131.07.1{20} tvaṃ tamindra vāvṛdhāno asmayuramitrayantaṃ tuvijāta martyaṃ vajreṇa śūra martyam /
analyzed: tvam tam indra vāvṛdhānaḥ asmayuḥ amitrayantam tuvi jāta martyam vajreṇa śūra martyam

original: jahi yo no aghāyati śṛṇuṣva suśravastamaḥ
analyzed: jahi yaḥ naḥ aghāyati śṛṇuṣva su śravastamaḥ

original: RV_01.131.07.2{20} riṣṭaṃ na yāmannapa bhūtu durmatirviśvāpa bhūtu durmatiḥ
analyzed: riṣṭam na yāman apa bhūtu durmatiḥ viśvā apa bhūtu durmatiḥ

original: RV_01.132.01.1{21} tvayā vayaṃ maghavan pūrvye dhana indratvotāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ /
analyzed: tvayā vayam maghavan pūrvye dhane indra tva utāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ

original: nediṣṭhe asminnahanyadhi vocā nu sunvate
analyzed: nediṣṭhe asmin ahani adhi vocāḥ nu sunvate

original: RV_01.132.01.2{21} asmin yajñe vi cayemā bhare kṛtaṃ vājayanto bhare kṛtam
analyzed: asmin yajñe vi cayema bhare kṛtam vājayantaḥ bhare kṛtam

original: RV_01.132.02.1{21} svarjeṣe bhara āprasya vakmanyuṣarbudhaḥ svasminnañjasikrāṇasya svasminnañjasi /
analyzed: svar jeṣe bhare āprasya vakmani uṣarbudhaḥ svasmin añjasi krāṇasya svasmin añjasi

original: ahannindro yathā vide śīrṣṇā-śīrṣṇopavācyaḥ
analyzed: ahan indraḥ yathā vide śīrṣṇā a śīrṣṇā upavācyaḥ

original: RV_01.132.02.2{21} asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayo bhadrā bhadrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayaḥ bhadrāḥ bhadrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_01.132.03.1{21} tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanaṃ yasmin yajñe vāramakṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vārasi kṣayam /
analyzed: tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanam yasmin yajñe vāram akṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya kṣayam

original: vi tad voceradha dvitāntaḥ paśyanti raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: vi tat voceḥ adha dvitā antar paśyanti raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_01.132.03.2{21} sa ghā vide anvindro gaveṣaṇo bandhukṣidbhyo gaveṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa ghā vide anu indraḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ bandhu kṣidbhyaḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_01.132.04.1{21} nū itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyaṃ yadaṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇorapa vrajamindra śikṣannapa vrajam /
analyzed: nu itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyam yat aṅgirobhyaḥ avṛṇoḥ apa vrajam indra śikṣan apa vrajam

analyzed: ā ebhyaḥ samānyā diśā asmabhyam jeṣi yotsi ca

analyzed: dūre cattāya chantsat gahanam yadinakṣat

analyzed: yāsām tisraḥ pañcāśataḥ abhivlaṅgaiḥ apāvapaḥ

analyzed: pra bodhaya purandhiṃjāre ā sasatīm iva

analyzed: tubhyam dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate

analyzed: ā rājānā divispṛśā asmatrā gantam upa naḥ

analyzed: ime vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ gavāśiraḥ somāḥ śukrāḥ gavāśiraḥ

original: RV_01.137.02.2{xx} uta vām uṣaso budhi sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: uta vām uṣasaḥ budhi sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_01.137.02.3{xx} suto mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cārur ṛtāya pītaye //
analyzed: sutaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cāruḥ ṛtāya pītaye

original: RV_01.137.03.1{xx} tāṃ vāṃ dhenuṃ na vāsarīm aṃśuṃ duhanty adribhiḥ somaṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
analyzed: tām vām dhenum na vāsarīm aṃśum duhanti adribhiḥ somam duhanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_01.137.03.2{xx} asmatrā gantam upa no 'rvāñcā somapītaye /
analyzed: asmatrā gantam upa naḥ arvāñcā soma pītaye

original: RV_01.137.03.3{xx} ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ soma ā pītaye sutaḥ //
analyzed: ayam vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ somaḥ ā pītaye sutaḥ

original: RV_01.138.01.1{xx} pra-pra pūṣṇas tuvijātasya śasyate mahitvam asya tavaso na tandate stotram asya na tandate /
analyzed: pra pra pūṣṇaḥ tuvi jātasya śasyate mahi tvam asya tavasaḥ na tandate stotram asya na tandate

original: RV_01.138.01.2{xx} arcāmi sumnayann aham antyūtim mayobhuvam /
analyzed: arcāmi sumnayan aham antyūtim mayobhuvam

original: RV_01.138.01.3{xx} viśvasya yo mana āyuyuve makho deva āyuyuve makhaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasya yaḥ manaḥ āyuyuve makhaḥ devaḥ āyuyuve makhaḥ

original: RV_01.138.02.1{xx} pra hi tvā pūṣann ajiraṃ na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇva ṛṇavo yathā mṛdha uṣṭro na pīparo mṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: pra hi tvā pūṣan ajiram na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇve ṛṇavaḥ yathā mṛdhaḥ uṣṭraḥ na pīparaḥ mṛdhaḥ

original: RV_01.138.02.2{xx} huve yat tvā mayobhuvaṃ devaṃ sakhyāya martyaḥ /
analyzed: huve yat tvā mayobhuvam devam sakhyāya martyaḥ

original: RV_01.138.02.3{xx} asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninas kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninas kṛdhi //
analyzed: asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninaḥ kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninaḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_01.138.03.1{xx} yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santo 'vasā bubhujrira iti kratvā bubhujrire /
analyzed: yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santaḥ avasā bubhujrire iti kratvā bubhujrire

original: RV_01.138.03.2{xx} tām anu tvā navīyasīṃ niyutaṃ rāya īmahe /
analyzed: tām anu tvā navīyasīm niyutam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_01.138.03.3{xx} aheḷamāna uruśaṃsa sarī bhava vāje-vāje sarī bhava //
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ uru śaṃsa sarī bhava vājevāje sarī bhava

original: RV_01.138.04.1{xx} asyā ū ṣu ṇa upa sātaye bhuvo 'heḷamāno rarivāṃ ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva /
analyzed: asyāḥ u su naḥ upa sātaye bhuvaḥ a heḍamānaḥ rarivān ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva

original: RV_01.138.04.2{xx} o ṣu tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhir dasma sādhubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā u su tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhiḥ dasma sādhubhiḥ

original: RV_01.138.04.3{xx} nahi tvā pūṣann atimanya āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve //
analyzed: nahi tvā pūṣan atimanye āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve

original: RV_01.139.01.1{xx} astu śrauṣaṭ puro agnīṃ dhiyā dadha ā nu tac chardho divyaṃ vṛṇīmaha indravāyū vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: astu śrauṣaṭ puras agnīm dhiyā dadhe ā nu tat śardhaḥ divyam vṛṇīmahe indra vāyū vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_01.139.01.2{xx} yad dha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī /
analyzed: yat ha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī

original: RV_01.139.01.3{xx} adha pra sū na upa yantu dhītayo devāṃ achā na dhītayaḥ //
analyzed: adha pra su naḥ upa yantu dhītayaḥ devān achā na dhītayaḥ

original: RV_01.139.02.1{xx} yad dha tyan mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtād adhy ādadāthe anṛtaṃ svena manyunā dakṣasya svena manyunā /
analyzed: yat ha tyad mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāt adhi ādadāthe anṛtam svena manyunā dakṣasya svena manyunā

original: RV_01.139.02.2{xx} yuvor itthādhi sadmasv apaśyāma hiraṇyayam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ itthā adhi sadmasu apaśyāma hiraṇyayam

original: RV_01.139.02.3{xx} dhībhiś cana manasā svebhir akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhir akṣabhiḥ //
analyzed: dhībhiḥ cana manasā svebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ

original: RV_01.139.03.1{xx} yuvāṃ stomebhir devayanto aśvināśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavo yuvāṃ havyābhy āyavaḥ /
analyzed: yuvām stomebhiḥ devayantaḥ aśvinā aśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavaḥ yuvām havyā abhi āyavaḥ

original: RV_01.139.03.2{xx} yuvor viśvā adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaś ca viśvavedasā /
analyzed: yuvoḥ viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaḥ ca viśva vedasā

original: RV_01.139.03.3{xx} pruṣāyante vām pavayo hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye //
analyzed: pruṣāyante vām pavayaḥ hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_01.139.04.1{xx} aceti dasrā vy ó nākam ṛṇvatho yuñjate vāṃ rathayujo diviṣṭiṣv adhvasmāno diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: aceti dasrā vi nākam yuñjate vām ratha yujaḥ diviṣṭiṣu adhvasmānaḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.139.04.2{xx} adhi vāṃ sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye /
analyzed: adhi vām sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye

original: RV_01.139.04.3{xx} patheva yantāv anuśāsatā rajo 'ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ //
analyzed: pathā iva yantau anuśāsatā rajaḥ añjasā śāsatā rajaḥ

original: RV_01.139.05.1{xx} śacībhir naḥ śacīvasū divā naktaṃ daśasyatam /
analyzed: śacībhiḥ naḥ śacī vasū divā naktam daśasyatam

original: RV_01.139.05.2{xx} mā vāṃ rātir upa dasat kadā canāsmad rātiḥ kadā cana //
analyzed: mā vām rātiḥ upa dasat kadā cana asmat rātiḥ kadā cana

original: RV_01.139.06.1{xx} vṛṣann indra vṛṣapāṇāsa indava ime sutā adriṣutāsa udbhidas tubhyaṃ sutāsa udbhidaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣan indra vṛṣapāṇāsaḥ indavaḥ ime sutāḥ adriṣutāsaḥ udbhidaḥ tubhyam sutāsaḥ udbhidaḥ

original: RV_01.139.06.2{xx} te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase /
analyzed: te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase

original: RV_01.139.06.3{xx} gīrbhir girvāha stavamāna ā gahi sumṛḷīko na ā gahi //
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ gir vāha stavamānaḥ ā gahi su mṛḍīkaḥ naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_01.139.07.1{xx} o ṣū ṇo agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḷito devebhyo bravasi yajñiyebhyo rājabhyo yajñiyebhyaḥ /
analyzed: ā u su naḥ agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḍitaḥ devebhyaḥ bravasi yajñiyebhyaḥ rājabhyaḥ yajñiyebhyaḥ

original: RV_01.139.07.2{xx} yad dha tyām aṅgirobhyo dhenuṃ devā adattana /
analyzed: yat ha tyām aṅgirobhyaḥ dhenum devāḥ adattana

original: RV_01.139.07.3{xx} vi tāṃ duhre aryamā kartarī sacāṃ eṣa tāṃ veda me sacā //
analyzed: vi tām duhre aryamā kartari sacā eṣa tām veda me sacā

original: RV_01.139.08.1{xx} mo ṣu vo asmad abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mota jāriṣur asmat purota jāriṣuḥ /
analyzed: mā u su vaḥ asmat abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mā uta jāriṣuḥ asmat purā uta jāriṣuḥ

original: RV_01.139.08.2{xx} yad vaś citraṃ yuge-yuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam /
analyzed: yat vaḥ citram yuge yuge navyam ghoṣāt amartyam

original: RV_01.139.08.3{xx} asmāsu tan maruto yac ca duṣṭaraṃ didhṛtā yac ca duṣṭaram //
analyzed: asmāsu tat marutaḥ yat ca duṣṭaram didhṛta yat ca duṣṭaram

original: RV_01.139.09.1{xx} dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvo aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvo atrir manur vidus te me pūrve manur viduḥ /
analyzed: dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvaḥ aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvaḥ atriḥ manuḥ viduḥ te me pūrve manuḥ viduḥ

original: RV_01.139.09.2{xx} teṣāṃ deveṣv āyatir asmākaṃ teṣu nābhayaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām deveṣu āyatiḥ asmākam teṣu nābhayaḥ

original: RV_01.139.09.3{xx} teṣām padena mahy ā name girendrāgnī ā name girā //
analyzed: teṣām padena mahi ā name girā indra agnī ā name girā

original: RV_01.139.10.1{xx} hotā yakṣad vanino vanta vāryam bṛhaspatir yajati vena ukṣabhiḥ puruvārebhir ukṣabhiḥ /
analyzed: hotā yakṣat vaninaḥ vanta vāryam bṛhaspatiḥ yajati venaḥ ukṣabhiḥ puru vārebhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ

original: RV_01.139.10.2{xx} jagṛbhmā dūraādiśaṃ ślokam adrer adha tmanā /
analyzed: jagṛbhmā dūraādiśam ślokam adreḥ adha tmanā

original: RV_01.139.10.3{xx} adhārayad ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ //
analyzed: adhārayat ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ

original: RV_01.139.11.1{xx} ye devāso divy ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhy ekādaśa stha /
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ divi ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhi ekādaśa stha

original: RV_01.139.11.2{xx} apsukṣito mahinaikādaśa stha te devāso yajñam imaṃ juṣadhvam //
analyzed: apsukṣitaḥ mahinā ekādaśa stha te devāsaḥ yajñam imam juṣadhvam

original: RV_01.140.01.1{xx} vediṣade priyadhāmāya sudyute dhāsim iva pra bharā yonim agnaye /
analyzed: vediṣade priya dhāmāya su dyute dhāsim iva pra bhara yonim agnaye

original: RV_01.140.01.2{xx} vastreṇeva vāsayā manmanā śuciṃ jyotīrathaṃ śukravarṇaṃ tamohanam //
analyzed: vastreṇa iva vāsaya manmanā śucim jyotīratham śukra varṇam tamaḥ hanam

original: RV_01.140.02.1{05} abhi dvijanmā trivṛdannam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdhamī punaḥ
analyzed: abhi dvi janmā trivṛt annam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe punar

original: RV_01.140.02.2{05} anyasyāsā jihvaya jenyo vṛṣā nyanyena vaninomṛṣṭa varaṇaḥ
analyzed: anyasya āsā jihvaya jenyaḥ vṛṣā ni anyena vaninā umṛṣṭa varaṇaḥ

original: RV_01.140.03.1{05} kṛṣṇaprutau vevije asya sakṣitā ubhā tarete abhi matarā śiśum
analyzed: kṛṣṇa prutau vevije asya sakṣitau ubhā tarete abhi matarā śiśum

original: RV_01.140.03.2{05} prācajihvaṃ dhvasayantaṃ tṛṣucyutamā sācyaṃ kupayaṃ vardhanaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: prācajihvam dhvasayantam tṛṣu cyutam ā sācyam kupayam vardhanam pituḥ

original: RV_01.140.04.1{05} mumukṣvo manave manavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇasītāsa ū juvaḥ
analyzed: mumukṣvaḥ manave manavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇa sītāsaḥ u juvaḥ

original: RV_01.140.04.2{05} asamanā ajirāso raghuṣyado vātajūtā upa yujyanta āśavaḥ
analyzed: asamanāḥ ajirāsaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ vāta jūtāḥ upa yujyante āśavaḥ

original: RV_01.140.05.1{05} ādasya te dhvasayanto vṛtherate kṛṣṇamabhvaṃ mahi varpaḥkarikrataḥ
analyzed: ādasya te dhvasayantaḥ vṛthā īrate kṛṣṇam abhvam mahi varpaḥ karikrataḥ

original: RV_01.140.05.2{05} yat sīṃ mahīmavaniṃ prābhi marmṛśadabhiśvasan stanayanneti nānadat
analyzed: yat sīm mahīm avanim pra abhi marmṛśat abhiśvasan stanayan eti nānadat

original: RV_01.140.06.1{06} bhūṣan na yo 'dhi babhrūṣu namnate vṛṣeva patnīrabhyeti roruvat
analyzed: bhūṣan na yaḥ adhi babhrūṣu vṛṣā iva patnīḥ abhyeti roruvat

original: RV_01.140.06.2{06} ojāyamānastanvaśca śumbhate bhīmo na śṛngādavidhava durgṛbhiḥ
analyzed: ojāyamānaḥ tanvaḥ ca śumbhate bhīmaḥ na śṛngāt avidhava durgṛbhiḥ

original: RV_01.140.07.1{06} sa saṃstiro viṣṭiraḥ saṃ gṛbhayati jananneva jānatīrnitya ā śaye
analyzed: sa saṃstiraḥ viṣṭiraḥ sam gṛbhayati janan eva jānatīḥ nityaḥ ā śaye

original: RV_01.140.07.2{06} punarvardhante api yanti devyamanyad varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā
analyzed: punar vardhante api yanti devyam anyat varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā

original: RV_01.140.08.1{06} tamagruvaḥ keśinīḥ saṃ hi rebhira ūrdhvāstasthurmamruṣīḥ prāyave punaḥ
analyzed: tam agruvaḥ keśinīḥ sam hi rebhire ūrdhvāḥ tasthuḥ mamruṣīḥ prāyave punar

original: RV_01.140.08.2{06} tāsāṃ jarāṃ pramuñcanneti nānadadasuṃ paraṃ janayañ jīvamastṛtam
analyzed: tāsām jarām pramuñcan eti nānadat asum param janayam jīvam astṛtam

original: RV_01.140.09.1{06} adhīvasaṃ pari matu rihannaha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhiryāti vi jrayaḥ
analyzed: adhīvasam pari matu rihan aha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhiḥ yāti vi jrayaḥ

original: RV_01.140.09.2{06} vayo dadhat padvate rerihat sadānu śyenī sacatevartanīraha
analyzed: vayaḥ dadhat padvate rerihat sadā anu śyenī

original: RV_01.140.10.1{06} asmākamagne maghavatsu dīdihyadha śvasīvān vṛṣabho damūnāḥ
analyzed: asmākam agne maghavatsu dīdihi adha śvasīvān vṛṣabhaḥ damūnāḥ

original: RV_01.140.10.2{06} avāsyā śiśumatīradīdervarmeva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ
analyzed: śiśumatīḥ adīdeḥ varmā iva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ

original: RV_01.140.11.1{07} idamagne sudhitaṃ durdhitādadhi priyādu cin manmanaḥ preyo astu te
analyzed: idam agne sudhitam durdhitāt adhi priyāt u cit manmanaḥ preyaḥ astu te

original: RV_01.140.11.2{07} yat te śukraṃ tanvo rocate śuci tenāsmabhyaṃvanase ratnamā tvam
analyzed: yat te śukram tanvaḥ rocate śuci tena asmabhyam vanase ratnamā tvam

original: RV_01.140.12.1{07} rathāya nāvamuta no gṛhāya nityāritrāṃ padvatīṃ rāsyagne
analyzed: rathāya nāvam uta naḥ gṛhāya nitya aritrām padvatīm rāsi agne

original: RV_01.140.12.2{07} asmākaṃ vīrānuta no maghono janāṃśca yā] pārayāccharma yā ca
analyzed: asmākam vīrān uta naḥ maghonaḥ janān ca yā pārayāt śarma yā ca

original: RV_01.140.13.1{07} abhī no agna ukthamijjuguryā dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaśca svagūrtāḥ
analyzed: abhi naḥ agne uktham id juguryāḥ dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaḥ ca sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_01.140.13.2{07} gavyaṃ yavyaṃ yanto dīrghāheṣaṃ varamaruṇyo varanta
analyzed: gavyam yavyam yantaḥ dīrgha ahā iṣam varam aruṇyaḥ varanta

original: RV_01.141.01.1{08} baḷ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso yato jani
analyzed: baḷ itthā tat vapuṣe dhāyi darśatam devasya bhargaḥ sahasaḥ yatas jani

original: RV_01.141.01.2{08} yadīmupa hvarate sādhate matirṛtasya dhena anayanta sasrutaḥ
analyzed: yadi īm upa hvarate sādhate matiḥ ṛtasya dhenā anayanta sasrutaḥ

original: RV_01.141.02.1{08} pṛkṣo vapuḥ pitumān nitya ā śaye dvitīyamā saptaśivāsu mātṛṣu
analyzed: pṛkṣaḥ vapuḥ pitumān nityaḥ ā śaye dvitīyamā sapta śivāsu mātṛṣu

original: RV_01.141.02.2{08} tṛtīyamasya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatiṃ janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatim janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_01.141.03.1{08} niryadīṃ budhnān mahiṣasya varpasa īśānāsaḥ śavasākranta sūrayaḥ
analyzed: niryadīm budhnāt mahiṣasya varpasaḥ īśānāsaḥ śavasā akranta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_01.141.03.2{08} yadīmanu pradivo madhva ādhave guhā santaṃ mātariśvā mathāyati
analyzed: yadi im anu pradivaḥ madhvaḥ ādhave guhā santam mātariśvā mathāyati

original: RV_01.141.04.1{08} pra yat pituḥ paramān nīyate paryā pṛkṣudho vīrudho daṃsu rohati
analyzed: pra yat pituḥ paramāt nīyate paryā pṛkṣudhaḥ vīrudhaḥ daṃsu rohati

original: RV_01.141.04.2{08} ubhā yadasya januṣaṃ yadinvata ādid yaviṣṭho abhavad ghṛṇā śuciḥ
analyzed: ubhā yadasya januṣam yadinvataḥ ādidh yaviṣṭhaḥ abhavat ghṛṇā śuciḥ

original: RV_01.141.05.1{08} ādin mātṝrāviśad yāsvā śucirahiṃsyamāna urviyāvi vāvṛdhe
analyzed: ādit mātṝḥ āviśat yāsvā śuciḥ a hiṃsyamānaḥ urviyāvi vāvṛdhe

original: RV_01.141.05.2{08} anu yat pūrvā aruhat sanājuvo ni navyasīṣvavarāsu dhāvate
analyzed: anu yat pūrvāḥ aruhat sanā juvaḥ ni navyasīṣu avarāsu dhāvate

original: RV_01.141.06.1{09} ādid dhotāraṃ vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagamiva papṛcānāsa ṛñjate
analyzed: ādit hotāram vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsaḥ ṛñjate

original: RV_01.141.06.2{09} devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭuto martaṃ saṃsaṃ viśvadhā veti dhāyase
analyzed: devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭutaḥ martam saṃsam viśvadhā veti dhāyase

original: RV_01.141.07.1{09} vi yadasthād yajato vātacodito hvāro na vakvā jaraṇā anākṛtaḥ
analyzed: vi yat asthāt yajataḥ vāta coditaḥ hvāraḥ na vakvā jaraṇāḥ anākṛtaḥ

original: RV_01.141.07.2{09} tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṃhasaḥ śucijanmano raja ā vyadhvanaḥ
analyzed: tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇa jaṃhasaḥ śuci janmanaḥ rajaḥ ā vyadhvanaḥ

original: RV_01.141.08.1{09} ratho na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛto dyāmaṅgebhiraruṣebhirīyate
analyzed: rathaḥ na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛtaḥ dyām aṅgebhiḥ aruṣebhiḥ īyate

original: RV_01.141.08.2{09} ādasya te kṛṣṇāso dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasyeva tveṣathādīṣate vayaḥ
analyzed: ādasya te kṛṣṇāsaḥ dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasya iva vayaḥ

original: RV_01.141.09.1{09} tvayā hyagne varuṇo dhṛtavrato mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ
analyzed: tvayā hi agne varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ

original: RV_01.141.09.2{09} yat sīmanu kratunā viśvathā vibhurarān na nemiḥ paribhūrajāyathāḥ
analyzed: yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhuḥ arāt na nemiḥ paribhūḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: RV_01.141.10.1{09} tvamagne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnaṃ yaviṣṭha devatātiminvasi
analyzed: tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnam yaviṣṭha devatā atiminvasi

original: RV_01.141.10.2{09} taṃ tvā nu navyaṃ sahaso yuvan vayaṃ bhagaṃ na kāremahiratna dhīmahi
analyzed: tam tvā nu navyam sahasaḥ yuvan vayam bhagam na dhīmahi

original: RV_01.141.11.1{09} asme rayiṃ na svarthaṃ damūnasaṃ bhagaṃ dakṣaṃ na papṛcāsi dharṇasim
analyzed: asme rayim na su artham damūnasam bhagam dakṣam na papṛcāsi dharṇasim

original: RV_01.141.11.2{09} raśmīnriva yo yamati janmanī ubhe devānāṃ śaṃsam ṛta ā ca sukratuḥ
analyzed: raśmīn riva yaḥ yamati janmanī ubhe devānām śaṃsam ṛte ā ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_01.141.12.1{09} uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvo hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavaccandrarathaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ sudyotmā jīra aśvaḥ hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavat candra rathaḥ

original: RV_01.141.12.2{09} sa no neṣan neṣatamairamūro 'gnirvāmaṃ suvitaṃ vasyo acha
analyzed: sa naḥ neṣat neṣatamaiḥ amūraḥ agniḥ vāmam suvitam vasyaḥ acha

original: RV_01.141.13.1{09} astāvyagniḥ śimīvadbhirarkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataraṃ dadhānaḥ
analyzed: astāvi agniḥ śimīvadbhiḥ arkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataram dadhānaḥ

original: RV_01.141.13.2{09} amī ca ye maghavāno vayaṃ ca mihaṃ na sūro atiniṣ ṭatanyuḥ
analyzed: amī ca ye maghavānaḥ vayam ca miham na sūraḥ atiniḥ tatanyuḥ

original: RV_01.142.01.1{10} samiddho agna ā vaha devānadya yatasruce
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne ā vaha devān adya yata sruce

original: RV_01.142.01.2{10} tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ sutasomāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam suta somāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_01.142.02.1{10} ghṛtavantamupa māsi madhumantaṃ tanūnapāt
analyzed: ghṛtavantam upa māsi madhumantam tanūnapāt

original: RV_01.142.02.2{10} yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ
analyzed: yajñam viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ

original: RV_01.142.03.1{10} śuciḥ pāvako adbhuto madhvā yajñaṃ mimikṣati
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ adbhutaḥ madhvā yajñam mimikṣati

original: RV_01.142.03.2{10} narāśaṃsaḥ trirā divo devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ trirā divaḥ devaḥ deveṣu yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_01.142.04.1{10} īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citramiha priyam
analyzed: īḍitaḥ agne ā vaha indram citram iha priyam

original: RV_01.142.04.2{10} iyaṃ hi tvā matirmamāchā sujihva vacyate
analyzed: iyam hi tvā matiḥ mama achā su jihva vacyate

original: RV_01.142.05.1{10} stṛṇānāso yatasruco barhiryajñe svadhvare
analyzed: stṛṇānāsaḥ yata srucaḥ barhiḥ yajñe su adhvare

original: RV_01.142.05.2{10} vṛñje devavyacastamamindrāya śarma saprathaḥ
analyzed: vṛñje deva vyacastamam indrāya śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_01.142.06.1{10} vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyo mahīḥ
analyzed: vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_01.142.06.2{10} pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛho dvāro devīrasaścataḥ
analyzed: pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛhaḥ dvāraḥ devī rasaścataḥ

original: RV_01.142.07.1{11} ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā
analyzed: ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā

original: RV_01.142.07.2{11} yahvī ṛtaśyamātarā sīdatāṃ barhirā sumat
analyzed: yahvī ṛtaśyamātarā sīdatām barhirā sumat

original: RV_01.142.08.1{11} mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī
analyzed: mandra jihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī

original: RV_01.142.08.2{11} yajñaṃ no yakṣatāmimaṃ sidhramadya divispṛśam
analyzed: yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam sidhram adya divispṛśam

original: RV_01.142.09.1{11} śucirdeveṣvarpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī
analyzed: śuciḥ deveṣu arpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī

original: RV_01.142.09.2{11} iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ
analyzed: iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_01.142.10.1{11} tan nasturīpamadbhutaṃ puru vāraṃ puru tmanā
analyzed: tat naḥ turīpam adbhutam puru vāram puru tmanā

original: RV_01.142.10.2{11} tvaṣṭāpoṣāya vi ṣyatu rāye nābhā no asmayuḥ
analyzed: tvaṣṭā apoṣāya vi syatu rāye nābhā naḥ asmayuḥ

original: RV_01.142.11.1{11} avasṛjannupa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate
analyzed: avasṛjan upa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate

original: RV_01.142.11.2{11} agnirhavyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiraḥ
analyzed: agniḥ havyā suṣūdati devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ

original: RV_01.142.12.1{11} pūṣaṇvate marutvate viśvadevāya vāyave
analyzed: pūṣaṇvate marutvate viśva devāya vāyave

original: RV_01.142.12.2{11} svāhā gāyatravepase havyamindrāya kartana
analyzed: svāhā gāyatra vepase havyam indrāya kartana

original: RV_01.142.13.1{11} svāhākṛtānyā gahyupa havyāni vītaye
analyzed: svāhākṛtā anyā ā gahi upa havyāni vītaye

original: RV_01.142.13.2{11} indrā gahi śrudhī havaṃ tvāṃ havante adhvare
analyzed: indra ā gahi śrudhi havam tvām havante adhvare

original: RV_01.143.01.1{12} pra tavyasīṃ navyasīṃ dhītimagnaye vāco matiṃ sahasaḥsūnave bhare
analyzed: pra tavyasīm navyasīm dhītim agnaye vācaḥ matim sahasaḥ sūnave bhare

original: RV_01.143.01.2{12} apāṃ napād yo vasubhiḥ saha priyo hotā pṛthivyāṃ nyasīdad ṛtviyaḥ
analyzed: apām napāt yaḥ vasubhiḥ saha priyaḥ hotā pṛthivyām nyasīdat ṛtviyaḥ

original: RV_01.143.02.1{12} sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomanyāviragnirabhavan mātariśvane
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani āvis agniḥ abhavat mātariśvane

original: RV_01.143.02.2{12} asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat
analyzed: asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat

original: RV_01.143.03.1{12} asya tveṣā ajarā asya bhānavaḥ susandṛśaḥ supratīkasyasudyutaḥ
analyzed: asya tveṣāḥ ajarāḥ asya bhānavaḥ su sandṛśaḥ su pratīkasya asu dyutaḥ

original: RV_01.143.03.2{12} bhātvakṣaso atyakturna sindhavo 'gne rejante asasanto ajarāḥ
analyzed: bhātvakṣasaḥ a tyaktuḥ na sindhavaḥ agne rejante a sasantaḥ ajarāḥ

original: RV_01.143.04.1{12} yamerire bhṛgavo viśvavedasaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā bhuvanasya majmanā
analyzed: yam erire bhṛgavaḥ viśva vedasam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ bhuvanasya majmanā

original: RV_01.143.04.2{12} agniṃ taṃ gīrbhirhinuhi sva ā dame ya eko vasvo varuṇo na rājati
analyzed: agnim tam gīrbhiḥ hinuhi sve ā dame yaḥ ekaḥ vasvaḥ varuṇaḥ na rājati

original: RV_01.143.05.1{12} na yo varāya marutāmiva svanaḥ seneva sṛṣṭā divyā yathāśaniḥ
analyzed: na yaḥ varāya marutām iva svanaḥ senā iva sṛṣṭā divyā yathā aśaniḥ

original: RV_01.143.05.2{12} agnirjambhaistigitairatti bharvati yodho na śatrūn sa vanā ny ṛñjate
analyzed: agniḥ jambhaiḥ tigitaiḥ atti bharvati yodhaḥ na śatrūn sa vanā ni ṛñjate

original: RV_01.143.06.1{12} kuvin no agnirucathasya vīrasad vasuṣ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmamāvarat
analyzed: kuvid naḥ agniḥ ucathasya vīra sad vasuḥ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat

original: RV_01.143.06.2{12} codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śucipratīkaṃ tamayā dhiyā gṛṇe
analyzed: codaḥ kuvid tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śuci pratīkam tamayā dhiyā gṛṇe

original: RV_01.143.07.1{12} ghṛtapratīkaṃ va ṛtasya dhūrṣadamagniṃ mitraṃ na samidhāna ṛñjate
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkam vaḥ ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitram na samidhānaḥ ṛñjate

original: RV_01.143.07.2{12} indhāno akro vidatheṣu dīdyacchukravarṇāmudu no yaṃsate dhiyam
analyzed: indhānaḥ akraḥ vidatheṣu dīdyat śukra varṇām udu naḥ yaṃsate dhiyam

original: RV_01.143.08.1{12} aprayuchannaprayuchadbhiragne śivebhirnaḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ
analyzed: aprayuchanna prayuchadbhiḥ agne śivebhiḥ naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ

original: RV_01.143.08.2{12} adabdhebhiradṛpitebhiriṣṭe 'nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi no jāḥ
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ a dṛpitebhiḥ iṣṭe a nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi naḥ jāḥ

original: RV_01.144.01.1{13} eti pra hotā vratamasya māyayordhvāṃ dadhānaḥ śucipeśasaṃ dhiyam
analyzed: eti pra hotā vratamasya māyayā ūrdhvām dadhānaḥ śuci peśasam dhiyam

original: RV_01.144.01.2{13} abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛto yā asya dhāma prathamaṃ ha niṃsate
analyzed: abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇa āvṛtaḥ yāḥ asya dhāma prathamam ha niṃsate

original: RV_01.144.02.1{13} abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ
analyzed: abhi īm ṛtasya dohanāḥ anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ

original: RV_01.144.02.2{13} apāmupasthe vibhṛto yadāvasadadha svadhā adhayad yābhirīyate
analyzed: apām upasthe vibhṛtaḥ yadā avasat adha svadhāḥ adhayat yābhiḥ īyate

original: RV_01.144.03.1{13} yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tadid vapuḥ samānamarthaṃ vitaritratā mithaḥ
analyzed: yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tat id vapuḥ samānam artham vitaritratā mithas

original: RV_01.144.03.2{13} ādīṃ bhago na havyaḥ samasmadā voḷhurna raśmīn samayaṃsta sārathiḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ na havyaḥ sam asmadā voḷhuḥ na raśmīn samayaṃsta sārathiḥ

original: RV_01.144.04.1{13} yamīṃ dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā
analyzed: yamīm dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā

original: RV_01.144.04.2{13} divā na naktaṃ palito yuvājani purū carannajaro mānuṣā yugā
analyzed: divā na naktam palitaḥ yuvā ajani purū caran ajaraḥ mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_01.144.05.1{13} tamīṃ hinvanti dhītayo daśa vriśo devaṃ martāsa ūtaye havāmahe
analyzed: tamīm hinvanti dhītayaḥ daśa vriśaḥ devam martāsaḥ ūtaye havāmahe

original: RV_01.144.05.2{13} dhanoradhi pravata ā sa ṛṇvatyabhivrajadbhirvayunā navādhita
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi pravataḥ ā saḥ ṛṇvati abhivrajadbhiḥ vayunā nava adhita

original: RV_01.144.06.1{13} tvaṃ hyagne divyasya rājasi tvaṃ pārthivasya paśupā iva tmanā
analyzed: tvam hi agne divyasya rājasi tvam pārthivasya paśu pāḥ iva tmanā

original: RV_01.144.06.2{13} enī ta ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhirāśāte
analyzed: enī te ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhiḥ āśāte

original: RV_01.144.07.1{13} agne juṣasva prati harya tad vaco mandra svadhāva ṛtajāta sukrato
analyzed: agne juṣasva prati harya tat vacaḥ mandra svadhāvas ṛta jāta su krato

original: RV_01.144.07.2{13} yo viśvataḥ partyaṃṃ asi darśato raṇvaḥ sandṛṣṭau pitumāniva kṣayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ viśvatas partyam asi darśataḥ raṇvaḥ san dṛṣṭau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ

original: RV_01.145.01.1{14} taṃ pṛchatā sa jagāmā sa veda sa cikitvānīyate sā nvīyate
analyzed: tam pṛcchata sa jagāma sa veda sa cikitvā ānīyate sā nu īyate

original: RV_01.145.01.2{14} tasmin santi praśiṣastasminniṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇas patiḥ
analyzed: tasmin santi praśiṣaḥ tasmin niṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_01.145.02.1{14} tamit pṛchanti na simo vi pṛchati sveneva dhīro manasā yadagrabhīt
analyzed: tam id pṛcchanti na simaḥ vi pṛcchati svena iva dhīraḥ manasā yat agrabhīt

original: RV_01.145.02.2{14} na mṛṣyate prathamaṃ nāparaṃ vaco 'sya kratvasacate apradṛpitaḥ
analyzed: na mṛṣyate prathamam na aparam vacaḥ asya kratu asacate a pradṛpitaḥ

original: RV_01.145.03.1{14} tamid gachanti juhvastamarvatīrviśvānyekaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me
analyzed: tam id gacchanti juhvaḥ tam arvatīḥ viśvāni ekaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṃsi me

original: RV_01.145.03.2{14} purupraiṣastaturiryajñasādhano 'chidrotiḥ śiśurādatta saṃ rabhaḥ
analyzed: puru praiṣaḥ taturiḥ yajña sādhanaḥ achidra ūtiḥ śiśuḥ ādatta sam rabhaḥ

original: RV_01.145.04.1{14} upasthāyaṃ carati yat samārata sadyo jātastatsāra yujyebhiḥ
analyzed: upasthāyam carati yat samārata sadyas jātaḥ tat sāra yujyebhiḥ

original: RV_01.145.04.2{14} abhi śvāntaṃ mṛśate nāndye mude yadīṃ gachantyuśatīrapiṣṭhitam
analyzed: abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude yadi īm gacchanti uśatīḥ apiṣṭhitam

original: RV_01.145.05.1{14} sa īṃ mṛgo apyo vanargurupa tvacyupamasyāṃ ni dhāyi
analyzed: saḥ īm mṛgaḥ apyaḥ vanarguḥ upa tvaci upamasyām ni dhāyi

original: RV_01.145.05.2{14} vyabravīd vayunā martyebhyo 'gnirvidvān ṛtacid dhi satyaḥ
analyzed: vyabravīt vayunā martyebhyaḥ agniḥ vidvān ṛta cit hi satyaḥ

original: RV_01.146.01.1{15} trimūrdhānaṃ saptaraśmiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nūnamagniṃ pitrorupasthe
analyzed: tri mūrdhānam sapta raśmim gṛṇīṣe anūnam agnim pitroḥ upasthe

original: RV_01.146.01.2{15} niṣattamasya carato dhruvasya viśvā divo rocanāpaprivāṃsam
analyzed: niṣattamasya carataḥ dhruvasya viśvā divaḥ rocanā āpaprivāṃsam

original: RV_01.146.02.1{15} ukṣā mahānabhi vavakṣa ene ajarastasthāvitaūtirṛṣvaḥ
analyzed: ukṣā mahān abhi vavakṣa ene ajaraḥ tasthau itaūtiḥ ṛṣvaḥ

original: RV_01.146.02.2{15} urvyāḥ pado ni dadhāti sānau rihantyūdho aruṣāso asya
analyzed: urvyāḥ padaḥ ni dadhāti sānau rihanti ūdhaḥ aruṣāsaḥ asya

original: RV_01.146.03.1{15} samānaṃ vatsamabhi saṃcarantī viṣvag dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke
analyzed: samānam vatsam abhi saṃcarantī viṣvak dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke

original: RV_01.146.03.2{15} anapavṛjyānadhvano mimāne viśvān ketānadhi mahodadhāne
analyzed: an apavṛjya an adhvanaḥ mimāne viśvān ketān adhi mahā udadhāne

original: RV_01.146.04.1{15} dhīrāsaḥ padaṃ kavayo nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇā ajuryam
analyzed: dhīrāsaḥ padam kavayaḥ nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇāḥ ajuryam

original: RV_01.146.04.2{15} siṣāsantaḥ paryapaśyanta sindhumāvirebhyo abhavatsūryo nṝn
analyzed: siṣāsantaḥ paryapaśyanta sindhum āvirebhyaḥ abhavat sūryaḥ nṝn

original: RV_01.146.05.1{15} didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenya īḷenyo maho arbhāya jīvase
analyzed: didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenyaḥ īḍenyaḥ mahaḥ arbhāya jīvase

original: RV_01.146.05.2{15} purutrā yadabhavat sūrahaibhyo garbhebhyo maghavā viśvadarśataḥ
analyzed: purutrā yat abhavat sūra hā ebhyaḥ garbhebhyaḥ maghavā viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_01.147.01.1{16} kathā te agne śucayanta āyordadāśurvājebhirāśuṣāṇāḥ
analyzed: kathā te agne śucayantaḥ āyoḥ dadāśuḥ vājebhiḥ āśuṣāṇāḥ

original: RV_01.147.01.2{16} ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānā ṛtasya sāman raṇayantadevāḥ
analyzed: ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānāḥ ṛtasya sāman raṇayantadevāḥ

original: RV_01.147.02.1{16} bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ
analyzed: bodha me asya vacasaḥ yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvas

original: RV_01.147.02.2{16} pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandāruste tanvaṃ vandeagne
analyzed: pīyati tvaḥ anu tvaḥ gṛṇāti vandāruḥ te tanvam vandeagne

original: RV_01.147.03.1{16} ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritādarakṣan
analyzed: ye pāyavaḥ māmateyam te agne paśyantaḥ andham duritāt arakṣan

original: RV_01.147.03.2{16} rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ
analyzed: rarakṣa tān su kṛtaḥ viśva vedāḥ dipsantaḥ id ripavaḥ na aha debhuḥ

original: RV_01.147.04.1{16} yo no agne ararivānaghāyurarātīvā marcayati dvayena
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agne a rarivān aghāyuḥ arātīvā marcayati dvayena

original: RV_01.147.04.2{16} mantro guruḥ punarastu so asmā anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvaṃ duruktaiḥ
analyzed: mantraḥ guruḥ punar astu saḥ asmai anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvam duruktaiḥ

original: RV_01.147.05.1{16} uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān marto martaṃ marcayati dvayena
analyzed: uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān martaḥ martam marcayati dvayena

original: RV_01.147.05.2{16} ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantamagne mākirno duritāya dhāyīḥ
analyzed: atas pāhi stavamāna stuvantam agne mākir naḥ duritāya

original: RV_01.148.01.1{17} mathīd yadīṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam
analyzed: mathīt yadi īm viṣṭaḥ mātariśvā hotāram viśva apsum viśvadevyam

original: RV_01.148.01.2{17} ni yaṃ dadhurmanuṣyāsu vikṣu svarṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam
analyzed: ni yam dadhuḥ manuṣyāsu vikṣu svarṇa citram vapuṣe vibhāvam

original: RV_01.148.02.1{17} dadānamin na dadabhanta manmāgnirvarūthaṃ mama tasya cākan
analyzed: dadānam id na dadabhanta manma agniḥ varūtham mama tasya cākan

original: RV_01.148.02.2{17} juṣanta viśvanyasya karmopastutiṃ bharamāṇasya kāroḥ
analyzed: juṣanta viśvanyasya karma upastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ

original: RV_01.148.03.1{17} nitye cin nu yaṃ sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhirdadhire yajñiyasaḥ
analyzed: nitye cit nu yam sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhiḥ dadhire yajñiyasaḥ

original: RV_01.148.03.2{17} pra sū nayanta gṛbhayanta iṣṭāvaśvāso na rathyorarahaṇāḥ
analyzed: pra su nayanta gṛbhayantaḥ iṣṭau aśvāsaḥ na

original: RV_01.148.04.1{17} purūṇi dasmo ni riṇāti jambhairād rocate vana ā vibhāvā
analyzed: purūṇi dasmaḥ ni riṇāti jambhairāt rocate vane ā vibhāvā

original: RV_01.148.04.2{17} ādasya vāto anu vāti śocirasturna śaryāmasanāmanu dyūn
analyzed: ādasya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ astuḥ na śaryāma sanām anu dyūn

original: RV_01.148.05.1{17} na yaṃ ripavo na riṣaṇyavo garbhe santaṃ reṣaṇā reṣayanti
analyzed: na yam ripavaḥ na riṣaṇyavaḥ garbhe santam reṣaṇāḥ reṣayanti

original: RV_01.148.05.2{17} andhā apaśyā na dabhannabhikhyā nityāsa īṃ pretāro arakṣan
analyzed: andhāḥ apaśyāḥ na dabhan abhikhyāḥ nityāsaḥ īm pretāraḥ arakṣan

original: RV_01.149.01.1{18} mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate patirdannina inasya vasunaḥ pada ā
analyzed: mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ eṣate patiḥ danninaḥ inasya vasunaḥ pade ā

original: RV_01.149.01.2{18} upa dhrajantamadrayo vidhannit
analyzed: upa dhrajantam adrayaḥ vidhan id

original: RV_01.149.02.1{18} sa yo vṛṣā narāṃ na rodasyoḥ śravobhirasti jīvapītasargaḥ
analyzed: sa yaḥ vṛṣā narām na rodasyoḥ śravobhiḥ asti jīva pīta sargaḥ

original: RV_01.149.02.2{18} pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau
analyzed: pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau

original: RV_01.149.03.1{18} ā yaḥ puraṃ nārmiṇīmadīdedatyaḥ kavirnabhanyo nārva
analyzed: ā yaḥ puram nārmiṇīm adīdedatyaḥ kaviḥ nabhanyaḥ

original: RV_01.149.03.2{18} sūro na rurukvāñchatātmā
analyzed: sūraḥ na rurukvān śata ātmā

original: RV_01.149.04.1{18} abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni viśva rajāṃsi śuśucano asthāt
analyzed: abhi dvi janmā trī rocanāni viśva rajāṃsi śuśucanaḥ asthāt

original: RV_01.149.04.2{18} hotā yajiṣṭho apāṃ sadhasthe
analyzed: hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ apām sadhasthe

original: RV_01.149.05.1{18} ayaṃ sa hota yo dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā
analyzed: ayam sa hota yaḥ dvi janmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā

original: RV_01.149.05.2{18} marto yo asmai sutuko dadāśa
analyzed: martaḥ yaḥ asmai sutukaḥ dadāśa

original: RV_01.150.01.1{19} puru tva dāśvān voce 'riragne tava svidā
analyzed: puru tva dāśvān voce ariḥ agne tava svidā

original: RV_01.150.01.2{19} todasyeva śaraṇa ā mahasya
analyzed: todasya iva śaraṇe ā mahasya

original: RV_01.150.02.1{19} vyaninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cidararuṣaḥ
analyzed: vyaninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cidararuṣaḥ

original: RV_01.150.02.2{19} kadā cana prajigato adevayoḥ
analyzed: kadā cana prajigataḥ a devayoḥ

original: RV_01.150.03.1{19} sa candro vipra martyo maho vrādhantamo divi
analyzed: sa candraḥ vipra martyaḥ mahaḥ vrādhantamaḥ divi

original: RV_01.150.03.2{19} pra-pret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma
analyzed: prapret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma

original: RV_01.151.01.1{20} mitraṃ na yaṃ śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ svādhyo vidathe apsujījanan
analyzed: mitram na yam śimyāḥ goṣu gavyavaḥ su ādhyaḥ vidathe apsujījanan

original: RV_01.151.01.2{20} arejetāṃ rodasī pājasā girā prati priyaṃ yajataṃ januṣamavaḥ
analyzed: arejetām rodasī pājasā girā prati priyam yajatam januṣam avaḥ

original: RV_01.151.02.1{20} yad dha tyad vāṃ purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāso na dadhire svābhuvaḥ
analyzed: yat ha tyad vām purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāsaḥ na dadhire su ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_01.151.02.2{20} adha kratuṃ vidataṃ gatumarcata uta śrutaṃ vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ
analyzed: adha kratum vidatam gatum arcataḥ uta śrutam vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ

original: RV_01.151.03.1{20} ā vāṃ bhūṣan kṣitayo janma rodasyoḥ pravācyaṃ vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe
analyzed: ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayaḥ janma rodasyoḥ pravācyam vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe

original: RV_01.151.03.2{20} yadīm ṛtāya bharatho yadarvate pra hotrayā śimya vītho adhvaram
analyzed: yadi īm ṛtāya bharathaḥ yadā arvate pra hotrayā śimya vīthaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_01.151.04.1{20} pra sā kṣitirasura yā mahi priya ṛtāvānāv ṛtamā ghoṣatho bṛhat
analyzed: pra sā kṣitiḥ asura yā mahi priye ṛtāvānau ṛtamā ghoṣathaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_01.151.04.2{20} yuvaṃ divo bṛhato dakṣamabhuvaṃ gāṃ na dhuryupa yuñjāthe apaḥ
analyzed: yuvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ dakṣam abhuvam gām na dhuri upa yuñjāthe apaḥ

original: RV_01.151.05.1{20} mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvatho 'reṇavastuja ā sadman dhenavaḥ
analyzed: mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvathaḥ areṇavastujaḥ ā sadman dhenavaḥ

original: RV_01.151.05.2{20} svaranti tā uparatāti sūryamā nimruca uṣasastakvavīriva
analyzed: svaranti tāḥ uparatāti sūryamā nimrucaḥ uṣasaḥ takvavīḥ iva

original: RV_01.151.06.1{21} ā vam ṛtāya keśinīranuṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātumarcathaḥ
analyzed: ā vam ṛtāya keśinīḥ anuṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ

original: RV_01.151.06.2{21} ava tmana sṛjataṃ pinvataṃ dhiyo yuvaṃ viprasya manmanamirajyathaḥ
analyzed: ava sṛjatam pinvatam dhiyaḥ yuvam viprasya manmanam irajyathaḥ

original: RV_01.151.07.1{21} yo vāṃ yajñaiḥ śaśamāno ha dāśati kavirhotā yajati manmasādhanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñaiḥ śaśamānaḥ ha dāśati kaviḥ hotā yajati manma sādhanaḥ

original: RV_01.151.07.2{21} upāha taṃ gachatho vītho adhvaramachā giraḥ sumatiṃ gantamasmayu
