analyzed: upa aha tam gachathaḥ vīthaḥ adhvaram achā giraḥ sumatim gantam asmayu

original: RV_01.151.08.1{21} yuvāṃ yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhirañjata ṛtāvanā manaso naprayuktiṣu
analyzed: yuvām yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhiḥ añjataḥ ṛtāvanā manasaḥ naprayuktiṣu

original: RV_01.151.08.2{21} bharanti vāṃ manmanā saṃyatā giro 'dṛpyatā manasa revadaśāthe
analyzed: bharanti vām manmanā saṃyatāḥ giraḥ a dṛpyatā manasa

original: RV_01.151.09.1{21} revad vayo dadhāthe revadāśathe narā mayābhiritauti mahinam
analyzed: revat vayaḥ dadhāthe revat āśathe narā mayā abhiritauti mahinam

original: RV_01.151.09.2{21} na vaṃ dyāvo 'habhirnota sindhavo na devatvaṃ paṇayo nānaśurmagham
analyzed: na vam dyāvaḥ ahabhiḥ na uta sindhavaḥ na deva tvam paṇayaḥ nā anaśuḥ magham

original: RV_01.152.01.1{22} yuvaṃ vastraṇi puvasā vasāthe yuvorachidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ
analyzed: yuvam vastraṇi puvasā vasāthe yuvoḥ achidrāḥ mantavaḥ ha sargāḥ

original: RV_01.152.01.2{22} avātiratamanṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe
analyzed: avātiratam anṛtāni viśve ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe

original: RV_01.152.02.1{22} etaccana tvo vi ciketadeṣāṃ satyo mantraḥ kaviśasta ṛghāvān
analyzed: etat cana tvaḥ vi ciketat eṣām satyaḥ mantraḥ kavi śastaḥ ṛghāvān

original: RV_01.152.02.2{22} triraśriṃ hanti caturaśrirugro devanido ha prathamāajūryan
analyzed: triraśrim hanti catur aśriḥ ugraḥ deva nidaḥ ha prathamāḥ ajūryan

original: RV_01.152.03.1{22} apādeti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kastad vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ciketa
analyzed: a pādā iti prathamā padvatīnām kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa

original: RV_01.152.03.2{22} garbho bhāraṃ bharatyā cidasya ṛtaṃ pipartyanṛtaṃ ni tārīt
analyzed: garbhaḥ bhāram bharati ā cit asya ṛtam piparti anṛtam ni tārīt

original: RV_01.152.04.1{22} prayantamit pari jāraṃ kanīnāṃ paśyāmasi nopanipadyamānam
analyzed: prayantam id pari jāram kanīnām paśyāmasi na upanipadyamānam

original: RV_01.152.04.2{22} anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānaṃ priyaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma
analyzed: an avapṛgṇāḥ vitatāḥ vasānam priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma

original: RV_01.152.05.1{22} anaśvo jāto anabhīśurarvā kanikradat patayadūrdhvasānuḥ
analyzed: an aśvaḥ jātaḥ an abhīśuḥ arvā kanikradat patayat ūrdhva sānuḥ

original: RV_01.152.05.2{22} acittaṃ brahma jujuṣuryuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇegṛṇantaḥ
analyzed: acittam brahma jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇegṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_01.152.06.1{22} ā dhenavo māmateyamavantīrbrahmapriyaṃ pīpayan sasminnūdhan
analyzed: ā dhenavaḥ māmateyam avantīḥ brahma priyam pīpayan sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_01.152.06.2{22} pitvo bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvānāsāvivāsannaditimuruṣyet
analyzed: pitvaḥ bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān āsa vivāsan aditim uruṣyet

original: RV_01.152.07.1{22} ā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ namasā devāvavasā vavṛtyām
analyzed: ā vām mitrāvaruṇāḥ havya juṣṭim namasā deva avasā vavṛtyām

original: RV_01.152.07.2{22} asmākaṃ brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭirdivyāsupārā
analyzed: asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyāḥ asmākam vṛṣṭiḥ divyā su pārā

original: RV_01.153.01.1{23} yajāmahe vāṃ mahaḥ sajoṣā havyebhirmitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ
analyzed: yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣāḥ havyebhiḥ mitrāvaruṇāḥ namobhiḥ

original: RV_01.153.01.2{23} ghṛtairghṛtasnū adha yad vāmasme adhvaryavo na dhītibhirbharanti
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ ghṛtasnū adha yat vām asme adhvaryavaḥ na dhītibhiḥ bharanti

original: RV_01.153.02.1{23} prastutirvāṃ dhāma na prayuktirayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ
analyzed: prastutiḥ vām dhāma na prayuktiḥ ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ

original: RV_01.153.02.2{23} anakti yad vāṃ vidatheṣu hotā sumnaṃ vāṃ sūrirvṛṣaṇāviyakṣan
analyzed: anakti yat vām vidatheṣu hotā sumnam vām sūriḥ vṛṣaṇa a viyakṣan

original: RV_01.153.03.1{23} pīpāya dhenuraditirṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde
analyzed: pīpāya dhenuḥ aditiḥ ṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā haviḥ de

original: RV_01.153.03.2{23} hinoti yad vāṃ vidathe saparyan sa rātahavyo mānuṣo na hotā
analyzed: hinoti yat vām vidathe saparyan sa rāta havyaḥ mānuṣaḥ na hotā

original: RV_01.153.04.1{23} uta vāṃ vikṣu madyāsvandho gāva āpaśca pīpayanta devīḥ
analyzed: uta vām vikṣu madyāsu andhaḥ gāvaḥ āpaḥ ca pīpayanta devīḥ

original: RV_01.153.04.2{23} uto no asya pūrvyaḥ patirdan vītaṃ pātaṃ payasa usriyāyāḥ
analyzed: uta u naḥ asya pūrvyaḥ patiḥ dan vītam pātam payasaḥ usriyāyāḥ

original: RV_01.154.01.1{24} viṣṇornu kaṃ vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yaḥ pārthivāni vimamerajāṃsi
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ nu kam vīryāṇi pra vocam yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi

original: RV_01.154.01.2{24} yo askabhāyaduttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇastredhorugāyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ askabhāyat uttaram sadhastham vicakramāṇaḥ tredhā urugāyaḥ

original: RV_01.154.02.1{24} pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryeṇa mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: pra tat viṣṇuḥ stavate vīryeṇa mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_01.154.02.2{24} yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣvadhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: yasya uruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣu adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.154.03.1{24} pra viṣṇave śūṣametu manma girikṣita urugāyāya vṛṣṇe
analyzed: pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma giri kṣite uru gāyāya vṛṣṇe

original: RV_01.154.03.2{24} ya idaṃ dīrghaṃ prayataṃ sadhasthameko vimame tribhirit padebhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ idam dīrgham prayatam sadhastham ekaḥ vimame tribhiḥ id padebhiḥ

original: RV_01.154.04.1{24} yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padānyakṣīyamāṇā svadhayāmadanti
analyzed: yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāni a kṣīyamāṇā svadhayā amadanti

original: RV_01.154.04.2{24} ya u tridhātu pṛtivīmuta dyāmeko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: yaḥ u tri dhātu pṛtivīm uta dyām ekaḥ dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.154.05.1{24} tadasya priyamabhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti
analyzed: tat asya priyam abhi pāthaḥ aśyām naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti

original: RV_01.154.05.2{24} urukramasya sa hi bandhuritthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva utsaḥ
analyzed: urukramasya sa hi bandhuḥ itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhvaḥ utsaḥ

original: RV_01.154.06.1{24} tā vaṃ vāstūnyuśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgāayāsaḥ
analyzed: tā vam vāstūni uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvaḥ bhūri śṛṅgāayāsaḥ

original: RV_01.154.06.2{24} atrāha tadurugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padamava bhāti bhūri
analyzed: atra aha tat uru gāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri

original: RV_01.155.01.1{25} pra vaḥ pāntamandhaso dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave cārcata
analyzed: pra vaḥ pāntam andhasaḥ dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave ca arcata

original: RV_01.155.01.2{25} yā sānuni parvatānāmadābhyā mahastasthaturarvateva sādhunā
analyzed: yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā mahaḥ tasthatuḥ arvatā iva sādhunā

original: RV_01.155.02.1{25} tveṣamitthā samaraṇaṃ śimīvatorindrāviṣṇū sutapā vāmuruṣyati
analyzed: tveṣam itthā samaraṇam śimīvatoḥ indrāviṣṇū suta pāḥ vām uruṣyati

original: RV_01.155.02.2{25} yā martyāya pratidhīyamānamit kṛśānorasturasanāmuruṣyathaḥ
analyzed: yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam id kṛśānā urastura sanām uruṣyathaḥ

original: RV_01.155.03.1{25} tā īṃ vardhanti mahyasya pauṃsyaṃ ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje
analyzed: tāḥ īm vardhanti mahyasya pauṃsyam ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje

original: RV_01.155.03.2{25} dadhāti putro 'varaṃ paraṃ piturnāma tṛtīyamadhi rocane divaḥ
analyzed: dadhāti putraḥ avaram param pituḥ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ

original: RV_01.155.04.1{25} tat-tadidasya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasīnasya traturavṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ
analyzed: tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi inasya traturavṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ

original: RV_01.155.04.2{25} yaḥ pārthivāni tribhirid vigāmabhiruru kramiṣṭorugāyāya jīvase
analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni tribhiḥ id vigāmabhiḥ uru kramiṣṭa uru gāyāya jīvase

original: RV_01.155.05.1{25} dve idasya kramaṇe svardṛśo 'bhikhyāya martyo bhuraṇyati
analyzed: dve idasya kramaṇe svar dṛśaḥ abhikhyāya martyaḥ bhuraṇyati

original: RV_01.155.05.2{25} tṛtīyamasya nakirā dadharṣati vayaścana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyam asya nakirā dadharṣati vayaḥ cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ

original: RV_01.155.06.1{25} caturbhiḥ sākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiścakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīnravīvipat
analyzed: caturbhiḥ sākam navatim ca nāmabhiḥ cakram na vṛttam vyatīn ravīvipat

original: RV_01.155.06.2{25} bṛhaccharīro vimimāna ṛkvabhiryuvākumāraḥ pratyetyāhavam
analyzed: bṛhat śarīraḥ vimimānaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ yuvā kumāraḥ pratyeti āhavam

original: RV_01.156.01.1{26} bhavā mitro na śevyo ghṛtāsutirvibhūtadyumna evayā u saprathāḥ
analyzed: bhavā mitraḥ na śevyaḥ ghṛta āsutiḥ vibhūta dyumnaḥ eva yāḥ u saprathāḥ

original: RV_01.156.01.2{26} adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cidardhya stomo yajñaścarādhyo haviṣmatā
analyzed: adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cit ardhyaḥ stomaḥ yajñaḥ carādhyaḥ haviṣmatā

original: RV_01.156.02.1{26} yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumat jānaye viṣṇave dadāśati

original: RV_01.156.02.2{26} yo jātamasya mahato mahi bravat sedu śravobhiryujyaṃ cidabhyasat
analyzed: yaḥ jātamasya mahataḥ mahi bravat sedu śravobhiḥ yujyam cit abhyasat

original: RV_01.156.03.1{26} tamu stotāraḥ pūrvyaṃ yathā vida ṛtasya garbhaṃ januṣāpipartana
analyzed: tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyam yathā vidaḥ ṛtasya garbham januṣā apipartana

original: RV_01.156.03.2{26} āsya jānanto nāma cid vivaktana mahaste viṣṇo sumatiṃ bhajāmahe
analyzed: ā asya jānantaḥ nāma cit vivaktana mahaḥ te viṣṇo sumatim bhajāmahe

original: RV_01.156.04.1{26} tamasya rājā varuṇastamaśvinā kratuṃ sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: tam asya rājā varuṇaḥ tam aśvinā kratum sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_01.156.04.2{26} dādhāra dakṣamuttamamaharvidaṃ vrajaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivānaporṇute
analyzed: dādhāra dakṣam uttamam ahar vidam vrajam ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivān aporṇute

original: RV_01.156.05.1{26} ā yo vivāya sacathāya daivya indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ vivāya sacathāya daivyaḥ indrāya viṣṇuḥ su kṛte sukṛttaraḥ

original: RV_01.156.05.2{26} vedhā ajinvat triṣadhastha āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānamābhajat
analyzed: vedhāḥ ajinvat triṣadhasthaḥ āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ābhajat

original: RV_01.157.01.1{27} abodhyagnirjma udeti sūryo vyuṣāścandrā mahyāvo arciṣā
analyzed: abodhi agniḥ jmaḥ udeti sūryaḥ vyuṣāḥ candrā mahyā vaḥ arciṣā

original: RV_01.157.01.2{27} āyukṣātāmaśvinā yātave rathaṃ prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak
analyzed: āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham prāsāvīt devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak

original: RV_01.157.02.1{27} yad yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇamaśvinā rathaṃ ghṛtena no madhunā kṣatramukṣatam
analyzed: yat yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā ratham ghṛtena naḥ madhunā kṣatram ukṣatam

original: RV_01.157.02.2{27} asmākaṃ brahma pṛtanāsu jinvataṃ vayaṃ dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi
analyzed: asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvatam vayam dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi

original: RV_01.157.03.1{27} arvāṃ tricakro madhuvāhano ratho jīrāśvo aśvinoryātu suṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: arvām tri cakraḥ madhu vāhanaḥ rathaḥ jīra aśvaḥ aśvinoḥ yātu suṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_01.157.03.2{27} trivandhuro maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ śaṃ na ā vakṣad dvipade catuṣpade
analyzed: tri vandhuraḥ maghavā viśva saubhagaḥ śam naḥ ā vakṣat dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_01.157.04.1{27} ā na ūrjaṃ vahatamaśvinā yuvaṃ madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam
analyzed: ā naḥ ūrjam vahatam aśvinā yuvam madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam

original: RV_01.157.04.2{27} prāyustāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā
analyzed: pra āyuḥ tāriṣṭam niḥ rapāṃsi mṛkṣatam sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā

original: RV_01.157.05.1{27} yuvaṃ ha garbhaṃ jagatīṣu dhattho yuvaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantaḥ
analyzed: yuvam ha garbham jagatīṣu dhatthaḥ yuvam viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_01.157.05.2{27} yuvamagniṃ ca vṛṣaṇāvapaśca vanaspatīnraśvināvairayethām
analyzed: yuvam agnim ca vṛṣaṇau apaḥ ca vanaspatīn raśvinau airayethām

original: RV_01.157.06.1{27} yuvaṃ ha stho bhiṣajā bheṣajebhiratho ha stho rathyā rāthyebhiḥ
analyzed: yuvam ha sthaḥ bhiṣajā bheṣajebhiḥ atha u ha sthaḥ rathyā rāthyebhiḥ

original: RV_01.157.06.2{27} atho ha kṣatramadhi dhattha ugrā yo vāṃ haviṣmānmanasā dadāśa
analyzed: atha u ha kṣatram adhi dhatthaḥ ugrā yaḥ vām haviṣmān manasā dadāśa

original: RV_01.158.01.1{01} vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā daśasyataṃ no vṛṣaṇāvabhiṣṭau
analyzed: vasū rudrā puru mantū vṛdhantā daśasyatam naḥ vṛṣaṇau abhiṣṭau

original: RV_01.158.01.2{01} dasrā ha yad rekṇa aucathyo vāṃ pra yat sasrātheakavābhirūtī
analyzed: dasrā ha yat rekṇaḥ aucathyaḥ vām pra yat sasrātha iakavābhirūtī

original: RV_01.158.02.1{01} ko vāṃ dāśat sumataye cidasyai vasū yad dhethe namasā pade goḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vām dāśat sumataye cit asyai vasū yat dhethe namasā pade goḥ

original: RV_01.158.02.2{01} jigṛtamasme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇeva manasā carantā
analyzed: jigṛtam asme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇa iva manasā carantā

original: RV_01.158.03.1{01} yukto ha yad vāṃ taugryāya perurvi madhye arṇaso dhāyi pajraḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ ha yat vām taugryāya perurvi madhye arṇasaḥ dhāyi pajraḥ

original: RV_01.158.03.2{01} upa vāmavaḥ śaraṇaṃ gameyaṃ śūro nājma patayadbhirevaiḥ
analyzed: upa vāmavaḥ śaraṇam gameyam śūraḥ na ajma patayadbhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_01.158.04.1{01} upastutiraucathyamuruṣyen mā māmime patatriṇī vi dugdhām
analyzed: upastutiḥ aucathyam uruṣyet mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām

original: RV_01.158.04.2{01} mā māmedho daśatayaścito dhāk pra yad vāṃ baddhastmani khādati kṣām
analyzed: mā mā medhaḥ daśatayaḥ citaḥ dhāk pra yat vām baddha stmani khādati kṣām

original: RV_01.158.05.1{01} na mā garan nadyo mātṛtamā dāsā yadīṃ susamubdhamavādhuḥ
analyzed: na mā garan nadyaḥ mātṛtamāḥ dāsāḥ yadi īm su samubdham avādhuḥ

original: RV_01.158.05.2{01} śiro yadasya traitano vitakṣat svayaṃ dāsa uro aṃsāvapi gdha
analyzed: śiraḥ yat asya traitanaḥ vitakṣat svayam dāsaḥ uraḥ aṃsau api

original: RV_01.158.06.1{01} dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuge
analyzed: dīrghatamāḥ māmateyaḥ jujurvān daśame yuge

original: RV_01.158.06.2{01} apāmarthaṃ yatīnāṃ brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ
analyzed: apām artham yatīnām brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ

original: RV_01.159.01.1{02} pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā
analyzed: pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā

original: RV_01.159.01.2{02} devebhirye devaputre sudaṃsasetthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ
analyzed: devebhiḥ ye deva putre su daṃsasā itthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ

original: RV_01.159.02.1{02} uta manye pituradruho mano māturmahi svatavastad dhavīmabhiḥ
analyzed: uta manye pituḥ adruhaḥ manaḥ mātuḥ mahi sva tavaḥ tat havīmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.159.02.2{02} suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratururu prajāyā amṛtaṃvarīmabhiḥ
analyzed: su retasā pitarā bhūma cakratuḥ uru prajāyai amṛtaṃvarīmabhiḥ

original: RV_01.159.03.1{02} te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṃsaso mahī jajñurmātarā pūrvacittaye
analyzed: te sūnavaḥ su apasaḥ su daṃsasaḥ mahī jajñuḥ mātarā pūrvacittaye

original: RV_01.159.03.2{02} sthātuśca satyaṃ jagataśca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padamadvayāvinaḥ
analyzed: sthātuḥ ca satyam jagataḥ ca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padam a dvayāvinaḥ

original: RV_01.159.04.1{02} te māyino mamire supracetaso jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā
analyzed: te māyinaḥ mamire su pracetasaḥ jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā

original: RV_01.159.04.2{02} navyaṃ-navyaṃ tantumā tanvate divi samudre antaḥ kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ
analyzed: navyam navyam tantumā tanvate divi samudre antar kavayaḥ su dītayaḥ

original: RV_01.159.05.1{02} tad rādho adya saviturvareṇyaṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave manāmahe
analyzed: tat rādhaḥ adya savituḥ vareṇyam vayam devasya prasave manāmahe

original: RV_01.159.05.2{02} asmabhyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ śatagvinam
analyzed: asmabhyam dyāvāpṛthivī su cetunā rayim dhattam vasumantam śatagvinam

original: RV_01.160.01.1{03} te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuva ṛtāvarī rajaso dhārayatkavī
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśva śambhuvaḥ ṛtāvarī rajasaḥ dhārayat kavī

original: RV_01.160.01.2{03} sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antarīyate devo devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: su janmanī dhiṣaṇe antarīyate devaḥ devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ

original: RV_01.160.02.1{03} uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ
analyzed: uru vyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ

original: RV_01.160.02.2{03} sudhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīmabhi rūpairavāsayat
analyzed: su dhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīmabhiḥ rūpaiḥ avāsayat

original: RV_01.160.03.1{03} sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīro bhuvanāni māyayā
analyzed: sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīraḥ bhuvanāni māyayā

original: RV_01.160.03.2{03} dhenuṃ ca pṛśniṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suretasaṃ viśvāhā śukraṃ payo asya dukṣata
analyzed: dhenum ca pṛśnim vṛṣabham su retasam viśvāhā śukram payaḥ asya dukṣata

original: RV_01.160.04.1{03} ayaṃ devānāmapasāmapastamo yo jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā
analyzed: ayam devānām apasām apastamaḥ yaḥ jajāna rodasī viśva śambhuvā

original: RV_01.160.04.2{03} vi yo mame rajasī sukratūyayājarebhi skambhanebhiḥsamānṛce
analyzed: vi yaḥ mame rajasī sukratūyayā ajarebhiḥ skambhanebhiḥ samānṛce

original: RV_01.160.05.1{03} te no gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatraṃ dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsatho bṛhat
analyzed: te naḥ gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatram dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsathaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_01.160.05.2{03} yenābhi kṛṣṭīstatanāma viśvahā panāyyamojo asme saminvatam
analyzed: yena abhi kṛṣṭīḥ tatanāma viśvahā panāyyam ojaḥ asme saminvatam

original: RV_01.161.01.1{04} kimu śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagan kimīyate dūtyaṃ kad yadūcima
analyzed: kimu śreṣṭhaḥ kim yaviṣṭhaḥ naḥ ājagan kimīyate dūtyam kad yat ūcima

original: RV_01.161.01.2{04} na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākulo 'gne bhrātardruṇa id bhūtimūdima
analyzed: na nindima camasam yaḥ mahā kulaḥ agne bhrātar druṇaḥ id bhūtim ūdima

original: RV_01.161.02.1{04} ekaṃ camasaṃ caturaḥ kṛṇotana tad vo devā abruvan tad va āgamam
analyzed: ekam camasam caturaḥ kṛṇotana tat vaḥ devāḥ abruvan tat vaḥ āgamam

original: RV_01.161.02.2{04} saudhanvanā yadyevā kariṣyatha sākaṃ devairyajñiyāso bhaviṣyatha
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ yadi evā kariṣyatha sākam devaiḥ yajñiyāsaḥ bhaviṣyatha

original: RV_01.161.03.1{04} agniṃ dūtaṃ prati yadabravītanāśvaḥ kartvo ratha uteha kartvaḥ
analyzed: agnim dūtam prati yat abravītana aśvaḥ kartvaḥ rathaḥ uta iha kartvaḥ

original: RV_01.161.03.2{04} dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātaranu vaḥ kṛtvyemasi
analyzed: dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvī emasi

original: RV_01.161.04.1{04} cakṛvāṃsa ṛbhavastadapṛchata kvedabhūd yaḥ sya dūto na ājagan
analyzed: cakṛvāṃsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata kva id abhūt yaḥ sya dūtaḥ naḥ ājagan

original: RV_01.161.04.2{04} yadāvākhyaccamasāñcaturaḥ kṛtānādit tvaṣṭā gnāsvantarnyānaje
analyzed: yadā avākhyat camasān caturaḥ kṛtān ādid tvaṣṭā gnāsu antar nyānaje

original: RV_01.161.05.1{04} hanāmaināniti tvaṣṭā yadabravīccamasaṃ ye devapānamanindiṣuḥ
analyzed: hanāma enān iti tvaṣṭā yat abravīt camasam ye deva pānam anindiṣuḥ

original: RV_01.161.05.2{04} anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacānanyairenānkanyā nāmabhi sparat
analyzed: anyāḥ nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacā an anyaiḥ enān kanyā nāmabhiḥ sparat

original: RV_01.161.06.1{05} indro harī yuyuje aśvinā rathaṃ bṛhaspatirviśvarūpāmupājata
analyzed: indraḥ harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham bṛhaspatiḥ viśvarūpām upājata

original: RV_01.161.06.2{05} ṛbhurvibhvā vājo devānagachata svapaso yajñiyambhāgamaitana
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vibhvā vājaḥ devān agacchata su apasaḥ yajñiyambhāgam aitana

original: RV_01.161.07.1{05} niścarmaṇo gāmariṇīta dhītibhiryā jarantā yuvaśā tākṛṇotana
analyzed: niścarmaṇaḥ gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ yā jarantā yuvaśā tā akṛṇotana

original: RV_01.161.07.2{05} saudhanvanā aśvādaśvamatakṣata yuktvā rathamupa devānayātana
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ aśvāt aśvam atakṣata yuktvā ratham upa devān ayātana

original: RV_01.161.08.1{05} idamudakaṃ pibatetyabravītanedaṃ vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam
analyzed: idam udakam pibata iti abravītana idam vā gha pibata muñja nejanam

original: RV_01.161.08.2{05} saudhanvanā yadi tan neva haryatha tṛtīye gha savane mādayādhvai
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ yadi tat na iva haryatha tṛtīye gha savane mādayādhvai

original: RV_01.161.09.1{05} āpo bhūyiṣṭhā ityeko abravīdagnirbhūyiṣṭha ityanyo abravīt
analyzed: āpaḥ bhūyiṣṭhāḥ iti ekaḥ abravīt agniḥ bhūyiṣṭhaḥ iti anyaḥ abravīt

original: RV_01.161.09.2{05} vadharyantīṃ bahubhyaḥ praiko abravīd ṛtā vadantaścamasānapiṃśata
analyzed: vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ pra ekaḥ abravīt ṛtā vadantaḥ camasān apiṃśata

original: RV_01.161.10.1{05} śroṇāmeka udakaṃ gāmavajati māṃsamekaḥ piṃśati sūnayābhṛtam
analyzed: śroṇām ekaḥ udakam gām avajati māṃsam ekaḥ piṃśati sūnayā ābhṛtam

original: RV_01.161.10.2{05} ā nimrucaḥ śakṛdeko apabharat kiṃ svit putrebhyaḥ pitarā upāvatuḥ
analyzed: ā nimrucaḥ śakṛt ekaḥ apabharat kim svid putrebhyaḥ pitarau upāvatuḥ

original: RV_01.161.11.1{06} udvatsvasmā akṛṇotana tṛṇaṃ nivatsvapaḥ svapasyaya naraḥ
analyzed: udvatsvasmai akṛṇotana tṛṇam nivatsvapaḥ svapasyaya naraḥ

original: RV_01.161.11.2{06} agohyasya yadasastanā gṛhe tadadyedam ṛbhavo nānu gachatha
analyzed: agohyasya gṛhe tat adya idam ṛbhavaḥ na anu gacchatha

original: RV_01.161.12.1{06} sammīlya yad bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svit tātyā pitara vaasatuḥ
analyzed: sammīlya yat bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svid tātyā pitara vaasatuḥ

original: RV_01.161.12.2{06} aśapata yaḥ karasnaṃ va adade yaḥ prābravīt protasma abravītana
analyzed: aśapata yaḥ karasnam vaḥ adade yaḥ prābravīt abravītana

original: RV_01.161.13.1{06} suṣupvāṃsa ṛbhavastadapṛchatāgohya ka idaṃ no abūbudhat
analyzed: suṣupvāṃsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata agohya kaḥ idam naḥ abūbudhat

original: RV_01.161.13.2{06} śvānaṃ basto bodhayitāramabravīt samvatsara idamadyā vyakhyata
analyzed: śvānam bastaḥ bodhayitāram abravīt samvatsare idam adyā vyakhyata

original: RV_01.161.14.1{06} divā yanti maruto bhūmyāgnirayaṃ vāto antarikṣeṇa yati
analyzed: divā yanti marutaḥ bhūmyā agniḥ ayam vātaḥ antarikṣeṇa yati

original: RV_01.161.14.2{06} adbhiryati varuṇaḥ samudrairyuṣmānichantaḥ śavaso napātaḥ
analyzed: adbhiḥ yati varuṇaḥ samudraiḥ yuṣmān ichantaḥ śavasaḥ napātaḥ

original: RV_01.162.01.1{07} mā no mitro varuṇo aryamāyurindra ṛbhukṣā marutaḥ parikhyan
analyzed: mā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ parikhyan

original: RV_01.162.01.2{07} yad vājino devajatasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmo vidathe vīryāṇi
analyzed: yat vājinaḥ deva jatasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmaḥ vidathe vīryāṇi

original: RV_01.162.02.1{07} yan nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya ratiṃ gṛbhītāṃ mukhato nayanti
analyzed: yat nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya ratim gṛbhītām mukhataḥ nayanti

original: RV_01.162.02.2{07} supranajo memyad viśvarūpa indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyamapyeti pāthaḥ
analyzed: su pranajaḥ memyat viśva rūpaḥ indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam apyeti pāthaḥ

original: RV_01.162.03.1{07} eṣa chāgaḥ puro aśvena vājinā pūṣṇo bhāgo nīyate viśvadevyaḥ
analyzed: eṣa chāgaḥ puras aśvena vājinā pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ nīyate viśvadevyaḥ

original: RV_01.162.03.2{07} abhipriyaṃ yat puroḷāśamarvatā tvaṣṭedenaṃ sauśravasāya jinvati
analyzed: abhipriyam yat puroḷāśam arvatā tvaṣṭā id enam sauśravasāya jinvati

original: RV_01.162.04.1{07} yad dhaviṣyam ṛtuśo devayānaṃ trirmānuṣāḥ paryaśvaṃ nayanti
analyzed: yat haviṣyam ṛtuśas deva yānam tris mānuṣāḥ pari aśvam nayanti

original: RV_01.162.04.2{07} atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamo bhāga eti yajñaṃ devebhyaḥ prativedayannajaḥ
analyzed: atra pūṣṇaḥ prathamaḥ bhāgaḥ eti yajñam devebhyaḥ prativedayan ajaḥ

original: RV_01.162.05.1{07} hotādhvaryurāvayā agnimindho grāvagrābha uta śaṃstā suvipraḥ
analyzed: hotā adhvaryuḥ āvayāḥ agnimindhaḥ grāvagrābhaḥ uta śaṃstā su vipraḥ

original: RV_01.162.05.2{07} tena yajñena svaraṃkṛtena sviṣṭena vakṣaṇā āpṛṇadhvam
analyzed: tena yajñena su araṃkṛtena su iṣṭena vakṣaṇāḥ āpṛṇadhvam

original: RV_01.162.06.1{08} yūpavraskā uta ye yūpavāhāścaṣālaṃ ye aśvayūpāya takṣati
analyzed: yūpavraskāḥ uta ye yūpa vāhāḥ caṣālam ye aśva yūpāya takṣati

original: RV_01.162.06.2{08} ye cārvate pacanaṃ sambharantyuto teṣāmabhigūrtirna invatu
analyzed: ye ca arvate pacanam sambharanti uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu

original: RV_01.162.07.1{08} upa prāgāt suman me 'dhāyi manma devānāmāśā upa vītapṛṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: upa prāgāt sumat me adhāyi manma devānām āśāḥ upa vīta pṛṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_01.162.07.2{08} anvenaṃ viprā ṛṣayo madanti devānāṃ puṣṭe cakṛmā subandhum
analyzed: anu enam viprāḥ ṛṣayaḥ madanti devānām puṣṭe cakṛma su bandhum

original: RV_01.162.08.1{08} yad vājino dāma sundānamarvato yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanārajjurasya
analyzed: yat vājinaḥ dāma sundāna marvataḥ yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjurasya

original: RV_01.162.08.2{08} yad vā ghāsya prabhṛtamāsye tṛṇaṃ sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
analyzed: yat vā gha asya prabhṛta māsye tṛṇam sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_01.162.09.1{08} yadaśvasya kraviṣo makṣikāśa yad vā svarau svadhitau riptamasti
analyzed: yat aśvasya kraviṣaḥ makṣikā āśa yat vā svarau svadhitau riptam asti

original: RV_01.162.09.2{08} yad dhastayoḥ śamituryan nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
analyzed: yat hastayoḥ śamituḥ yat nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_01.162.10.1{08} yadūvadhyamudarasyāpavāti ya āmasya kraviṣo gandho asti
analyzed: yat ūvadhyam udarasya apavāti yaḥ āmasya kraviṣaḥ gandhaḥ asti

original: RV_01.162.10.2{08} sukṛtā tacchamitāraḥ kṛṇvantūta medhaṃ śṛtapākaṃ pacantu
analyzed: su kṛtā tat śamitāraḥ kṛṇvantu uta medham śṛta pākam pacantu

original: RV_01.162.11.1{09} yat te gātrādagninā pacyamānādabhi śūlaṃ nihatasyāvadhāvati
analyzed: yat te gātrāt agninā pacyamānāt abhi śūlam nihatasya avadhāvati

original: RV_01.162.11.2{09} mā tad bhūmyāmā śriṣan mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyastaduśadbhyo rātamastu
analyzed: mā tat bhūmyām ā śriṣat mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyaḥ tat uśadbhyaḥ rātam astu

original: RV_01.162.12.1{09} ye vājinaṃ paripaśyanti pakvaṃ ya īmāhuḥ surabhirnirhareti
analyzed: ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvam ye īm āhuḥ surabhiḥ nirhara iti

original: RV_01.162.12.2{09} ye cārvato māṃsabhikṣāmupāsata uto teṣāmabhigūrtirna invatu
analyzed: ye ca arvataḥ māṃsa bhikṣām upāsate uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu

original: RV_01.162.13.1{09} yan nīkṣaṇaṃ māṃspacanyā ukhāyā yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇaāsecanāni
analyzed: yat nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyāḥ ukhāyāḥ yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇaāsecanāni

original: RV_01.162.13.2{09} ūṣmaṇyāpidhānā carūṇāmaṅkāḥ sūnāḥpari bhūṣantyaśvam
analyzed: ūṣmaṇyā apidhānā carūṇām aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanti aśvam

original: RV_01.162.14.1{09} nikramaṇaṃ niṣadanaṃ vivartanaṃ yacca paḍbīśamarvataḥ
analyzed: nikramaṇam niṣadanam vivartanam yat ca paḍbīśa marvataḥ

original: RV_01.162.14.2{09} yacca papau yacca ghāsiṃ jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
analyzed: yat ca papau yat ca ghāsim jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_01.162.15.1{09} mā tvāgnirdhvanayīd dhūmagandhirmokhā bhrājantyabhi vikta jaghriḥ
analyzed: mā tvā agniḥ dhvanayīt dhūma gandhiḥ mā ukhā bhrājantī abhi vikta jaghriḥ

original: RV_01.162.15.2{09} iṣṭaṃ vītamabhigūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ taṃ devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇantyaśvam
analyzed: iṣṭam vītam abhigūrtam vaṣaṭkṛtam tam devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanti aśvam

original: RV_01.162.16.1{10} yadaśvāya vāsa upastṛṇantyadhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyānyasmai
analyzed: yat aśvāya vāsaḥ upastṛṇanti adhīvāsam yāḥ hiraṇyāni asmai

original: RV_01.162.16.2{10} sandānamarvantaṃ paḍbīśaṃ priyā deveṣvā yāmayanti
analyzed: sandāna marvantam paḍbīśam priyāḥ deva iṣvā yāmayanti

original: RV_01.162.17.1{10} yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda
analyzed: yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda

original: RV_01.162.17.2{10} sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇāsūdayāmi
analyzed: srucā iva tā haviṣaḥ adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā asūdayāmi

original: RV_01.162.18.1{10} catustriṃśad vājino devabandhorvaṅkrīraśvasya svadhitiḥsameti
analyzed: catustriṃśat vājinaḥ deva bandhoḥ vaṅkrīḥ aśvasya svadhitiḥ sameti

original: RV_01.162.18.2{10} achidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-paruranughuṣya vi śasta
analyzed: achidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruḥ paruḥ anughuṣya vi śasta

original: RV_01.162.19.1{10} ekastvaṣturaśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatastathaṛtuḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ tvaṣtuḥ aśvasya viśastā dvā yantārā bhavataḥ tathaṛtuḥ

original: RV_01.162.19.2{10} yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍanāṃ pra juhomyagnau
analyzed: yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tātā piṇḍanām pra juhomi agnau

original: RV_01.162.20.1{10} mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantaṃ mā svadhitistanva ā tiṣṭhipat te
analyzed: mā tvā tapat priyaḥ ātmā apiyantam mā svadhitiḥ tanve ā tiṣṭhipat te

original: RV_01.162.20.2{10} mā te gṛdhnuraviśastātihāya chidrā gātraṇyasinā mithū kaḥ
analyzed: mā te gṛdhnuḥ aviśastā atihāya chidrā gātraṇī asinā mithū kaḥ

original: RV_01.162.21.1{10} na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devānideṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ
analyzed: na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi devān ideṣi pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ

original: RV_01.162.21.2{10} harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtāmupāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya
analyzed: harī te pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthāt vājī dhuri rāsabhasya

original: RV_01.162.22.1{10} sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyaṃ puṃsaḥ putrānuta viśvāpuṣaṃ rayim
analyzed: su gavyam naḥ vājī su aśvyam puṃsaḥ putrān uta viśvāpuṣam rayim

original: RV_01.162.22.2{10} anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatāṃ haviṣmān
analyzed: anāgāstvam naḥ aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatram naḥ aśvaḥ vanatām haviṣmān

original: RV_01.163.01.1{11} yadakrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyan samudrāduta vā purīṣāt
analyzed: yat akrandaḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ udyan samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt

original: RV_01.163.01.2{11} śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyaṃ mahi jātaṃ te arvan
analyzed: śyenasya pakṣāḥ hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātam te arvan

original: RV_01.163.02.1{11} yamena dattaṃ trita enamāyunagindra eṇaṃ prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat
analyzed: yamena dattam tritaḥ enam āyunak indraḥ eṇam prathamaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat

original: RV_01.163.02.2{11} gandharvo asya raśanāmagṛbhṇāt sūrādaśvaṃ vasavo nirataṣṭa
analyzed: gandharvaḥ asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrāt aśvam vasavaḥ nirataṣṭa

original: RV_01.163.03.1{11} asi yamo asyādityo arvannasi trito guhyena vratena
analyzed: asi yamaḥ asi ādityaḥ arvan asi tritaḥ guhyena vratena

original: RV_01.163.03.2{11} asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhuste trīṇi divi bandhanāni
analyzed: asi somena samayā vipṛktaḥ āhuḥ te trīṇi divi bandhanāni

original: RV_01.163.04.1{11} trīṇi ta āhurdivi bandhanāni trīṇyapsu trīṇyantaḥ samudre
analyzed: trīṇi te āhuḥ divi bandhanāni trīṇi apsu trīṇi antar samudre

original: RV_01.163.04.2{11} uteva me varuṇaścantsyarvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram
analyzed: uta iva me varuṇaścantsi arvan yatrā te āhuḥ paramam janitram

original: RV_01.163.05.1{11} imā te vājinnavamārjanānīmā śaphānāṃ saniturnidhānā
analyzed: imā te vājin avamārjanāni imā śaphānām sanituḥ nidhānā

original: RV_01.163.05.2{11} atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣantigopāḥ
analyzed: atrā te bhadrāḥ raśanāḥ apaśyam ṛtasya yāḥ abhirakṣanti gopāḥ

original: RV_01.163.06.1{12} ātmānaṃ te manasārādajānāmavo divā patayantaṃ pataṃgam
analyzed: ātmānam te manasā ārāt ajānām avaḥ divā patayantam pataṃgam

original: RV_01.163.06.2{12} śiro apaśyaṃ pathibhiḥ sugebhirareṇubhirjehamānaṃ patatri
analyzed: śiraḥ apaśyam pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ areṇubhiḥ jehamānam patatri

original: RV_01.163.07.1{12} atrā te rūpamuttamamapaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇamiṣa ā padegoḥ
analyzed: atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyam jigīṣamāṇam iṣaḥ ā padegoḥ

original: RV_01.163.07.2{12} yadā te marto anu bhogamānaḷ ādid grasiṣṭha oṣadhīrajīgaḥ
analyzed: yadā te martaḥ anu bhogamānaḥ ādit grasiṣṭhaḥ oṣadhīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_01.163.08.1{12} anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvannanu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām
analyzed: anu tvā rathaḥ anu maryaḥ arvan anu gāvaḥ anu bhagaḥ kanīnām

original: RV_01.163.08.2{12} anu vrātāsastava sakhyamīyuranu devā mamire vīryaṃ te
analyzed: anu vrātāsaḥ tava sakhyam īyuḥ anu devāḥ mamire vīryam te

original: RV_01.163.09.1{12} hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt
analyzed: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ ayaḥ asya pādā manaḥ javāḥ avaraḥ indraḥ āsīt

original: RV_01.163.09.2{12} devā idasya haviradyamāyan yo arvantaṃ prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat
analyzed: devāḥ idasya haviḥ adyam āyan yaḥ arvantam prathamaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat

original: RV_01.163.10.1{12} īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ saṃ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ
analyzed: īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ sam śūraṇāsaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_01.163.10.2{12} haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatante yadākṣiṣurdivyamajmamaśvāḥ
analyzed: haṃsāḥ iva śreṇiśas yatante yadā akṣiṣuḥ divyam ajmam aśvāḥ

original: RV_01.163.11.1{13} tava śarīraṃ patayiṣṇvarvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān
analyzed: tava śarīram patayiṣṇu arvan tava cittam vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān

original: RV_01.163.11.2{13} tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti
analyzed: tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrā araṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti

original: RV_01.163.12.1{13} upa prāgācchasanaṃ vājyarvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ
analyzed: upa prāgāt śasanam vājī arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ

original: RV_01.163.12.2{13} ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhirasyānu paścāt kavayo yantirebhāḥ
analyzed: ajaḥ puras nīyate nābhiḥ asya anu paścāt kavayaḥ yantiḥ rebhāḥ

original: RV_01.163.13.1{13} upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhasthamarvānachā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
analyzed: upa prāgāt paramam yat sadhastham arvān achā pitaram mātaram ca

original: RV_01.163.13.2{13} adyā devāñ juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi
analyzed: adyā devām juṣṭatamaḥ hi gamyāḥ athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_01.164.01.1{14} asya vāmasya palitasya hotustasya bhrātā madhyamo astyaśnaḥ
analyzed: asya vāmasya palitasya hotuḥ tasya bhrātā madhyamaḥ asti aśnaḥ

original: RV_01.164.01.2{14} tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asyātrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ bhrātā ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ asya atra apaśyam viśpatim sapta putram

original: RV_01.164.02.1{14} sapta yuñjanti rathamekacakrameko aśvo vahati saptanāmā
analyzed: sapta yuñjanti ratham eka cakram ekaḥ aśvaḥ vahati sapta nāmā

original: RV_01.164.02.2{14} trinābhi cakramajaramanarvaṃ yatremā viśvā bhuvanādhitasthuḥ
analyzed: tri nābhi cakram ajaram anarvam yatra imā viśvā bhuvanā adhitasthuḥ

original: RV_01.164.03.1{14} imaṃ rathamadhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahantyaśvāḥ
analyzed: imam ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ sapta cakram sapta vahanti aśvāḥ

original: RV_01.164.03.2{14} sapta svasāro abhi saṃ navante yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāma
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ abhi sam navante yatra gavām nihitā sapta nāma

original: RV_01.164.04.1{14} ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānamasthanvantaṃ yadanasthā bibharti
analyzed: kaḥ dadarśa prathamam jāyamānam asthanvantam yat anasthā bibharti

original: RV_01.164.04.2{14} bhūmyā asurasṛgātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsamupa gāt praṣṭumetat
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ asuḥ asṛj ātmā kva svid kaḥ vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat

original: RV_01.164.05.1{14} pākaḥ pṛchāmi manasāvijānan devānāmenā nihitā padāni
analyzed: pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasā a vijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni

original: RV_01.164.05.2{14} vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavāu
analyzed: vatse baṣkaye adhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavayaḥ otavau

original: RV_01.164.06.1{15} acikitvāñcikituṣaścidatra kavīn pṛchāmi vidmane na vidvān
analyzed: a cikitvān cikituṣaḥ cit atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān

original: RV_01.164.06.2{15} vi yastastambha ṣaḷ imā rajāṃsyajasya rūpe kimapi svidekam
analyzed: vi yastastambha ṣaḍ imā rajāṃsi ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam

original: RV_01.164.07.1{15} iha bravītu ya īmaṅga vedāsya vāmasya nihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ
analyzed: iha bravītu yaḥ īm aṅga veda asya vāmasya nihitam padam veḥ

original: RV_01.164.07.2{15} śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakaṃ padāpuḥ
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīram duhrate gāvaḥ asya vavrim vasānāḥ udakam padā apuḥ

original: RV_01.164.08.1{15} mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhītyagre manasā saṃ hi jagme
analyzed: mātā pitaram ṛte ā babhāja dhīti agre manasā sam hi jagme

original: RV_01.164.08.2{15} sā bībhatsurgarbharasā nividdhā namasvanta idupavākamīyuḥ
analyzed: sā bībhatsuḥ garbha rasā nividdhā namasvantaḥ id upavākam īyuḥ

original: RV_01.164.09.1{15} yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣvantaḥ
analyzed: yuktā mātā āsīt dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ atiṣṭhat garbhaḥ vṛjanīṣu antar

original: RV_01.164.09.2{15} amīmed vatso anu gāmapaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu
analyzed: amīmet vatsaḥ anu gām apaśyat viśvarūpyam triṣu yojaneṣu

original: RV_01.164.10.1{15} tisro mātṝstrīn pitṝn bibhradeka ūrdhvastasthau nemava glāpayanti
analyzed: tisraḥ mātṝḥ trīn pitṝn bibhrat ekaḥ ūrdhvaḥ tasthau glāpayanti

original: RV_01.164.10.2{15} mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācamaviśvaminvām
analyzed: mantrayante divaḥ amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśva vidam vācam a viśvaminvām

original: RV_01.164.11.1{16} dvādaśāraṃ nahi tajjarāya varvarti cakraṃ pari dyām ṛtasya
analyzed: dvādaśa aram nahi tat jarāya varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya

original: RV_01.164.11.2{16} ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiśca tasthuḥ
analyzed: ā putrāḥ agne mithunāsaḥ atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca tasthuḥ

original: RV_01.164.12.1{16} pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam
analyzed: pañca pādam pitaram dvādaśa ākṛtim divaḥ āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam

original: RV_01.164.12.2{16} atheme anya upare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḷara āhurarpitam
analyzed: atha ime anye upare vicakṣaṇam sapta cakre ṣaṣ are āhuḥ arpitam

original: RV_01.164.13.1{16} pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminnā tasthurbhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: pañca are cakre parivartamāne tasmin na ā tasthuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.164.13.2{16} tasya nākṣastapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanādeva na śīryate sanābhiḥ
analyzed: tasya na akṣaḥ tapyate bhūri bhāraḥ sanāt eva na śīryate sa nābhiḥ

original: RV_01.164.14.1{16} sanemi cakramajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti
analyzed: sa nemi cakram ajaram vi vāvṛte uttānāyām daśa yuktāḥ vahanti

original: RV_01.164.14.2{16} sūryasya cakṣū rajasaityāvṛtaṃ tasminnārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: sūryasya cakṣuḥ rajasā eti āvṛtam tasmin na arpitā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_01.164.15.1{16} sākaṃjānāṃ saptathamahurekajaṃ ṣaḷ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti
analyzed: sākaṃjānām saptatham ahuḥ ekajam ṣaṭ id yamāḥ ṛṣayaḥ deva jāḥ iti

original: RV_01.164.15.2{16} teṣāmiṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśa sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ
analyzed: teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśas

original: RV_01.164.16.1{17} striyaḥ satīstānu me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyadakṣaṇvān navi cetadandhaḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ satīḥ tān u me puṃsaḥ āhuḥ paśyat akṣaṇvān navi cetat andhaḥ

original: RV_01.164.16.2{17} kaviryaḥ putraḥ sa īmā ciketa yastā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat
analyzed: kaviḥ yaḥ putraḥ saḥ īmā ciketa yaḥ tāḥ vijānāt sa pituḥ pitā asat

original: RV_01.164.17.1{17} avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibhratī gaurudasthāt
analyzed: avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gauḥ udasthāt

original: RV_01.164.17.2{17} sā kadrīcī kaṃ svidardhaṃ parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antaḥ
analyzed: sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe antar

original: RV_01.164.18.1{17} avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asyānuveda para enāvareṇa
analyzed: avas pareṇa pitaram yaḥ asya anuveda paras enā avareṇa

original: RV_01.164.18.2{17} kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devaṃ manaḥ kuto adhi prājātam
analyzed: kavīyamānaḥ kaḥ iha pra vocat devam manaḥ kutas adhi prājātam

original: RV_01.164.19.1{17} ye arvāñcastānu parāca āhurye parāñcastānu arvāca āhuḥ
analyzed: ye arvāñcaḥ tān anu parācaḥ āhuḥ ye parāñcaḥ tān anu arvācaḥ āhuḥ

original: RV_01.164.19.2{17} indraśca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajaso vahanti
analyzed: indraḥ ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajasaḥ vahanti

original: RV_01.164.20.1{17} dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pari ṣasvajāte
analyzed: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pari sasvajāte

original: RV_01.164.20.2{17} tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattyanaśnannanyo abhi cākaśīti
analyzed: tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādvatti an aśnan anyaḥ abhi cākaśīti

original: RV_01.164.21.1{18} yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhāgamanimeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti
analyzed: yatra suparṇāḥ amṛtasya bhāgam animeṣam vidathā abhisvaranti

original: RV_01.164.21.2{18} ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākamatrā viveśa
analyzed: inaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atra ā viveśa

original: RV_01.164.22.1{18} yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve
analyzed: yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇāḥ niviśante suvate ca adhi viśve

original: RV_01.164.22.2{18} tasyedāhuḥ pippalaṃ svādvagre tan non naśad yaḥpitaraṃ na veda
analyzed: tasya id āhuḥ pippalam svādu agre tat na ud naśat yaḥ pitaram na veda

original: RV_01.164.23.1{18} yad gāyatre adhi gāyatramāhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata
analyzed: yat gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitam traiṣṭubhāt vā traiṣṭubham niratakṣata

original: RV_01.164.23.2{18} yad vā jagajjagatyāhitaṃ padaṃ ya it tad viduste amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
analyzed: yat vā jagat jagatyā āhitam padam ye id tat viduḥ te amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_01.164.24.1{18} gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkamarkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam
analyzed: gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam

original: RV_01.164.24.2{18} vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadākṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ
analyzed: vākena vākam dvipadā catuṣpadā akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_01.164.25.1{18} jagatā sindhuṃ divyasthabhāyad rathantare sūryaṃ paryapaśyat
analyzed: jagatā sindhum divyasthabhāyat rathantare sūryam paryapaśyat

original: RV_01.164.25.2{18} gāyatrasya samidhastisra āhustato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā
analyzed: gāyatrasya samidhaḥ tisraḥ āhuḥ tatas mahnā pra ririce mahi tvā

original: RV_01.164.26.1{19} upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenumetāṃ suhasto godhuguta dohadenām
analyzed: upa hvaye su dughām dhenum etām su hastaḥ go duh uta dohad enām

original: RV_01.164.26.2{19} śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmastadu ṣu pra vocam
analyzed: śreṣṭham savam savitā sāviṣat naḥ abhīddhaḥ gharmaḥ tat u su pra vocam

original: RV_01.164.27.1{19} hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsamichantī manasābhyāgāt
analyzed: hiṅkṛṇvatī vasu patnī vasūnām vatsam icchantī manasā abhyāgāt

original: RV_01.164.27.2{19} duhāmaśvibhyāṃ payo aghnyeyaṃ sa vardhatāṃ mahate saubhagāya
analyzed: duhām aśvibhyām payaḥ aghnyā iyam sa vardhatām mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_01.164.28.1{19} gauramīmedanu vatsaṃ miṣantaṃ mūrdhānaṃ hiṃṃ akṛṇon mātavā u
analyzed: gauḥ amīmet anu vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānam hiṃṃ akṛṇot mātavai u

original: RV_01.164.28.2{19} sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmamabhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ
analyzed: sṛkvāṇam gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ

original: RV_01.164.29.1{19} ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaurabhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāvadhi śritā
analyzed: ayam sa śiṅkte yena gauḥ abhīvṛtā mimāti māyum dhvasana avadhi śritā

original: RV_01.164.29.2{19} sā cittibhirni hi cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrimauhata
analyzed: sā cittibhiḥ ni hi cakāra martyam vidyut bhavantī prati vavrim auhata

original: RV_01.164.30.1{19} anacchaye turagātu jīvamejad dhruvaṃ madhya ā pastyānām
analyzed: anat śaye tura gātu jīvam ejat dhruvam madhye ā pastyānām

original: RV_01.164.30.2{19} jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhiramartyo martyenā sayoniḥ
analyzed: jīvaḥ mṛtasya carati svadhābhiḥ amartyaḥ martyena sa yoniḥ

original: RV_01.164.31.1{20} apaśyaṃ gopāmanipadyamānamā ca parā ca pathibhiścarantam
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam

original: RV_01.164.31.2{20} sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viśūcīrvasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣvantaḥ
analyzed: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viśūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_01.164.32.1{20} ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirugin nutasmāt
analyzed: yaḥ īm cakāra na saḥ asya veda yaḥ īm dadarśa hirugid nutasmāt

original: RV_01.164.32.2{20} sa māturyonā parivīto antarbahuprajā nirṛtimā viveśa
analyzed: sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahuprajāḥ nirṛtimā viveśa

original: RV_01.164.33.1{20} dyaurme pitā janitā nābhiratra bandhurme mātā pṛthivīmahīyam
analyzed: dyauḥ me pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra bandhuḥ me mātā pṛthivīmahī iyam

original: RV_01.164.33.2{20} uttānayoścamvoryonirantaratrā pitā duhiturgarbhamādhāt
analyzed: uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antaratra pitā duhituḥ garbham ādhāt

original: RV_01.164.34.1{20} pṛchāmi tvā paramantaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛchāmi yatra bhuvanasyanābhiḥ
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_01.164.34.2{20} pṛchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: RV_01.164.35.1{20} iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ
analyzed: iyam vediḥ paraḥ antaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ayam yajñaḥ bhuvanasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_01.164.35.2{20} ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyaṃ vācaḥparamaṃ vyoma
analyzed: ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: RV_01.164.36.1{21} saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇostiṣṭhanti pradiśāvidharmaṇi
analyzed: sapta ardha garbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ viṣṇoḥ tiṣṭhanti pradiśā a vidharmaṇi

original: RV_01.164.36.2{21} te dhītibhirmanasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ
analyzed: te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvatas

original: RV_01.164.37.1{21} an vi jānāmi yadivedamasmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi
analyzed: an vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi

original: RV_01.164.37.2{21} yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyādid va[co aśnuve bhāgamasyāḥ
analyzed: yadā mā agan prathama jāḥ ṛtasya āt id vacaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ

original: RV_01.164.38.1{21} apāṃ prāṃ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ
analyzed: apām prāṃ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ amartyaḥ martyena sa yoniḥ

original: RV_01.164.38.2{21} tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā nyanyaṃ cikyurna nicikyuranyam
analyzed: tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ni anyam cikyuḥ na nicikyuḥ anyam

original: RV_01.164.39.1{21} ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ
analyzed: ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ

original: RV_01.164.39.2{21} yastan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidusta ime samāsate
analyzed: yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ye id tat viduḥ te ime samāsate

original: RV_01.164.40.1{21} sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma
analyzed: sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ atha u vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: RV_01.164.40.2{21} addhi tṛṇamaghnye viśvadānīṃ piba śuddhamudakamācarantī
analyzed: addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī

original: RV_01.164.41.1{22} gaurīrmimāya salilāni takṣatyekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī
analyzed: gaurīḥ mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī

original: RV_01.164.41.2{22} aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman
analyzed: aṣṭāpadī navapadī sahasra akṣarā parame vyoman

original: RV_01.164.42.1{22} tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaścatasraḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_01.164.42.2{22} tataḥ kṣaratyakṣaraṃ tad viśvamupa jīvati
analyzed: tatas kṣarati akṣaram tat viśvam upa jīvati

original: RV_01.164.43.1{22} śakamayaṃ dhūmamārādapaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa
analyzed: śaka mayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam viṣūvatā paras enā avareṇa

original: RV_01.164.43.2{22} ukṣāṇaṃ pṛśnimapacanta vīrāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan
analyzed: ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: RV_01.164.44.1{22} trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām
analyzed: trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām

original: RV_01.164.44.2{22} viśvameko abhi caṣṭe śacībhirdhrājirekasya dadṛśena rūpam
analyzed: viśvam ekaḥ abhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśena rūpam

original: RV_01.164.45.1{22} catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidurbrāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: catvāri vāc parimitā padāni tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_01.164.45.2{22} guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti
analyzed: guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti

original: RV_01.164.46.1{22} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇamagnimāhuratho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ atha u divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān

original: RV_01.164.46.2{22} ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadantyagniṃ yamaṃ mātariśvānamāhuḥ
analyzed: ekam sat viprāḥ bahudhā vadanti agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ

original: RV_01.164.47.1{23} kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divamut patanti
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti

original: RV_01.164.47.2{23} ta āvavṛtran sadanād ṛtasyādid ghṛtena pṛthivī vyudyate
analyzed: te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya ādid ghṛtena pṛthivī vyudyate

original: RV_01.164.48.1{23} dvādaśa pradhayaścakramekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tacciketa
analyzed: dvādaśa pradhayaḥ cakram ekam trīṇi nabhyāni kaḥ u tat ciketa

original: RV_01.164.48.2{23} tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭirna calācalāsaḥ
analyzed: tasmin sākam tri śatā na śaṅkavaḥ arpitāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ na calācalāsaḥ

original: RV_01.164.49.1{23} yaste stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūryena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi
analyzed: yaḥ te stanaḥ śaśayaḥ yaḥ mayobhūḥ yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi

original: RV_01.164.49.2{23} yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tamiha dhātave kaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ratna dhāḥ vasu vid yaḥ su datraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ

original: RV_01.164.50.1{23} yajñena yajñamayajanta devāstani dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāstani dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: RV_01.164.50.2{23} te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ
analyzed: te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: RV_01.164.51.1{23} samānametadudakamuccaityava cāhabhiḥ
analyzed: samānam etat udakam uccais aiti ava ca ahabhiḥ

original: RV_01.164.51.2{23} bhūmiṃ parjanyā jinvanti divaṃ jinvantyagnayaḥ
analyzed: bhūmim parjanyāḥ jinvanti divam jinvanti agnayaḥ

original: RV_01.164.52.1{23} divyaṃ suparṇaṃ vāyasaṃ bṛhantamapāṃ garbhaṃ darśatamoṣadhīnām
analyzed: divyam suparṇam vāyasam bṛhantam apām garbham darśatam oṣadhīnām

original: RV_01.164.52.2{23} abhīpato vṛṣṭibhistarpayantaṃ sarasvantamavase johavīmi
analyzed: abhīpatas vṛṣṭibhiḥ tarpayantam sarasvantam avase johavīmi

original: RV_01.165.01.1{24} kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ saṃ mimikṣuḥ
analyzed: kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_01.165.01.2{24} kayā matī kuta etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā
analyzed: kayā matī kutas etāsaḥ ete arcanti śuṣmam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasūyā

original: RV_01.165.02.1{24} kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣuryuvānaḥ ko adhvare maruta ā vavarta
analyzed: kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ kaḥ adhvare marutaḥ ā vavarta

original: RV_01.165.02.2{24} śyenāniva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma
analyzed: śyenān iva dhrajataḥ antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma

original: RV_01.165.03.1{24} kutastvamindra māhinaḥ sanneko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā
analyzed: kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ san ekaḥ yāsi satpate kim te itthā

original: RV_01.165.03.2{24} saṃ pṛchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānairvocestan no harivo yatte asme
analyzed: sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānaiḥ voceḥ tat naḥ harivas yat te asme

original: RV_01.165.04.1{24} brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ
analyzed: brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śam sutāsaḥ śuṣmaḥ iyarti prabhṛtaḥ me adriḥ

original: RV_01.165.04.2{24} ā śāsate prati haryantyukthemā harī vahatastā no acha
analyzed: ā śāsate prati haryanti ukthā imā harī vahataḥ tāḥ naḥ acha

original: RV_01.165.05.1{24} ato vayamantamebhiryujānāḥ svakṣatrebhistanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ
analyzed: atas vayam antam ebhiḥ yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhiḥ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_01.165.05.2{24} mahobhiretānupa yujmahe nvindra svadhāmanu hi no babhūtha
analyzed: mahobhiḥ etān upa yujmahe nu indra svadhām anu hi naḥ babhūtha

original: RV_01.165.06.1{25} kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan māmekaṃ samadhattāhihatye
analyzed: kva syā vaḥ marutaḥ svadhā āsīt yat mām ekam samadhatta ahi hatye

original: RV_01.165.06.2{25} ahaṃ hyūgrastaviṣastuviṣmān viśvasya śatroranamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ
analyzed: aham hi ūgraḥ taviṣaḥ tuviṣmān viśvasya śatroḥ anamam vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_01.165.07.1{25} bhūri cakartha yujyebhirasme samānebhirvṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ
analyzed: bhūri cakartha yujyebhiḥ asme samānebhiḥ vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ

original: RV_01.165.07.2{25} bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendra kratvā maruto yadvaśāma
analyzed: bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭha indra kratvā marutaḥ yat vaśāma

original: RV_01.165.08.1{25} vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān
analyzed: vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣaḥ babhūvān

original: RV_01.165.08.2{25} ahametā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaścakara vajrabāhuḥ
analyzed: aham etāḥ manave viśva ścandrāḥ su gāḥ apaḥ cakara vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_01.165.09.1{25} anuttamā te maghavan nakirnu na tvāvānasti devatā vidānaḥ
analyzed: anuttamā te maghavan nakir nu na tvāvān asti devatāḥ vidānaḥ

original: RV_01.165.09.2{25} na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhipravṛddha
analyzed: na jāyamānaḥ naśate na jātaḥ yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha

original: RV_01.165.10.1{25} ekasya cin me vibhvastvojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā
analyzed: ekasya cit me vibhvastu ojaḥ yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā

original: RV_01.165.10.2{25} ahaṃ hyūgro maruto vidāno yāni cyavamindra idīśa eṣām
analyzed: aham hi ūgraḥ marutaḥ vidānaḥ yāni cyavam indraḥ id īśe eṣām

original: RV_01.165.11.1{26} amandan mā maruta stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyaṃ brahma cakra
analyzed: amandat mā marutaḥ stomaḥ atra yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra

original: RV_01.165.11.2{26} indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyastanvetanūbhiḥ
analyzed: indrāya vṛṣṇe su makhāya mahyam sakhye sakhāyaḥ tanvā itanūbhiḥ

original: RV_01.165.12.1{26} evedete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śrava eṣo dadhānāḥ
analyzed: eva id ete prati mā rocamānāḥ anedyaḥ śravaḥ eṣaḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_01.165.12.2{26} saṃcakṣyā marutaścandravarṇā achānta me chadayāthā canūnam
analyzed: saṃcakṣyāḥ marutaḥ candra varṇāḥ achānta me chadaya athā canūnam

original: RV_01.165.13.1{26} ko nvatra maruto māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīnrachā sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu atra marutaḥ māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīn racha sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_01.165.13.2{26} manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣāṃ bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām
analyzed: manmāni citrā apivātayantaḥ eṣām bhūta navedāḥ me ṛtānām

original: RV_01.165.14.1{26} ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārurasmāñcakre mānyasya medhā
analyzed: ā yat duvasyāt duvase na

original: RV_01.165.14.2{26} o ṣu vartta maruto vipramachemā brahmāṇi jaritā voarcat
analyzed: ā u su varta marutaḥ brahmāṇi jaritā voarcat

original: RV_01.165.15.1{26} eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīrmāndāryasya mānyasya karoḥ
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya karoḥ

original: RV_01.165.15.2{26} eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
analyzed: ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_01.166.01.1{01} tan nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvaṃ mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasyaketave
analyzed: tat nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvam mahitvam vṛṣabhasya ketave

original: RV_01.166.01.2{01} aidheva yāman marutastuviṣvaṇo yudheva śakrāstaviṣāṇi kartana
analyzed: aidhā iva yāman marutaḥ tuviṣvaṇaḥ yudhā iva śakrāḥ taviṣāṇi kartana

original: RV_01.166.02.1{01} nityaṃ na sūnuṃ madhu bibhrata upa krīḷanti krīḷā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ
analyzed: nityam na sūnum madhu bibhrataḥ upa krīḍanti krīḍā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_01.166.02.2{01} nakṣanti rudrā avasā namasvinaṃ na mardhanti svatavaso haviṣkṛtam
analyzed: nakṣanti rudrāḥ avasā namasvinam na mardhanti svatavasaḥ haviṣkṛtam

original: RV_01.166.03.1{01} yasmā ūmāso amṛtā arāsata rāyas poṣaṃ ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe
analyzed: yasmai ūmāsaḥ amṛtāḥ arāsata rāyaḥ poṣam ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe

original: RV_01.166.03.2{01} ukṣantyasmai maruto hitā iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ
analyzed: ukṣanti asmai marutaḥ hitāḥ iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ

original: RV_01.166.04.1{01} ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhiravyata pra va evāsaḥ svayatāsoadhrajan
analyzed: ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhiḥ avyata pra vaḥ evāsaḥ sva yatāsaḥ adhrajan

original: RV_01.166.04.2{01} bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citro vo yāmaḥprayatāsv ṛṣṭiṣu
analyzed: bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citraḥ vaḥ yāmaḥ prayatāsu ṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.166.05.1{01} yat tveṣayāmā nadayanta parvatān divo vā pṛṣṭhaṃ naryāacucyavuḥ
analyzed: yat tveṣa yāmāḥ nadayanta parvatān divaḥ vā pṛṣṭham naryāḥ acucyavuḥ

original: RV_01.166.05.2{01} viśvo vo ajman bhayate vanaspatī rathīyantīvapra jihīta oṣadhiḥ
analyzed: viśvaḥ vaḥ ajman bhayate vanaspatiḥ jihīte oṣadhiḥ

original: RV_01.166.06.1{02} yūyaṃ na ugrā marutaḥ sucetunāriṣṭagrāmāḥ sumatiṃ pipartana
analyzed: yūyam naḥ ugrāḥ marutaḥ sucetunā ariṣṭa grāmāḥ sumatim pipartana

original: RV_01.166.06.2{02} yatrā vo didyud radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhiteva barhaṇā
analyzed: yatrā vaḥ didyut radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhitā iva barhaṇā

original: RV_01.166.07.1{02} pra skambhadeṣṇā anavabhrarādhaso 'lātṛṇāso vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ
analyzed: pra skambha deṣṇāḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ alātṛṇāsaḥ vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ

original: RV_01.166.07.2{02} arcantyarkaṃ madirasya pītaye vidurvīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā
analyzed: arcanti arkam madirasya pītaye viduḥ vīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_01.166.08.1{02} śatabhujibhistamabhihruteraghāt pūrbhī rakṣatā maruto yamāvata
analyzed: śata bhujibhiḥ tam abhihruteḥ aghāt pūrbhiḥ rakṣata marutaḥ yam āvata

original: RV_01.166.08.2{02} janaṃ yamugrāstavaso virapśinaḥ pāthanā śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu
analyzed: janam yam ugrāḥ tavasaḥ virapśinaḥ pāthana śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu

original: RV_01.166.09.1{02} viśvāni bhadrā maruto ratheṣu vo mithaspṛdhyeva taviṣāṇyāhitā
analyzed: viśvāni bhadrā marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ mithaspṛdhyā iva taviṣāṇi āhitā

original: RV_01.166.09.2{02} aṃseṣvā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayo 'kṣo vaścakrā samayā vi vāvṛte
analyzed: aṃsa iṣvā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayaḥ akṣaḥ vaḥ cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte

original: RV_01.166.10.1{02} bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāso añjayaḥ
analyzed: bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāsaḥ añjayaḥ

original: RV_01.166.10.2{02} aṃseṣvetāḥ paviṣu kṣurā adhi vayo na pakṣān vyanu śriyo dhire
analyzed: aṃseṣu etāḥ paviṣu kṣurāḥ adhi vayaḥ na pakṣān vi anu śriyaḥ dhire

original: RV_01.166.11.1{03} mahānto mahnā vibhvo vibhūtayo dūredṛśo ye divyā iva stṛbhiḥ
analyzed: mahāntaḥ mahnā vibhvaḥ vibhūtayaḥ dūredṛśaḥ ye divyāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ

original: RV_01.166.11.2{03} mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāra āsabhiḥ sammiślā indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ
analyzed: mandrāḥ su jihvāḥ svaritāraḥ āsabhiḥ sammiślāḥ indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ

original: RV_01.166.12.1{03} tad vaḥ sujātā maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ vo dātramaditeriva vratam
analyzed: tat vaḥ su jātāḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam dīrgham vaḥ dātram aditeḥ iva vratam

original: RV_01.166.12.2{03} indraścana tyajasā vi hruṇāti tajjanāya yasmai sukṛte arādhvam
analyzed: indraḥ cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti tat janāya yasmai su kṛte arādhvam

original: RV_01.166.13.1{03} tad vo jāmitvaṃ marutaḥ pare yuge purū yacchaṃsamamṛtāsaāvata
analyzed: tat vaḥ jāmi tvam marutaḥ pare yuge purū yat śaṃsam amṛtāsaḥ āvata

original: RV_01.166.13.2{03} ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭimāvyā sākaṃ naro daṃsanairā cikitrire
analyzed: ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭim āvyā sākam naraḥ daṃsanaiḥ ā cikitrire

original: RV_01.166.14.1{03} yena dīrghaṃ marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ
analyzed: yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ

original: RV_01.166.14.2{03} ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsa ebhiryajñebhistadabhīṣṭimaśyām
analyzed: ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsaḥ ebhiḥ yajñebhiḥ tat abhīṣṭim aśyām
eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ

original: RV_01.167.01.1{04} sahasraṃ ta indrotayo naḥ sahasramiṣo harivo gūrtatamāḥ
analyzed: sahasram te indra ūtayaḥ naḥ sahasram iṣaḥ harivas gūrtatamāḥ

original: RV_01.167.01.2{04} sahasraṃ rāyo mādayadhyai sahasriṇa upa no yantu vājāḥ
analyzed: sahasram rāyaḥ mādayadhyai sahasriṇaḥ upa naḥ yantu vājāḥ

original: RV_01.167.02.1{04} ā no 'vobhirmaruto yāntvachā jyeṣṭhebhirvā bṛhaddivaiḥsumāyāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ avobhiḥ marutaḥ yāntu achā jyeṣṭhebhiḥ vā bṛhaddivaiḥ su māyāḥ

original: RV_01.167.02.2{04} adha yadeṣāṃ niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya ciddhanayanta pāre
analyzed: adha yat eṣām niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya cit hanayanta pāre

original: RV_01.167.03.1{04} mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇyanirṇiguparā na ṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇya nirṇij uparā na ṛṣṭiḥ

original: RV_01.167.03.2{04} guhā carantī manuṣo na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyeva saṃ vāk
analyzed: guhā carantī manuṣaḥ na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyā iva sam vāc

original: RV_01.167.04.1{04} parā śubhrā ayāso yavyā sādhāraṇyeva maruto mimikṣuḥ
analyzed: parā śubhrāḥ ayāsaḥ yavyā sādhāraṇyā iva marutaḥ mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_01.167.04.2{04} na rodasī apa nudanta ghorā juṣanta vṛdhaṃ sakhyāya devāḥ
analyzed: na rodasī apa nudanta ghorāḥ juṣanta vṛdham sakhyāya devāḥ

original: RV_01.167.05.1{04} joṣad yadīmasuryā sacadhyai viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ
analyzed: joṣat sacadhyai viṣita stukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ

original: RV_01.167.05.2{04} ā sūryeva vidhato rathaṃ gāt tveṣapratīkā nabhaso netyā
analyzed: ā sūryā iva vidhataḥ ratham gāt tveṣa pratīkā nabhasaḥ netyā

original: RV_01.167.06.1{05} āsthāpayanta yuvatiṃ yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiṣlāṃ vidatheṣupajrām
analyzed: āsthāpayanta yuvatim yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiṣlām vidatheṣu pajrām

original: RV_01.167.06.2{05} arko yad vo maruto haviṣmān gāyad gāthaṃ sutasomo duvasyan
analyzed: arkaḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ haviṣmān gāyat gātham suta somaḥ duvasyan

original: RV_01.167.07.1{05} prataṃ vivakmi vakmyo ya eṣāṃ marutāṃ mahimā satyo asti
analyzed: vivakmi vakmyaḥ yaḥ eṣām marutām mahimā satyaḥ asti

original: RV_01.167.07.2{05} sacā yadīṃ vṛṣamaṇā ahaṃyu sthirā cijjanīrvahate subhāgāḥ
analyzed: sacā yadi īm vṛṣamaṇāḥ ahaṃyu sthirā cit janīḥ vahate subhāgāḥ

original: RV_01.167.08.1{05} pānti mitrāvaruṇāvavadyāccayata īmaryamo apraśastān
analyzed: pānti mitrāvaruṇau avadyāt cayataḥ īm aryamā u apraśastān

original: RV_01.167.08.2{05} uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdha īṃ maruto dātivāraḥ
analyzed: uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdhe īm marutaḥ dāti vāraḥ

original: RV_01.167.09.1{05} nahī nu vo maruto antyasme ārāttāccicchavaso antamāpuḥ
analyzed: nahi nu vaḥ marutaḥ anti asme ārāt tāt cit śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ

original: RV_01.167.09.2{05} te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃso 'rṇo na dveṣo dhṛṣatā pari ṣṭhuḥ
analyzed: te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃsaḥ arṇaḥ na dveṣaḥ dhṛṣatā pari sthuḥ

original: RV_01.167.10.1{05} vayamadyendrasya preṣṭhā vayaṃ śvo vocemahi samarye
analyzed: vayam adya indrasya preṣṭhāḥ vayam śvas vocemahi samarye

original: RV_01.167.10.2{05} vayaṃ purā mahi ca no anu dyūn tan na ṛbhukṣā narāmanu ṣyāt
analyzed: vayam purā mahi ca naḥ anu dyūn tat naḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ narām anu syāt
eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ

original: RV_01.168.01.1{06} yajñā-yajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇirdhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ vo devayā u dadhidhve
analyzed: yajñāyajñāḥ vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇiḥ dhiyam dhiyam vaḥ deva yāḥ u dadhidhve

original: RV_01.168.01.2{06} ā vo 'rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyormahe vavṛtyāmavase suvṛktibhiḥ
analyzed: ā vaḥ arvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyoḥ mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_01.168.02.1{06} vavrāso na ye svajāḥ svatavasa iṣaṃ svarabhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ
analyzed: vavrāsaḥ na ye sva jāḥ svatavasaḥ iṣam svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_01.168.02.2{06} sahasriyāso apāṃ normaya āsā gāvo vandyāso nokṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sahasriyāsaḥ apām na ūrmayaḥ āsā gāvaḥ vandyāsaḥ na ukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_01.168.03.1{06} somāso na ye sutāstṛptāṃśavo hṛtsu pītāso duvaso nāsate
analyzed: somāsaḥ na ye sutāḥ tṛpta aṃśavaḥ hṛtsu pītāsaḥ duvasaḥ na āsate

original: RV_01.168.03.2{06} aiṣāmaṃseṣu rambhiṇīva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiścakṛtiśca saṃ dadhe
analyzed: ā eṣām aṃseṣu rambhiṇī iva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiḥ cakṛtiḥ ca sam dadhe

original: RV_01.168.04.1{06} ava svayuktā diva ā vṛthā yayuramartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā
analyzed: ava sva yuktāḥ divaḥ ā vṛthā yayuḥ amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā

original: RV_01.168.04.2{06} areṇavastuvijātā acucyavurdṛḷhāni cin maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: areṇavaḥ tuvi jātāḥ acucyavuḥ dṛḷhāni cit marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_01.168.05.1{06} ko vo 'ntarmaruta ṛṣṭividyuto rejati tmanā hanveva jihvayā
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ antar marutaḥ ṛṣṭi vidyutaḥ rejati tmanā hanvā iva jihvayā

original: RV_01.168.05.2{06} dhanvacyuta iṣāṃ na yāmani purupraiṣā ahanyo naitaśaḥ
analyzed: dhanva cyutaḥ iṣām na yāmani puru praiṣāḥ ahanyaḥ na etaśaḥ

original: RV_01.168.06.1{07} kva svidasya rajaso mahas paraṃ kvāvaraṃ maruto yasminnāyaya
analyzed: kva svid asya rajasaḥ mahaḥ param kva avaram marutaḥ yasmin nāyaya

original: RV_01.168.06.2{07} yaccyāvayatha vithureva saṃhitaṃ vyadriṇā patatha tveṣamarṇavam
analyzed: yat cyāvayatha vithurā iva saṃhitam vyadriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam

original: RV_01.168.07.1{07} sātirna vo 'mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī
analyzed: sātiḥ na vaḥ amavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī

original: RV_01.168.07.2{07} bhadrā vo rātiḥ pṛṇato na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryeva jañjatī
analyzed: bhadrā vaḥ rātiḥ pṛṇataḥ na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryā iva jañjatī

original: RV_01.168.08.1{07} prati ṣṭobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyo yadabhriyāṃ vācamudīrayanti
analyzed: prati stobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyaḥ yat abhriyām vācam udīrayanti

original: RV_01.168.08.2{07} ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadī ghṛtaṃ marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti
analyzed: ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyām yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti

original: RV_01.168.09.1{07} asūta pṛśnirmahate raṇāya tveṣamayāsāṃ marutāmanīkam
analyzed: asūta pṛśniḥ mahate raṇāya tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam

original: RV_01.168.09.2{07} te sapsarāso 'janayantābhvamādit svadhāmiṣirāṃ paryapaśyan
analyzed: te sapsarāsaḥ ajanayanta abhvam ādid svadhām iṣirām paryapaśyan
eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ

original: RV_01.169.01.1{08} mahaścit tvamindra yata etān mahaścidasi tyajaso varūtā
analyzed: mahaścit tvam indra yataḥ etān mahaścit asi tyajasaḥ varūtā

original: RV_01.169.01.2{08} sa no vedho marutāṃ cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā
analyzed: sa naḥ vedhaḥ marutām cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā

original: RV_01.169.02.1{08} ayujran ta indra viśvakṛṣṭīrvidānāso niṣṣidho martyatrā
analyzed: ayujran te indra viśvakṛṣṭīḥ vidānāsaḥ niṣṣidhaḥ martyatrā

original: RV_01.169.02.2{08} marutāṃ pṛtsutirhāsamānā svarmīḷhasya pradhanasya sātau
analyzed: marutām pṛtsutiḥ ha asamānā svarmīḍhasya pradhanasya sātau

original: RV_01.169.03.1{08} amyak sā ta indra ṛṣṭirasme sanemyabhvaṃ maruto junanti
analyzed: amyak sā te indra ṛṣṭiḥ asme sanemi abhvam marutaḥ junanti

original: RV_01.169.03.2{08} agniścid dhi ṣmātase śuśukvānāpo na dvīpaṃ dadhatiprayāṃsi
analyzed: agniḥ cit hi smātase śuśukvān apaḥ na dvīpam dadhati prayāṃsi

original: RV_01.169.04.1{08} tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayeva rātim
analyzed: tvam tu naḥ indra tam rayim dāḥ ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayā iva rātim

original: RV_01.169.04.2{08} stutaśca yāste cakananta vāyo stanaṃ na madhvaḥpīpayanta vājaiḥ
analyzed: stutaḥ ca yāḥ te vāyoḥ stanam na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ

original: RV_01.169.05.1{08} tve rāya indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cid ṛtāyoḥ
analyzed: tve rāyaḥ indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cit ṛtāyoḥ

original: RV_01.169.05.2{08} te ṣu ṇo maruto mṛḷayantu ye smā purā gātūyantīva devāḥ
analyzed: te su naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍayantu ye smā purā gātūyanti iva devāḥ

original: RV_01.169.06.1{09} prati pra yāhīndra mīḷhuṣo nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva
analyzed: prati pra yāhi indra mīḍhuṣaḥ nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva

original: RV_01.169.06.2{09} adha yadeṣāṃ pṛthubudhnāsa etāstīrthe nāryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ
analyzed: adha yat eṣām pṛthu budhnāsaḥ etāḥ tīrthe na aryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_01.169.07.1{09} prati ghorāṇāmetānāmayāsāṃ marutāṃ śṛṇva āyatāmupabdiḥ
analyzed: prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām marutām śṛṇve āyatām upabdiḥ

original: RV_01.169.07.2{09} ye martyaṃ pṛtanāyantamūmairṛṇāvānaṃ na patayanta sargaiḥ
analyzed: ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmaiḥ ṛṇāvānam na patayanta sargaiḥ

original: RV_01.169.08.1{09} tvaṃ mānebhya indra viśvajanyā radā marudbhiḥ śurudho goagrāḥ
analyzed: tvam mānebhyaḥ indra viśvajanyāḥ rada marudbhiḥ śurudhaḥ go agrāḥ

original: RV_01.169.08.2{09} stavānebhi stavase deva devairvidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
analyzed: stavānebhiḥ stavase deva devaiḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_01.170.01.1{10} na nūnamasti no śvaḥ kastad veda yadadbhutam
analyzed: na nūnam asti no śvas kaḥ tat veda yat adbhutam

original: RV_01.170.01.2{10} anyasyacittamabhi saṃcareṇyamutādhītaṃ vi naśyati
analyzed: anyasya cittam abhi saṃcareṇyam uta adhītam vi naśyati

original: RV_01.170.02.1{10} kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutastava
analyzed: kim naḥ indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava

original: RV_01.170.02.2{10} tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ
analyzed: tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ

original: RV_01.170.03.1{10} kiṃ no bhrātaragastya sakhā sannati manyase
analyzed: kim naḥ bhrātar agastya sakhā san ati manyase

original: RV_01.170.03.2{10} vidmā hi teyathā mano 'smabhyamin na ditsasi
analyzed: vidma hi teyathā manaḥ asmabhyam id na ditsasi

original: RV_01.170.04.1{10} araṃ kṛṇvantu vediṃ samagnimindhatāṃ puraḥ
analyzed: aram kṛṇvantu vedim sam agnim indhatām puras

original: RV_01.170.04.2{10} tatrāmṛtasya cetanaṃ yajñaṃ te tanavāvahai
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cetanam yajñam te tanavāvahai

original: RV_01.170.05.1{10} tvamīśiṣe vasupate vasūnāṃ tvaṃ mitrāṇāṃ mitrapate dheṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe vasu pate vasūnām tvam mitrāṇām mitra pate dheṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_01.170.05.2{10} indra tvaṃ marudbhiḥ saṃ vadasvādha prāśāna ṛtuthā havīṃṣi
analyzed: indra tvam marudbhiḥ sam vadasva adha prāśānaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi

original: RV_01.171.01.1{11} prati va enā namasāhamemi sūktena bhikṣe sumatiṃ turāṇām
analyzed: prati vaḥ enā namasā aham emi sūktena bhikṣe sumatim turāṇām

original: RV_01.171.01.2{11} rarāṇatā maruto vedyābhirni heḷo dhatta vi mucadhvamaśvān
analyzed: rarāṇatā marutaḥ vedyābhiḥ ni heḍaḥ dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān

original: RV_01.171.02.1{11} eṣa va stomo maruto namasvān hṛdā taṣṭo manasā dhāyi devāḥ
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ namasvān hṛdā taṣṭaḥ manasā dhāyi devāḥ

original: RV_01.171.02.2{11} upemā yāta manasā juṣāṇā yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā namasa id vṛdhāsaḥ
analyzed: upa imāḥ yāta manasā juṣāṇāḥ yūyam hi stha namasaḥ id vṛdhāsaḥ

original: RV_01.171.03.1{11} stutāso no maruto mṛḷayantūta stuto maghavā śa=mbhaviṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: stutāsaḥ naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍayantu uta stutaḥ maghavā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_01.171.03.2{11} ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanānyahāni viśvā maruto jigīṣā
analyzed: ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāni ahāni viśvā marutaḥ jigīṣā

original: RV_01.171.04.1{11} asmādahaṃ taviṣādīṣamāṇa indrād bhiyā maruto rejamānaḥ
analyzed: asmāt aham taviṣāt īṣamāṇaḥ indrāt bhiyā marutaḥ rejamānaḥ

original: RV_01.171.04.2{11} yuṣmabhyaṃ havyā niśitānyāsan tānyāre cakṛmā mṛḷata naḥ
analyzed: yuṣmabhyam havyā niśitāni āsan tāni āre cakṛma mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_01.171.05.1{11} yena mānāsaścitayanta usrā vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām
analyzed: yena mānāsaḥ citayante usrāḥ vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām

original: RV_01.171.05.2{11} sa no marudbhirvṛṣabha śravo dhā ugra ugrebhi sthaviraḥ sahodāḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ marudbhiḥ vṛṣabha śravaḥ dhāḥ ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ sthaviraḥ sahaḥ dāḥ

original: RV_01.171.06.1{11} tvaṃ pāhīndra sahīyaso nṝn bhavā marudbhiravayātaheḷāḥ
analyzed: tvam pāhi indra sahīyasaḥ nṝn bhava marudbhiḥ avayāta heḍāḥ

original: RV_01.171.06.2{11} supraketebhiḥ sāsahirdadhāno vidyāmeṣaṃ v. j.
analyzed: su praketebhiḥ sāsahiḥ dadhānaḥ vidyāma iṣam u j

original: RV_01.172.01.1{12} citro vo 'stu yāmaścitra ūtī sudānavaḥ
analyzed: citraḥ vaḥ astu yāmaḥ citraḥ ūtī sudānavaḥ

original: RV_01.172.01.2{12} maruto ahibhānavaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ ahi bhānavaḥ

original: RV_01.172.02.1{12} āre sā vaḥ sudānavo maruta ṛñjatī śaruḥ
analyzed: āre sā vaḥ sudānavaḥ marutaḥ ṛñjatī śaruḥ

original: RV_01.172.02.2{12} āre aśmā yamasyatha
analyzed: āre aśmā yamasyatha

original: RV_01.172.03.1{12} tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ

original: RV_01.172.03.2{12} ūrdhvān naḥ karta jīvase
analyzed: ūrdhvān naḥ karta jīvase

original: RV_01.173.01.1{13} gāyat sāma nabhanyaṃ yathā verarcāma tad vāvṛdhānaṃ svarvat
analyzed: gāyat sāma nabhanyam yathā veḥ arcāma tat vāvṛdhānam svarvat

original: RV_01.173.01.2{13} gāvo dhenavo barhiṣyadabdhā ā yat sadmānaṃ divyaṃ vivāsān
analyzed: gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ barhiṣi adabdhāḥ ā yat sadmānam divyam vivāsān

original: RV_01.173.02.1{13} arcad vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyairmṛgo nāśno ati yajjuguryāt
analyzed: arcat vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyaiḥ mṛgaḥ na aśnaḥ ati yat juguryāt

original: RV_01.173.02.2{13} pra mandayurmanāṃ gūrta hotā bharate maryo mithunā yajatraḥ
analyzed: pra mandayuḥ manām gūrta hotā bharate maryaḥ mithunā yajatraḥ

original: RV_01.173.03.1{13} nakṣad dhotā pari sadma mitā yan bharad garbhamā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: nakṣat hotā pari sadma mitā yan bharat garbhamā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_01.173.03.2{13} krandadaśvo nayamāno ruvad gaurantardūto na rodasī carad vāk
analyzed: krandat aśvaḥ nayamānaḥ ruvat gauḥ antar dūtaḥ na rodasī carat vāc

original: RV_01.173.04.1{13} tā karmāṣatarāsmai pra cyautnāni devayanto bharante
analyzed: tā karma aṣatarā asmai pra cyautnāni devayantaḥ bharante

original: RV_01.173.04.2{13} jujoṣadindro dasmavarcā nāsatyeva sugmyo ratheṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: jujoṣat indraḥ dasma varcāḥ nāsatyā iva sugmyaḥ ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_01.173.05.1{13} tamu ṣṭuhīndraṃ yo ha satvā yaḥ śūro maghavā yo ratheṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: tam u stuhi indram yaḥ ha satvā yaḥ śūraḥ maghavā yaḥ ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_01.173.05.2{13} pratīcaścid yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaścit tamaso vihantā
analyzed: pratīcaḥ cit yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaḥ cit tamasaḥ vihantā

original: RV_01.173.06.1{14} pra yaditthā mahinā nṛbhyo astyaraṃ rodasī kakṣye nāsmai
analyzed: pra yat itthā mahinā nṛbhyaḥ asti aram rodasī kakṣye na asmai

original: RV_01.173.06.2{14} saṃ vivya indro vṛjanaṃ na bhūmā bharti svadhāvānopaśamiva dyām
analyzed: sam vivye indraḥ vṛjanam na bhūmā bharti svadhāvān ā upaśam iva dyām

original: RV_01.173.07.1{14} samatsu tvā śūra satāmurāṇaṃ prapathintamaṃ paritaṃsayadhyai
analyzed: samatsu tvā śūra satāmurāṇam prapathintamam paritaṃsayadhyai

original: RV_01.173.07.2{14} sajoṣasa indraṃ made kṣoṇīḥ sūriṃ cid ye anumadanti vājaiḥ
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ indram made kṣoṇīḥ sūrim cit ye anumadanti vājaiḥ

original: RV_01.173.08.1{14} evā hi te śaṃ savanā samudra āpo yat ta āsu madanti devīḥ
analyzed: eva hi te śam savanā samudre āpaḥ yat te āsu madanti devīḥ

original: RV_01.173.08.2{14} viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūd gauḥ sūrīṃścid yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān
analyzed: viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūt gauḥ sūrīn cit yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān

original: RV_01.173.09.1{14} asāma yathā suṣakhāya ena svabhiṣṭayo narāṃ na śaṃsaiḥ
analyzed: asāma yathā su sakhāyaḥ ena su abhiṣṭayaḥ narām na śaṃsaiḥ

original: RV_01.173.09.2{14} asad yathā na indro vandaneṣṭhāsturo na karma nayamāna ukthā
analyzed: asat yathā naḥ indraḥ vandaneṣṭhāḥ turaḥ na karma nayamānaḥ ukthā

original: RV_01.173.10.1{14} viṣpardhaso narāṃ na śaṃsairasmākāsadindro vajrahastaḥ
analyzed: viṣpardhasaḥ narām na śaṃsaiḥ asmākā asat indraḥ vajra hastaḥ

original: RV_01.173.10.2{14} mitrāyuvo na pūrpatiṃ suśiṣṭau madhyāyuva upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ
analyzed: mitrāyuvaḥ na pūrpatim su śiṣṭau madhyāyuvaḥ upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ

original: RV_01.173.11.1{15} yajño hi ṣmendraṃ kaścid ṛndhañ juhurāṇaścin manasāpariyan
analyzed: yajñaḥ hi sma indram kaścid ṛndham juhurāṇaḥ cit manasā apariyan

original: RV_01.173.11.2{15} tīrthe nāchā tātṛṣāṇamoko dīrgho na sidhramā kṛṇotyadhvā
analyzed: tīrthe na achā tātṛṣāṇam okaḥ dīrghaḥ na sidhramā kṛṇoti adhvā

original: RV_01.173.12.1{15} mo ṣū ṇa indrātra pṛtsu devairasti hi ṣmā te śuṣminnavayāḥ
analyzed: mā u su naḥ indra atra pṛtsu devaiḥ asti hi sma te śuṣmin avayāḥ

original: RV_01.173.12.2{15} mahaścid yasya mīḷhuṣo yavyā haviṣmato marutovandate gīḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ cit yasya mīḍhuṣaḥ yavyā haviṣmataḥ marutaḥ vandate gīḥ

original: RV_01.173.13.1{15} eṣa stoma indra tubhyamasme etena gātuṃ harivo vido naḥ
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ indra tubhyam asme etena gātum harivas vidaḥ naḥ

original: RV_01.173.13.2{15} ā no vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāmeṣaṃ v. j.
analyzed: ā naḥ vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāma iṣam u j

original: RV_01.174.01.1{16} tvaṃ rājendra ye ca devā rakṣā nṝn pāhyasura tvamasmān
analyzed: tvam rājā indra ye ca devāḥ rakṣa nṝn pāhi asura tvam asmān

original: RV_01.174.01.2{16} tvaṃ satpatirmaghavā nastarutrastvaṃ satyo vasavānaḥ sahodāḥ
analyzed: tvam satpatiḥ maghavā naḥ tarutraḥ tvam satyaḥ vasavānaḥ sahaḥ dāḥ

original: RV_01.174.02.1{16} dano viśa indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīrdart
analyzed: danaḥ viśaḥ indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīḥ dart

original: RV_01.174.02.2{16} ṛṇorapo anavadyārṇā yūne vṛtraṃ purukutsāya randhīḥ
analyzed: ṛṇoḥ apaḥ anavadya arṇāḥ yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ

original: RV_01.174.03.1{16} ajā vṛta indra śūrapatnīrdyāṃ ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam
analyzed: aja vṛtaḥ indra śūra patnīḥ dyām ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam

original: RV_01.174.03.2{16} rakṣo agnimaśuṣaṃ tūrvayāṇaṃ siṃho na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ
analyzed: rakṣaḥ agnim aśuṣam tūrvayāṇam siṃhaḥ na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ

original: RV_01.174.04.1{16} śeṣan nu ta indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā
analyzed: śeṣan nu te indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā

original: RV_01.174.04.2{16} sṛjadarṇāṃsyava yad yudhā gāstiṣṭhad dharī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān
analyzed: sṛjat arṇāṃsi ava yat yudhā gāḥ tiṣṭhat harī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān

original: RV_01.174.05.1{16} vaha kutsamindra yasmiñcākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasyāśvā
analyzed: vaha kutsam indra yasmin cākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasya aśvā

original: RV_01.174.05.2{16} pra sūraścakraṃ vṛhatādabhīke 'bhi spṛdho yāsiṣadvajrabāhuḥ
analyzed: pra sūraḥ cakram vṛhatāt abhīke abhi spṛdhaḥ yāsiṣat vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_01.174.06.1{17} jaghanvānindra mitrerūñcodapravṛddho harivo adāśūn
analyzed: jaghanvān indra mitrerūn coda pravṛddhaḥ harivas a dāśūn

original: RV_01.174.06.2{17} praye paśyannaryamaṇaṃ sacāyostvayā śūrtā vahamānā apatyam
analyzed: praye paśyan aryamaṇam sacā āyoḥ tvayā śūrtāḥ vahamānāḥ apatyam

original: RV_01.174.07.1{17} rapat kavirindrārkasātau kṣāṃ dāsāyopabarhaṇīṃ kaḥ
analyzed: rapat kaviḥ indra arka sātau kṣām dāsāya upabarhaṇīm kaḥ

original: RV_01.174.07.2{17} karat tisro maghavā dānucitrā ni duryoṇe kuyavācaṃ mṛdhiśret
analyzed: karat tisraḥ maghavā dānu citrāḥ ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhiśret

original: RV_01.174.08.1{17} sanā tā ta indra navyā āguḥ saho nabho 'viraṇāya pūrvīḥ
analyzed: sanā tā te indra navyā āguḥ sahaḥ nabhaḥ aviraṇāya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_01.174.08.2{17} bhinat puro na bhido adevīrnanamo vadharadevasya pīyoḥ
analyzed: bhinat puraḥ na bhidaḥ adevīḥ nanamaḥ vadharadevasya pīyoḥ

original: RV_01.174.09.1{17} tvaṃ dhunirindra dhunimatīrṛṇorapaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ
analyzed: tvam dhuniḥ indra dhunimatīḥ ṛṇoḥ apaḥ sīrāḥ na sravantīḥ

original: RV_01.174.09.2{17} pra yat samudramati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti
analyzed: pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pāraya turvaśam yadum svasti

original: RV_01.174.10.1{17} tvamasmākamindra viśvadha sya avṛkatamo narāṃ nṛpātā
analyzed: tvam asmākam indra viśvadha sya avṛkatamaḥ narām nṛ pātā

original: RV_01.174.10.2{17} sa no viśvāsāṃ spṛdhāṃ sahodā vi...
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāsām spṛdhām sahaḥ dāḥ vi

original: RV_01.175.01.1{18} matsyapāyi te mahaḥ pātrasyeva harivo matsaro madaḥ
analyzed: matsya pāyi te mahaḥ pātrasya iva harivas matsaraḥ madaḥ

original: RV_01.175.01.2{18} vṛṣā te vṛṣṇa indurvājī sahasrasātamaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā te vṛṣṇaḥ induḥ vājī sahasra sātamaḥ

original: RV_01.175.02.1{18} ā naste gantu matsaro vṛṣā mado vareṇyaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ te gantu matsaraḥ vṛṣā madaḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_01.175.02.2{18} sahāvānindrasānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amartyaḥ
analyzed: sahāvān indrasānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_01.175.03.1{18} tvaṃ hi śūraḥ sanitā codayo manuṣo ratham
analyzed: tvam hi śūraḥ sanitā codayaḥ manuṣaḥ ratham

original: RV_01.175.03.2{18} sahāvān dasyumavratamoṣaḥ pātraṃ na śociṣā
