analyzed: sahāvān dasyum avratam oṣaḥ pātram na śociṣā

original: RV_01.175.04.1{18} muṣāya suryaṃ kave cakramīśāna ojasā
analyzed: muṣāya suryam kave cakram īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_01.175.04.2{18} vaha śuṣṇāyavadhaṃ kutsaṃ vātasyāśvaiḥ
analyzed: vaha śuṣṇāya vadham kutsam vātasya aśvaiḥ

original: RV_01.175.05.1{18} śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ
analyzed: śuṣmintamaḥ hi te madaḥ dyumnintamaḥ uta kratuḥ

original: RV_01.175.05.2{18} vṛtraghnā varivovidā maṃsīṣṭhā aśvasātamaḥ
analyzed: vṛtra ghnā varivaḥ vidā maṃsīṣṭhāḥ aśva sātamaḥ

original: RV_01.175.06.1{18} yathā purvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha
analyzed: yathā purvebhyaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ indra mayaḥ iva apaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha

original: RV_01.175.06.2{18} tāmanu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vi...
analyzed: tām anu tvā nividam johavīmi vi

original: RV_01.176.01.1{19} matsi no vasyaiṣṭaya indramindo vṛṣā viśa
analyzed: matsi naḥ vasyaiṣṭaye indram indo vṛṣā viśa

original: RV_01.176.01.2{19} ṛghāyamāṇainvasi śatrumanti na vindasi
analyzed: ṛghāyamāṇainvasi śatrumanti na vindasi

original: RV_01.176.02.1{19} tasminnā veśayā giro ya ekaścarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: tasmin ā veśaya giraḥ yaḥ ekaḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_01.176.02.2{19} anu svadhāyamupyate yavaṃ na carkṛṣad vṛṣā
analyzed: anu svadhā ayam upyate yavam na carkṛṣat vṛṣā

original: RV_01.176.03.1{19} yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnāṃ vasu
analyzed: yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnām vasu

original: RV_01.176.03.2{19} spāśayasva yo asmadhrug divyevāśanirjahi
analyzed: spāśayasva yaḥ asmadhruk divyā iva aśaniḥ jahi

original: RV_01.176.04.1{19} asunvantaṃ samaṃ jahi dūṇāśaṃ yo na te mayaḥ
analyzed: a sunvantam samam jahi dūṇāśam yaḥ na te mayaḥ

original: RV_01.176.04.2{19} asmabhyamasya vedanaṃ daddhi sūriścidohate
analyzed: asmabhyam asya vedanam daddhi sūriḥ cit ohate

original: RV_01.176.05.1{19} āvo yasya dvibarhaso 'rkeṣu sānuṣagasat
analyzed: āvaḥ yasya dvibarhasaḥ arkeṣu

original: RV_01.176.05.2{19} ājāvindrasyendo prāvo vājeṣu vājinam
analyzed: ājau indrasya indo prāvaḥ vājeṣu vājinam

original: RV_01.176.06.1{19} yathā pūrvebhyo ...
analyzed: yathā pūrvebhyaḥ

original: RV_01.177.01.1{20} ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnāṃ puruhūta indraḥ
analyzed: ā carṣaṇi prāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ janānām rājā kṛṣṭīnām puru hūtaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_01.177.01.2{20} stutaḥ śravasyannavasopa madrig yuktvā harīvṛṣaṇā yāhyarvāṃ
analyzed: stutaḥ śravasyan avasā upa madrik yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā yāhi arvān

original: RV_01.177.02.1{20} ye te vṛṣaṇo vṛṣabhāsa indra brahmayujo vṛṣarathāso atyāḥ
analyzed: ye te vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣabhāsaḥ indra brahma yujaḥ vṛṣa rathāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_01.177.02.2{20} tānā tiṣṭha tebhirā yāhyarvāṃ havāmahe tvā suta indra some
analyzed: tān ā tiṣṭha tebhiḥ ā yāhi arvām havāmahe tvā sute indra some

original: RV_01.177.03.1{20} ā tiṣṭha rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha ratham vṛṣaṇam vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni

original: RV_01.177.03.2{20} yuktvā vṛṣabhyāṃ vṛṣabha kṣitīnāṃ haribhyāṃ yāhi pravatopa madrik
analyzed: yuktvā vṛṣabhyām vṛṣabha kṣitīnām haribhyām yāhi pravatā upa madrik

original: RV_01.177.04.1{20} ayaṃ yajño devayā ayaṃ miyedha imā brahmaṇyayamindra somaḥ
analyzed: ayam yajñaḥ deva yāḥ ayam miyedhaḥ imāḥ brahmaṇi ayam indra somaḥ

original: RV_01.177.04.2{20} stīrṇaṃ barhirā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadyavi mucā harī iha
analyzed: stīrṇam barhirā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadyavi mucā harī iha

original: RV_01.177.05.1{20} o suṣṭuta indra yāhyarvāṃ upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ
analyzed: ā u suṣṭutaḥ indra yāhi arvān upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_01.177.05.2{20} vidyāma vastoravasā gṛṇanto vi...
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ vi

original: RV_01.178.01.1{21} yad dha syā ta indra śruṣṭirasti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhya ūtī
analyzed: yat ha syā te indra śruṣṭiḥ asti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhyaḥ ūtī

original: RV_01.178.01.2{21} mā naḥ kāmaṃ mahayantamā dhag viśvā te aśyāmparyāpa āyoḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ kāmam mahayantama ā dhak viśvā te aśyāmpari apaḥ āyoḥ

original: RV_01.178.02.1{21} na ghā rājendra ā dabhan no yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau
analyzed: na ghā rājā indraḥ ā dabhat naḥ yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau

original: RV_01.178.02.2{21} āpaścidasmai sutukā aveṣan gaman na indraḥ sakhyā vayaśca
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai sutukāḥ aveṣan gamat naḥ indraḥ sakhyā vayaḥ ca

original: RV_01.178.03.1{21} jetā nṛbhirindraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havaṃ nādhamānasya kāroḥ
analyzed: jetā nṛbhiḥ indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havam nādhamānasya kāroḥ

original: RV_01.178.03.2{21} prabhartā rathaṃ dāśuṣa upaka udyanta giro yadi ca tmanā bhūt
analyzed: prabhartā ratham dāśuṣe upake udyanta giraḥ yadi ca tmanā bhūt

original: RV_01.178.04.1{21} evā nṛbhirindraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣo abhi mitriṇo bhūt
analyzed: eva nṛbhiḥ indraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣaḥ abhi mitriṇaḥ bhūt

original: RV_01.178.04.2{21} samarya iṣa stavate vivāci satrākaro yajamānasyaśaṃsaḥ
analyzed: samarye iṣaḥ stavate vivāci satrā karaḥ yajamānasya śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_01.178.05.1{21} tvayā vayaṃ maghavannindra śatrunabhi ṣyama mahato manyamanān
analyzed: tvayā vayam maghavan indra śatrun abhi syama mahataḥ manyamanān

original: RV_01.178.05.2{21} tvaṃ trātā tvamu no vṛdhe bhurvi...
analyzed: tvam trātā tvam u naḥ vṛdhe bhurvi

original: RV_01.179.01.1{22} pruvīrahaṃ śaradaḥ śaśramaṇā doṣā vastoruṣaso jarayantīḥ
analyzed: pruvīḥ aham śaradaḥ śaśramaṇāḥ doṣā vastoḥ uṣasaḥ jarayantīḥ

original: RV_01.179.01.2{22} mināti śriyaṃ jarimā tanūnamapyu nu patnīrvṛṣaṇo jagamyuḥ
analyzed: mināti śriyam jarimā tanūnam api u nu patnīḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ jagamyuḥ

original: RV_01.179.02.1{22} ye cid dhi pūrva ṛtasāpa āsan sākaṃ devebhiravadannṛtāni
analyzed: ye cit hi pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ āsan sākam devebhiḥ avadan ṛtāni

original: RV_01.179.02.2{22} te cidavasurnahyantamāpuḥ samū nu patnīrvṛṣabhirjagamyuḥ
analyzed: te cit avasuḥ nahyantam āpuḥ samū nu patnīḥ vṛṣabhiḥ jagamyuḥ

original: RV_01.179.03.1{22} na mṛṣā śrāntaṃ yadavanti devā viśvā it spṛdho abhyaśnavāva
analyzed: na mṛṣā śrāntam yat avanti devāḥ viśvāḥ id spṛdhaḥ abhyaśnavāva

original: RV_01.179.03.2{22} jayāvedatra śatanīthamajiṃ yat samyañcā mithunāvabhyajāva
analyzed: jayāvet atra śata nītham ajim yat samyañcā mithunau abhyajāva

original: RV_01.179.04.1{22} nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāma āgannita ājāto amutaḥ kutaścit
analyzed: nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāmaḥ āgan itas ājātaḥ amutas kutaścid

original: RV_01.179.04.2{22} lopāmudra vṛṣaṇaṃ nī riṇati dhīramadhīra dhayati śvasantam
analyzed: lopāmudra vṛṣaṇam nī riṇati dhīram adhīra dhayati śvasantam

original: RV_01.179.05.1{22} imaṃ n1 somamantito hṛtsu pītamupa bruve
analyzed: imam n somam antitas hṛtsu pītam upa bruve

original: RV_01.179.05.2{22} yat sīmāgaścakṛmā tat su mṛḷatu pulukāmo hi martyaḥ
analyzed: yat sīmā agaścakṛma tat su mṛḍatu pulu kāmaḥ hi martyaḥ

original: RV_01.179.06.1{22} agastyaḥ khanamanaḥ khanitraiḥ prajamapatyaṃ balamichamānaḥ
analyzed: agastyaḥ khana manaḥ khanitraiḥ prajam apatyam balam icchamānaḥ

original: RV_01.179.06.2{22} ubhau varṇāv ṛṣirugraḥ pupoṣa satyā deveṣvaśiṣo jagāma
analyzed: ubhau varṇau ṛṣiḥ ugraḥ pupoṣa satyāḥ deveṣu aśiṣaḥ jagāma

original: RV_01.180.01.1{23} yuvo rajāṃsi suyamāso aśvā ratho yad vāṃ paryarṇāṃsidiyat
analyzed: yuvoḥ rajāṃsi su yamāsaḥ aśvāḥ rathaḥ yat vām pari arṇāṃsi diyat

original: RV_01.180.01.2{23} hiraṇyayā vāṃ pavayah pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantā uṣasaḥ sacethe
analyzed: hiraṇyayāḥ vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantau uṣasaḥ sacethe

original: RV_01.180.02.1{23} yuvamatyasyāva nakṣatho yad vipatmano naryasya prayajyoḥ
analyzed: yuvamatyasya ava nakṣathaḥ yat vipatmanaḥ naryasya prayajyoḥ

original: RV_01.180.02.2{23} svasā yad vāṃ viśvagūrtī bharāti vājāyeṭṭe madhupāviṣe ca
analyzed: svasā yat vām viśva gūrtī bharāti vājāya īṭṭe madhu pāviṣe ca

original: RV_01.180.03.1{23} yuvaṃ paya usriyāyāmadhattaṃ pakvamāmāyāmava pūrvyaṃgoḥ
analyzed: yuvam payaḥ usriyāyām adhattam pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvī aṃgoḥ

original: RV_01.180.03.2{23} antaryad vanino vām ṛtapsū hvāro na śuciryajate haviṣmān
analyzed: antar yat vaninaḥ vām ṛtapsū hvāraḥ na śuciḥ yajate haviṣmān

original: RV_01.180.04.1{23} yuvaṃ ha gharmaṃ madhumantamatraye 'po na kṣodo 'vṛṇītameṣe
analyzed: yuvam ha gharmam madhumantam atraye apaḥ na kṣodaḥ avṛṇītam eṣe

original: RV_01.180.04.2{23} tad vāṃ narāvaśvinā paśvaiṣṭī rathyeva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ
analyzed: tat vām narau aśvinā paśvaiṣṭiḥ rathyā iva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ

original: RV_01.180.05.1{23} ā vāṃ dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā goroheṇa taugryo na jivriḥ
analyzed: ā vām dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā goroheṇa taugryaḥ na jivriḥ

original: RV_01.180.05.2{23} apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vāṃ jūrṇo vāmakṣuraṃhaso yajatrā
analyzed: apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vām jūrṇaḥ vām akṣuḥ aṃhasaḥ yajatrā

original: RV_01.180.06.1{24} ni yad yuvethe niyutaḥ sudānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim
analyzed: ni yat yuvethe niyutaḥ su dānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim

original: RV_01.180.06.2{24} preṣad veṣad vāto na sūrirā mahe dade suvratona vājam
analyzed: veṣat vātaḥ na sūrirā mahe dade suvrata ūna vājam

original: RV_01.180.07.1{24} vayaṃ cid dhi vāṃ jaritāraḥ satyā vipanyāmahe vi paṇirhitāvān
analyzed: vayam cit hi vām jaritāraḥ satyāḥ vipanyāmahe vi paṇiḥ hitāvān

original: RV_01.180.07.2{24} adhā cid dhi ṣmāśvināvanindyā pātho hi ṣmāvṛṣaṇāvantidevam
analyzed: adhā cit hi sma aśvinau anindyā pāthaḥ hi sma avṛṣaṇā avantidevam

original: RV_01.180.08.1{24} yuvaṃ cid dhi ṣmāśvināvanu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasyasātau
analyzed: yuvam cit hi sma aśvinau anu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau

original: RV_01.180.08.2{24} agastyo narāṃ nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunīva citayat sahasraiḥ
analyzed: agastyaḥ narām nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunī iva citayat sahasraiḥ

original: RV_01.180.09.1{24} pra yad vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yātho manuṣo na hotā
analyzed: pra yat vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yāthaḥ manuṣaḥ na hotā

original: RV_01.180.09.2{24} dhattaṃ sūribhya uta va svaśvyaṃ nāsatya rayiṣācaḥ syāma
analyzed: dhattam sūribhyaḥ uta vaḥ su aśvyam nāsatya rayiṣācaḥ syāma

original: RV_01.180.10.1{24} taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayamadyā huvema stomairaśvinā suvitāyanavyam
analyzed: tam vām ratham vayam adya ā huvema stomaiḥ aśvinā suvitāya navyam

original: RV_01.180.10.2{24} ariṣṭanemiṃ pari dyāmiyānaṃ vi...
analyzed: ariṣṭa nemim pari dyāmiyānam vi

original: RV_01.181.01.1{25} kadu preṣṭāviṣāṃ rayīṇāmadhvaryantā yadunninīthoapām
analyzed: kadu preṣṭā viṣām rayīṇām adhvaryantā yat unninītha uapām

original: RV_01.181.01.2{25} ayaṃ vāṃ yajño akṛta praśastiṃ vasudhitī avitārā janānām
analyzed: ayam vām yajñaḥ akṛta praśastim vasu dhitī avitārā janānām

original: RV_01.181.02.1{25} ā vāmaśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspā vātaraṃhaso divyāso atyāḥ
analyzed: ā vāmaśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_01.181.02.2{25} manojuvo vṛṣaṇo vītapṛṣṭhā eha svarājo aśvināvahantu
analyzed: manaḥ juvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ ā iha svarājaḥ aśvinā āvahantu

original: RV_01.181.03.1{25} ā vāṃ ratho 'vanirna pravatvān sṛpravandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ avaniḥ na pravatvān sṛpra vandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_01.181.03.2{25} vṛṣṇa sthātārā manaso javīyānahampūrvo yajatodhiṣṇyā yaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ sthātārā manasaḥ javīyān ahampūrvaḥ yajataḥ dhiṣṇyā yaḥ

original: RV_01.181.04.1{25} iheha jātā samavāvaśītāmarepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ
analyzed: iha iha jātā samavāvaśīta amarepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ

original: RV_01.181.04.2{25} jiṣṇurvāmanyaḥ sumakhasya sūrirdivo anyaḥ subhagaḥ putra ūhe
analyzed: jiṣṇuḥ vām anyaḥ su makhasya sūriḥ divaḥ anyaḥ subhagaḥ putraḥ ūhe

original: RV_01.181.05.1{25} pra vāṃ niceruḥ kakuho vaśānanu piśaṅgarūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ
analyzed: pra vām niceruḥ kakuhaḥ vaśān anu piśaṅga rūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ

original: RV_01.181.05.2{25} harī anyasya pīpayanta vājairmathrā rajāṃsyaśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ
analyzed: harī anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ mathrā rajāṃsi aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ

original: RV_01.181.06.1{26} pra vāṃ śaradvān vṛṣabho na niṣṣāṭ pūrvīriṣaścarati madhva iṣṇan
analyzed: pra vām śaradvān vṛṣabhaḥ na niṣṣāh pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ carati madhvaḥ iṣṇan

original: RV_01.181.06.2{26} evairanyasya pīpayanta vājairveṣantīrūrdhvā nadyo na āguḥ
analyzed: evaiḥ anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ veṣantīḥ ūrdhvāḥ nadyaḥ naḥ āguḥ

original: RV_01.181.07.1{26} asarji vāṃ sthavirā vedhasā gīrbāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī
analyzed: asarji vām sthavirā vedhasā gīḥ bāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī

original: RV_01.181.07.2{26} upastutāvavataṃ nādhamānaṃ yāmannayāmañchṛṇutaṃ havaṃ me
analyzed: upastutau avatam nādhamānam yāman a yāman śṛṇutam havam me

original: RV_01.181.08.1{26} uta syā vāṃ ruśato vapsaso gīstribarhiṣi sadasi pinvatenṝn
analyzed: uta syā vām ruśataḥ vapsasaḥ gīḥ tri barhiṣi sadasi pinvata inṝn

original: RV_01.181.08.2{26} vṛṣā vāṃ megho vṛṣaṇā pīpāya gorna seke manuṣodaśasyan
analyzed: vṛṣā vām meghaḥ vṛṣaṇā pīpāya goḥ na seke manuṣaḥ udaśasyan

original: RV_01.181.09.1{26} yuvāṃ pūṣevāśvinā purandhiragnimuṣāṃ na jarate haviṣmān
analyzed: yuvām pūṣā iva aśvinā purandhiḥ agnim uṣām na jarate haviṣmān

original: RV_01.181.09.2{26} huve yad vāṃ varivasyā gṛṇāno vi...
analyzed: huve yat vām varivasyā gṛṇānaḥ vi

original: RV_01.182.01.1{27} abhūdidaṃ vayunamo ṣu bhūṣatā ratho vṛṣaṇvān madatā manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: abhūt idam vayunam ā u su bhūṣata rathaḥ vṛṣaṇvān madata manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_01.182.01.2{27} dhiyaṃjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalāvasū divo napāta sukṛte śucivratā
analyzed: dhiyaṃjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalā vasū divaḥ napāta sukṛte śuci vratā

original: RV_01.182.02.1{27} indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā
analyzed: indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā

original: RV_01.182.02.2{27} pūrṇaṃ rathaṃ vahethe madhva ācitaṃ tena dāśvāṃsamupa yātho aśvinā
analyzed: pūrṇam ratham vahethe madhvaḥ ācitam tena dāśvāṃsam upa yāthaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_01.182.03.1{27} kimatra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kimāsāthe jano yaḥ kaścidahavirmahīyate
analyzed: kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe janaḥ yaḥ kaścid a haviḥ mahīyate

original: RV_01.182.03.2{27} ati kramiṣṭaṃ jurataṃ paṇerasuṃ jyotirviprāya kṛṇutaṃ vacasyave
analyzed: ati kramiṣṭam juratam paṇerasum jyotiḥ viprāya kṛṇutam vacasyave

original: RV_01.182.04.1{27} jambhayatamabhito rāyataḥ śuno hataṃ mṛdho vidathustānyaśvinā
analyzed: jambhayatam abhitas śunaḥ hatam mṛdhaḥ vidathuḥ tāni aśvinā

original: RV_01.182.04.2{27} vācaṃ-vācaṃ jaritū ratninīṃ kṛtamubhā śaṃsaṃ nāsatyāvataṃ mama
analyzed: vācam vācam jarituḥ ratninīm kṛtam ubhā śaṃsam nāsatyā avatam mama

original: RV_01.182.05.1{27} yuvametaṃ cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavamātmanvantaṃ pakṣiṇantaugryāya kam
analyzed: yuvam etam cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam ātmanvantam pakṣiṇantau augryāya kam

original: RV_01.182.05.2{27} yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanīpetathuḥ kṣodaso mahaḥ
analyzed: yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanīpetathuḥ kṣodasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_01.182.06.1{28} avaviddhaṃ taugryamapsvantaranārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham
analyzed: avaviddham taugryam apsu antar an ārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham

original: RV_01.182.06.2{28} catasro nāvo jaṭhalasya juṣṭā udaśvibhyāmiṣitāḥ pārayanti
analyzed: catasraḥ nāvaḥ jaṭhalasya juṣṭāḥ udaśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti

original: RV_01.182.07.1{28} kaḥ svid vṛkṣo niṣṭhito madhye arṇaso yaṃ taugryo nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat
analyzed: kaḥ svid vṛkṣaḥ niṣṭhitaḥ madhye arṇasaḥ yam taugryaḥ nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat

original: RV_01.182.07.2{28} parṇā mṛgasya patarorivārabha udaśvinā ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam
analyzed: parṇā mṛgasya pataroḥ iva ārabhe udaśvinau ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam

original: RV_01.182.08.1{28} tad vāṃ narā nāsatyāvanu ṣyād yad vāṃ mānāsa ucathamavocan
analyzed: tat vām narā nāsatyau anu syāt yat vām mānāsaḥ ucatham avocan

original: RV_01.182.08.2{28} asmādadya sadasaḥ somyādā] vi...
analyzed: asmāt adya sadasaḥ somya ādāḥ vi

original: RV_01.183.01.1{29} taṃ yuñjāthāṃ manaso yo javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇa yastricakraḥ
analyzed: tam yuñjāthām manasaḥ yaḥ javīyān tri vandhuraḥ vṛṣaṇa yaḥ tri cakraḥ

original: RV_01.183.01.2{29} yenopayāthaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tridhātuna patathovirna parṇaiḥ
analyzed: yena upayāthaḥ su kṛtaḥ duroṇam tri dhātuna patathaḥ ūviḥ na parṇaiḥ

original: RV_01.183.02.1{29} suvṛd ratho vartate yannabhi kṣāṃ yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantānu pṛkṣe
analyzed: suvṛt rathaḥ vartate yan abhi kṣām yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantā anu pṛkṣe

original: RV_01.183.02.2{29} vapurvapuṣyā sacatāmiyaṃ gīrdivo duhitroṣasā sacethe
analyzed: vapuḥ vapuṣyā sacatām iyam gīḥ divaḥ duhitrā uṣasā sacethe

original: RV_01.183.03.1{29} ā tiṣṭhataṃ suvṛtaṃ yo ratho vāmanu vratāni vartate haviṣmān
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhatam suvṛtam yaḥ rathaḥ vām anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān

original: RV_01.183.03.2{29} yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartiryāthastanayāyatmane ca
analyzed: yena narā nāsatyā iṣayadhyai vartiḥ yāthaḥ tanayā ayatmane ca

original: RV_01.183.04.1{29} mā vāṃ vṛko mā vṛkīrā dadharṣīn mā pari varktamutamāti dhaktam
analyzed: mā vām vṛkaḥ mā vṛkīrā dadharṣīt mā pari varktam utamā ati dhaktam

original: RV_01.183.04.2{29} ayaṃ vāṃ bhāgo nihita iyaṃ gīrdasrāvime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām
analyzed: ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ iyam gīḥ dasrau ime vām nidhayaḥ madhūnām

original: RV_01.183.05.1{29} yuvāṃ gotamaḥ purumīḷho atrirdasrā havate 'vase haviṣmān
analyzed: yuvām gotamaḥ purumīḍhaḥ atriḥ dasrā havate avase haviṣmān

original: RV_01.183.05.2{29} diśaṃ na diṣṭām ṛjūyeva yantā me havaṃ nāsatyopa yātam
analyzed: diśam na diṣṭām ṛjūyā iva yantā me havam nāsatyā upa yātam

original: RV_01.183.06.1{29} atāriṣma tamasas pāramasya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināvadhāyi
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāramasya prati vām stomaḥ aśvinā avadhāyi

original: RV_01.183.06.2{29} eha yātaṃ pathibhirdevayānairvi...
analyzed: ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ vi

original: RV_01.184.01.1{01} tā vāmadya tāvaparaṃ huvemochantyāmuṣasi vahnirukthaiḥ
analyzed: tā vām adya tau aparam huvema ucchantyām uṣasi vahniḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_01.184.01.2{01} nāsatyā kuha cit santāvaryo divo napātā sudāstarāya
analyzed: nāsatyā kuha cit santāvaryaḥ divaḥ napātā sudāstarāya

original: RV_01.184.02.1{01} asme ū ṣu vṛṣaṇā mādayethāmut paṇīnrhatamūrmyā madantā
analyzed: asme u su vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ud paṇīn hatamūrmyā madantā

original: RV_01.184.02.2{01} śrutaṃ me achoktibhirmatīnāmeṣṭā narā nicetāraca karṇaiḥ
analyzed: śrutam me achoktibhiḥ matīnām īṣṭāḥ narāḥ karṇaiḥ

original: RV_01.184.03.1{01} śriye pūṣanniṣukṛteva devā nāsatyā vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ
analyzed: śriye pūṣan niṣukṛtā iva devā nāsatyā vahatum sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_01.184.03.2{01} vacyante vāṃ kakuhā apsu jātā yugā jūrṇeva varuṇasya bhūreḥ
analyzed: vacyante vām kakuhāḥ apsu jātāḥ yugā jūrṇā iva varuṇasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_01.184.04.1{01} asme sā vāṃ mādhvī rātirastu stomaṃ hinotaṃ mānyasya kāroḥ
analyzed: asme sā vām mādhvī rātiḥ astu stomam hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_01.184.04.2{01} anu yad vāṃ śravasyā sudānū suvīryāya carṣaṇayomadanti
analyzed: anu yat vām śravasyā sudānū su vīryāya carṣaṇayaḥ madanti

original: RV_01.184.05.1{01} eṣa vāṃ stomo aśvināvakāri mānebhirmaghavānā suvṛkti
analyzed: eṣa vām stomaḥ aśvinā akāri mānebhiḥ maghavānā suvṛkti

original: RV_01.184.05.2{01} yātaṃ vartistanayāya tmane cāgastye nāsatyā madantā
analyzed: yātam vartiḥ tanayāya tmane ca agastye nāsatyā madantā
atāriṣma

original: RV_01.185.01.1{02} katarā pūrvā katarāparāyoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ ko vi veda
analyzed: katarā pūrvā katarā aparā ayoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ kaḥ vi veda

original: RV_01.185.01.2{02} viśvaṃ tmanā bibhṛto yad dha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyeva
analyzed: viśvam tmanā bibhṛtaḥ yat ha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyā iva

original: RV_01.185.02.1{02} bhūriṃ dve acarantī carantaṃ padvantaṃ garbhamapadī dadhāte
analyzed: bhūrim dve a carantī carantam padvantam garbham apadī dadhāte

original: RV_01.185.02.2{02} nityaṃ na sūnuṃ pitrorupasthe dyāvā rakṣataṃ pṛthivī no abhvāt
analyzed: nityam na sūnum pitroḥ upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_01.185.03.1{02} aneho dātramaditeranarvaṃ huve svarvadavadhaṃ namasvat
analyzed: anehaḥ dātram aditeḥ anarvam huve svarvat avadham namasvat

original: RV_01.185.03.2{02} tad rodasī janayataṃ jaritre dyāvā ...
analyzed: tat rodasī janayatam jaritre dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.04.1{02} atapyamāne avasāvantī anu ṣyāma rodasī devaputre
analyzed: a tapyamāne avasā avantī anu syāma rodasī deva putre

original: RV_01.185.04.2{02} ubhe devānāmubhayebhirahnāṃ dyāvā ...
analyzed: ubhe devānām ubhayebhiḥ ahnām dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.05.1{02} saṃgachamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitrorupasthe
analyzed: saṃgacchamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitroḥ upasthe

original: RV_01.185.05.2{02} abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhiṃ dyāvā ...
analyzed: abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhim dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.06.1{03} urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānāmavasā janitrī
analyzed: urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānām avasā janitrī

original: RV_01.185.06.2{03} dadhāte ye amṛtaṃ supratīke dyāvā ...
analyzed: dadhāte ye amṛtam su pratīke dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.07.1{03} urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin
analyzed: urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin

original: RV_01.185.07.2{03} dadhāte ye subhage supratūrtī dyāvā ...
analyzed: dadhāte ye subhage su pratūrtī dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.08.1{03} devān vā yaccakṛmā kaccidāgaḥ sakhāyaṃ vā sadamijjāspatiṃ vā
analyzed: devān vā yat cakṛma kaccit āgaḥ sakhāyam vā sadamidh jāspatim vā

original: RV_01.185.08.2{03} iyaṃ dhīrbhūyā avayānameṣāṃ dyāvā .. .
analyzed: iyam dhīḥ bhūyāḥ avayānam eṣām dyāvā

original: RV_01.185.09.1{03} ubhā śaṃsā naryā māmaviṣṭāmubhe māmūtī avasā sacetām
analyzed: ubhā śaṃsā naryā mām aviṣṭām ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām

original: RV_01.185.09.2{03} bhūri cidaryaḥ sudāstarāyeṣā madanta iṣayema devāḥ
analyzed: bhūri cit aryaḥ sudāstarāya iṣā madantaḥ iṣayema devāḥ

original: RV_01.185.10.1{03} ṛtaṃ dive tadavocaṃ pṛthivyā abhiśrāvāya prathamaṃ sumedhāḥ
analyzed: ṛtam dive tat avocam pṛthivyai abhiśrāvāya prathamam sumedhāḥ

original: RV_01.185.10.2{03} pātāmavadyād duritādabhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatāmavobhiḥ
analyzed: pātām avadyāt duritāt abhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ

original: RV_01.185.11.1{03} idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī satyamastu pitarmātaryadihopabruve vām
analyzed: idam dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu pitar mātar yat iha upabruve vām

original: RV_01.185.11.2{03} bhūtaṃ devānāmavame avobhirvidyā...
analyzed: bhūtam devānām avame avobhiḥ vidyā

original: RV_01.186.01.1{04} ā na iḷabhirvidathe suśasti viśvānaraḥ savitā deva etu
analyzed: ā naḥ iḷabhiḥ vidathe su śasti viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ etu

original: RV_01.186.01.2{04} api yathā yuvāno matsathā no viśvaṃ jagadabhipitve manīṣā
analyzed: api yathā yuvānaḥ matsatha naḥ viśvam jagat abhipitve manīṣā

original: RV_01.186.02.1{04} ā no viśva āskrā gamantu devā mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ viśve āskrāḥ gamantu devāḥ mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_01.186.02.2{04} bhuvan yathā no viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan suṣāhā vithuraṃ na śavaḥ
analyzed: bhuvan yathā naḥ viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan vithuram na śavaḥ

original: RV_01.186.03.1{04} preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'gniṃ śastibhisturvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: preṣṭham vaḥ atithim gṛṇīṣe agnim śastibhiḥ turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_01.186.03.2{04} asad yathā no varuṇaḥ sukīrtiriṣaśca parṣadarigūrtaḥ sūriḥ
analyzed: asat yathā naḥ varuṇaḥ su kīrtiḥ iṣaḥ ca parṣat ari gūrtaḥ sūriḥ

analyzed: upa vaḥ eṣe namasā jigīṣā uṣāsānaktā su dughā iva dhenuḥ

original: RV_01.186.04.2{04} samāne ahan vimimāno arkaṃ viṣurūpe payasi sasminnūdhan
analyzed: samāne ahan vimimānaḥ arkam viṣurūpe payasi sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_01.186.05.1{04} uta no 'hirbudhnyo mayas kaḥ śiśuṃ na pipyuṣīva veti sindhuḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ ahirbudhnyaḥ mayaḥ kaḥ śiśum na pipyuṣī iva veti sindhuḥ

original: RV_01.186.05.2{04} yena napātamapāṃ junāma manojuvo vṛṣaṇo yaṃ vahanti
analyzed: yena napātam apām junāma manaḥ juvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yam vahanti

original: RV_01.186.06.1{05} uta na īṃ tvaṣṭā gantvachā smat sūribhirabhipitve sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ īm tvaṣṭā gantu achā smat sūribhiḥ abhipitve sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_01.186.06.2{05} ā vṛtrahendraścarṣaṇiprāstuviṣṭamo narāṃ naiha gamyāḥ
analyzed: ā vṛtrahā indraḥ carṣaṇi prāḥ tuviṣṭamaḥ narām na iha gamyāḥ

original: RV_01.186.07.1{05} uta na īṃ matayo 'śvayogaḥ śiśuṃ na gāvastaruṇaṃ rihanti
analyzed: uta naḥ īm matayaḥ aśva yogaḥ śiśum na gāvaḥ taruṇam rihanti

original: RV_01.186.07.2{05} tamīṃ giro janayo na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamaṃ narāṃnasanta
analyzed: tam īm giraḥ janayaḥ na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamam narān nasanta

original: RV_01.186.08.1{05} uta na īṃ maruto vṛddhasenāḥ smad rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu
analyzed: uta naḥ īm marutaḥ vṛddha senāḥ smat rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu

original: RV_01.186.08.2{05} pṛṣadaśvāso 'vanayaḥ na rathā riśādaso mitrayujo na devāḥ
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ avanayaḥ na rathāḥ riśādasaḥ mitra yujaḥ na devāḥ

original: RV_01.186.09.1{05} pra nu yadeṣāṃ mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujaste suvṛkti
analyzed: pra nu yat eṣām mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujaḥ te suvṛkti

original: RV_01.186.09.2{05} adha yadeṣāṃ sudine na śarurviśvameriṇaṃ pruṣāyanta senaḥ
analyzed: adha yat eṣām sudine na śaruḥ viśvam iriṇam pruṣāyanta senaḥ

original: RV_01.186.10.1{05} pro aśvināvavase kṛṇudhvaṃ pra pūṣaṇaṃ svatavaso hi santi
analyzed: pra u aśvinau avase kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇam sva tavasaḥ hi santi

original: RV_01.186.10.2{05} adveṣo viṣṇurvāta ṛbhukṣā achā sumnāya vavṛtīyadevān
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ vātaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ achā sumnāya vavṛtīyadevān

original: RV_01.186.11.1{05} iyaṃ sā vo asme dīdhitiryajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyaḥ
analyzed: iyam sā vaḥ asme dīdhitiḥ yajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyas

original: RV_01.186.11.2{05} ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyurvi...
analyzed: ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyuḥ vi

original: RV_01.187.01.1{06} pituṃ nu stoṣaṃ maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm
analyzed: pitum nu stoṣam mahaḥ dharmāṇam taviṣīm

original: RV_01.187.01.2{06} yasya trito vyojasā vṛtraṃ viparvamardayat
analyzed: yasya tritaḥ vyojasā vṛtram viparvamardayat

original: RV_01.187.02.1{06} svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvā vavṛmahe
analyzed: svādo pitaḥ madho pitaḥ vayam tvā vavṛmahe

original: RV_01.187.02.2{06} asmākamavitā bhava
analyzed: asmākam avitā bhava

original: RV_01.187.03.1{06} upa naḥ pitavā cara śivaḥ śivābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: upa naḥ pitavā cara śivaḥ śivābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_01.187.03.2{06} mayobhuradviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśevo advayāḥ
analyzed: mayobhuḥ adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā su śevaḥ advayāḥ

original: RV_01.187.04.1{06} tava tye pito rasa rajāṃsyanu viṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: tava tye pito rasa rajāṃsi anu viṣṭhitāḥ

original: RV_01.187.04.2{06} divi vātā iva śritāḥ
analyzed: divi vātāḥ iva śritāḥ

original: RV_01.187.05.1{06} tava tye pito dadatastava svādiṣṭha te pito
analyzed: tava tye pito dadataḥ tava svādiṣṭha te pito

original: RV_01.187.05.2{06} pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate
analyzed: pra svādmānaḥ rasānām tuvi grīvāḥ iva īrate

original: RV_01.187.06.1{07} tve pito mahānāṃ devānāṃ mano hitām
analyzed: tve pito mahānām devānām manaḥ hitām

original: RV_01.187.06.2{07} akāri cāru ketunā tavāhimavasāvadhīt
analyzed: akāri cāru ketunā tava ahim avasā avadhīt

original: RV_01.187.07.1{07} yadado pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām
analyzed: yat adaḥ pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām

original: RV_01.187.07.2{07} atrā cin no madho pito 'raṃ bhakṣāya gamyāḥ
analyzed: atrā cit naḥ madho pito aram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_01.187.08.1{07} yadapāmoṣadhīnāṃ pariṃśamāriśāmahe
analyzed: yat apām oṣadhīnām pariṃśam āriśāmahe

original: RV_01.187.08.2{07} vātape pīvaid bhava
analyzed: vātape pīvaid bhava

original: RV_01.187.09.1{07} yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe
analyzed: yat te soma gavāśiraḥ yava āśiraḥ bhajāmahe
vāta āpe

original: RV_01.187.10.1{07} karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ
analyzed: karambhaḥ oṣadhe bhava pīvaḥ vṛkkaḥ udārathiḥ
vāta āpe

original: RV_01.187.11.1{07} taṃ tvā vayaṃ pito vacobhirgāvo na havyā suṣūdima
analyzed: tam tvā vayam pito vacobhiḥ gāvaḥ na havyā suṣūdima

original: RV_01.187.11.2{07} devebhyastvā sadhamādamasmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādam
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā sadhamādam asmabhyam tvā sadhamādam

original: RV_01.188.01.1{08} samiddho adya rājasi devo devaiḥ sahasrajit
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya rājasi devaḥ devaiḥ sahasra jit

original: RV_01.188.01.2{08} dūto havyā kavirvaha
analyzed: dūtaḥ havyā kaviḥ vaha

original: RV_01.188.02.1{08} tanunapād ṛtaṃ yate madhvā yajñaḥ samajyate
analyzed: tanunapāt ṛtam yate madhvā yajñaḥ samajyate

original: RV_01.188.02.2{08} dadhat sahasriṇīriṣaḥ
analyzed: dadhat sahasriṇīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_01.188.03.1{08} ājuhvāno na īḍyo devānā vakṣi yajñiyān
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ naḥ īḍyaḥ devān ā vakṣi yajñiyān

original: RV_01.188.03.2{08} agne sahasrasā asi
analyzed: agne sahasra sāḥ asi

original: RV_01.188.04.1{08} prācīnaṃ barhirojasā sahasravīramastṛṇan
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ ojasā sahasra vīram astṛṇan

original: RV_01.188.04.2{08} yatrādityā virājatha
analyzed: yatra ādityāḥ virājatha

original: RV_01.188.05.1{08} virāṭ samrāḍ vibhvīḥ prabhvīrbahvīśca bhūyasīścayāḥ
analyzed: virāj samrāj vibhvīḥ prabhvīḥ bahvīḥ ca bhūyasīḥ ca yāḥ

original: RV_01.188.05.2{08} duro ghṛtānyakṣaran
analyzed: duraḥ ghṛtāni akṣaran

original: RV_01.188.06.1{09} surukme hi supeśasādhi śriyā virājataḥ
analyzed: su rukme hi supeśasā adhi śriyā virājataḥ

original: RV_01.188.06.2{09} uṣāsāvehasīdatām
analyzed: uṣāsāva iha sīdatām

original: RV_01.188.07.1{09} prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī
analyzed: prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī

original: RV_01.188.07.2{09} yajñaṃ no yakṣatāmimam
analyzed: yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam

original: RV_01.188.08.1{09} bhāratīḷe sarasvati yā vaḥ sarvā upabruve
analyzed: bhārati iḍe sarasvati yāḥ vaḥ sarvāḥ upabruve

original: RV_01.188.08.2{09} tā naścodayata śriye
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ codayata śriye

original: RV_01.188.09.1{09} tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśun viśvān samānaje
analyzed: tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśun viśvān samānaje

original: RV_01.188.09.2{09} teṣāṃ naḥ sphātimā yaja
analyzed: teṣām naḥ sphātimāḥ yaja

original: RV_01.188.10.1{09} upa tmanyā vanaspate pātho devebhyaḥ sṛja
analyzed: upa tmanyā vanaspate pāthaḥ devebhyaḥ sṛja

original: RV_01.188.10.2{09} agnirhavyāni siṣvadat
analyzed: agniḥ havyāni siṣvadat

original: RV_01.188.11.1{09} purogā agnirdevānāṃ gāyatreṇa samajyate
analyzed: purogāḥ agniḥ devānām gāyatreṇa samajyate

original: RV_01.188.11.2{09} svāhākṛtīṣu rocate
analyzed: svāhākṛtīṣu rocate

original: RV_01.189.01.1{10} agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān
analyzed: agne naya su pathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān

original: RV_01.189.01.2{10} yuyodhyasmajjuhurāṇameno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃvidhema
analyzed: yuyodhi asmat juhurāṇam enaḥ bhūyiṣṭhām te namauktim vidhema

original: RV_01.189.02.1{10} agne tvaṃ pārayā navyo asmān svastibhirati durgāṇi viśvā
analyzed: agne tvam pāraya navyaḥ asmān svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā

original: RV_01.189.02.2{10} puśca pṛthvī bahulā na urvi bhavā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ
analyzed: puśca pṛthvī bahulā naḥ urvi bhava tokāya tanayāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_01.189.03.1{10} agne tvamasmad yuyodhyamīvā anagnitrā abhyamanta kṛṣṭīḥ
analyzed: agne tvam asmat yuyodhi amīvāḥ anagnitrāḥ abhyamanta kṛṣṭīḥ

original: RV_01.189.03.2{10} punarasmabhyaṃ suvitāya deva kṣāṃ viśvebhiramṛtebhiryajatra
analyzed: punar asmabhyam suvitāya deva kṣām viśvebhiḥ amṛtebhiḥ yajatra

original: RV_01.189.04.1{10} pāhi no agne pāyubhirajasrairuta priye sadana ā śuśukvān
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne pāyubhiḥ ajasraiḥ uta priye sadane ā śuśukvān

original: RV_01.189.04.2{10} mā te bhayaṃ jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha nūnaṃ vidan māparaṃ sahasvaḥ
analyzed: mā te bhayam jaritāram yaviṣṭha nūnam vidat mā aparam sahasvas

original: RV_01.189.05.1{10} mā no agne 'va sṛjo aghāyāviṣyave ripave duchunāyai
analyzed: mā naḥ agne ava sṛjaḥ aghāya aviṣyave ripave duchunāyai

original: RV_01.189.05.2{10} mādatvate daśate mādate no mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ
analyzed: mādatvate daśate mādate na u mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ

original: RV_01.189.06.1{11} vi gha tvāvān ṛtajāta yaṃsad gṛṇāno agne tanve varūtham
analyzed: vi gha tvāvān ṛta jāta yaṃsat gṛṇānaḥ agne tanve varūtham

original: RV_01.189.06.2{11} viśvād ririkṣoruta vā ninitsorabhihrutāmasi hi deva viṣpaṭ
analyzed: viśvāt ririkṣoḥ uta vā ninitsoḥ abhihrutām asi hi deva viṣpaṭ

original: RV_01.189.07.1{11} tvaṃ tānagna ubhayāniv vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣo yajatra
analyzed: tvam tān agne ubhayān iv vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣaḥ yajatra

original: RV_01.189.07.2{11} abhipitve manave śāsyo bhūrmarmṛjenya uśigbhirnākraḥ
analyzed: abhipitve manave śāsyaḥ bhūrmarmṛjenyaḥ uśigbhiḥ na akraḥ

original: RV_01.189.08.1{11} avocāma nivacanānyasmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau
analyzed: avocāma nivacanāni asmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau

original: RV_01.189.08.2{11} vayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vi...
analyzed: vayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vi

original: RV_01.190.01.1{12} anarvāṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ mandrajihvaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ vardhayā navyamarkaiḥ
analyzed: anarvāṇam vṛṣabham mandra jihvam bṛhaspatim vardhaya navyam arkaiḥ

original: RV_01.190.01.2{12} gāthānyaḥ suruco yasya devā āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ
analyzed: gāthānyaḥ su rucaḥ yasya devāḥ āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ

original: RV_01.190.02.1{12} tam ṛtviyā upa vācaḥ sacante sargo na yo devayatāmasarji
analyzed: tam ṛtviyāḥ upa vācaḥ sacante sargaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji

original: RV_01.190.02.2{12} bṛhaspatiḥ sa hyañjo varāṃsi vibhvābhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi añjaḥ varāṃsi vibhvā abhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā

original: RV_01.190.03.1{12} upastutiṃ namasa udyatiṃ ca ślokaṃ yaṃsat saviteva pra bāhū
analyzed: upastutim namase udyatim ca ślokam yaṃsat savitā iva pra bāhū

original: RV_01.190.03.2{12} asya kratvāhanyo yo asti mṛgo na bhīmo arakṣasastuviṣmān
analyzed: asya kratvā ahanyaḥ yaḥ asti mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ arakṣasaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_01.190.04.1{12} asya śloko divīyate pṛthivyāmatyo na yaṃsad yakṣabhṛd vicetāḥ
analyzed: asya ślokaḥ divi īyate pṛthivyām atyaḥ na yaṃsat yakṣa bhṛt vicetāḥ

original: RV_01.190.04.2{12} mṛgāṇāṃ na hetayo yanti cemā bṛhaspaterahimāyānabhi dyūn
analyzed: mṛgāṇām na hetayaḥ yanti ca imāḥ bṛhaspateḥ ahi māyān abhi dyūn

original: RV_01.190.05.1{12} ye tvā devosrikaṃ manyamānāḥ pāpā bhadramupajīvanti pajrāḥ
analyzed: ye tvā deva usrikam manyamānāḥ pāpāḥ bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ

original: RV_01.190.05.2{12} na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmaṃ bṛhaspate cayasa it piyārum
analyzed: na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam bṛhaspate cayase id piyārum

original: RV_01.190.06.1{13} supraituḥ sūyavaso na panthā durniyantuḥ pariprīto na mitraḥ
analyzed: su praituḥ sū yavasaḥ na panthāḥ durniyantuḥ pariprītaḥ na mitraḥ

original: RV_01.190.06.2{13} anarvāṇo abhi ye cakṣate no 'pīvṛtā aporṇuvanto asthuḥ
analyzed: anarvāṇaḥ abhi ye cakṣate naḥ apīvṛtāḥ aporṇuvantaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_01.190.07.1{13} saṃ yaṃ stubho 'vanayo na yanti samudraṃ na sravato rodhacakrāḥ
analyzed: sam yam stubhaḥ avanayaḥ na yanti samudram na sravataḥ rodha cakrāḥ

original: RV_01.190.07.2{13} sa vidvānubhayaṃ caṣṭe antarbṛhaspatistara āpaśca gṛdhraḥ
analyzed: sa vidvān ubhayam caṣṭe antar bṛhaspatiḥ taraḥ āpaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ

original: RV_01.190.08.1{13} evā mahastuvijātastuviṣmān bṛhaspatirvṛṣabho dhāyi devaḥ
analyzed: eva mahaḥ tuvi jātaḥ tuviṣmān bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ dhāyi devaḥ

original: RV_01.190.08.2{13} sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad vi...
analyzed: sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat dhātu gomat vi

original: RV_01.191.01.1{14} kaṅkato na kaṅkato 'tho satīnakaṅkataḥ
analyzed: kaṅkataḥ na kaṅkataḥ atho satīna kaṅkataḥ

original: RV_01.191.01.2{14} dvāviti pluṣī iti nyadṛṣṭa alipsata
analyzed: dvau iti pluṣī iti nyadṛṣṭa alipsata

original: RV_01.191.02.1{14} adṛṣṭān hantyāyatyatho hanti parāyatī
analyzed: adṛṣṭān hanti āyatī atho hanti parāyatī

original: RV_01.191.02.2{14} atho avaghnatī hantyatho pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī
analyzed: atha u avaghnatī hanti atha u pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī

original: RV_01.191.03.1{14} śarāsaḥ kuśarāso darbhāsaḥ sairyā uta
analyzed: śarāsaḥ kuśarāsaḥ darbhāsaḥ sairyāḥ uta

original: RV_01.191.03.2{14} mauñjā adṛṣṭā vairiṇāḥ sarve sākaṃ nyalipsata
analyzed: mauñjāḥ adṛṣṭāḥ vairiṇāḥ sarve sākam nyalipsata

original: RV_01.191.04.1{14} ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata
analyzed: ni gāvaḥ goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata

original: RV_01.191.04.2{14} ni ketavo janānāṃ nyadṛṣṭā alipsata
analyzed: ni ketavaḥ janānām nyadṛṣṭāḥ alipsata

original: RV_01.191.05.1{14} eta u tye pratyadṛśran pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva
analyzed: ete u tye pratyadṛśran pradoṣam taskarāḥ iva

original: RV_01.191.05.2{14} adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ viśva dṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana

original: RV_01.191.06.1{15} dyaurvaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somo bhrātāditiḥ svasā
analyzed: dyauḥ vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somaḥ bhrātā aditiḥ svasā

original: RV_01.191.06.2{15} adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭāstiṣṭhatelayatā su kam
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ viśva dṛṣṭāḥ tiṣṭhata ilayata su kam

original: RV_01.191.07.1{15} ye aṃsyā ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkā ye prakaṅkatāḥ
analyzed: ye aṃsyāḥ ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkāḥ ye prakaṅkatāḥ

original: RV_01.191.07.2{15} adṛṣṭāḥ kiṃ caneha vaḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata
analyzed: adṛṣṭāḥ kim cana iha vaḥ sarve sākam ni jasyata

original: RV_01.191.08.1{15} ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā
analyzed: ud purastāt sūryaḥ eti viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā

original: RV_01.191.08.2{15} adṛṣṭān sarvāñ jambhayan sarvāśca yātudhānyaḥ
analyzed: adṛṣṭān sarvām jambhayan sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ

original: RV_01.191.09.1{15} udapaptadasau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan
analyzed: udapaptat asau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan

original: RV_01.191.09.2{15} ādityaḥ parvatebhyo viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā
analyzed: ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā

original: RV_01.191.10.1{15} sūrye viṣamā sajāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe
analyzed: sūrye viṣamā sajāmi dṛtim surāvataḥ gṛhe

original: RV_01.191.10.2{15} so cin nu namarāti no vayaṃ marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvāmadhulā cakāra
analyzed: sā u cit nu namarāti naḥ vayam marāma āre asya yojanam hariṣṭhāḥ madhu tvā a madhulā cakāra

original: RV_01.191.11.1{16} iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam
analyzed: iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam
sā u cit nu

original: RV_01.191.12.1{16} triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyamakṣan
analyzed: tris sapta viṣpuliṅgakāḥ viṣasya puṣyam akṣan

original: RV_01.191.12.2{16} tāścinnu na maranti no vayaṃ ma...
analyzed: tāḥ cit nu na maranti na u vayam

original: RV_01.191.13.1{16} navānāṃ navatīnāṃ viṣasya ropuṣīṇām
analyzed: navānām navatīnām viṣasya ropuṣīṇām

original: RV_01.191.13.2{16} sarvāsāmagrabhaṃ nāmāre asya yo...
analyzed: sarvāsām agrabham nāma āre asya

original: RV_01.191.14.1{16} triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ
analyzed: tris sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāraḥ agruvaḥ

original: RV_01.191.14.2{16} tāste viṣaṃ vi jabhrira udakaṃ kumbhinīriva
analyzed: tāḥ te viṣam vi jabhrire udakam kumbhinīḥ iva

original: RV_01.191.15.1{16} iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakastakaṃ bhinadmyaśmanā
analyzed: iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakaḥ takam bhinadmi aśmanā

original: RV_01.191.15.2{16} tato viṣaṃ pra vāvṛte parācīranu saṃvataḥ
analyzed: tatas viṣam pra vāvṛte parācīḥ anu saṃvataḥ

original: RV_01.191.16.1{16} kuṣumbhakastadabravīd gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ
analyzed: kuṣumbhakaḥ tat abravīt gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ

original: RV_01.191.16.2{16} vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣamarasaṃ vṛścika te viṣam
analyzed: vṛścikasya arasam viṣama rasam vṛścika te viṣam
